name: aplace/antwerp: cosy suite - fashion district
description:
Decorated in a vintage style combined with a few new objects which quarantees you a warm and cosy room.

The space
Aplace Antwerp is located on a charming little square in the very center of Antwerp (fashion district area). Literally around the corner of everything you want to see in this beautifull city.

This suite has been completely renovated since december 2012. It is being decorated in a vintage style combined with a few new objects which quarantees you a warm and cosy room.

It has a small sitting corner with sofa, digital tv, a docking station, dvd-player, a shared kitchinette with Illy espresso machine, a perculator and a little fridge and a microwave. The bathroom has a walk-in / rainshower.


This suite is situated in the back of the building and is extremely cosy.

Aplace is situated in the middle of the old town of Antwerp. On the corner of ‘de Groenplaats’ and the Big Market, the designer shops and the ‘Kl
host_about: Since my childhoocd I dreamt of having my own small/tiny 'hotel' and my dream became real. In combination with my passion for designing interiors, I'm absolutely doing what I like to do most: hosting & decorating, an ideal match.

name: Trendy Vacation Apartment Antwerp
description:
Enjoy your stay at our 4 person apartment in the trendy old harbour of Antwerp. It entails all the luxury and comfort you need for a short or longer stay in the vibrant city.

The space
You'll have the chance to stay in a very nice, new modern apartment, for 4 guests, ideally located, at the Antwerp Marina (neighbourhood 't Eilandje), between the new MAS museum and the Red Star Line museum. It is located 15 minutes walk to the historic city center, in a lively trendy, upcoming neighbourhood, with plenty of restaurants, cafés, art galleries, ... We'll be glad to advice you on the nice places in this area.

A spacious, completely new apartment, with all amenities : 2 bedrooms, each with a kingsize boxspring bed, 2 bathrooms, 2 terraces, 2 toilets, a spacious living room, a fully equipped kitchen (microwave, oven, dishwasher, Nespresso machine, etc, ...
Flatscreen tv, stereo, dvd, ipod connection, wireless WiFi internet, ,

There is a parki
neighborhood_overview: The area "`t eilandje" is located at the old harbour of the city. It has a unique laidback vibe, with a lot of great restaurants, bars and cafés. Enjoy a glass on one of the many terrasses or just a walk through the MAS museum. You could also walk to the city centre in 15 minutes.
host_about: My wife Gina and I will be glad to welcome you and help you have a great stay in Antwerp.

name: Large stylish room in 1930s house + garden
description:
Large bedroom in classic 1930s house. Kitchen, 2 bathrooms, terrace and garden for common use. Parks and free outdoor swimming pool nearby at 200 meters.
Minimum period of stay 14 days.
Bedroom is fully furnished, including mattress. Large and fully equipped bathroom for common use on the same floor. Ground floor: fully equipped kitchen for common use. You are welcome as well to enjoy garden and terrace on the ground floor. Tram stop to city centre (10 minutes) at 50 meters.

The space
My house is too big for me currently to use the second floor and the entire first floor as well, so I am looking for students or professionals to rent these (furnished) spaces out to. Currently 4 people are living in the house. Most of us are young foreign professionals.
Pictures show only one of the bathrooms and the room on the 1st floor (the one with antique furniture). Second floor: 2 big bedrooms (20 and 25m²) and 1 bathroom.
First floor: 2 big bedrooms (2
neighborhood_overview: The house is located in one of the most beautiful and most quiet neighbourhoods of Antwerp. 2 parks at 200m distance, as wel as tram stops at 50m distance. Trams take you in 5 min to Antwerpen-Berchem railway station and in 10 min to Antwerpen-Centraal railway station.
host_about: I am a person with a job in research, and I like reading, listening to music, cycling, and speaking foreign languages. My house is too big for me currently to use it entirely, so I am looking for visitors to rent the extra space out to. I am only looking for longer stays, at least for two weeks.

name: APARTMENT ROSCAM - OLD CENTRE ANTWERP
description:
The space
Apartment "Roscam" is a charming self catering guest apartment situated on the Vrijdagmarkt, a peaceful square in the fashion district area, right in the old city center of Antwerp.

A cosy living room (incl. double sofa bed), one comfortable bedroom with a double bed, a fully equipped kitchen (coffee, tea, boiler, microwave, toaster), and a bathroom with a shower.
The apartment is perfect for a couple and could host up to four people.

The flat is very cozy and warm with many windows and natural light surrounded by lots of museums, galleries, bars, restaurants and antiques shops. Everything you are looking for in Antwerp is there to be discovered!

Guest access
The apartment is on the first floor but there is no elevator.

Other things to note
The price of the apartment comprises the stay of two people. Per extra guest we charge an additional 25€ per person, per night.
neighborhood_overview: There is a paid parking lot around the corner. In case you come by train, it takes a thirty minutes walk from the station to the apartment, or you can take the subway from the central station to ''Groenplaats'' (2 mins from the apartment).
host_about:
Hello! My name is Kristien, living and working in the center of Antwerp. I own a little café and always enjoy discovering cities, making nice rides on my motorcycle, and going for long walks with my little dog called Roma. 

Please, do not hesitate to contact me in case you would have any questions or requests. I speak Nederlands, English, français & deutsch.
Hope to meet you soon and to make sure you'll have the most wonderful stay in Antwerp that you could wish for.

Best greetings from Antwerp!
At your service,
Kristien

name: Marleen's home in Antwerp city
description:
your entire, private groundfloor 2-bedroom apartment and garden

The space
We welcome you on the ground floor of our house, situated in a quiet residential area of Antwerp. We live near “Elixir d’Anvers” (a delicious liquor), near the cultural center De Singel and near Antwerp Expo. You can walk to the city center, take a tram or rent a city bike.
You have lots of space, making our house suitable for longer stays. We prefer stays of minimum 3 nights. You're welcome for 1 or 2 nights too, but we only take these short term stays max. 2 weeks in advance.
Our flat provides one double and one single room. You get to the single room through the double room, so we only accommodate for a single party of maximum three people.
You have your own bathroom with shower and toilet, a full blown kitchen, a very cosy living-room (the library) and a small dining-room. And ... your own private garden.
We, the owners, live on the first floor and we will look
host_about:
I'm a reader, gardener and I like meeting people. I also like cooking, going to restaurants, concerts, theatre and dance-performances. I try to be a real ambassador for my city and region.

Being a member of the Antwerp B&B-Association, I rent my groundfloor apartment on a professional basis. If you need an invoice for your stay, that's no problem.

I dislike arrogant people.

name: 1-bedroom apartment with court yard
description:
The space
Big one-bedroom apartment with court yard. Living room, dining room, fully equiped kitchen with cupola, bathroom, bedroom, seperate toilet. Very sunny and cosy place in the centre of Antwerp. Close to the central station (5 min. walk) and the Roosevelplaats (bus and metro station).
Newly renovated apartment, retrostyle decorated.
Digital tv, surround sound system, big flat screen tv, free WiFi, Nespresso-machine...

Walking distance to the Zoo, cinema, the opera, shopping streets, ...

The apartment is completely yours, private.


Towels, soap, shampoo and bed linen are provided.

Guest access
Access to the private court yard.
host_about:
I am a 39 old, married woman. My husband's name is Yves. We have a great 12-year old son, his name is Igor. 
Me and Yves both work for the government. 
I am totaly into photography and literature, Yves is totally into Belgian beers ;-)

name: ROOM IN FAMILY HOME near C. Station
description:
In the Antwerp district of Borgerhout, we live with more than one hundred nationalities, all of them of the human race If one race is all you need, please come and stay with us!

The space
SHORT AND LONG TERM
free use of bike

A GREAT CITY, WHERE EVERYTHING IS AT WALKING DISTANCE
Trams and buses at 50 meter.
Less than 15 minutes walk to the Antwerp Central Station, the ZOO and the main shopping street. (Meir)
Less than 30 min to historical center: City Hall, Grote Markt (main square), Plantin Museum (16th century printer's work shop)
30 minutes to MAS brand new museum, the pride of Antwerp
30 minutes to Kloosterstraat (vintage and second hand shops
35 minutes to M HKA (museum of contemporary art)

We have quiet bedrooms in the back of the apartment. One bedroom has a sunny balcony. (Belgian Climate)

Towels, soap and shampoo are vailabe

Bread, coffee and tea are available.
host_about:
We, Lieve (52 y.) Fronk (49 y.) and Aurora (18 y.) love talking, laughing and music.
Communication is always easy as we speak several languages
Fronk is crazy about Brazil, where he lived for 2 years
Lieve adores India and Aurora is mad about Greece.
We have a preference for natural, vegetarian food.
Lieve and Fronk  practice Yoga daily..
We and our neighbours live on pleasant terms with each other.
Tranquility is a must in our home and in the building.
Please ring our bell... N°116/14 (fifth floor)

FLANDERS TODAY a flemish online newspaper has published an article about us and about Airbnb:
“In the last year we’ve had 60 or so guests staying with us at home,” says Fronk, who, with his partner Lieve, is one of the best-rated Flemish hosts on Airbnb, a hotel-like service for the digital age. “We have had guests from Brazil, the US, Canada, Iran, Japan, Bulgaria and more. Though no one from Africa has yet requested to stay.” 
Airbnb is an online marketplace for temporary accommodation across 33,000 cities in 192 countries. Trip planners can find spare rooms, flats, sofa-beds and even igloos and private islands. Some hosts are simply renting out a spare room for a couple of weeks a month to travellers to supplement their incomes or to fill the house when they themselves are away. 
Airbnb is in the vanguard of the so-called “sharing economy”, in which web services help private individuals monetise their possessions and share anything from school runs to electric drills. Flanders has more than 900 listings on the site. 
Connections 
Fronk and Lieve say that their guests have loved Antwerp and always have a good time. Yet if a number of their guests are visiting for tourism, many are in town for less conventional reasons. One was interviewing for a job at the opera house. Another was doing a course with world-famous contemporary artist Jan Fabre, while a third was studying with a leading dancer. A medievalist stayed for several weeks to learn Dutch for her research, while a Canadian rock band crashed when gigging down the road. 
Connecting with new people with different world views is one of the attractions, as is discovering a unexpected shared interest. “The other day I was having a bowl of soup with one of our guests, who had just arrived from the United States,” recalls Fronk. “To our surprise, we soon discovered that we were both working on essays on the same subject.” Fronk, who is a literary translator of Russian and a performer, and Lieve, an organist and soprano, say that in their year of hosting they have yet to have a bad experience. Some guests stay several weeks, some come back for a second or third visit. “But we make it clear on the website that we are vegetarians, that we do yoga and that this is a family house,” Fronk explains. This attracts people who are into the same things (and probably discourages those who want to spend their time exploring Antwerp’s party scene). 
Peer reviews 
Fronk and Lieve live in Borgerhout, a neighbourhood with a large immigrant population just east of the city’s Central Station, which is visible from their balcony. Borgerhout itself does not house many attractions and enjoys a reputation for being a rough sort of place. But guests have never had any problems, says Fronk. Indeed, he wistfully recalls a middle-aged American visitor looking out of the window at the district where Fronk grew up and declaring it a beautiful place. 
Importantly for guests, the area provides easy access by foot or bike to Antwerp’s main sites, including the zoo; elephants can be heard vaguely trumpeting from the flat’s balcony.

name: ROOM in FAMILY HOME near Central Sation
description:
In the Antwerp district of Borgerhout, we live with more than one hundred nationalities, all of them of the human race If one race is all you need, please' come and stay with us!

The space
walking distance from the raiway station and the adherent Antwerp Zoo: roaring lions, bears and trumpeting elephants can sometimes be heard from our balcony

The blue and the yellow room hav a view on the historical city hall of Borgerhout. (Antwerp) We have just moved from an apartment in a building surounded by trees. So the green has changed for the colours of the belgian sky. As we now live on the 5th floor you can enjoy here an impressive variety of grey and blue.

There is not only the nearby railway station, there are tram and bus stops just 50 M from our doorstep. Public transport will bring you to the historical center of Antwerp in just 10 minutes

All Antwerp has to offer as far as entertainment, restaurants and museums is concerned,

name: Ahome Awayfromhome
description:
The space
Ahome. Away from home !
This bright fully furnished to modern conditions appartment is located in the Medieval centre of Antwerp. Ahome lies in the heart of the old city, the bubbling city centre of Antwerp. You have and find everything nearby.

www.ahome.be
+32 488 20 83 23

135,- Euro per night for 2 persons (1 bed)
25,- Euro per night per person extra (max. 2 extra persons)
It can sleep up to 4 people: a double bed in the bedroom and a comfortable sleeper couch for two persons in the living room.
Extra service: an cot or child’s bed up to the age of 5.
For longer periods we will happily give you an attractive offer.
Pets negotiable.

The guest apartment (50sq.meters) is located on the 3rd floor in a traffic free street. It is light, airy, comfortable and tastefully decorated. It meets all the requirements of a modern guest apartment and offers lots of extra’s to spoil its guests.
neighborhood_overview:
Ahome lies in the heart of the old city, the bubbling city centre of Antwerp.

Discover the Grote Markt with its mighty Renaissance Town Hall (UNESCO listed World Heritage site), the Groenplaats, the Gothic Cathedral of our Lady, the Rubens House, the Royal Museum of Fine Arts, the Museum of Contemporary Art (MUKHA), the Museum Plantin-Moretus/Prints Room(World Heritage Site), the Museum At the Stream (MAS), the Kloosterstraat with its antique & brocante shops, the Nationale straat : thé fashion street with its world famous designer shops and the Fashion Museum (MoMu), the Zoo, the Central Station (nicknamed: the Railway Cathedral), its traffic free shopping streets and last but not least: a myriad of star restaurants as well as simple Belgian and ethnic eateries, fresh markets, culinary shops, theatres, bars and a vibrant nightlife.

Antwerp being a multi cultural cosmos has various quarters: Chinatown (with its shops and restaurants), the Jewish Quarter (diamond t
host_about:
Looking for a home a way from home ?  Ahome has it all.
A splendid and bright fully furnished appartement in the Medieval centre of Antwerp, Belgium for short or medium-long stay !

€135 for one night stay with 2 persons

 (Website hidden by Airbnb)

name: NEW YORK STYLE LOFT IN ANTWERP
description:
The space
Beautiful, spacious loft in the Montevideo district 'het eilandje', currently known as the newest district in Antwerp with a lot of hotspots. The loft is a renovated former warehouse building just around the corner of the 'Red Star Line' & 'MAS' museum.

There are a lot of amazing bars and good restaurant in walking distance, however, the location of my loft is very quiet. Also on walking distance to the historic center, the riverside, museums, parks, yacht harbor, supermarkets, bakery and public transport.

There is a lofted area with a fully equipped kitchen (glassware, pots, microwave, oven, freezer, fridge, dishwasher, cooking plate,...), a bedroom with an Auping queen-sized bed to ensure that you sleep in total comfort, a bathroom with rain shower and hairdryer and a living room with a 4K projector and access to Netflix, CBS All Access and HBO, a coach that could also accommodate 1 guest. My loft is on the first floor, you can use the stai
neighborhood_overview: The Loft is located in a fresh newly renovated area of Antwerp City called 'Eilandje'. It is surrounded by trendy restaurants, bars, museums and even some nice Pop-up bars during the Summer Period.
host_about:
Hello

My name is Kevin and I'm a Belgian independent cinematographer, so I'm always on the run for new stories and meeting new people all over the world. I'd love to travel and explore new things with my camera on my right shoulder.

Until now I was an Airbnb traveler as well but since 2013 i'm on the other side, so I'm really looking forward to my first experience as a host.

Hope to meet you soon so we can share stories.

Best regards

Kevin

name: Design Apartment Near The Center!
description:
The space
NOTE: NEW FURNITURE IN THE APARTMENT. SOME ROOMS MAY LOOK DIFFERENT.

LOCATION
Very spacious, bright apartment on the first floor of a townhouse in a bustling street close to restaurants and shops. Near the three biggest parks of the city. A 1 min walk to the tram will take you to the vibrant city center in 10 min. Conveniently located within close proximity to the important highways. Breakfast is not included but there are lots of little shops in the places nearby. There is a butcher, a bakery, an Italian restaurant and much more, right in the street.


THE APARTMENT
The apartment has a large living room, open kitchen and dining room. There is a little terrace. The bathroom includes a separate bath and shower. I redecorated the apartment myself with noble materials, so I hope this apartment will be taken care of very well.

CHECK IN:
After 2PM

CHECK OUT:
Before Noon, but you can leave your luggag
host_about: My daughter has been using airbnb for a while in Berlin and recommended I do the same. I am an interior designer and Antwerp native. I've lived in this city my entire life and know the best places to eat, drink and be merry. I love meeting new people and promoting this city to curious travels who come to Belgium's best kept secret!

name: Room in Cosy Design Duplex, Antwerp
description:
My boyfriend and I live here too. You rent one or two rooms on the 3rd floor (no elevator). The two rooms share a bathroom. (The bathroom is not shared with us)
The apartment is located in the beautiful, green suburb of Wilrijk. Nearby bus & tram take you to the city center in 15mn.
Two free rabbits live in the shared common areas.

The space
The apartment has a large living room, open kitchen and dining room on the 2nd floor, which you share with me as I still live in the apartment.
The room(s) that you will be renting is on the third floor (there is no elevator!), your shared bathroom includes a separate bath and shower.
There are two bedrooms and a bathroom on your floor.
The beds are REAL Boxsprings and REAL MATTRESSES. I guarantee you'll spend a comfortable night!

There is NO TELEVISION and NO MICROWAVE in the flat. Neither of these things are good for you ;)

Other things to note
If you are 2 people
neighborhood_overview:
Very spacious, bright duplex apartment on the second and third floors of an old townhouse in a bustling street close to restaurants and shops.
Located in a green suburb of Antwerp, near the three biggest parks of the city.
host_about:
I am addicted to travel, love photography and I'm a movie enthusiast.

I work in the film/TV industry so when I'm working I'm away for long hours and am very rarely home.

I really hope you enjoy the flat and your room(s) feels homely, but most importantly make the most of your time in Antwerp!

name: *Perfect* for a Longer Stay | Trendy | City center
description:
My loft has it all! Superb location, right in the city center of Antwerp. Walk ANYWHERE within 15 to 20 minutes. Public transportation at the doorstep. If you have a car: get on the E19 or A12 to Brussels in 5 minutes, even during rush hour.
Contemporary.
Quiet bedroom, separate room from living space.
Lots of daylight.
Spacious living space with living room, kitchen and dining room.

***Cheaper than a hotel, you get more than a hotel***
Ideal for longer stay.

The space
***recently upgraded***
- New Nespresso coffee machine
- Brand new Bosch dryer and washing machine
- New building front door, freshly painted hallway
- Renovated elevator
- Brand new 4k LED Smart tv (please note, there is no cable! Bring your dvd's/blue rays)
****

Please read the house rules before you book. Booking means you've agreed to all house rules.

- Loft on the 4fth floor (5th floor for Americans ;-)
neighborhood_overview:
Excellent location. There are plenty of great restaurants and coffee bars within walking distance. Ask me for tips or check out my Airbnb Guidebook: https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/603545?preview#maps.

If you have a car: you can reach the freeway to Brussels (E19 and A12) in 5 minutes. Street parking is easy to find and is free from 19:00pm till 9:00am, on Sundays and Public Holidays. There is a cheap underground public parking (Vinci Parking Nationale Bank) within 50 meters, open 24/7.

These are the rates (for 2020):
1h: €2,40
2h: €5,00
3h: €7,30
4h: €9,60
5h: €11,90
24h: €13,40
This is the TOTAL price. So for example if you park 2 hours, you'll pay €5. If you park anywhere between 5 and 24 hours the rate is €13,40. This parking is subsidized by the city, that's why the rate is affordable.

Across the street, you'll find:
- Pharmacy
- Pizza Hut take away
- affordable but good restaurants (e.g. Continu Food
host_about:
I'm mostly in the USA. So, my apartment is often empty and it deserves more attention than I can give, that's why I rent it out.

I love good food, expensive and cheap. Going to the movies is my passion.

name: sunny rooftop apartment, sleeps 2-5
description:
Centrally located two-bedroom rooftop apartment near local transportation, shops and central station.
Large terrace overlooking the city. Superb views from the Antwerp skyline.
Handy supermarket downstairs.
I always welcome you personally and try to answer all your last minute questions about Antwerp.
Interesting rates for long term stays.

Notice : People coming by old cars should check whether they are allowed to enter the city center . Check the website of slimnaarantwerpen

The space
The elevator brings you to the 7th floor. This rooftop apartment is on the 8th floor smack in the centre of Antwerp.


It has a spacious living/dining room with comfy sofabed, cable TV, docking station, wifi ...

From the two bedrooms (both with a brandnew double bed) you have a beautiful view of the Antwerp skyline, MAS, cathedral, harbour....

In the bathroom you will also find a handy washer/dryer and hair
neighborhood_overview:
It is a mixed cultural neighborhood. A lot of young people moved in, providing a new vibe. New restaurants, cafes, shops pop up all the time.
So they call the neighborhood BOHO.
There is a beautiful art deco cinema turned into a cultural centre a bit further. Check the program of 'De Roma' for concerts, films etc.

On the ground floor of the apartment building is a handy small supermarket. Other shops like fresh bakery, butcher, fish are around the corner on the Turnhoutsebaan.

On Friday morning you will find local produce at the vegetable and fruit market at the church of Laar (which you can see from the terrace).

Hop on tram 10 or go for a walk to Zurenborg neighborhood with its famous Cogels-Osylei dotted with dazzling art deco houses.
host_about:
I studied languages and cultural anthropology and am currently teaching Dutch to teenage migrant children in Antwerp. I also play the violoncello.
We travel a lot and spent some years abroad (NZ, USA) before returning to Antwerp.  We know what we missed in our temporary lodgings, that's why we try to make our apartment a home away from home for you.

name: The chill place in Antwerp 1
description:
De slaapkamer bevind zich op de eerste verdieping van een sfeervol heren huis.

The space
Close to the city centre and central station in the artistic and multicultural neighbourhood Borgerhout a beautiful mansion (herenhuis) from 1905. Live in the grandeur of passed times and feel at home. Sleep in the comfortable double beds of the two large rooms. The two rooms share one big bathroom where a refreshing rainshower starts your day.

When you arrive I always take time to show you the house and give you a lot of suggestions what to do in Antwerp, where to drink or dine and where to go out.
In the morning your extensive breakfast is served in the cozy kitchen or outside in the garden. The house has free Wifi, cable TV and radio.

From the house you can easily walk to some typical Belgian cafe's and restaurants in the neighbourhood. Or you can take the tram that brings you to the very centre in 15 minutes. Visit the city of the famous Flemis
neighborhood_overview:
The neighboorhood is an upcoming area wth soem nice coffebars ans small restaurants.
Nearby is also the concerthall Trixt, the Roma and Sportpaleis. There are lots of nice concerts.
host_about: I am very interested in art, in design, in movies and music. I also love Italian cooking, I love to cook for friends. I traveled a lot in Italy and learned how to cook there. Now I organize Italian cooking lessons at my house.

name: Stylish decorated  room in 'art nouveau house'
description:
Fantastic room in big house with hardwood floors, big double bed, tv set, Free wifi, chaise lounge and lots of light. The room has a private yet not an ensuite bathroom.

The space
This beautiful, renovated 'Art Nouveau' house from 1903 is situated in the Antwerp neighbourhood called Berchem. It is closely located to 'Zurenborg', with its architectural marvels and cosy restaurants. There are also lots of restaurants within a 500 m radius.

The citycenter and all the places worth discovering are nearby, as are the major roads entering the city. There is easy and cheap parking in front of the house. (3,8 euro/day)

The house is furnished with vintage design from the 1950s to the 1980s. All pieces - mostly from well-known designers such as Verner Panton, Willy Rizzo, Ludwig Mies van der Rohe and Emile Stejnar - were collected by the owners over the years.

There is free wifi, cabel-tv and tea and coffee in the rooms.

Th

name: Spacy family studio in Antwerp City
description:
Nice spacious studio nearby the hotspots of the city! Theatre & shopping area, museums, Train Station, metro, public buses, all on walking distance. Easy accessible with train and car, on 45 minutes with train from the airport of Brussels ( Zaventem)
Price includes bed sheets, towels and taxes. Cleaning 35€

The space
Studio " Ornamentum" is a class studio on ground floor of restored town house ( mansion) in Antwerp.
Sleeping area with a four individual box springs plus a canapé with possibility to extend in a double bed (2 extra persons) makes a total of 6 sleeping places.
Sitting area with cosy fireplace.
Completely new kitchen, combi - oven, ceramic hob, fridge and dishwasher. All cutlery, crockery and kitchen utensils.
Table can be extended to six persons.
Private shower with sink and toilet.
Small private garden available.

Centrally located 5 minutes from central Station, National Bank, museums, City Th
neighborhood_overview: Jewish quarter of the city , nearby the city park with great children play ground, jogging track. Nice quiet and save area of the city, close to the centre an easy accessible by train, car or public transport.
host_about:
Samen met mijn echtgenoot Stefan , zoon Gaetan en dochter Kjenta,  wonen wij graag in de Stad Antwerpen, het is er aangenaam en goed leven, er is steeds iets te doen of te zien, cultuur, sport, shoppen ...Het is een echte uitgaansstad, bij goed weer zitten alle terrasjes vol! Zelf verken ik graag per fiets alle leuke wijken, parken en natuurlijk de haven en Schelde in en om Antwerpen.
Ik als verpleegkundige in het ziekenhuis, mijn man is zelfstandige, de kinderen studeren en bouwen hun eigen leven stilaan op. 
Wij wonen zelf op de bovenverdiepingen van het pand dat we verhuren, we zijn dus steeds beschikbaar om eventueel informatie of hulp te bieden aan onze gasten. 
Ondertussen hebben wij al wat ervaring met het verhuren van onze locatie, wij vinden het erg leuk om verschillende nationaliteiten als gast te hebben en zijn zeer positief over onze ervaringen met Airbnb. Zelf hebben we ook al enkele trips gemaakt met Airbnb en dat is steeds een positieve ervaring.  geweest. 
Wij houden zelf van reizen, nieuwe steden ontdekken, maar ook rust en uitwaaien aan zee om de batterijen op te laden. We houden ook van lekker eten met een glaasje wijn, genieten dus!

name: Stay in a designers place & donate
description:
My beautiful one bedroom designer's place with exposed brick has a true city feeling! It comfortably fits two and is close to the heart of the city but in a quiet neighbourhood just on the other side of the river. Enjoy the open space!

The space
This beautiful designers place is located just one metrostop away from the city, just on the other side of the river. In an amazingly quiet neighborhood where you can walk next to the river and enjoy the view on our beautiful cathedral or our famous MAS museum which is located just on the other side of the river. The loft has an open kitchen and living room, and also open bath- and bedroom (double bed) with a shower and bathtub. The bedroom is equiped with a television with an HDMI cable (also apple) which allows you to connect your laptop and watch movies if you like. There is a small balcony in the front and a little terrace in the back which smokers can use for smoking, please no smoking inside.

Apart from
host_about:
My two passions are traveling and designing interior and furniture. With airbnb i get to share both, because I believe the design of my appartment is also one of the reasons you choose for it. Since I travel a lot for work and private purposes, my appartment is empty quiet a lot and so i like others to enjoy it too! Also I just love to take good care of people, so whenever you come at my place I will always try to put in this little extra thing to make you smile!

As a lot of people I started renting out my place to have an extra income, to cover for my bills and to create some financial space to travel more myself. Recently I started sharing my profit with charity because I wanted it to be something more, for me. So now 5% of the profit I make renting out my appartment is donated to charity. 'SOS Kinderdorpen' at the moment, I will add more later on.

name: cosy & beautiful apartment Antwerp
description:
A stylish B&B with kitchen in a beautiful apartment. Fits perfectly for a romantic breakaway weekend. Nearby the historic City Center and the trendy Zuid. All this you can easily discover by foot, bike or public transport. Have fun !

The space
A stylish, affordable and brand-new b&b accommodation in a sixties building in the centre of Antwerp. Centrally located if you want to discover the whole city.

Guest access
It is a tastefully decorated spacious bedroom with king size springbox. Free digital TV and wifi are available. Own private kitchen with all commodities and a large bathroom.
Coffee and tea are free. Upon your request we can provide some fine wine or excellent champagne.
neighborhood_overview:
Nearby you find the busy Diamond District, the cosy Zurenborg Quarter, the historic city center and the trendy Zuid District.

All this you can easily discover by foot, bike or public transport. All is very easy accessible. If you like to bike, you will find also the city bike rental 'Velo' in front of the house.
host_about:
Elizbeth makes tailored clothing and Marc is working for television. Elizabeth is passionate about antiques while Marc is mad about fine wines.
In a previous life Elizabeth lived in Amsterdam, London, Boston and Warsowa. Now she feels completely at ease in fashion city Antwerp.

+++ May your dreams last longer than your nights +++

name: 150 m² loft (terrace & river view)
description:
This spacious and luxurious loft is located on the bank of the River Scheldt
The large bedrooms are furnished with king-sized beds and it has a fully stocked kitchen and a large table (14 seats) perfect for meetings or diner parties.
It's located on the second floor with a view of the river Scheldt from one of the 2 balconies. Of course, it has luxuries like Wifi, Flat screen tv, Nespresso Machine and more.

The space
This spacious 150 sqm. luxurious loft is situated at the riverside of The Schelde in the area called ‘t Zuid. 10 minutes’ walk to the old city center and well connected to public transport.

It's a 2 bedroom loft disigned by Antwerp well known architect Jo Peeters. The specious bedrooms are furnished with comfortable California king size box spring. There is a well-equipped kitchen and large dining table which can also be used for meetings or dinner parties (up to 14 setas).
The loft has a river view and has 2 terraces. One
neighborhood_overview:
The area near the river is called ‘t Zuid, just a 10-minute walk to the old city center and well connected to public transport.
In the neighborhood, you can find supermarkets, banks, trendy bars, designer shops, and many restaurants only a few minutes away.
"'T Zuid" is known is hip and unique atmosphere.
host_about: Hi I'm Sarah. I'm a painter and I love Antwerp because its creativity. I love character in people and things. Enjoying experience and beauty in life.

name: 4 Cosy rooms near Central Station
description:
The space
Four charming rooms available in my house..
1 single room and 3 double rooms (33€ for the first persoon + 23€ per extra person, incl. large breakfast)
..in one of the most interesting parts of Antwerp: just around the corner from Central Station and the Keyserlei with its numerous restaurants and cafes, the UGC cinema complex ... Since the reconstruction of the Keyserlei, a bicycle and pedestrian boulevard takes you from the Central Station to the old city center, with its Grand Place, Cathedral and Groenplaats, only 1.7 km from your bed. Metro Station 'Elisabeth' is just around the corner (100m), with bike renatl stands next to it.

Fun fact: Vincent Van Gogh lived in our street from 24 November 1885 until end of February 1886. Two of his paintings titled 'Lange Beeldekensstraat' are exhibited at the Vincent Van Gogh Museum in Amsterdam*

We are world cyclists ourselves and enjoy the stories and anecdotes of all travelers :) <
host_about:
Hi there! 

I am Son! I enjoy traveling as much as most of our guests. Cycling is my passion, for short as well as long distances.
The Antwerp Central Train Station is a short walk from my house. 
With the Metro station and rental bike stand around the corner, you can get to the old center of Antwerp in minutes, even when it's raining (which does happen in Belgium, from time to time...)

My job allows me to choose my working hours, so I can make time for my guests on arrival, or at breakfast. It's also possible to get in with keybox/code. Wifi is available, as are city guide maps. I hope to see you soon, feel free to contact me if you have any questions.

Warm greetings,
Son:)

Hey daar,  
Ik ben Son, 'doorzomerde' fietster, van een trip naar Parijs tot een rondje wereld, en heb dan ook graag reizigersvolk over de vloer, om verhalen en ervaringen te delen bij het ontbijt. Mijn huis is gelegen op korte wandelafstand van het Centraal Station Antwerpen. Mijn job laten ons meestal toe om mijn werkuren te kiezen, dus kan ik tijd vrij maken voor mijn gasten, bij ontvangst en bij het ontbijt. Het is ook mogelijk om binnen te komen met sleutelkastje/code.
Als je vragen of opmerkingen hebt, aarzel dan niet om mij te contacteren.
Graag tot gauw, en warme groeten,
Son:)

name: BorzeB&B, sleeping in the heart of Antwerp!
description:
The location of this B&B is great: it's less than 10 minutes away by foot from the main attractions like the shopping street (Meir), terraces with excellent Belgian beers, MAS, theatres, museums, the market... .
Being always in the vicinity of your room , you can easily get rid of your shopping bags, refresh a little bit, relax in between two museum visits...that is what we call luxury!

The space
We offer you a double room with bathroom on the groundfloor. Bed- and bathlinen are provided and there is free wifi for our guests. Indoor parking lot at your disposal.

Other things to note
We 'll contact you to hear when you will arrive. We want to avoid you finding nobody at home.
neighborhood_overview: In the heart of the  old city centre. Probably the most central B&B in Antwerp.
host_about:
I like travelling and meeting other people.
Antwerp is a great town to live in : I like to share my experiences with you.  I like musea, exhibitions, going to the movies.  I know the nice shopping places and the good restaurants.  I'm glad to help you discovering this fantastic town !

name: aplace/antwerp: amazing suite & square view
description:
This second floor suite with a splendid square view has been decorated in a warm homey style and will make you feel at home immediately!

The space
This unique suite is located on a charming little square in the very center of Antwerp (fashion district area).

The suite has been completely renovated since december 2012 and is decorated in an eclectic style combined with a few new objects which quarantees you a warm and cosy home.

The view on the Vrijdagmarkt is amazing, The large windows make sure you'll have a postcard view at night.

More information about our rooms & flats you'll find on aplaceantwerp.be
neighborhood_overview:
aplace/antwerp is situated in the middle of the old town of Antwerp. On the corner of ‘de Groenplaats’ and the Big Market, the designer shops and the ‘Kloosterstraat’, known for its antique en curiosa. The ideal spot to discover Antwerp!

De Vrijdagmarkt is a quiet square that hasn’t been discovered by the big audience yet and ideal to meet local Antwerp people.

Very unique and traditonal is the weekly auction on - fridays - on the ‘Vrijdagmarkt’. Here you can buy for a cheap price exclusive, retro and sometimes even valuable objects.

On this square you’ll also find the world famous Plantin-Moretus museum. The only printing/publisher in the world from the Renaissances and baroque time which has kept remained.

In the ‘Nationalestraat’ (= around the corner) and in the neighbourhood you can spend your money in various designer shops of famous Antwerp and international designers. (Dries Van Noten, Filippa K, Diane von Furstenberg, Paul Smith,, St
host_about: Since my childhoocd I dreamt of having my own small/tiny 'hotel' and my dream became real. In combination with my passion for designing interiors, I'm absolutely doing what I like to do most: hosting & decorating, an ideal match.

name: aplace/antwerp: stunning flat with square view
description:
While entering this well located flat, you'll feel at home immediately. It has been decorated warm and cosy with all modern comfort and a gorgeous square view. The flat is situated in the fashion district of the city, absolutaly everything on walking distance!

The space
This lovely flat is located on a charming little square in the very center of Antwerp (fashion district area). Literally around the corner of everything you want to see in this beautifull city.

This first floor flat has been completaly renovated since december 2012 and is being decorated in an eclectic style (soul full things combined with a few new objects) which quarantees you a warm, cosy and comfortable home.

There is a fully equipped kitchen, a marble bathroom with tub/rainshower, a seperate restroom, a very bright and cosy living room (4 large windows with square view) and 2 bedrooms - and one with a patio!

The view on the Vrijdagmarkt is amazing, The large w
neighborhood_overview:
Aplace/antwerp is situated in the middle of the old town of Antwerp. On the corner of ‘de Groenplaats’ and the Big Market, the designer shops (the famous Dries van Noten shop is around the corner) and the ‘Kloosterstraat’, known for its antique en curiosa. The ideal spot to discover Antwerp!

De Vrijdagmarkt is a quiet square that hasn’t been discovered by the big audience yet and ideal to meet local Antwerp people. Very unique and traditonal is the weekly auction on - fridays - on the ‘Vrijdagmarkt’. Here you can buy for a cheap price exclusive, retro and sometimes even valuable objects.

When staring out of your windows you'll see the beautifully enlightened building of the Museum Plantin-Moretues. The only printing/publisher in the world from the Renaissances and baroque time which has kept remained and the only museum in the world on the UNESCO World Heritage list - so for sure a must see!

In the ‘Nationalestraat’ (= around the corner) and in the nei
host_about: Since my childhoocd I dreamt of having my own small/tiny 'hotel' and my dream became real. In combination with my passion for designing interiors, I'm absolutely doing what I like to do most: hosting & decorating, an ideal match.

name: NEST
description:
The space
We are happy to offer you this super cosy apartment in a kicking neighbourhood, where we love to live ourselfs!
15 minutes from Central Station. Public transport at a 5 minutes walk.
Tranquil sleeping, hidden away in a beautiful green alley. Located on the first floor. Total surface = 45m2.
Nice big kitchen with dining space and all utilities. Coffee, tea, olive oil, sugar, salt and pepper are provided.
Bath and shower in 1. Clean towels and shower gel are included. Washingmachine.
Cosy livingroom with digital tv and wifi.
Double bed and closet in the bedroom.
We have our own small and hip ‘brown’ bar in the same building, but situated on the street, so no noise-insurance.
There is a full range of colourfull places just around the corner if you want to eat out.
The appartement can be let in combination with another appartement on the second floor and a fully equiped music studio, which is also situated in the
neighborhood_overview: The great thing about our neighbourhood is the always present couleur locale, het Krugerplein, which is a public square, slash park, with the cosy Bar Leon. You can have great food in the countless Moroccan restaurants on the Turnhoutsebaan. Or at the Ecocafé or -a little bit further- in the Kerkstraat. Very nearby are de Roma (a beautiful old concerthall) and Trix (a musiccentre with fantastic gigs). Art galeries like Base Alpha and Zeno X keep on popping up.
host_about: We are a lively couple who likes a good combination of travelling , city life, rooftopfarming, running a restaurant, bar and club, organising markets, making music, creating pottery and other arts. We try to inspire others to make everything by hand and to follow your dream by just start doing iT! We never get bored and we love to meet people. That’s how we end up in renting 2 Air BnB appartements; NEST / NESTT. We like to make people feel at home and create some caracter in the appartments.

name: Great Classic House in Antwerp (4-10 persons)
description:
Beautiful mansion house close to the central station and old centre in a quiet neighborhood .

The space
Mooi authentiek gezellig herenhuis in een rustige buurt.
Gelijkvloers grote living, eetkamer, keuken en stadstuin.

1 ste verdieping : 2 ruime slaapkamers met dubbel bed
Badkamer met toilet op de tussenverdieping.

2de verdieping: 2 slaapkamers met dubbel bed.
Badkamer met inloopdouche en toilet op de tussenverdieping.

In 1 van de kamers is ook een hoogslaper met extra 2x 1- persoonsbed , vooral geschikt voor kinderen of jonge mensen.
Totaal slaapplek voor 10 personen + 2p rekening houdend met de vide. Er zijn 5 slaapkamers in totaal met 2- persoonsbedden.

Close to the city centre and central station in the artistic and multicultural neighborhood Borgerhout a beautiful mansion (herenhuis) from 1905. Live in the grandeur of passed times and feel at home. Sleep in the comfortable double beds
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is very quiet and near to the centre.
host_about: I am very interested in art, in design, in movies and music. I also love Italian cooking, I love to cook for friends. I traveled a lot in Italy and learned how to cook there. Now I organize Italian cooking lessons at my house.

name: Colourful Inspiration In Every Room
description:
Antwerp, my beattiful city, take a look at:
(URL HIDDEN)

The space
Visiting Antwerp and looking for a comfortable stay during your weekend, business-trip or an extended period of time? Then I am pleased to welcome you into my home in Deurne, a great starting point to explore Antwerp. You are surrounded by 3 parcs.
This family-run concept as an alternative to a hotel offers you a warm welcome and creates a relaxing atmosphere in which you will feel like home. Not far away from the city yet away from all the noise, you can enjoy a good night's sleep in an oasis of calmness after your journey or City-Trip.
The two beautiful guestrooms are decorated with much love and care, designed to give its guests the most pleasant stay possible. Inspired by the Belgian architect Agnes Emery, both rooms were painted with the warm colors of Emery en co and were even given poetic titles to match the appearance of the rooms.
If you prefer charm, subtle romance
host_about:
I'm 29 years old, study Language and Literature at UA and work part-time in Antwerp.  I love the lively atmosphere of every city and try to enjoy it as much as possible. Going from concerts at festivals or parks, fashion and shopping, theatre performances, museums or just strolling through the city. And since I'm very social and quick to make contacts, the vision of an AirBnB is right up my alley. Providing a cosy space for wanderlust travelers, handing information about my town and creating some interaction without obtrusiveness. So travelling  in an unconventional way and interacting with locals is something the guests and I have in common. After travelling to San Francisco to live with a childhood friend, participating on an intercultural project in Mexico, sharing the apartment of an inhabitant in Berlin, Valladolid, Barcelona, Vienna, etc I even try to make a holiday out of being at home. Or as one of my favorite Dutch writers, Godfriend Bomans,  would put it; "The art of living is to be at home when one is travelling". I hope to bring my guests a feeling of "Home" during their stay and hopefully soon I'll meet and welcome you in Antwerp, I'm looking forward to it.

Ik ben  29 jaar, werk parttime en studeer  taal- en letterkunde aan de Universiteit van Antwerpen. Ik hou erg  van het levendige en bruisende, dat elke stad in zich heeft en probeer daar zoveel mogelijk van te genieten:  de terrasjes, optredens in parken of festivals, shoppen,   theatervoorstellingen, musea, flaneren door de stad, noem maar op.  Vermits ik vrij sociaal ben en snel  contacten maak, past de AirBnB -formule  helemaal in mijn visie: een cosy plek verschaffen aan de reislustige gasten, hen informatie geven over mijn stad en enige interactie opbouwen zonder opdringerigheid. Eén punt hebben de gasten en ik gemeen: we reizen graag, doen dit graag op een niet al te conventionele manier en houden van interactie met de plaatselijke inwoner(s).  Zo ging ik naar San Francisco om bij een jeugdvriendin in te wonen, nam deel aan een intercultureel project in Mexico,  deelde het appartement van een inwoonster in  Berlijn, Valladolid, Barcelona en Wenen, enz.  Ik probeer me ook thuis op reis te voelen of zoals de Nederlandse schrijver Godfried Bomans, één mijn favoriete schrijvers, het stelde : ” De kunst van te leven is thuis te zijn alsof men op reis is ". Ik hoop dat ik mijn gasten een gevoel van 'thuis zijn'  tijdens hun reis kan geven en hoop jullie snel te mogen verwelkomen en ontmoeten in (Website hidden by Airbnb) kijk er alvast naar uit..

Tengo 29 años y estudio Lengua y Literatura en la Universidad de Amberes y trabajo a medio tiempo en la ciudad. Me encanta el ambiente animado de cada ciudad y trato de disfrutarlo lo más posible con paseos a conciertos en festivales o parques, a través de la moda y las compras, obras de teatro, museos o simplemente pasear por la ciudad. Como soy una persona muy social y que rápidamente hace contactos, la visión de Airbnb es lo mío. Ofrezco un espacio agradable para los viajeros con deseo de explorar, facilito información sobre mi ciudad y establezco algún tipo de interacción sin impertinencia. Viajar de una manera poco convencional e interactuar con la gente local, es algo que los clientes y yo tenemos en común. Después de haber viajado a la ciudad de San Francisco para vivir con una amiga de la infancia, participado en un proyecto intercultural en México, compartido el apartamento de un habitante de Berlín, Valladolid, Barcelona, Viena, y más lugar, hasta trato de hacer unas vacaciones estando en mi casa. Como dice uno de mis escritores Neerlandés favoritos, Godfried Bomans "el arte de vivir es estar en casa cuando uno está viajando." Espero darles a mis invitados una sensación de "hogar" durante su estancia y espero que pronto pueda darle la bienvenida en Amberes.

我今年 29歲,在UA修語言及文學,同時在安特衛普打工｡我喜歡每一個城市的熱鬧氛圍,不管是音樂節,公園演唱會,時尚購物,戲劇表演,博物館,或在市中心散步,我都盡可能找機會品嘗｡另外我很樂於交朋友,不管是提供舒適的空間給旅遊愛好者,傳達關於我的城市的資訊,或無壓力的互動,我很理解也能夠發揮Airbnb想表達的精神,畢竟非凡的旅遊方式和與當地人交集是我們的共同點｡
我曾去舊金山與兒時的朋友居住,參與過墨西哥的多重文化案子,與他人居住的城市包含柏林,巴拉多利德,巴塞羅那,維也納,等等｡在家時我也儘量保持旅遊的心態｡我最愛的荷蘭作家『Godfriend Bomans』曾說:『生活的祕訣在於旅遊時也感受到家｡』我希望來這裡的客人都有這樣的感受,並期待很快能歡迎您來安特衛普｡ 

我今年29岁,在UA修语言及文学,同时在安特卫普打工｡我喜欢每一个城市的热闹氛围,不管是音乐节,公园演唱会,时尚购物,戏剧表演,博物馆,或在市中心散步,我都尽可能找机会品尝｡另外我很乐于交朋友,不管是提供舒适的空间给旅游爱好者,传达关于我的城市的资讯,或无压力的互动,我很理解也能够发挥Airbnb想表达的精神,毕竟非凡的旅游方式和与当地人交集是我们的共同点｡
我曾去旧金山与儿时的朋友居住,参与过墨西哥的多重文化案子,与他人居住的城市包含柏林,巴拉多利德,巴塞罗那,维也纳,等等｡在家时我也尽量保持旅游的心态｡我最爱的荷兰作家『Godfriend Bomans』曾说:『生活的秘诀在于旅游时也感受到家｡ 』我希望来这里的客人都有这样的感受,并期待很快能欢迎您来安特卫普｡

name: 4 Cosy rooms near Central Station! ~ double room
description:
Wooden interior double room with private shower.
This is one of my three cosy rooms.
Another double and single room are available.

The space
Drie sfeervolle kamers beschikbaar in mijn huis..1 eenpersoonskamer en 2 tweepersoonskamers. (35€ + 25€ voor 2personen in tweepersoonskamer, 35€ voor 1 persoon in éénpersoonskamer, incl. uitgebreid ontbijt). Gelegen in een van de interessantste delen van Antwerpen: om de hoek van het Centraal Station en De Keyserlei met zijn talrijke restaurants en café's, het UGC cinemacomplex, ... Sinds de heraanleg van de De Keyserlei is er een fiets- en wandelboulevard van het Centraal Station tot in het oude centrum met de Grote Markt, kathedraal en Groenplaats op 1,6 km van uw slaapplaats. Indien gewenst: metrostation 'Elisabeth' ligt net om de hoek (100m), waar er ook fietsen te huur zijn. *Leuk weetje: Vincent Van Gogh leefde in deze straat van 24 november 1885 tot eind februari 1886. Twee schilderijen getiteld 'Lange Bee
host_about:
Hi there! 

I am Son! I enjoy traveling as much as most of our guests. Cycling is my passion, for short as well as long distances.
The Antwerp Central Train Station is a short walk from my house. 
With the Metro station and rental bike stand around the corner, you can get to the old center of Antwerp in minutes, even when it's raining (which does happen in Belgium, from time to time...)

My job allows me to choose my working hours, so I can make time for my guests on arrival, or at breakfast. It's also possible to get in with keybox/code. Wifi is available, as are city guide maps. I hope to see you soon, feel free to contact me if you have any questions.

Warm greetings,
Son:)

Hey daar,  
Ik ben Son, 'doorzomerde' fietster, van een trip naar Parijs tot een rondje wereld, en heb dan ook graag reizigersvolk over de vloer, om verhalen en ervaringen te delen bij het ontbijt. Mijn huis is gelegen op korte wandelafstand van het Centraal Station Antwerpen. Mijn job laten ons meestal toe om mijn werkuren te kiezen, dus kan ik tijd vrij maken voor mijn gasten, bij ontvangst en bij het ontbijt. Het is ook mogelijk om binnen te komen met sleutelkastje/code.
Als je vragen of opmerkingen hebt, aarzel dan niet om mij te contacteren.
Graag tot gauw, en warme groeten,
Son:)

name: Homey apartment near Antwerpen Centraal Station
description:
Cozy, recently renovated apartment, located 10 min walking distance from Central Station. Excellent public transport connections. Proximity to bars, restaurants, supermarkets, UGL Cinema, the Meir shopping district, the Zoo, the Opera.

The space
The apartment is located on the 4th floor and is accessible by elevator. It consists of 2 bedrooms.

One of the bedrooms is adjacent to a balcony. There is a flat TV screen (Telenet cable) in each room. Bedding and towels are provided. You have an access to a bathroom with shower, toilet & double sink. Washing & drying services are also available.

Fully equipped kitchen and cozy dining/sitting area are also at your disposal.

Other things to note
Free WiFi Internet connection.
host_about: The purpose of life is a life of purpose. ~Robert Byrne

Free Wi-Fi, Number22Antwerp is a 19th-century building.The spacious flat is fully furnished, has a city & a garden view. This flat is on the 2d Floor ,has one bedroom and one living room with a sofa bed. Capacity max 4 p (8euro extra from 3d per.

The space
Very central and close to the trendy south area of Antwerpen. Maximum 4 peoples ( extra 8 euro for 3de and 4th person)

Guest access
Access to the roof terrace ( 9am to 22pm) for smokers and the Hall. The flat is a one floor flat completely independent.

name: Bedroom in large antique house near parks+trams
description:
Large bedroom in classic 1930s Antwerp house. Kitchen, 2 bathrooms, terrace and garden for common use. Parks and trams to city centre nearby. We are living with about 5 people in the house. Most of us are young professionals from abroad.

The space
Minimum stay is two weeks. Bedroom is fully furnished. Complete bathroom on the same floor. Ground floor: fully equipped kitchen for common use. You are welcome as well to enjoy garden and terrace on the ground floor. Tram stop to city centre (10 minutes) at 50 meters from the house.
neighborhood_overview: The house is located in one of the nicest neighbourhoods of Antwerp, in the middle of parks and near tram stops. Berchem railway station is 5 minutes away, central station is 15 minutes away.
host_about: I am a person with a job in research, and I like reading, listening to music, cycling, and speaking foreign languages. Enjoy a fully equipped kitchen, roof terrace, spacious living room, office and 2 bedrooms with separate bathrooms.

The space
The penthouse is fully equipped with high end materials, the latest technology and classy furniture. The 2 bedrooms have access to a private bathroom. There is a smaller and a large bedroom with separate dressing. The living room has a large flatscreen with digital tv and movies. Music and WIFI network is available throughout the apartment. The office, the open kitchen and the living room are installed to the highest standards. The very large rooftop terrace offers sun all day long with outdoor furniture to enjoy a sunny lounge experience.

Guest access
The penthouse can be rented entirely with access to office space, living

name: Room with a view!
description:
This apartment is where I live myself, so to stay here, plaese use the 'contact host button' to inquire for your wishes. I go out and travel regularly, so there's always an opportunity, even sharing for a night...

The space
While I'm travelling I'll be happy to have a (non-smoking) guest in my own house. I live there myself, so can only rent it out when I'm away myself! It's a cozy 75m2 app with 1 bedroom, on the 10th floor of a well located building, just outside the city centre and close to the highway entrance/exit. It's recently renovated and contains all services/facilities: tv, Wi-Fi, laundry machine, full equiped kitchen... in walking distance of the central train station and the Antwerp-Berchem train station, close to the famous Dageraadplaats, a nice square with pubs and restaurants, and the new upcoming place to be: Café Mombasa. Enough public transport (tram, bus, city-bikes) around to bring you anywhere in the city... though you don't need to go that
neighborhood_overview: Close to everything, nice local cafes and resto's around, public transportation nearby, local area just outside the city center.
host_about: I'm a happy camper when travelling, so quite flexible and open minded, though I like a clean bed and space. I like happy, optimistic people that are in for a good serious chat and laugh. I like adventure and am always curious arriving into a new place/city. I am a culture lover, love biking to get around, and always look out for cozy places to eat or drink...

name: Cosy ship Hannus Antwerp Belgium
description:
The space
Hannus is a over 100 years old ship, originally built as a sailing cargo vessel. Nowadays the ship is used as a cosy hostel for individual travellers and groups. The ship offers 24 beds in 10 cabins, most cabins have 2 beds, two cabins offer 4 beds. Each cabin has its own sink offering warm and cold water and a cv radiator.

There are 2 shared showers and 2 shared toilets. Inside there is no internet, however on deck, outside, there is a free wifi of Antwerp available.

In the central room breakfast is served, guest may sit there to talk, read. In concert the central kitchen may be used by the guests.

Hannus offers an informal and pleasant stay in Antwerp amids many restaurants, bars and musea like the famous MAS while moored in the antique Bonapartedok, many historical houses and buildings make the unique location. The historical centre of Antwerp is only a few minutes walking away, along the River Scheldt. There is almost a
host_about: Ik vind het leuk om alternatieve projecten op te starten en nieuwe marken te verkennen, daarvoor ben ik over de hele wereld gereisd. Op deze manier kom ik graag in contact met mensen van over de hele wereld. Met ons schip Hannus kunnen we informeel onderdak verlenen aan reizigers die net als ik op zoek zijn naar avontuur en waarvoor luxe geen noodzaak is. Belangstelling voor natuur, cultuur en schoonheid vind ik belangrijk. Het gaat mij om blijvende waarden.

name: Suites in Antwerp:"Suite Frederik"
description:
The space
We rent two beautiful completely renovated suites in a protected Art Nouveau house in the familiar and cozy Zurenborg district with many restaurants and cafes within walking distance of the central station and Berchem station and also easily accessible by car. Both spacious suites have a separate character by antique furniture combined with original and contemporary style and are equipped with all modern comfort (WIFI, wide screen TV, fully equipped kitchen, bathroom with bath and rain shower). The suite "Joachim" on the first floor consists of over 45 m² (cozy living room with kitchen and sitting area, bedroom, terrace, bathroom, separate toilet). The suite "Frederik" on the ground floor measuring over 61 sqm (living room, bedroom, dining room, conservatory, kitchen and bathroom with toilet), a sofa bed can accommodate 2 additional people. Cot is available on request.
Both suites are available to rent for weekends, midweek or week with arrival or departure

name: Cosy historic Ship Hannus  Antwerp
description:
Sailing vessel in the centre of Antwerp, ideal for groups ( 24 beds) and individual travellers. The location is perfect next musea, good restaurants and pubs, the historical centre is 10 minutes walking away. Sailing is possible if planned ahead

The space
In a harbour as Antwerp you may choose to stay on board of a historic ship. Hannus is over 100 years old sailing vessel with 10 cabins allowing around 24 guests to sleep. Inside you will enjoy the maritime look and feel thanks to the beautiful wooden interior. The cabins are small, like you may expect on a sailing vessel, but comfortable with good beds, sink and heating. In the main cabin, you may sit, read, chat with other guests. The kitchen may be used to make coffe or thee and to prepare a meal. It is all rather informal. Breakfast can be served for a supplement.

When the weather is nice, you can enjoy the wonderfull views of the harbourfront, while sitting on deck with a drink. But the dire

name: bright apartment with parkview
description:
A quiet place in the heart of Antwerp, overlooking park.
700m from Central Station and ZOO.
1500m from the old city center.
500m from shopping area.
Showroom for fashion labels but sometimes available for a holiday in Antwerp. We love our place and we furnish bit by bit to our taste.

The space
6th floor with elevator.
Apartment from 1956 recently renovated, preserving authentic atmosphere. With large living room (50m²), 2 bedrooms (14m² and 20m²), kitchen, bathroom, balcony (8m²), ...
It is usually a showroom to Belgian designers and personal pied-à-terre for weekends with friends. We like sharing it with people who respect the place as it is and handle it with care.
We like to keep the neighbours happy: they love quietness. The neighborhood offers 100 opportunities for wilder evenings.
7 minutes walk from the central station with direct connection to Brussels (45'), Ghent (45'), Bruges (1h25'),...
We provide sheets
host_about:
Hallo,
Ik ben Debora.
Het appartement uit 1956 vonden we in geheel authentieke staat en we restaureerden zo getrouw mogelijk;

Doorgaans dient het als werkplek en showroom voor Debora, die mode-ontwerpers vertegenwoordigt. 
Door zijn unieke ligging is het intussen ook onze uitvalsbasis voor vakantieweekendjes in Antwerpen.

Tussen de modeseizoenen stellen wij het graag ter beschikking. De rust van de buren respecteren we graag.
Jo en Debora

name: Trendy apartment near city park !
description:
Comfortable apt. for 2 persons in the middle of the centre of Antwerp, situated nearby the City Park (Diamond area). Only a 5 min. walk to the commercial centre & less than 15 min. away from the old centre and trendy South. Public transport and citybikes are just around the corner.

The space
Our apt. has recently been renovated. We want to give you a warm and comfy feeling, just like your own home.
All modern facilities are available to make your stay more pleasurable (Wifi, dishwasher, washing machine and dryer, digital TV and a terrace to chill out...)
neighborhood_overview: We love this area as it is very close to the City Park and just a few miles away from all the trendy spots in Antwerp.
host_about:
Hi, I'm Mark. I'm very fond of travelling, so that's one of the reasons why I'd like to share my apartment with you. 
I'm very much into quality music and spend a lot of time in the kitchen, as food is my passion. 
I've been living in Antwerp for 12 years now and I love this city a lot. 
When you stay in my apartment I will happily give you some recommendations for restaurants, things to do and to see...

name: "Antwerp B&B"
description:
Tasteful, stylish and comfortable
Genuine renovated Mansion anno 1870 with the original Fresco’s in the breakfast room.
All the rooms are provided with wifi, flatscreen TV, (DVD on request), coffee, tea and a mini library.

The space
The 'White Room'
Situated on the first floor, this room is spacious with heaps of light and clarity by three door windows on the street side, with a middle door giving entrance onto a small terrace.
Double bed, lounge and breakfast table.

The 'Buddha Room'
(Just Buddha room is not possible to be rented separately, only in combination with White room). Smaller but cosy room and is also located on the first floor. Decorated with original paintings from a French artiste who has residence and atelier in Saigon.
Double bed.

The White & Buddha Room jointly (most suitable for friends and perfect for families with children) as both the rooms are located on the first floor and having an i
neighborhood_overview:
Artist area-Dageraadplaats.
Close to Central station, shopping area and the major Concerthalls, like Elizabethzaal or Roma and Rataplan.
host_about:
Your hosts

For 20 years we lived and worked in different Asian countries. We where based in Thailand, Malaysia, Sri-Lanka, China and India.
Paul as Manager-Technical Advisor in Diamond Manufacturing Company’s. Patricia as a Documentary-Photographer.
In 2006 we decided to extend our family, we settled in Antwerp and in March 2007 our daughter Vita was born.
Patricia bought the anno1870 old Mansion in 2003 and with the original architecture in mind we renovated the entire house, into a unique and original B&B.
In Januari 2010 Patricia finally opened “Antwerp Bed and Breakfast.” We run our business not as a job but as a passion in life. Our goals are an excellent around the clock service, but most important to make our guests feel comfortable and relaxed like we would do with our own family.
Our hobby’s Art lovers. Vita’s hobby’s are, making mess and
listening to fairytales.
We look forward to welcoming you!

name: Lovely flat in trendy neighborhood
description:
We're offering a private and sunny appartment. It's located in a nice multicultural district, within walking distance of many cool bars. Discover a different side of Antwerp, and still be very close to the historical center.

The space
At your disposal is an entire flat, with two bedrooms. One big room with double bed, table and wardrobe and a smaller room with two single beds. Right across the big room is the bathroom with toilet and shower. The living room is cosy with lots of light. Feel free to hang out and relax. There's also a desk, if you need to get some work done. Finally, there's a fully equipped kitchen and a sunny balcony.

Guest access
The flat is located on the second floor (two stairs), in our family house.

Other things to note
Of course (OF COURSE) there's free WIFI available.
Towels and bed linen are provided, as well as coffee and tea.

We speak Dutch (mothertongue), English and French
neighborhood_overview: The flat is located in a great and increasingly popular neighborhood. It's multicultural and alternative, with lots of nice bars very close. Don't worry, I'll tell you where to find them or take you there. Also around the corner there's a great art gallery, called Zeno X. And there's a legendary concert hall/cinema, called De Roma. And lots of nice restaurants, snackbars and shops, too. Plenty of groceries, bakeries, butchers and supermarkets within walking distance.
host_about: Hello. We are Dirk and Leen, both in our fifties. Leen is HR-manager in a large hospital, Dirk is spokesperson for an NGO. We love nature, literature, theater and to travel. We  enjoy meeting people from all over the world.

At "HET ZUID" - centre of ANTWERP. In the neighbourhood of the trendy shoppingstreets Kloosterstraat and Nationale Straat. With plenty of cafés, restaurants within a few metres distance. Within walking distance of the historic city centre. At the garden side of the building, located in a renovated ICE FACTORY .

The space
LOFT 1D is a design of a famous Belgian interior architect Filip Deslee , which was actually designed for himself. His minimalistic point of view has been translated into an impressive Loft with many straight lines, without turning into a clinic sterile interior. Impressive large pivoting walls, makes you create the space according your mood. 100m². Its situated at the garden side of the building, meaning : green view and quiet place. :-) Bright and spacious.

Guest access
communal garden is accessible, with table

unique design concept - has been published in books and magazines,be

name: spacious and comfortable apartment
description:
Welcome to my large and bright apartment on the fourth floor in a quiet neighborhood. It is situated on the Grotesteenweg nearby the small Albertpark. You can reach the city center by city bike (3 euro/day or 7 euro/week) or by public transport. Other nice neighborhoods are a short walk on foot. Every Saturday there are two markets nearby where you can buy flowers, fresh fruit and delicious food. Or you can visit the tasty restaurant Marie next door.

The apartment was build in 2005 so it is very comfortable. It has wooden floors throughout the whole space. There is a spacious livng room with self designed and vintage furniture, tv, dvd and stereo. On the balcony you can enjoy your breakfast, a coffee, or a glass of good wine while watching the sunset. The large open kitchen is fully equipped with a fridge, a microwave, a gas stove and all the amenities you need. A washing machine and a dryer are available in a separate room

There is one large bedroom with a ergo

name: Authentic and very light studio in Antwerp
description:
The one bedroom flat comes fully furnished, is bathing in light and has a peaceful and relaxing atmosphere. The neighborhood is lively and a big park (Park Spoor Noord), concert hall Sportpaleis and Art Nouveau bathing house are right around the corner.

The space
We are renting out the top floor of our house in the upcoming north side neighborhood of Antwerp. We have renovated the mansion and created a one-bedroom apartment with private shower, toilet, king-size bedroom and a living room studio with kitchenette. If desired, we can add a single mattress onto the living room floor.

Guest access
You will be given a key to the front door of our house (where we also live in). Three stairs up is our beautiful studio apartment, where you have your own toilet, separate shower, a bedroom and the living room with kitchenette at your personal disposition.
We live downstairs, so if you're in need of anything, or you just want to know where to find
neighborhood_overview:
The north side of Antwerp used to be a place to skip when visiting Antwerp. It is not anymore. On the contrary, the vicinity of Park Spoor Noord now offers the opportunity to relax while having a peaceful picnic, but also to enjoy nightlife by going to the summer bar (Bar Noord) or the multiple galleries that are nearby. More into a relaxing day at the spa or just a refreshing swim? The most beautiful (Art Nouveau) swimming pool annex bathing house is literally around the corner.
For those coming to Antwerp for a show or concert at Het Sportpaleis or Lotto Arena, our place is ideal to avoid the traffic jams, as it is only a 5 minute walk door to door.

Still close to the ancient city centre, our neighborhood is a very interesting one to live in and start your journey from.

name: The chill place in Antwerp 2
description:
The space
Close to the city centre and central station in the artistic and multicultural neighbourhood Borgerhout a beautiful mansion (herenhuis) from 1905. Live in the grandeur of passed times and feel at home.

When you arrive I always take time to show you the house and give you a lot of suggestions what to do in Antwerp, where to drink or dine and where to go out.
In the morning your extensive breakfast is served in the cozy kitchen or outside in the garden. The house has free Wifi.

From the house you can easily walk to some typical Belgian cafe's and restaurants in the neighbourhood. Or you can take the tram that brings you to the very centre in 15 minutes. Visit the city of the famous Flemish painters Rubens, Van Dijck and Breughel. Enjoy your Belgian beer on one of the many terraces, shop till you drop in the fashion capital of Belgium and buy that piece you always looked for in that beautiful second hand shop.

And when you have
host_about: I am very interested in art, in design, in movies and music. I also love Italian cooking, I love to cook for friends. I traveled a lot in Italy and learned how to cook there. Now I organize Italian cooking lessons at my house.

The space

Guest access

Without having to enter our living space, you have free access to your room with private bathroom and small living room with tv. If requested so, breakfast can be served in your room, or you can ask for breakfast upstairs in our loft.

Other things to note
If you are looking for the old center and the most touristic place in Antwerp, y

Your room is away from the street and therefore in the night time our place is very quiet.
And for art lovers, this is the upcoming area in the city (although you wouldn't notice right away) for art galeries.

name: NEW - Quiet loft in city center w/ private parking
description:
Looking forward to receiving you as one of our first guests!

Minimum stay = 2 nights.

Our modern loft offers absolute rest and shelter in the middle of the beating hart of the historic district. At 5 minutes walking from the Cathedral and the river Schelde.

The space
Our spacious loft (135 m2) is situated on the first floor of a neoclassical building dating from the end of the 19th century. Formerly, it was a paper factory and a factory of Indian caps. High ceilings, fine decoration and lots of books create an atmosphere that will make you feel at home during your stay.
Big windows open up to the wooden terrace with view on a patio, so you can also enjoy sitting outside on warm days.
If you don't feel like dining out, our fully equipped kitchen invites you to explore your own cooking creativity.
The apartment has one bedroom, so we can accommodate two guests.
You can safely park your car in the closed garage under th
neighborhood_overview:
All musea, the river Scheldt, restaurants, bars, shops ... are at walking distance from our apartment. The area is specifically known for its art galeries.
Antwerp has a lot to offer: city on the Scheldt, city of Rubens, of diamonds, a fashionista's dream with world-renowned designers, a port city, impressive architecture and splendid art... Antwerp is a vibrant, welcoming metropolis, which is also great fun and heart-warming, with green areas where you can relax, and peaceful corners. The cafes only serve the best beers and foodies can enjoy delicious traditional and multicultural cuisine.
Antwerp is also a perfect starting point to visit other Belgian cities like Brussels (30 mins), Ghent (30 mins), Bruges (60 mins),... but also Amsterdam (1,5 hrs), Paris (2 hrs) and London (2,5 hrs) are nearby.
After your city visit(s), our apartment offers you complete rest and shelter.
host_about:
Ingrid is business developer for Living Care Labs. Yves is Portfolio manager for a Wealth manager. 
In our spare time we love to travel, walk, have good time with friends and family.
We also are culturally involved: translating catalogues, teach creative and business writing.
Yves is also an avid art affecionado. He reviews (modern) art exhibitions and interviews contemporary artists.

All these experiences we love to share with our guests in the Antwerp Loft.

name: aplace/antwerp: gorgeous flat with square view
description:
While entering this well located flat, you'll feel at home immediately. It has been decorated warm and cosy with all modern comfort and a gorgeous square view. The flat is situated in the fashion district of the city, absolutaly everything on walking distance!

The space
This lovely flat is located on a charming little square in the very center of Antwerp (fashion district area). Literally around the corner of everything you want to see in this beautifull city.

This third floor flat has been completely renovated since december 2012 and is being decorated in an eclectic style (soul full things combined with a few new objects) which quarantees you a warm, cosy and comfortable home.

There is a fully equipped kitchen, a marble bathroom with tub/rainshower, a seperate restroom, a very bright and cosy living room (4 large windows with square view) and 2 bedrooms.

The view on the Vrijdagmarkt is amazing, The large windows offers you a pos
neighborhood_overview:
Aplace/antwerp is situated in the middle of the old town of Antwerp. On the corner of ‘de Groenplaats’ and the Big Market, the designer shops (the famous Dries van Noten shop is around the corner) and the ‘Kloosterstraat’, known for its antique en curiosa. The ideal spot to discover Antwerp!

THE AUCTION ON FRIDAY
De Vrijdagmarkt is a quiet square that hasn’t been discovered by the big audience yet and ideal to meet local Antwerp people. Very unique and traditonal is the weekly auction on - fridays - on the ‘Vrijdagmarkt’. Here you can buy for a cheap price exclusive, retro and sometimes even valuable objects.

PLANTIN-MORETUS MUSEUM
When staring out of your windows you'll see the beautifully enlightened building of the Museum Plantin-Moretues. The only printing/publisher in the world from the Renaissances and baroque time which has kept remained and the only museum in the world on the UNESCO World Heritage list - so for sure a must see!

DESI
host_about: Since my childhoocd I dreamt of having my own small/tiny 'hotel' and my dream became real. In combination with my passion for designing interiors, I'm absolutely doing what I like to do most: hosting & decorating, an ideal match.

name: Gezellig 1-slpk app. op toplocatie
description:
Met hart en ziel hebben wij dit charmante 1-slpk app. op het hippe Antwerpse Zuid gerenoveerd zodat u zich onmiddellijk thuis zou voelen. Achter de 19e eeuwse gevel wacht je alle comfort en een zalig bed! De ideale basis om Antwerpen te ontdekken!

The space
Ons appartement - gelegen op de 2de verdieping - maakt deel uit van een recent volledig gerenoveerd gebouw uit de 19de eeuw op het bruisende Antwerpse Zuid. Loop je de straat uit dan bots je als het ware op het nieuwe justitiepaleis.

Het appartement is ideaal voor 2 personen maar wij hebben in de woonruimte ook een heerlijke slaapbank staan van waaruit je gezellig kan genieten van digitale TV.

Onze keuken is volledig van alle toeters en bellen voorzien. Je kan indien je dit wenst je culinaire talenten ook hier bovenhalen!

De dag begin of eindig je onder een heerlijke regendouche.

Voor een verkwikkende rust leg je je te slapen in een bed met pocketveren matras op ee
neighborhood_overview:
Te voet ben je in no-time in de gezellige buurt aan het Museum van Schone Kunsten waar het moeilijk kiezen wordt tussen de vele cafés en restaurants. Ook de befaamde modebuurt met het Modemuseum, Dries Van Noten en andere stijlvolle adresjes ligt op 5 minuten wandelen. In de Kloosterstraat kan je dan weer terecht voor antiek en curiosa, ook op zondagnamiddag!
Voor je boodschappen kan je terecht in supermarkt Carrefour net achter de hoek. Erg handig want deze is ook op zondag geopend!

Op de Vlaamse Kaai zijn er - naast de vele designwinkels - ook enkele delicatessenwinkels en bakkerij Dellafaille (top!) waar je zeker iets naar je gading vindt.
