name: One bedroom appartment near Eilandje
description:
Conveniently located spacious and bright one bedroom appt with a vintage touch, in one of the quieter streets of the centre. After a one year break I decided to take up AirBnB again ;-)!

The space
Conveniently located spacious and bright one bedroom appt with a vintage touch. Small building in one of the quieter streets of the centre.

The 60m² appartment is located in a quiet side street of the art school. The small sixtiesstyle building has 4 units.

The 30m² hardwood floor living room is light and bright. The orientation to the south gives you sun most of the afternoon. The 12m² bedroom has a 2 person bed (140*200) and is located in the back of the building. Bathroom is light and bright as well equiped shower.

Friends or couples who want be in the centre of it all for an affordable price should not hesitate and just book ;-).

Guest access
You have access to the entire appt.

Other things
neighborhood_overview:
I live in the bohémien part of Antwerp that just breathes out the Academy of arts life style. You can take it a l' aise in a handful of coffeebars just a short walk away. New ones keep popping up so ask me about the latest ones.

Harbour district Eilandje, old city centre and Academy of arts are all within max 10 minutes walking distance.

name: laterrebleue-'my house, your house'
description:
Hello,
My name is Fatima and I am from Brazil. I've been living in Antwerp for 27 years. I love cooking, Quentin Tarantino movies and Caetano Veloso's music!
The house has two toilets and a separate shower and a big bathtub for everyone to use.
We have a large living where you can relax and watch tv.
The kitchen, bathroom and living room are all shared amongst the guests.
There are 3 bedrooms.

The space
The bedrooms are either with two or three beds, if you're alone in the bnb you have a room to yourself, if we have a lot of bookings you will have to share the room.

The house has two toilets and a shower and big bathtub.
We have a living room where you can watch tv and relax. There is Netflix.

Guest access
Kitchen, bathroom, livingroom are shared with us.

Other things to note
The parking spots on the street are always paying, except for sundays. The price for every 24hours i
neighborhood_overview:
The house is 200 meters away from a very cosy place named 'Dageraad plaats', where you can find a lot of nice restaurants and bars. There's a supermarket 50meters from the house. On the corner of the street, there's also a gas station with a small shop.
If you stay for a longer period, you can find a washing salon in the street from the bnb.
host_about:
Hello, my name is Fatima and I'm from Brasil. I've been living in Belgium, Antwerp for 27 years now and I love cooking, Quentin Tarantino movies and Caetano Veloso's music. I am on Airbnb because I love meeting new people. The house is very cosy and colorful and I hope you'll feel at home. It's decorated with really exotic details. It has three floors. On the first floor you have a huge living room with a hammock and a giant kitchen which is especially designed as I am a professional cook. On the second floor you have the shared large bathroom with a separate shower and a big bathtub. The rooms for rent are on the third floor. They are not too big but with every comfort you will need like a good quality bed, matras and enough drawers. The kitchen, living room and the bathroom are shared.

It's not a house with a lot of  house rules; but we expect our guest to have awareness of some fundamentals like; respect, hygiene and open communication. 

The location of the house is ten minutes walk from Antwerpen Berchem station and five minutes walk from tram and bus stops. You have also a really nice square in five minutes walking distance  "Dageraadsplaats" with a lot of cafes bars and restaurants. 
There is a supermarket 50 meters from the house, open all days. There is also a very large supermarket about 300 meters from the house.

If you would like to discover Belgium's gastronomy and culture, combined with Brasil's hospitality, don't hesitate to send me a message!

name: +++ KAMIL +++ terrace & pond
description:
KAMIL offers you an individual resting place in vivid Antwerp, where you can take a breath and relax or plan your next trip. The interior and the objects were designed by the owners, two architects who love to travel.

The space
+++ May your dreams last longer than your nights +++
We offer you a full equipped house with 2
PRIVATE TERRACES AND POND. The house contains livingroom, kitchen, diningspace, 3 bedrooms, bathroom, separate toilet, private roof terrace and common garden and pool with the owner. We can host 6 adults. 2 people per bedroom. stay in the individual bedroom and 2 people with a comfortable double bed. A babybed (and other necessities for kids, chair, buggy, toys, ...) can be provided.

At arrival there's a WELCOME PACKAGE (bread, tea, coffee, fruit, jam, eggs, oil, herbs, toiletpaper, kitchentowels, ...) that gets you started. The kitchen is fully equipped : fridge, freezer, oven, microwave, dishwasher, coffeemaker, etc.
neighborhood_overview: +++ In our multi-cultural neighborhood there is always a lot of movement. Bakery, fish, meat and grocery shops are within 50meters and open on sunday. We are just a 10min. walk from the lovely Zurenborg area for restaurants, bars and more. Bus and tramway are around the corner.
host_about: +++ May your dreams last longer than your nights! +++ Pour que vos rêves soient plus longs que vos nuits! +++ Moge uw dromen langer duren dan uw nachten! +++

description:
A spacious, quiet and modern loft on 3 levels with big sunny garden and swimming pool in a renovated 19th century neo-renaissance building.
10 minutes from the historic city center!

The space
Bright triplex loft near Antwerp city centre.
Welcome to our unique historical home: our loft is a 250 sq mrs renovated old notary house, where the traditional architecture is perfectly blended in with modernist elements and comfort. A peaceful oasis in the city, the rooms are bright and large, and all look out on our garden with swimming pool. We have 2 living rooms on different levels, bordering our spacious and fully equipped kitchen. Our 3 bedrooms have a separate bathroom, toilet and private terrace, all very quiet, facing away from the street. The fourth bedroom is on a half-open mezzanine, which you can close off with curtains.

Guest access
Guests have full and private access to all amenities and rooms in the house.
We expect from
neighborhood_overview: Borgerhout, or, 'Boho' as we like to call it ;-) is a young vibrant and multicultural neighbourhood. There are plenty of new, alternative and artistic venues. There are nice and cosy bars and restaurants and bakeries just a few steps away. Borgerhout is also an up and coming neigbourhood for young artists with many art galleries popping up.

name: Penthouse +Terrace @CentralStation
description:
Our quiet and fully equipped apartment, with large and sunny rooftop terrace, is located at the top floor of a static 'Bel Etage' house. Centrally located in the unique and Jewish and Diamond quarter, you have easy access to train, tram, bus, bike.

The space
The flat is located in the rooftop of a static bel etage house, with both a large and quiet exterior terrace and a cosy interior. The open space is centered around a custom-made 8m bookshelf which reaches to the ceiling. The apartment is decorated with souvenirs from travels from places off the beaten track, such as Afghanistan and Central African countries. As the private flat is fully furnished and equipped, the space is ideal for longer stays stays as well.

Guest access
Guests are welcome to use the whole flat, as well as the large terrace. Just make sure not to be too loud when on the terrace in the evening, so our neighbours are just happy.

Other things to note<
neighborhood_overview: The flat is located in the very city center with easy and quick access to any part in town. The international mix that passes your front door every day makes this neighbourhood very unique: elderly couples on their way to the renowned 'delicatesse’ pastry shop just next door, Chasidim Jews in traditional attire roaming their neighbourhood with plenty of ‘kosjer’ shops and restaurants, international businessmen looking busy trading diamonds at the Diamond Exchange just behind the flat, as well as young couples shopping for jewellery in the many diamond and gold stores in the neighbourhood (the men often looking less enthusiastic than their women), … Moreover, the neighbourhood offers plenty of restaurants, shops, bars, cinema - as well as two of the principal city parks: the Central Park and the Antwerp Zoo. A perfect base for discovering the city.
host_about:
Native to the city of Antwerp, Belgium, I have spent many years travelling, studying and working abroad. Coming back to my home town feels like a true reward during which I enjoy very much the good life and 'Burgondic'  lifestyle Belgium has to offer, which has fostered an informal expertise in Belgian beers, coffee bars, cultural events and places where to hide with a good book. 
In my absences from Antwerp, a good friend will host guests in my flat.

name: Cosy flat in trendy neighbourhood
description: Sunny and light appartment in 'Zurenborg', a charming neighbourhood which is well known for its bars, restaurants and its Art Nouveau architecture. 10min walk from Central Station. Public transport and city bikes only few meters from door.
host_about:
Vincent and I (Ester his girlfriend) are both born,raised and residented in Belgium. Vincent is 100% Belgian but I'm also 50% made out of thai roots :-)

We both have our own appartement in the center of Antwerp, but because we are both fond of meeting new people from diffrent nations we decided to put one up on air bnb. Because the second appartment is nearby, we will always be close to help you out. 

During our education in economics at the University of Antwerp we participated in some exchange programme. Vincent went to Sweden for 3 months and I stayed a semester in Toulouse (France) and Georgtown ( Washington) during my studies. Our jobs are also related to these studies. 

We try to travel the world on any occation we can, holidays, exchange programs, international work environment... after all this is the best eduction man can get! Seeing the world, meeting new people and of course charing my love of great food and drinks with them while getting insights.  from an other angel.

Nicely renovated two floor duplex with garden in a quiet neighborhood, close to Berchem train station and 15min to Antwerp city centre with public transportation. 3 minute walk to restaurants, shops, and grocery stores. Perfect for families with kids.

The space
We offer you a full equipped home with 3 bedrooms, bathroom, separate toilet, dining room, open kitchen and living area, and a private garden with terrace.

Our duplex is part of a 100 years old house that has recently been renovated creating a unique combination between old features and modern comfort. The duplex is filled with light and it also has a nice garden with a terrace.

The duplex consists of the first 2 floors in a 4 story house with a share staircase.

On the ground floor you have a bedroom with a queen size bed, the dining room, the open kitchen and living area, a toilet, and the terrace and garden.
On the in-between floor you have a big restroom with a
neighborhood_overview:

name: Charmant appartement op toplocatie!
description:
Wilt u ook graag eens slapen onder oude stenen gewelven op een toplocatie in Antwerpen?
Ons appartement is 80m2, gelegen op de begane grond en een souterrain. Het heeft een moderne en knusse uitstraling en is van alle gemakken voorzien.
De badkamer is recent vernieuwd en heeft een prachtige, moderne beton-ciré look, met vloerverwarming.

The space
In ons appartement slaap je in alle rust onder prachtige oude gewelven.

Guest access
Van 1 t/m 5 personen beschikbaar.

Other things to note
Reserveren is mogelijk vanaf 2 personen tot max. 5 personen.

Het appartement is NIET geschikt voor feestjes!
neighborhood_overview:
Het appartement is gelegen op 150 m van de Grote markt en de Scheldekaaien. Het is een gezellige straat en waar je culinair kunt genieten van verschillende restaurantjes.

Tussen de historische panden en galerieën, is er voor de kinderen een klein speeltuintje dat zich midden in de straat bevindt.

Vanuit het appartement is het ongeveer 10 minuten lopen naar het trendy Zuid met zijn eigenzinnige winkeltjes, vintagezaakjes en hippe uitgaansgelegenheden.

Ook loop je vanuit de Zirkstraat in korte tijd naar de winkelstraten, historische monumenten en vele cafeetjes en terrassen waar je kunt genieten van het Bourgondische Vlaamse stadsleven.
host_about:
Wij zijn Leonie en Ahmed. Wij houden ervan om te reizen en nieuwe sfeervolle adresjes te ontdekken. Zo genieten we ervan om de fijne ervaring die we zelf hebben met het verblijf in ons appartement te delen met anderen die de stad Antwerpen willen verkennen of gewoon een heerlijk weekendje met vrienden door willen brengen.
We vinden het belangrijk om vanuit vertrouwen en respect om te gaan met andermans eigendom, maar ook zorg te dragen voor de wereld om ons heen. 
Sfeer en eigenheid is voor ons onmisbaar.. Dat maakt de plek waar je verblijft..

Daarnaast zijn we graag bezig met het creëren van nieuwe dingen; meubels maken, fotograferen, beeldend werken.

Stad en platteland is voor ons een belangrijke afwisseling, zowel om te wonen als om te reizen.

neighborhood_overview: Peaceful residential area. At the rear of the house you overlook the neighborhood garrdens. It is more quiet here than in the countryside. The neighborhood has a village atmosphere with shops, a first class butcher, an excellent cheese store, a great fishmonger, interior decorating stores, pharmacies and several local supermarkets. The best restaurants of Antwerp are located in this area. Also great nightlife within a 10 minute walk and the same distance for the historic city center and the major museums.
host_about:
Hallo, ik houd al meer dan 25 jaar mijn B&B open en doe het nog altijd even graag.
In mijn vrije tijd luister ik vaak naar klassieke muziek (ik zing zelf ook), kook ik lekkere gerechten of onderhoud ik mijn stadstuintje. Daarnaast reis ik graag met mijn man doorheen Europa, meestal op de fiets.
Ik ontvang mijn gasten in stijl in één van mijn studio's en geef hen met plezier uitleg over alle fijne adresjes in Antwerpen. 
En mijn motto? Carpe Diem. De tijd gaat al snel genoeg om hem te verliezen aan pietluttigheden :-)

The space

Natuurliefhebbers of mensen die graag tot rust willen komen, zijn bij ons helemaal aan het juiste adres. Zo hebben we verschillende forten in de omgeving en zijn de Hobokense Polders op wandelafstand. Echt een aanrader!

name: Studio Pancake Paste
description:
Beautiful 19th century town house.

2 single beds that can be merged into 1
Kitchenette with fridge and hob
Separate bathroom with rain shower
Free WiFi
Flatscreen TV
Courtesy coffee and tea, breakfast: €5/person

1 night possible*, weekend 2 nights min.

Excl. city tax: €2,25/person/night
* For stays of one night: cleaning fee of € 12

Smoke free, no pets

The space
Studio Pancake Paste is quiet, cozy and comfortable. The room has a luxury double bed that can be set up to make twin beds. You can hear the birds sing. Rate is €75 per night, for 1 or for 2 persons. An extensive breakfast can be arranged in the room at a rate of €5 per person. Everything is available to prepare tea and coffee.

Guest access
The guests have access to their room.

Other things to note
The public parking garage "Indigo" is located at a 10 minute walk from the house and o
neighborhood_overview: Peaceful residential area. At the rear of the house you overlook the neighborhood garrdens. It is more quiet here than in the countryside. The neighborhood has a village atmosphere with shops, a first class butcher, an excellent cheese store, a great fishmonger, interior decorating stores, pharmacies and several local supermarkets. The best restaurants of Antwerp are located in this area. Also great nightlife within a 10 minute walk and the same distance for the historic city center and the major museums.
host_about:
Hallo, ik houd al meer dan 25 jaar mijn B&B open en doe het nog altijd even graag.
In mijn vrije tijd luister ik vaak naar klassieke muziek (ik zing zelf ook), kook ik lekkere gerechten of onderhoud ik mijn stadstuintje. Daarnaast reis ik graag met mijn man doorheen Europa, meestal op de fiets.
Ik ontvang mijn gasten in stijl in één van mijn studio's en geef hen met plezier uitleg over alle fijne adresjes in Antwerpen. 
En mijn motto? Carpe Diem. De tijd gaat al snel genoeg om hem te verliezen aan pietluttigheden :-)

name: Spacious & eclectic loft
description:
Located in the trendy neigbourhood 't Eilandje, surrounded by water. It is the melting pot of creatives and entrepreneurs. You will find museums, many restaurants and typical Antwerp brown cafe's nearby. My apartment is a great way to immerse yourself in the Antwerp experience with a nice view of the park and close to the water, grab a bottle of wine and go watch the sunset. Supermarket is 2 mins away. Perfect for city trips, business stay, available for longer.
Message me with any questions!

The space
Loft style apartment with vintage interior elements
Spacious living room with lots of light falling in
White peaceful bedroom
Open shower and bath tub to relax
Good atmosphere, books to read & dvd's to watch
This place is all about giving yourself some space to breathe
neighborhood_overview:
Trendy neighbourhood with an eclectic mix of buildings and architecture. Amazing restaurants, fun bars, great parties in hidden spaces.
All the big fashion showrooms are located in this area.
Famous museums such as the MAS museum and Red Starline museum are 5 mins by foot.
2 mins away you find yourself by The Schelde river, relax there, have a drink and look at the beautiful sunset.
You will almost find everything you need on this little island.
Experience for yourself and enjoy!
host_about:
Hi! 
I'm a vibrant lady who loves to travel and explore.
I have my own business of vintage clothing and many projects on the side involving sustainable fashion & interior design.
My place is definitely a reflection of my personality. 
I also offer a Revive shopping experience that you can book through Air bnb, explore the city like a local.

name: Cosy 19th c townhouse near Central Station+parking
description:
Charmant huis met 2 slaapkamers in een levendige woonbuurt vlakbij winkelstraat Meir,Zoo,Elisabethzaal,Centraal Station.
U beschikt over het volledige huis. Wij wonen met ons gezin aan de achterzijde van de vakantiewoning.
Digitale tv, dvd, wifi, keuken met oven, magnetron, vaatwas, Nespresso-apparaat,koffie en thee,handdoeken,beddengoed, gezelschapspellen,boeken,dvd's..
Vrij gebruik van de gesloten private parkeerplaats naast het huis. Steile trap: moeilijker voor jonge kinderen/ouderen.

The space
Huis Dujardin is een kleine stadswoning (72 m²) met authentieke 19e eeuwse charme. Het huis staat helemaal ter uwer beschikking. Het is centraal gelegen op wandelafstand (500 m) van het Antwerps Centraal Station -het mooiste treinstation ter wereld-, de Antwerpse Zoo -een van de oudste dierentuinen ter wereld-, de wandelboulevard De Keyserlei en de Meir,de belangrijkste winkelstraat van de stad. Voor muziekliefhebbers is de Opera, de Roma en het Sportpal
neighborhood_overview:
De vakantiewoning ligt vlakbij het Centraal Station, de Zoo, de Opera. De wijk Borgerhout
'Boho' is een bruisend deel van de stad met een multicultureel en artistiek, bohemien karakter. Overal duiken hippe cafés en restaurants op.
De Elisabethzaal, de Lotto Arena en het Sportpaleis; de grote concertzalen van Antwerpen, zijn vlakbij.
host_about: Interested in interior architecture, decoration and food, I want to create a feeling of coming home for my guests. As I love my city Antwerp I can help them to find special places to eat, drink and visit.

name: Duplex 160m² with sauna & piano
description:
Spacious apartment in the city centre of Antwerp (South District) with sauna, an upright piano, 2 spacious rooms, 2 bathrooms and a spacious living room with open kitchen and dining room.

The space
This apartment has 2 spacious rooms. The master bedroom has a double bed and a 2 persons sofa. The second room features a 2 persons bed. 2 extra people can sleep in the living room(on the sofa or on a air mattress). The living room is spacious with open kitchen and dining room. The dining room has a TV and an upright piano.

Guest access
all rooms are open.

Other things to note
The building has a camera security system. In the common entrance hall and at the fire ladder are camera's for your safety.
neighborhood_overview:
Located in the center of Antwerp (south of city center), the apartment is situated with an abundance of restaurants, bars, shopping, landmarks and galleries. A great location for couples and families visiting Antwerp and seeking a great place to stay.
Due to its proximity to the city center, most places are within walking distance. However, you can also take the tramway or bus – both are 50 meters from the apartment – to help you explore or get around the city:
- Central Station (most beautiful train station in the world!)
- palace on the meir: a genuine palace. The originally 18th century building used to be the home/residence of important rulers such as Napoleon Bonaparte.
- Antwerp Zoo is one of the oldest and best-known zoos in Europe
- Aquatopia is like living under the ocean in the future
- Pirates Island is a great place for children aged between 2 and twelve. Here, you can meet Peg Leg and his mates where you can play for hours in a renovated wa
host_about: Ik heb psychologie en human resources management gestudeerd. Ik werk voor een project in het bedrijfsleven rond diversiteit. Mijn doelstelling is openheid te creëren bij bedrijven voor personen met een arbeidsbeperking, 50 +'ers, allochtonen en jongeren laaggeschoolden. Daarnaast probeer ik in mijn vrije tijd zoveel mogelijk te reizen en speel ik piano en keyboard in een bandje. Sinds enkele weken ben ik gestart met airbnb en ik vind het fantastisch! Leuk om mensen te kunnen ontmoeten over heel de wereld. Ik verwelkom u graag in mijn appartement en geef je al de nodige info over leuke plaatsjes in Antwerpen. Tot binnenkort!

host_about:
I'm a reader, gardener and I like meeting people. I also like cooking, going to restaurants, concerts, theatre and dance-performances. I try to be a real ambassador for my city and region.

Being a member of the Antwerp B&B-Association, I rent my groundfloor apartment on a professional basis. If you need an invoice for your stay, that's no problem.

I dislike arrogant people.

name: Charming room in center of Antwerp
description:
**New** Renovated apartment in the heart of Antwerp with view on the cityhall ( main square ) 50 meters from the cathedral, and 100 meters from the main shopping street. The best location to explore the old part of the center.

The space
Big and trendy loft in the center of Antwerp.
100m² renovated with a unique view and located in the citycenter.

Guest access
Public transport is very easy in Antwerp .
From central station you can take trams (phone number hidden) melkmarkt or groenplaats and then it's a 5 minute walk to my place.
If you come by car you can either park (payed) in the surrounding streets or covered at Public parkings grote markt or Scheldekaaien and again a 5 min walk to the appartment.
Once settled getting around town is easy and cheap on Public transport or on foot or you can rent bikes for a day at Antwerp's VELO bike stations .. You can find 3 of these stations at max 500m distance.

name: Unique city loft with amazing view!
description:
Welcome to Antwerp's historic city center!

Your home will be a light and spacious loft in a refurbished 1850's building.

White wooden floors, lots of natural light, stunning view on the cathedral, fully equipped kitchen with coffee, tea etc.
Separate bathroom with bath and shower.

The space
**Hygiene and cleanliness have always been very important to us. After each booking we take 2 hours to clean the whole apartment thoroughly. We have enhanced our cleaning routines and are following guidelines provided by Airbnb and local health authorities.**

The loft has no separate bedroom. One double bed and one double sofa bed. Bed linen and towels are provided.

The loft is on the 3rd floor in a building without a lift. Definitely worth the view though, but might not be suitable for people with mobility issues.

A couple of (cool-air) fans are present.

You'll have the entire apartment to yourself.
neighborhood_overview: The historic part of Antwerp’s city center is full of charming buildings, restaurants, cafés, shops. Our apartment is located in a car free street (after 11am).
host_about:
Hello!
I'm Yara and I've lived in Antwerp for 6 years.
Originally from Holland, love to travel and enjoy good food :D
I really like the cosiness of the city and the fact that you can walk almost to every hotspot from our apartment.
There's so much to see and do here, so I've written all my tips down for you.
 Sharing=caring :D
Hope you'll have a fantastic stay!

name: Louise Marie, romantisch huisje
description:
The space
In het hart van het modecentrum van Antwerpen staat een gezellig vakantiehuisje. Een ideale uitvalsbasis om een bruisende stad te leren kennen. Want Antwerpen is een havenstad waar steeds iets te ontdekken en te beleven valt. Denk maar aan de mode, de musea, de dierentuin, de oergezellige cafeetjes, de markten, de theaters, de antiquairs ... En als je dan kan logeren in een historisch pandje, waar je alle comfort van een hotel hebt, maar de privacy van je eigen thuis en waar je eventueel een heerlijk dineetje kan serveren voor enkele vrienden, is de keuze snel gemaakt.

Het huisje is volledig beschikbaar.

Ik ontvang jullie bij aankomst en spreek met jullie af bij vertrek.
Jullie verblijf is op basis van self-catering.

Ideaal gelegen in het midden van de hippe modewijk en op enkele minuten wandelafstand van de Grote Markt en Kathedraal en de Schelde.

Alle openbaar vervoer is op wandelafstand beschikbaar.

The space

The high and charming hallway connects all the different rooms and mezzanines. Windows everywhere. The color green is the thread that links everything.

The Hamsa is named after the 'hamsa' symbol that can be found in the kitchen above the stove. It is the symbol for happiness.

name: A-South Luxury Penthouse Living
description:
A-South is a spacious 200 sqm duplex apartment offering luxurious city living,
situated in the South District of Antwerp.

A-South is set amongst the charming antique and vintage design stores of Kloosterstraat.

The space
A-South is a spacious 200 sqm duplex apartment offering luxurious city living,
situated in the South District of Antwerp.

The accommodation comprises of 2 double bedrooms & 1 twin, all with ensuite facilities.
Bedrooms are offered with luxurious linens.

The living quarters are on the upper floor with large terraces overlooking the Kloosterstraat and views of Antwerp Cathedral.

There is a well equipped kitchen and dining area set amongst an open planned lounge which offers a large flat screen TV. Other guest amenities are free Wi Fi, Nespresso Coffee Machine and Complimentary Belgian Biscuits.

Behind the lounge is a vintage design office space for the business traveller.

name: Apartment in Antwerp
description:
This cosy,fully furnished 1 bedroom/80 m2 apartment in the very heart of Antwerp, will let you discover this cosmopolitan and vibrant city in fullcomfort. It is just a stone's throw away from the Central Station, Diamond District and Meir. Historic and shopping centers are all within less than 10 minutes walking distance . Easy for public transport connections .Perfect both for short and long stays.Ideal for1 p. (especially when considering long term)or a couple & there is also 1 foldable bed.

The space
Spacious living room , plenty of light , very clean and comfortable . Separate bedroom , bathroom , toilet and kitchen . All kitchen essentials are available if you prefer to shop and prepare your own dinner for a night in . Nespresso coffee machine & several capsules as well as towels,bedlinen,shampoos, shower gels and soaps are also included . For the guests who stay longer (14 days and more ) and are usually too busy to do their own laundry, ironing, cleaning

name: Classy and spacious 19th cent loft with terrace.
description:
Welcome to our beautiful renovated old classic appartement with terrace and garden views.
220 square metres on 2 levels of authentic elements, high doors, windows and ceilings combined with modern comfort and luxury.
10 minutes from the historic center! You're welcome to enjoy our premises whilst respecting the quiet for themselves and our neighbours.

Guest access
Guests have full and private access to all amenities and rooms in the house.
We expect from our guests that they'll treat our house and its surroundings like their own home, this means:
Not causing night noise or anything that might disturb our neighbours
No parties, music or loud noises after 22 pm
Be extra quiet in the hall when entering or leaving the building
Please leave our house tidy and don't leave any dirty dishes
neighborhood_overview: Borgerhout, or 'Boho' as we like to call it ;-) is a young, vibrant and multicultural neighbourhood. Restaurants, bars, bakeries, but also contemporary art galeries are just a few minutes away.
host_about: We are a family (mother, daughter and son) living in Antwerp. We have a beautiful home that we want to share with people from all over the world.

This house is situated outside of the city center. The center of Antwerp is located at cycling distance and only 5 km away. There is a tram stop at 200 m from the residence. The tram ride will take about 20 to 30 minutes. The cat you read about in the reviews died in 2018. Dit huis bevindt zich net buiten de stad. Het centrum van Antwerpen is op fietsafstand en slechts 5 km verwijderd. Er is een tramhalte op 200 m. De tramrit naar de stad duurt 25 - 30 minuten. De kat is er niet meer.

The space
The house contains a beautiful kitchen and modern bathroom. There is one cozy bedroom with one double bed and one bedroom with one single bed. Under the single bed is also an extra matrass for an additional 4th person.
Er is een riante keuken en een moderne badkamer. Er is een gezellige slaapkamer met één 2-persoonsbed (140cm) en een ruime kamer met een 1-persoonsbed. Onder dat bed ligt een extra matras voor een eventuele 4de persoon.

Guest acce
neighborhood_overview: You can find within 1 km from the house 4 big supermarkets. name: Design loft in historic building
description:
Newly renovated design loft in a house build in 1869. Located in the city centre @5 minutes walking distance from the train station. The main shopping street is directly around the corner and bars and restaurants are all nearby in this lively area.

The space
The location in the city centre of Antwerp is ideal for shopping during the day, drop your bags at home, refresh and go out in the night. The loft is very spacious, you can program the blinds to wake up with daylight, you have your own kitchenette to make Nespresso coffee or tea and there is a small refrigerator for your drinks! The bathroom has a luxury bath and a lovely rain shower.

Guest access
You acces the space on the third floor through the shared staircase.

Other things to note
We have two cats, but they are not allowed to come upstairs in the design loft.
Please bring your own towels and shampoo!
neighborhood_overview: We love about our neighborhood that it's very central, there are some nice small restaurants and bars just around the corner, a good bakery for fresh croissants and delicious pies and several sandwich shops. The historic Cathedral of Antwerp is at walking distance, the ZOO just around the corner and in summer the Park Spoor Noord is a very relaxed location to enjoy some drinks and music.

name: NESTT
description:
NESTT offers you the same space as NEST, also advertised on this website. The decoration is a bit different and it is situated on the 2nd floor, so it even has more light. And on top of that a roofterrace.

The space
NESTT is situated on the 2nd floor and is very spacious and light. It's at the end of a calm green alley, away from the always moving streets of Borgerhout.

Guest access
You have access to the roofterrace. But please check with us first, cause it also can be used by, for example, people working at the recording studio.
neighborhood_overview:
We have a very lovely lively neighbourhood. There's a lot of couleur locale, Moroccan teahouses, places where you can eat, nightshops. And since a couple of years a younger, hipper crowd, that makes sure there are some nice bars and stuff. More and more galleries are opening here and a couple times a year we have some big art happenings.
We are around the corner of the famous theater and concert hall De Roma and not very far away from musiccentre Trix.
host_about: We are a lively couple who likes a good combination of travelling , city life, rooftopfarming, running a restaurant, bar and club, organising markets, making music, creating pottery and other arts. We try to inspire others to make everything by hand and to follow your dream by just start doing iT! We never get bored and we love to meet people. That’s how we end up in renting 2 Air BnB appartements; NEST / NESTT. We like to make people feel at home and create some caracter in the appartments.

name: "la casa di Frà"
description:
The space
In a quiet street not far from the Central Station, you can find our happy house where to spend your beautiful week (- end) in Antwerp, ideal for business as well as for travelling couples (also with children).
We are Frà and Dominique –an Italian- Belgian couple- and we have been trying to re-create the differences of our cultures in the project of the house, not forgetting our architectural studies. La casa di Frà is part of our double-house renovation plan, we'll be next-door neighbors, but you will enjoy your own totally private space and terrace.

On the ground floor you'll find a bathroom (with shower) and a bedroom with a double bed with space for an extra little children bed; on the first floor a bright open space with living room and the kitchen. If the weather is more Italian then Belgian, you can drink a nice Belgian beer on the sunny terrace.
Inside you’ll find a fully equipped kitchen (microwave, dishwasher, toaster, pots…), kitch
neighborhood_overview:
By foot:
= Zurenborg: trendy area with pubs, restaurant and nice villa's.
= Zoo: the Zoo of Antwerp is the oldest in Belgium, ideal for children.
= Central station: beautiful building completely transformed inside in 2007.
= Meir: the main shopping street of Antwerp.

By bike:
= Centrum: you'll find everything what you want.
= Rivierenhof: big park ideal to have a picnic, to run or to be in the nature; in the summertimes, everyday, open air concert in a spectacular setting
= Park Spoor Noord: big green area with fountains, skate park, ping pong table and place for barbecue, of course there is also a bar and a playground.
= South Antwerp (Het Zuid): the south of the city is the trendy neighborhood where you find trendy restaurants, cozy bars, literary cafes, art galleries, art shops, interior design shops …
host_about:
"La casa di Frà" was built with the idea to learn to know people who travel around, with different stories and experiences.
I am Frà, short for Francesca, an Italian but I moved to Belgium 10 years ago to be with Dominique, my Flemish husband, with whom I have two little girls. We are an eclectic couple, joined by many small aspects that make our cultural diversity very interesting.
I like to cook, sports and I enjoy my social life. I love the sea and the sun.
I think Antwerp is a funny and interesting city, where you can really find anything what you like on every single moment. 

 “La casa di frà” è nata dal desiderio di conoscere persone che viaggiano alla scoperta di luoghi e di culture diverse. 
Sono Frà, abbreviazione di Francesca, un’italiana che vive in Belgio da 10 anni e sposata con un fiammingo, Dominique, e abbiamo due bambine. Siamo una coppia eclettica,  le nostre diversita' culturali rendono affascinante e interessante la nostra vita. 
Mi piace cucinare, fare sport e chiacchierare con gli amici e conoscerne di nuovi. Amo il mare e il sole.
Trovo Anversa una città divertente e stimolante, tutta da scoprire.

name: Cosy apartment in historic house
description:
Beautiful restored house of 16th Century with 1 room apartment on 1st floor. The triple A location of Antwerp, middle of the historic center, 150 m from Town Hall, Grote Markt, Groenplaats, Schelde, restos, fashion, museum ...

The space
The suite is a studio apartment with comfortable bed 160x200cm. Open kitchen includes microwave, oven, dishwasher, kettle, coffee maker, refrigerator, cutlery and cooking utensils. The badroom has a shower and towels and soap will always be there .

Guest access
You can use our 2 bicycles.

Other things to note
3 nights minimum stay.
neighborhood_overview:
Dit is de absolute topbuurt van Antwerpen. Centraler kan je niet vinden. Je stapt buiten en je komt meteen in een gezellige winkelwandelstraat.
Overal zijn er leuke restaurants, lounge-bars, café's en winkeltjes. De Grote Markt met de historische gildehuizen, het stadhuis en het bekende Brabo-standbeeld, iets verder de Kathedraal en als je de straat uitloopt zit je op de oevers van de Schelde waar je 's zomers gezellig kan vertoeven op het ponton.

Als je graag gaat shoppen dan zit je hier op de beste locatie van Antwerpen. Je bevindt je hier namelijk vlak aan de befaamde modebuurt van Antwerpen. De beroemdste designers hebben hier hun ateliers en winkels in de Nationalestraat, Kammenstraat.
In principe is alles op wandelafstand dankzij de formidabele ligging van het appartement.
Uiteraard zijn er ook andere mogelijkheden zoals trams en metro's. Het metrostation vind je onder de Groenplaats en dus slechts op 500m van het appartement.

The bathroom, fully in m
neighborhood_overview:

No tram passing by. A lot of nice restaurants and breakfast bars are only one minute away.
It only takes you 5 minutes to the shopping area and ten minutes to the historical area, and I'm mean on foot, of course...
host_about:
Hallo, ik ben Arthur en verhuur sinds een dik jaar een appartement op airbnb. 
Aangezien ik meestal de organisator ben als we met vrienden op citytrip gaan, ben ik eveneens graag een goede host voor mijn gasten.
Daarom sta ik altijd klaar met suggesties om jullie verblijf extra aangenaam te maken.
Ik woon al meer dan 10 jaar in dezelfde buurt als het appartement, wat betekent dat ik snel in de buurt ben in geval van een probleempje, maar ook dat ik de buurt heel goed ken en voldoende tips kan geven wat betreft bezienswaardigheden en restaurantjes. 
Het appartement is ruim en heeft een grote woonkamer met hoog plafond, wat ervoor zorgt dat het gezellig vertoeven is als je met een groep vrienden of met het gezin een weekend samen wilt doorbrengen.
Het interieur is nogal eclectisch qua stijl, vintage gemixt met design klassiekers. Vooral geen zwart/wit, maar kleurrijk, en ook zo ingericht dat het lijkt alsof iemand er echt woont, geen steriele hotelkamer. Ik ben een liefhebber van films, fotografie en kunst, en dit valt eveneens als je het appartement betreedt. Litho's van Karel Appel en Dali worden afgewisseld met foto's van Helmut Newton en Herb Ritts. 
Als ik zelf op citytrip ga, vind ik naast de huiselijkheid van het appartement dat ik huur, de locatie erg belangrijk. Daarom dat ik voor het appartement op Vleminckveld gekozen heb, het ligt recht in het midden van alle belangrijke attracties/buurten.
Je kunt deze allemaal te voet bezoeken, het bruisende Zuid, het historisch centrum, het shopping gedeeltje,... 
Het ligt dus enorm centraal en terrasjes en restaurantjes liggen zeer nabij, maar toch is de straat erg rustig, dus van nachtlawaai is geen sprake. 
Niet te vergeten is de supermarkt die zich in hetzelfde gebouw bevindt, super handig als je last minute nog iets nodig hebt.
Kortom ik heb geprobeerd alle elementen waar ikzelf belang aan hecht als ik op citytrip ga, te bundelen in het appartement dat ik verhuur in mijn thuishaven Antwerpen.

name: At Granny's near Rivierenhof
description: My mum lives next to a park, Rivierenhof. She likes hosting Airbnb guests on long term. She is fluent in Dutch and French, but also speaks some English and German. The street where she lives is quiet. Easy parking. 20 min by tram to city center
host_about:
We, Lieve (52 y.) Fronk (49 y.) and Aurora (18 y.) love talking, laughing and music.
Communication is always easy as we speak several languages
Fronk is crazy about Brazil, where he lived for 2 years
Lieve adores India and Aurora is mad about Greece.
We have a preference for natural, vegetarian food.
Lieve and Fronk  practice Yoga daily..
We and our neighbours live on pleasant terms with each other.
Tranquility is a must in our home and in the building.
Please ring our bell... N°116/14 (fifth floor)

FLANDERS TODAY a flemish online newspaper has published an article about us and about Airbnb:
“In the last year we’ve had 60 or so guests staying with us at home,” says Fronk, who, with his partner Lieve, is one of the best-rated Flemish hosts on Airbnb, a hotel-like service for the digital age. “We have had guests from Brazil, the US, Canada, Iran, Japan, Bulgaria and more. Though no one from Africa has yet requested to stay.” 
Airbnb is an online marketplace for temporary accommodation across 33,000 cities in 192 countries. Trip planners can find spare rooms, flats, sofa-beds and even igloos and private islands. Some hosts are simply renting out a spare room for a couple of weeks a month to travellers to supplement their incomes or to fill the house when they themselves are away. 
Airbnb is in the vanguard of the so-called “sharing economy”, in which web services help private individuals monetise their possessions and share anything from school runs to electric drills. Flanders has more than 900 listings on the site. 
Connections 
Fronk and Lieve say that their guests have loved Antwerp and always have a good time. Yet if a number of their guests are visiting for tourism, many are in town for less conventional reasons. One was interviewing for a job at the opera house. Another was doing a course with world-famous contemporary artist Jan Fabre, while a third was studying with a leading dancer. A medievalist stayed for several weeks to learn Dutch for her research, while a Canadian rock band crashed when gigging down the road. 
Connecting with new people with different world views is one of the attractions, as is discovering a unexpected shared interest. “The other day I was having a bowl of soup with one of our guests, who had just arrived from the United States,” recalls Fronk. “To our surprise, we soon discovered that we were both working on essays on the same subject.” Fronk, who is a literary translator of Russian and a performer, and Lieve, an organist and soprano, say that in their year of hosting they have yet to have a bad experience. Some guests stay several weeks, some come back for a second or third visit. “But we make it clear on the website that we are vegetarians, that we do yoga and that this is a family house,” Fronk explains. This attracts people who are into the same things (and probably discourages those who want to spend their time exploring Antwerp’s party scene). 
Peer reviews 
Fronk and Lieve live in Borgerhout, a neighbourhood with a large immigrant population just east of the city’s Central Station, which is visible from their balcony. Borgerhout itself does not house many attractions and enjoys a reputation for being a rough sort of place. But guests have never had any problems, says Fronk. Indeed, he wistfully recalls a middle-aged American visitor looking out of the window at the district where Fronk grew up and declaring it a beautiful place. 
Importantly for guests, the area provides easy access by foot or bike to Antwerp’s main sites, including the zoo; elephants can be heard vaguely trumpeting from the flat’s balcony.

name: Comfy Studio Apartment in Antwerp
description:
Part of a masterfully restored late 19th century townhouse, this top floor studio is probably one of the cosiest places you'll ever stay. Centrally located, ideal for solo travellers or couples who want to discover Antwerp, or for business travelers looking for a convenient and private place. Fully equipped kitchen, a separate large bathroom with full bath incl. hydrotherapy, shower, two mezzanines with a two-person bed, desk area, sleeper sofa, flat screen TV with blu-ray player and free WiFi.

The space
The studio consists of two separate "volumes" connected by a small entranceway. One area contains the kitchen with seating, a lounge/music listening area and a coffee/tea corner. Spacesaver stairs take you up to the sleeping mezzanine. The second volume features the living room area with a sofa bed, separate bathroom with full bath, and another mezzanine containing a small office area where you can work in peace.
Present are:
- selection of books, DVDs,
neighborhood_overview: Our neighbourhood is generally somewhat calmer and more residential, but it's a stone's throw away from all the action in the tourist centre of Antwerp. In summertime more activities take place in the direct vicinity, ranging from urban gardening to an actual neighbourhood bar serving unique Antwerp beers, etc. - summer is when our neighbourhood really comes to life. We are proud of our tight-knit community and go the extra mile to maintain a close relationship with neighbours.
host_about:
Being too creative for a 9-to-5,  now on Airbnb because I love to travel to fresh and new destinations.

"Quality is not an act, it is a habit"
- Aristotle

name: Musician's apartment in city center
description:
A well equipped place really in the heart of Antwerp, very close to just everything you might want to see or visit. It is located in the lively student area.
Old city center: 10 min walk
Central station: 10 min walk
MAS museum: 10 min walk

The space
Super centric location, lots of bars and restaurants, shops and museums.

Guest access
Private apartment with 1 double bed and 1 couch to pull out into a double bed, kitchen with all basic necessities, bathroom, washing machine, clean towels and bed linen, funny neighbour and off course wifi. Mind that there is no extra bedroom so the extra bed will be in the same room as the other one.

Other things to note
My place is in the University neighborhood, located between the University and the academy of fine arts. At the beginning and end of the academic year and before holidays it can be noisy, especially on Thursdays.
On the other hand: because there are
neighborhood_overview: Come and enjoy the lively atmosphere on the street and in the bars on the square next to the apartment. Always fun to step out of the door. Just a stone's throw from most touristic attractions, city center, central station and old harbour.
host_about: I am a musician and play the bass. I enjoy good food, good music obviously and travelling. I can't live without chocolate and coffee. As a traveler I enjoy spending time in a city as much as in nature. As a host I want to offer people a nice place to stay. I will ask my friend to welcome you when I am abroad, which happens quite often.

name: Comfortable accommodation in spacious penthouse
description:
Comfortable room with queen-size bed, wardrobe, writing desk and chairs. Free parking! Second private room with (pull-out) sofa available. Shared living room, kitchen, bathroom and roof terrace.
Usually, you'll be able to enjoy the entire apartment in my absence from Thursday to Tuesday, as I spend most of my week abroad.
New and located in a quiet street, close to public transport, 15 min walk from central train station, 30 min walk to city center.

The space
- The private room has a double bed, wardrobe, writing desk and chairs. The pull-out sofa in the second private room is available as a bed for the 3rd and 4th guests.
- The bathroom has a bath tub and a separate shower (bed linen & towels provided).
- The luminous living room, with open kitchen (fully equipped), is connected to a rooftop terrace that is blessed with afternoon & evening sunshine.
- WiFi is available throughout the entire apartment.

Guest access
neighborhood_overview:
- Located in a quiet, one-direction street in neighborhood '2060'.
- Bakeries, supermarket, restaurants, pubs & night shops at less than a 5 min walk.
- Attractions include the park 'Spoor Noord', cinema 'Klappei', swimming pool 'De Veldstraat'. For more, see Guidebook.

name: Belle Epoque Townhouse Antwerp
description:
A spacious 19th century house located in the center of Antwerp.
You can enjoy the grandeur of the bél epoque with all the modern comfort of today.
The house has up to 5 individual bedrooms and can accomodate up to 12 adults.

The space
We fall directly in love with this house the first moment we saw it.
Build in the end of the 19th century, you can almost grasp the different spirits of time that passed here. High ceilings, lots of lights and well conserved ornaments.
The house was totally renovated with repect to the original style of the house. It consists of 430 square meters divided over 4 floors. There are 5 spacious bedrooms with double beds. It is possible to foresee extra beds for children. Each floor has its own bathroom + toilet. The master bedroom has a private bathroom and library.

Guest access
All house is available except the basement.
neighborhood_overview: Quiet neighbourhood nearby central park.
host_about:
I love life, travelling and speaking with any open minded person especially if they have different opinions than me.
Happily married and father of three children.

Accommodations feature a seating are

The space

Guest access

'We are delighted to offer you the most hospital welcome as we can', for all our guests at all time.
Breakfast in the studio (packages ), washing machin
host_about:
In brief:
Active on the Belgian housing market since 1984. We would like to receive you as our guest and welcome you warmly in ‘your home away from home’; a comfortable flat, room, or apartment, we spoil you with sincere hospitality.

A stay with us guarantees competitive priced units that are clean, spacious and comfortable, combined with the service of our attentive staff.

Throughout the years we kept growing, and today we can offer our clients more than 800 flats, rooms and apartments, scattered all over Belgium.

Leuven, Brussels, Antwerp, Ostend, Bruges, Blankenberge, and soon Mechelen as well, are cities in which we can offer you a solution for your short or long stay.

We are already pleased to be able to convince you of our qualities.

Target group:
Tourists and business travellers from all over the world who are looking for a great, affordable stay in Belgium.

Advantages for our target group:
-Most competitive price within Belgium
-Privacy during your stay
-A contact person who is ready to help you and care-free arranges everything for you
-'We are delighted to offer you the most hospitable welcome possible', for all of our customers at all times.

Mission:
-‘Give our guests a homey feel’.
Together with you, our team will look for a type of flat that will suit your needs regarding equipment and price. We greatly value customer satisfaction.
-‘Not an impersonal hotel room, but your own spot’? You can decide yourself how your room furnishing will look like. To be able to meet our clients wishes to the fullest extent, we offer our guests a wealth of possibilities.

Team:
There are on a daily basis more than ten people in our headquarters in Diest, who are ready to help you with your housing quest.

In all of our buildings you can expect a warm welcome of our residence managers, who will arrange everything for you in detail when you have questions or remarks.
amenities: ["Elevator", "Heating", "Smoke alarm", "Essentials", "Wifi", "Cable TV", "Kitchen", "First aid kit", "Carbon monoxide alarm", "Breakfast", "Fire extinguisher"]

neighborhood_overview:
History of the « Eilandje » :

Eilandje started around 1550 and is the oldest port of Antwerp. In the 19th century, Napoleon Bonaparte had the first two docks excavated for an important naval base. This is followed by an intense flowering period in which several other docks will be excavated.
In the 20th century the port activities shift to the North. Most people move away and the « Eilandje » is a deserted area between port and city.

At the end of the 20th century, one can see the potential of the abandoned docks, quays and warehouses. The city writes, together with the organization "City on the River" an international architectural competition and in the early 1990s the Spanish architect Manuel de Solà-Morales draws an initial plan for The Island. In 1997 René Daniel's works out concrete plans for the Old Docks, the Montevideo district and the Cadix district. In 2002 the « Eilandje » gets its own Master Plan.

name: Quiet with a view and morning light
description:
Enjoy your private room in a family house with shared kitchen, shared living room, shared bathroom. Your own sink in the room with hot and cold water. Tea/coffee in the room. Extra mattress possible for second person.

The space
The house was built in 1886. We have tried to keep the atmosphere of the time.

Other things to note
If you plan to travel through Belgium by train, make sure to buy a 'tienrittenkaart'. It gives you the right to do ten rides ('tien ritten' means ten rides). If you are under 26 years old, it is 50 euros for ten rides, five euro per ride, to ANY train station in Belgium. That is extremely cheap. If you are older than 26, it is 75 euro, 7,5 euro per ride, still not bad. Brugge is a train ride from here of 1,5 hour, Brussels is 45 minutes from here, Gent also about the same.
http://www.belgianrail.be/en/Default.aspx

description:
Fully renovated and furnished attic appartement at the 3rd floor of our house.
The lofty studio has everything you need: fully equipped kitchen, sunny bathroom with bath and shower, cosy bed, bright living area. You’ll have the entire appartement to yourself so your privacy is guaranteed.

Volledig gerenoveerde zolderstudio: ruime leefruimte met volledig geïnstalleerde keuken, badkamer, berging en slaapmezzanine. Het appartement is afgesloten van de rest van het huis. Privacy gegarandeerd.

The space
Renovated attic appartement on the 3rd floor of our house:
lofty living room with fully equipped kitchen, dining and sitting area light bathroom with all modern comfort, a cosy double bed upstairs under the roof.

Guest access
You'll have the appartement all to yourself.

neighborhood_overview:
The appartement is situated in a family house near Central Station, the Antwerp Zoo, China Town and the UGC cinema complex.
Although the street itself is relatively quiet, there's a lot going on in the neigbourhood: a lot of artists and creative people live here, there are art galleries, alternative restaurants, excellent coffee bars, authentic music cafés and much more. The big city park Spoor Noord and the more cosy Krugerpark (both with lovely playgrounds) are nearby.
Just around the corner a shopping street provides a nice supermarket with a big range of organic products and a pharmacy.
My personal favourites: the Art Deco city swimming pool (Veldstraat), Café Kiebooms: a beautiful 1920's jazz bar with live gigs; and Klappei: a tiny old cinema in the street behind us.

description:
Bright, new flat of 65 sq meters that comfortably fits 2 people. Flat has a real cozy feel, with lush furnishings & is fully equipped w/ new kitchen & bathroom. Located in Antwerp South's trendy Marnix Place - walking distance to restaurants & shops!

The space
This charming, modern one bedroom apartment is located in the true center of Antwerpse Zuid. Just around the corner you will find Marnixplaats and Leopold de Waelplaats, two of the city's most charming squares, filled with hip bars, great restaurants with outdoor terraces and nice cozy cafés.

It is the ideal location to explore Antwerp by foot. Just a ten minute walk to the Nationalestraat away from the Groenplaats and the historical centre of Antwerp. A five minute walk up to the "Kaaien", from which you can admire the river Schelt. And another five minute walk to the "Huidevettersstraat", one of the main shopping areas!

Guest access
Guests will have the whole place to th
neighborhood_overview:
Infinite amount of choices when it comes to bars and restaurants in the area. The availability of authentic ethnic food, still having some of the best Belgian brasseries in the area.

You can take a stroll along the Schelt, sit in the sun on one of the many different squares which are scattered around this neighborhood or browse one of the many museums. Take a look at the Museum of Fine Arts, Museum of Contemporary Art or the Fashion Museum, all walking distance!

description:
Hi!
You have Antwerp for tourists AND you have Antwerp for travelers. Our apartment is located in the city's coolest and most upcoming neighbourhood where you can buy the cheapest fresh food and meet with different cultures.
We love to give advice!

The space
The apartment has 4 rooms:
1. The living room : tv, couch, dining table with 4 chairs, office,
2. The bedroom : Double bed, big closet, down comforters and pillows
3. Kitchen : Breakfast table, 2 barstools, kitchenet, fridge, cutlery, pots and pans, mop, towels
4. Bathroom : Shower, toilet, lavatory, toiletpaper, clothes horse

Guest access

Other things to note
I am a kindergarten teacher and a free time artist. I love every aspect of art and love to give you advice. My son is a designer and traveler. He studied and lives in Antwerp. He is aware of a lot of the events. He helps me with the bookings for my
neighborhood_overview:
Drinks/Food/Chillout : Cargo Bar @ Parkspoornoord & http://www.2060.be/site/category/drinken/

Restaurants: PLENTY! Belgian, Thai, Italian, Turkish, Portuguese,...you name it! http://www.2060.be/site/category/eten/
host_about:
"Adventure is the best way to learn."

Hi everyone,
My name is Christel and this is my story:
I come from the countryside of Belgium. You know...like a small time-stood-still-village where everybody knows everybody :) ? Well, the only way to get out of there once in a while is by going to my favorite city in Belgium, Antwerp.

The City.
I like art, no I mean I LOVE art. Music, theatre, ballet, expositions, literature, performances,...are my sources of inspiration to be creative. I also love  Antwerp is both modern and authentic. It’s a city that moves. There are dozens of cultural activities every week. The food in the restaurants, even in the tiny bars are amazing. It’s ALL about exploring with all your senses. 

About the apartment.
My husband, my kids and I renovated this building a couple of years ago. I prefer to stay there once in a while, having some time for myself. That’s why we decided it to rent it on Airbnb. We’ve chosen for this neighborhood ‘cause it’s the most upcoming place in Antwerp. It’s on a foot walk from the centre and yet it’s different. It’s Antwerps most multicultural neigbourhood. Over 70 different nationalities! And they all have their own cultural traditions which are awesome to discover!

To my guests.
Enjoy your time in Antwerp, they say it's the city of diamonds. 
But for me it's the people who shine :)
Leave a note, a comment or better...a story before you leave. 
I love stories.

I was born and raised in Amsterdam and also know a lot about this beautiful city to tell.  We like sports, tennis, horse-riding and our daughters play hockey. We love running, swimming and skiing.

name: Cosy flat in the historic old city centre.
description:
Cosy and clean flat in a 60's building, situated in the historic part of the city, across the monumental gate of Sint Pauls church. 5' walking from Grand plaza, the river side, the MAS museum and the coolest shopping streets. The flat is located in the creative and trendy university neighborhood with lots of restaurants and bars. The flat is thoroughly cleaned before checkin. Check in is with a keybox.

The space
The apartment is recently renovated. The flat is non-smoking and has a nicely furnished living room with a sofa/sleeping bed, a bedroom with a double made up bed for 2 people, a small bathroom with shower & toilet, a well equipped small kitchen with a combi oven, coffee machine and a small terrace. In the fridge you'll find a bottle of mineral water, tea, coffee and milk. Smoking is possible on the terrace. Note: If you book with 2 people and also need the sofa bed. Please let me know! I calculate 25 euro extra for the use of towels and sheets.
neighborhood_overview: The flat is located in the historic centre of the city. It is situated between the famous MAS museum, the grand plaza and the river side. All of these highlights are within a 5' walk. The neighborhood with the university and the school for fine arts has a creative and lively atmosphere with lots of restaurants, wine bars, coffee bars and shops. name: The Collector's House (short & long term stay)
description:
Guest house for rent in the historic city center of Antwerp for short and long term stays.

The space
Follow us on Instagram: @thecollectorshouse.antwerp

Since 2017 The Collector’s House is managed by a young brother and sister duo. They're known as notoriously friendly hosts and have a few years experience in running a guest house and organise events.
They transformed the house into a unique event space and a cosy guest house.

The guest house is situated on the second floor and is suitable for 4 guests. An extra bed can be provided for 20€/night per person.

The guesthouse has 2 master bedrooms, 2 bathrooms with rain shower and a small kitchen, equipped to prepare you breakfast, lunch and dinner.
The rooms gives you a unique city view, looking out on the cathedral tower.

The entire house is recently renovated to modern comfort standards but the original architecture nor the ornaments have been altered.
<
neighborhood_overview:
The Collector's House is situated in the historical heart of the city, on a walking distance of all city highlights: Mas, Red Star Line Museum, FOMU, Museum of Modern Art, the cathedral, the Fashion Museum, the gorgeous Carolus Borromeus church, the Meir shopping area but also the boutiques and trendy fashion stores are nearby. And of course there are plenty of restaurants, bars and breakfast places in the neighbourhood.
Public transport is at 100m, a 5 minute walk from the central station and also parking facilities are to be found at walking distance.

name: Charming, bright apartment
description:
Lovely self-contained flat situated on the top floor of a 19th-century townhouse, only a short trip away from the town centre by bike or by tram. Sunny and spacious, it offers all the comfort you need for a wonderful stay in Antwerp. Sleeps up to 3 persons, plus 2 extra when using the sofa bed downstairs. The flat also has a foldable baby bed for one small child.

The space
Lovely self-contained flat, situated on the top floor of a 19th-century townhouse, only minutes away from the town centre by bike or by tram. Sunny and spacious, it offers all the comfort you need for a wonderful stay. Sleeps up to 3 persons plus one small child in a toddler bed which can be prepared at your request.

Guest access
Several bicycles are available for use: 2 for adults and 2 for children.

Other things to note
The flat has a sleeping area in the attic with a comfortable double bed and a single bed, and offers an extra toddler bed for a s
neighborhood_overview:
The neighbourhood is characterised by 19th-century townhouses and hosts a lovely park with a playground and a very nice child-friendly café just next to it. Restaurants, coffeebars and cafés are just a stroll away (5 - 10 minutes).

As for parking space, there are two options: either find a spot near the house and pay for it (Monday through Saturday from 8 AM until 7 PM, daily rate 3,80 euros) or leave your car for free in the parking area on the Desguinlei (where the Desguinlei, the Kielsevest and the Lange Elzenstraat meet) at a walking distance of 5 - 10 minutes.
host_about: I love travelling, reading, visiting places. I love old places, history, brocantes.

name: Smile you're in Antwerp
description:
First floor of a charming, renovated townhouse (1920's)
- romantic bedroom with private spacious bathroom, including own toilet & bathtub
- working space with additional sofa bed and adjoining balcony
All rooms mentioned are exclusively private!

The holidays are busy, so make sure to send us a request to assure your booking.

The space
The central bedroom has a double bed. The second room has a fold out bed for two people, with a little balcony also for two. If you like we can also provide a working desk. The large bathroom has a bath with shower curtain. All rooms are connected and completely private.

Guest access
You will have exclusive access to the bedroom, salon, bathroom and balcony. You will have private access to all of the rooms apart from the rest of the house.

Other things to note
During weekends we only accept reservations for at least 2 nights.
During July & August we only ac
neighborhood_overview:
It's a 5 minute walk from Antwerp Central station to my place. We live in the multicultural Atheneum neighborhood, so there are all these special and particular restaurants and shops. Did you know that Antwerp has the most nationalities in the world, besides Amsterdam?

The best Chinese food in Antwerp is just around the corner.

Our place is in walking distance from the touristic city center. 50 metres from our door there is access to public transport which takes you to any place in the city.
Subsequently a fresh bakery, several supermarkets, bars, breakfast places, are all right nearby.

My favorite place is Viggo's Coffeebar in the morning & Beerlover's Bar at night. These are just a street away. Tim from Viggo's has the best coffee & Ben serves more than 130 different kinds of beer. You'll love it!
host_about:
Hoi, hello, bonjour, guten tag!
I´m a passionate host, and only happy when my guests are happy. I love to share my knowledge and appreciation and love for Antwerp with my guests. 
Me and my partner will do everything we can to make your stay as comfortable as possible.

In the neighborhood, you can find supermarkets, banks, trendy bars, designer shops, and many restaurants only a few minutes away.
"'T Zuid" is known is hip and unique atmosphere.

name: Stay in the shoppinghart of Antwerp
description:
Renewed, cosy 1 bedroom appartment of 65m2 off Meir(main shopping street). Plenty of restaurants, shops, opera, cinema, tourist attractions at walking distance. Ten minute walk from the Antwerp Central train station. Two public parkings within 100 meters. We welcome our guests with a large bottle of Belgian beer.

The space
The appartment has been renovated recently. There is a brand new bathroom with walk-in shower and kitchen with oven, dishwasher, washing machine, coffeemaker ...

Guest access
The appartment sits on the first floor of a small building. You can either use the elevator or the staircase to reach the lodging. From the bedroom you can reach a small terrace which has a small table and two stools.

Other things to note
We are located in a carfree zone. From 7 pm till 11 am the appartment can be reached by car and you can park in front of the building for unloading luggage. Please check the website SNA.B
neighborhood_overview: Within minutes you are in the vibrant main shopping area of Antwerp : Meir.  Our street is rather calm, since it is a pedestrian area, and you can have a cosy breakfast, lunch or dinner.  When the sun is shining there are several terraces, so you can eat outside.  Two houses down the road is a bakery with fresh bread and pastries for those who want to take breakfast in the appartment.  For your daily groceries we recommend the supermarket just across the door Okay or Carrefour (250 meters walking).  There is also a large supermarket with organic and healthfood 100 m walk from the appartment.
host_about: Ons gezin houdt van reizen. Nadat we diverse malen te gast waren bij airbnb verhuurders, wilden we graag zelf gastheer worden. Intussen is onze droom uitgekomen en kunnen we op twee locaties mensen van over de hele wereld ontvangen in ons geliefde Antwerpen.

name: Backpackersroom !!
description:
This is a nice quiet room in a cute house in the city of Antwerp, near the famous Mas museum, the University, and in walking distance to the historical center.

The space
The railwaystation is a 15 minutes walk, there is also bus 17 stopping at the railwaystation that brings you around our corner.

You get a key of the house so you are free to come in and go out as you like.

Our neigbourghoud is full of young people, there are café's, bars, restaurants... just around the corner.

We also can give you advice on where to go, maps...
Clean bedsheets and towels included.

Be welcome!

The money collected by airbnb is used to improve the house to make it even a better place for future guests and to help family, friends and other people in need in Nepal.
host_about:
Hi, we are Jay and Dirk, Jay is from Nepal and Dirk from Belgium, we met each other 8 years ago in Kathmandu. 
Since 6 years Jay is living in Antwerp and we have started hosting people in our house on Airbnb since then.
We had many great experiences since, we will always do our best to make your stay as good as possible. 
We love Antwerp and are happy to host you during your discovery of this amazing city.
Looking forward to meet you!

The apartment is situated in Antwerp Historic Centre, 100 meters from the University, 3 minute walk from MEIR (the main shopping street in Antwerp); Grote Markt is distant only 400mt, 1 Km from the Station Central.

name: Lux Loft in the heart of Historic Antwerp
description:
Best location for visiting Antwerp!! situated in the no car zone. Steps away from famous musea, shops at the Meir and café's. Historic building with open floor plan and modern kitchen. Have your Belgian beer on the balcony and enjoy the view!

The space
This spacious loft is on the 3rd floor of two adjacent historical buildings. These are renovated recently with respect of the authentic architecture from the 16th century. This old world structure meets contemporary design with some reclaimed furniture pieces.

Summary for sleeping arrangements: One master bedroom with 2 single boxspring beds ( together or separated) for two adults.
One bunk bed for two adults.
One sofa bed for two adults.
NEW: One extra folded guest bed for one adult ( Sheets and bedding for extra bed upon request)


Once arrived at the property you will enter the first door and will get a personal code that will get you the access to the key of the elev
neighborhood_overview:
Surrounding the loft there are multiple restaurants, sandwich bars, bakeries and the most cosy sunny terraces from Antwerp!
Right outside are already amazing Bars and cafees. Jazz bar "de Muze" brings a art deco style back to life and " Het Pelikaantje" is a typical brown cafe were the locals love to hang out for a beer and chat after work. Two breakfast places or right there too.
The big shopping area with “The Meir" is only 3 min from the front door but starts right outside with some vintage, retro shops. The supermarket "Carrefour" is in the basement of the Shopping Center Grand Bazar and is about a minute walk away.
If you love Belgian chocolates, then don't forget to visit Quetzal on the Lijnwaadmarkt. A chocolate bar that brings enjoying chocolate to a whole new level!
host_about: Hi, I'm Petra , a Belgian interior designer.  Me and my daughters lived in Connecticut for 15 years were lots of friends and family came to visit.  Guiding them through world cities like New York and Boston was a joy.  Over the years we traveled often back and forth to Belgium, US but also France.  For 20 years my family and I run a vacation resort in the south of France.  The guest that we welcomed over the years are now all like family and lots of them we have the pleasure of meeting again year after year. Coming to visit and showing my American family Antwerp and surroundings, helps me now to look through tourists glasses.  I love sharing those insiders tips and treasures so please feel free to ask so we can make your trip extraordinary!

name: Hofje- Oranje kamer (Historisch centrum)
description:
Een mooi hofje in het centrum van Antwerpen. Een leuke kamer, inclusief ontbijt, met keuken en benodigdheden, bankje en een vide waar het bed staat. Er is een gedeelde badkamer.

The space
Zoekt u een authentieke plek om te overnachten in Antwerpen? Lees dan verder! Het begijnhof om de hoek, het historisch centrum op loopafstand, een kwartiertje van het schitterende centraal station, het MAS (Museum aan de Stroom) en andere musea vlakbij…

Dit terwijl u overnacht op een plek die al meer dan honderd jaar oud is. Hofje is werkelijk uniek gelegen, midden in de levendige universiteitsbuurt, met een eigen binnentuin. Als het mooi weer kunt u lekker genieten van een ontbijtje buiten, uitkijkend op de eeuwenoude kerk.

Guest access
De oranje kamer

Vanuit uw kamer heeft u een levendig schouwspel. De oranje kamer is gelegen aan de straatkant, op de benedenverdieping. Hierdoor kan het gehorig zijn in deze levendige universiteitsbu

name: Grand Loft in the heart of historic Antwerp
description:
Best location for visiting Antwerp!! Beautiful loft on the first level. Steps from famous musea, shops at the Meir and café's. Historic building with open floor plan and modern kitchen. Have your Belgian beer on the balcony and enjoy the view!

The space
Welcome in Antwerp!!

The loft is situated on the second floor of two adjacent historical buildingsthat are renovated recently. The walls and structure are still authentic 17th century brick walls and wooden beams creating an old world feeling.  This style is mixed with a contemporary kitchen and reclaimed furniture pieces.  The private elevator brings you to the right level thanks to the card reader.  Once in the loft you will find yourself in the wide hallway.  

On the left you will find the separated water closet.  The spacious kitchen and living room are right in front of you.  

The island is big enough to house six barstool comfortably.  You will have a full equipped kitch

name: ★Bright Apt★2 BDR★in the South★breakfast nearby★
description:
Our 105m² apartment is situated in the most vibrant part of Antwerp "Het Zuid - The South", nearby the best restaurants, bars, art galleries and museums. It is within walking distance of the old city center. There is public transport, as well as a velo station right in front of the apartment!

The space
All the rooms are very spacious, and light.
The aparment offers two spacious terraces.
You will be guaranteed of a good night sleep, because it's a building where the neighbours respect each others.
You can have the nicest breakfast just by crossing the road. If you prefer a breakfast at the apartment, then you are lucky because the best butcher of Antwerp is just around the corner.

Guest access
The apartment is situated on the 4th floor. You can get there with the elevator or the stairs.
neighborhood_overview: Antwerp's South district is the go to hotspot for lovers of culture and an overall artistic experience. Here you are embraced by refined architecture, art galleries, many lovely restaurants and small bars. The Museum of Fine Arts, contemporary art museum (MHKA) and photography museum (FOMU) are just a 5 minute walk away.  A 10 minute walk to the famous shopping street the Meir.
host_about:
Hello all and welcome!
I’m 44 years old, and my partner and I decided to buy this apartment for our own getaway, because we love Antwerp so much.
In order to make this payable, we decided to put our apartment for rent in some periods of the year.
We are looking forward to connecting with people travelling to Antwerp and aim to make each guest experience as beautiful as possible.
Thanks for checking out our place and we hope to talk with you soon!

name: Cosy Studio Historic Centre
description:
You'll be our only Airbnb guests in our private home (a 450 years old house at the end of a 30 meter private alleyway) in a cosy room with kitchenette, flat-screen (Netflix) and all amenities. Your luxury private bathroom nearby is separate from the room accessible via the historic entrance hall.

We welcome you in an outstanding hidden place in the middle of old Antwerp, near to most touristic attractions, shops and restaurants.

We look forward hosting you!

Warm greetings,
Ada & Wim

The space
The house is set 30 meters of the street. You come in along a private historic alleyway and main historic entrance you share with the owners.

The room is accessible via a mezzazine (first floor 13 step stair) that opens onto the historic entrance hall.

Your luxury private bathroom nearby on the groundfloor is accesible via the same historic entrance hall.

You'll have access to our private garden
host_about:
Hi there!

We're Ada & Wim.

We love to enjoy life, cherishing the little things.

Together with  our five children, cat and dog we live in one of the oldest guild houses in Antwerp built in 1564. We both are musicians & also our children love to play music and singing. Ada teaches choir (Wednesday) and pianoclasses (Friday eve & Saturday morning) in our house, near to our guestroom. So when you should stay with us, you may hear music  or singing in the background. 

We'll do all we can to let you feel at home in our house.

See you soon!

Warm greetings,
Ada & Wim
