host_about:
In brief:
Active on the Belgian housing market since 1984. We would like to receive you as our guest and welcome you warmly in ‘your home away from home’; a comfortable flat, room, or apartment, we spoil you with sincere hospitality.

A stay with us guarantees competitive priced units that are clean, spacious and comfortable, combined with the service of our attentive staff.

Throughout the years we kept growing, and today we can offer our clients more than 800 flats, rooms and apartments, scattered all over Belgium.

Leuven, Brussels, Antwerp, Ostend, Bruges, Blankenberge, and soon Mechelen as well, are cities in which we can offer you a solution for your short or long stay.

We are already pleased to be able to convince you of our qualities.

Target group:
Tourists and business travellers from all over the world who are looking for a great, affordable stay in Belgium.

Advantages for our target group:
-Most competitive price within Belgium
-Privacy during your stay
-A contact person who is ready to help you and care-free arranges everything for you
-'We are delighted to offer you the most hospitable welcome possible', for all of our customers at all times.

Mission:
-‘Give our guests a homey feel’.
Together with you, our team will look for a type of flat that will suit your needs regarding equipment and price. We greatly value customer satisfaction.
-‘Not an impersonal hotel room, but your own spot’? You can decide yourself how your room furnishing will look like. To be able to meet our clients wishes to the fullest extent, we offer our guests a wealth of possibilities.

Team:
There are on a daily basis more than ten people in our headquarters in Diest, who are ready to help you with your housing quest.

In all of our buildings you can expect a warm welcome of our residence managers, who will arrange everything for you in detail when you have questions or remarks.

name: Apartment in historic center - 2nd
description:
The apartment is located in one of the most beautiful historic streets of Antwerp within walking distance of the cathedral, museums, restaurants, bars and shopping streets.
Right outside you'll find the city bikes that can be rented out for a day!

The space
This apartment is part of 'Den Blauwen Esel', a complex of three flats, located in a 16th century building, right in the center of Antwerp. The name of the house dates from the same century. We found this information in the city archives!

The apartment was recently completely renovated and decorated to welcome travelers and businessmen.

The apartment is equipped with oven / microwave, Nespresso machine, kettle and hob (induction). Coffee and tea are always available.
In the living room you'll find a flat screen TV with channels in different languages ​​and WIFI.
We offer bathroom toiletries, towels and a hairdryer.

You'll enjoy a good night's sleep in the bedroo
neighborhood_overview:
You can find really everything within one kilometer! Museums, picturesque streets, churches, bars, markets, shopping streets, restaurants ...
This is one of the nicest parts of Antwerp!

It takes you a five minutes walk to find the magnificent Cathedral of Our Lady, the old square (Grote Markt) or Green Square (Groenplaats).
At 200m are the Rockoxhouse, St. Anne chapel or the Late Gothic St. James church.
You can visit a lot of museums nearby including the Rubens House, the MAS or the Museum Plantin-Moretus .
Also for shopping there can not be a better location! The famous Meir is just around the corner, the area around the National Street and the Fashion Museum is only 10 minutes away.
host_about:
In 2014 werden Filip en ik verliefd op een huis in wat bekend staat als één van de mooiste straten van Antwerpen. 
We besloten er onze eigen woning van te maken, maar ook om drie vakantiewoningen te voorschijn te toveren om anderen te laten meegenieten van deze uitzonderlijke locatie in het historische centrum.
Filip, niet toevallig architect, liet zijn tekenkunsten op het huis los en vandaag zijn we eindelijk in de mogelijkheid om gasten te ontvangen.

Als fervente reizigers hopen we nu ook zelf anderen te kunnen helpen bij het ontdekken van onze lievelingsstad: Antwerpen!!

Samen spreken we bovendien vijf verschillende talen, dus kom ons gerust aan een taalproef onderwerpen...

name: Spacious & cosy apt - theater area - very central
description:
Hi all, I'm Sofie & I used to live in this cosy appt in the city center. Located in the middle of theater district it is walking distance from lots of nice bars, restaurants & tourist spots: market & shopping is right around the corner. come & enjoy!

The space
This apartment is situated on the second floor of a nice and clean apartment building. There is a lift, which is always nice to get your luggage upstairs.
Once you enter the apartment, you'll notice there is plenty of space for coats, shoes etc. The apartment has 2 bedrooms, one with a double bed and wardrobe, the other with two single sofa beds (really comfortable). The best feature of this second room is the small balcony that is attached and where you could enjoy some sunshine especially in the morning/ at noon. In between the 2 bedrooms, there is a bathroom with a big massage shower, heating and some practical storage place. In the hallway, you'll also find a separate toilet.
Moving on int
neighborhood_overview: I don't want to exaggerate, but this is really the nicest place to stay in the city of Antwerp. Not only do you stay literately above the tastiest Italian restaurant in town, the smell is heavenly and hard to resist :-) but also all  sightseeing is within walking distance. The romantic botanical garden and the popular weekend market are around the corner, theaters and shops are just a 5 minutes walk away.  In this artistic district you'll also find plenty of restaurants and bars for every taste. From a good cup of coffee in the morning 'till the real Belgian beers late at night. More details and coordinates to be found in the map in the apartment.
host_about:
Hi I am Sofie, I am an enthusiastic 30-something sales manager  in fashion :-). 2 years ago, I married Rob - the man of my life - and not that long afterwards, we became the proud parents of baby Lou. On top of all that, i am also a happy 'plus-mom' for our 13 year old daughter. Together we live just outside Antwerp on the countryside. After 10 years of living in the city, our family life needed a calmer and greener setting, but we still enjoy visiting cities, going out for drinks and dinner, going to concerts and theater shows and going on holiday off course, who doesn't? :-) 
Whenever we go on holiday, we always like the personal contact and all the tips from local people, so that is why we really like the airbnb system. That is also the reason why we now decided to rent out our 'old' appartment in the city center, to be able to share that great spot & our favorite bars and restaurants with nice people from all around the world.  
We really look forward to this part of the experience and hope to meet you soon. 
kind regards X Sofie & Rob

name: Cosy home, excellent location!
description:
The space
Behind the front door you'll find a spacious hall with a small cabinet for shoes, bags and other items, a coatrack and enough space to put a pram for example. The livingarea on the ground floor is decorated with a large sofa and a round dinertable. On request toys, puzzles, books and a high chair for children can be facilitated.
The open kitchen which is also situated on the ground floor is fully equiped with a Nespresso coffeemaker, milkfoamer, kettle, toaster, microwave and stove.Besides there's a toilet and a small outdoor area.

From the hall a flight of stairs leads to the first floor where a bedroom and a bedroom/livingarea are situated next to each other. In the cosy bedroom a large electric slatted bed of 180x200cm is placed.
The livingroom on the first floor is furnished with a large (sleeping) sofa, a comfortabel chair and a television with cable tv. When 6 people are staying at Zuid42 this livingroom is converted into a bedroom wit
neighborhood_overview:
The Coquilhatstraat is a straight street which is part of the original allotment of 1875 of this part of town. The street is situated between the Zwijger- and the Verbondstraat and is seperated by the De Vrièrestraat. Historically the name of the street was Vaderlandstraat but was renamed in 1891 after Aimé Coquilhat (1853-1891) who was vice governor of the former Belgian colony.
The Coquilhatstraat has the typical profile of a street at 'the Zuid', with a construction of late 19th century neoclassical cornices alternated with brick gables and with a monumental building as eyecatcher (source: inventaris onroerenderfgoed).
host_about:
Samen met mijn man en twee kinderen woon ik sinds 2009 in Antwerpen. Daarvoor heb ik in Nederland, Engeland en Duitsland gewoond en gewerkt. Ik hou van reizen en ben ondertussen al op veel plekken geweest. Reizen met een gezin is wel wat anders dan alleen en mede daardoor ben ik op het idee gekomen om een familie-vriendelijke vakantiewoning te gaan verhuren. 

Toen onze kinderen nog een stuk kleiner waren vond ik het lastig om leuke adressen te vinden die voorzien waren van een aantal dingen die je als jonge ouders nodig hebt (en waarvan je geen zin hebt ze altijd mee te zeulen...). 

Ondertussen woon ik lang genoeg in Antwerpen om hier een heleboel leuke plekken te kennen die ik graag deel met gasten. Zowel voor mensen op zakenreis, families met kinderen, stellen of vriendengroepen zijn er veel leuke dingen te doen en te ontdekken. Ik stel mijn stad graag aan je voor!

name: Apartment in historic center
description:
The apartment is located in one of the most beautiful historic streets of Antwerp within walking distance of the cathedral, museums, restaurants, bars and shopping streets.
Right outside you'll find the city bikes that can be rented out for a day!

The space
This apartment is part of 'Den Blauwen Esel', a complex of three flats, located in a 16th century building, right in the center of Antwerp. The name of the house dates from the same century. We found this information in the city archives!

The apartment was recently completely renovated and decorated to welcome travelers and businessmen.

In the living room a sofa bed can be transformed into a comfortable double bed. This way there can be a total of four people in this apartment. Bathroom and toilet are separate, allowing plenty of privacy for everyone.

The apartment is equipped with oven / microwave, Nespresso machine, kettle and hob (induction). Coffee and tea are always a
neighborhood_overview:
You can find really everything within one kilometer! Museums, picturesque streets, churches, bars, markets, shopping streets, restaurants ...
This is one of the nicest parts of Antwerp!

It takes you a five minutes walk to find the magnificent Cathedral of Our Lady, the old square (Grote Markt) or Green Square (Groenplaats).
At 200m are the Rockoxhouse, St. Anne chapel or the Late Gothic St. James church.
You can visit a lot of museums nearby including the Rubens House, the MAS or the Museum Plantin-Moretus .
Also for shopping there can not be a better location! The famous Meir is just around the corner, the area around the National Street and the Fashion Museum is only 10 minutes away.
host_about:
In 2014 werden Filip en ik verliefd op een huis in wat bekend staat als één van de mooiste straten van Antwerpen. 
We besloten er onze eigen woning van te maken, maar ook om drie vakantiewoningen te voorschijn te toveren om anderen te laten meegenieten van deze uitzonderlijke locatie in het historische centrum.
Filip, niet toevallig architect, liet zijn tekenkunsten op het huis los en vandaag zijn we eindelijk in de mogelijkheid om gasten te ontvangen.

Als fervente reizigers hopen we nu ook zelf anderen te kunnen helpen bij het ontdekken van onze lievelingsstad: Antwerpen!!

Samen spreken we bovendien vijf verschillende talen, dus kom ons gerust aan een taalproef onderwerpen...

name: TOOG (ecofriendly loft apartment)
description:
volledig gerenoveerd appartement (100m2), gelegen in een trendy wijk van Antwerpen, 500 m van het MAS museum, 10 minuten stappen van het centraal station en shopping. volledig ingerichte keuken en leefruimte. Veel leuke restaurants in de buurt.

Alles ecofriendly ingericht (LED, water-en warmtepomp, verwarming en koeling op airconditioning)
NEW: netflix account available

The space
Dit volledig nieuw gerenoveerde loft met hoge plafonds is geschikt voor 4 personen, 1 slaapkamer en een slaap-mezzanine, beide met echte bedden, slaapkamer met bed van 180 cm, mezzanine heeft een bed van 160 cm. De open keuken is volledig ingericht met kookplaat, microgolfoven, afwasmachine, nespresso koffie-apparaat. Moderne eetkamer en zithoek.
Volledig ingerichte badkamer met bad/douche.
Het appartement heeft een eigen ingang, ligt op wandelafstand van het nieuwe MAS museum, alle bekende winkelstraten, het centraal station en vele leuke restaurants en
neighborhood_overview: De buurt is altijd levendig en bruisend, dicht bij alles bij (shoppen, cultuur, uitgaan), met vele restaurants en cafe's in de buurt.  Het MAS museum is de nieuwe parel in Antwerpen en dit op 500 m van het appartement.  In de buurt zijn te veel goede restaurants om ze allemaal op te noemen, maar NIMMAN ( aziatisch), DE BURGERIJ ( hamburger) en MON (luxe dining) zijn onze favorieten.  Voor een leuk en gezellig avondje op cafe zijn CLODETTE en HESSENHUIS zeker aan te raden.  de vele Antwerpse zomerbars zijn zeker ook een aanrader, zo zijn er in de buurt, CARGO in park spoor noord (minder dan 1 km afstand) en BOCADERO, aan de scheldekaaien ( Max 1 km afstand)
host_about: hello, my name is Erwin Schryvers, born in 1977, i am a belgian flight attendant. Together with my partner Dimitri, we rent out our loft above the garage. We are living in Antwerp for the whole of our lifes. So if you want to ask something about the city, fire away! We hope to welcome you all in our, with passion, renovated loft. The loft is just finished since the end of april 2016. Kind regards Dimitri and erwin

name: Big sunny appartement full of green
description:
Our appartement is big and full of light. There is a nice bathroom with a shower and bath, a kitchen that is fully equipped and two beautiful terraces.
We are very close to Berchem station, the airport of Deurne and the nice neighborhood Zurenborg. By tram we are 15 minutes away from the center.

The space
The appartement is located on the first floor of and old mansion. It's a big and open space: only bedroom and bathroom are separate spaces. The other bedroom is next to the living room with an open door. In the bathroom there is a bath and a rain shower. The kitchen is big and forms, together with the living room, a nice place to relax after a day of city tripping.

If the weather is good, you can enjoy the sun on the terrace.

Guest access
You have access to the entire appartement and the 2 terraces.
neighborhood_overview:
The appartement is located in a quit neigbourhood close to Berchem station and Zurenborg, a very nice district in Antwerp. Within walking distance there is a nice square full of restaurants and bars: the Dageraadplaats.
If you feel like relaxing: there are two parks closeby, one of them has a natural swimming pool.

Volledig gerenoveerd ruim twee slaapkamerappartement uit de jaren 40. name: Beautiful Light Apartment in Trendy South Quarter
description:
Our place is close to art and culture. You’ll love the apartment because of the neighborhood, the light, the comfy bed, and the kitchen. The perfect place for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.

The space
The apartment is located on the third floor of an eclectic house, built for a horse smit in 1906. It has a quiet bedroom at the back with an en suite bathroom and there’s a spacious and light living room with beautiful large windows at the front.

The kitchen is well equipped with a stove, dishwasher and combi oven with microwave function and is stocked with coffee, tea, olive oil and the basic spices.

It might be hard to leave this quiet place in one of the trendiest neighborhoods in town, but do get out! There’s many great things to see and do in the direct surroundings! It’s perfect for a couple or a person alone, looking for a hideaway in a very inspirational part of town.

neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is in the heart of the Antwerp South Quarter (’t Zuid). An area with many nice restaurants and bars (you’ll be staying just 50 meters from the beautiful Marnix Plaats with great places for food & drinks and the famous Leopold De Waelplaats is just 300 metres from the apartment).

Famous fashion designers, like Ann Demeulemeerster, Dries Van Noten and Walter Van Beirendonck (and many many new and upcoming talents like Anja Schwerbrock) have their stores and ateliers in this quarter. You’ll also find wonderful museums just around the corner; the Royal Museum of Fine Arts (KMSKA), the Museum of Modern Art (MuHKA), the Photography Museum (FoMu) and the Fashion Museum (MoMu) are all just a few minutes walk.

Many trendy Coffee places, even an organic bakery and a gluten free bakery are found at 2 minutes walk from where you’ll stay. A Delhaize supermarket and an organic supermarket (Het Natuurhuis) are within walking distance as well. The famous Kloosterst

host_about:
"Adventure is the best way to learn."

Hi everyone,
My name is Christel and this is my story:
I come from the countryside of Belgium. You know...like a small time-stood-still-village where everybody knows everybody :) ? Well, the only way to get out of there once in a while is by going to my favorite city in Belgium, Antwerp.

The City.
I like art, no I mean I LOVE art. Music, theatre, ballet, expositions, literature, performances,...are my sources of inspiration to be creative. I also love  Antwerp is both modern and authentic. It’s a city that moves. There are dozens of cultural activities every week. The food in the restaurants, even in the tiny bars are amazing. It’s ALL about exploring with all your senses. 

About the apartment.
My husband, my kids and I renovated this building a couple of years ago. I prefer to stay there once in a while, having some time for myself. That’s why we decided it to rent it on Airbnb. We’ve chosen for this neighborhood ‘cause it’s the most upcoming place in Antwerp. It’s on a foot walk from the centre and yet it’s different. It’s Antwerps most multicultural neigbourhood. Over 70 different nationalities! And they all have their own cultural traditions which are awesome to discover!

To my guests.
Enjoy your time in Antwerp, they say it's the city of diamonds. 
But for me it's the people who shine :)
Leave a note, a comment or better...a story before you leave. 
I love stories.

name: Stylish and bright 19th century loft with terrace
description:
Welcome to our beautiful renovated neoclassic apartment.
A 160 square meters of authentic elements, high doors, windows and ceilings combined with modern comfort and luxury.
We have 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms and a 2 huge living rooms divided by a kitchen/dining room in the middle.
Located on a 10 min walk to the Central Station and 20 min to the historic city center and with a tram-stop nearly in front of the house.

The space
Welcome to our unique historical home: our loft is a 160 square meters renovated old notary house, where the traditional architecture is perfectly blended in with modernist elements and comfort. There's a beautiful view over the city and our beautiful garden. The rooms are bright and large, and all look out on our garden with swimming pool. We have 2 living rooms on different sides of the apartment, both next to our spacious and fully equipped kitchen. Our 2 bedrooms have a separate bathroom and toilet.

Guest acc

There are nice and cosy bars and restaurants and bakeries just a few steps away. Borgerhout is also an up and coming neigbourhood for young artists with many art galleries popping up.

name: ⭐️Stylish Bright Apt ✔2 BR ✔2 Patio ✔Free Ⓟ
description:
A very bright & spacious apartment with a modern touch without giving in on coziness and comfort.

It's located in the "Eilandje" (Dutch for islet) district, which is a beautiful piece of Antwerp with its own unique atmosphere: the link with the water and the port of yesteryear. Due to the urban development of recent years, the neighborhood is a metamorphosis between old and new, water and city.

The space
The apartment is modernly furnished with a spacious open kitchen that is fully equipped with appliances and cooking utensils - for those who like to cook. And not to worry; the dishwasher does the dishes!

In the extension of the open kitchen you will find a dining table for 6.

The lighting throughout the apartment is cozy and warm and can easily be changed in intensity and color for the atmosphere you want.

The master bedroom has a king-size bed and a very spacious closet. In the small bedroom you'll find a queen-size
neighborhood_overview:
The "Eilandje" district is the oldest port area in Antwerp and is surrounded by water. Today the port activity is more concentrated in the north, but the port feeling still dominates here. Taste the old atmosphere of the unloading quay with monumental warehouses, lanterns, hangars and cobblestones.

For good food, you can undoubtedly find something in one of the many and various eateries in the area. The historic city center is a 20-30 minute walk, where there is an even greater range of food and drink, shopping, entertainment and culture.

The MAS | Museum aan de Stroom, the Red Star Line Museum and the Port House are not to be missed in the immediate vicinity, and underline the connection between the city and the water.
host_about:
I live in Antwerp, and I love being a host here! I like to offer guests a homely & comfortable place to stay, along with a smooth & worry-less Airbnb experience.

Before hosting on Airbnb, the apartment was my home for several years together with my partner. I put every effort into making it as cozy & convenient for guests now as it used to be living there myself. I love this part of Antwerp and we still live in the area. 

I like to travel when I get the chance. When traveling I try to use Airbnb as a guest myself as much as possible, as it's a great way to stay in extraordinary places in the snugness of a home.

neighborhood_overview:
Within walking distance you can find:
- Central Station
- art-nouveau neighborhood Cogels-Osylei
- Zurenborg, a neighborhood with lots of restaurants, bars and playgrounds
- central park, to relax, go jogging, take a picnic, playground
- Zoo of Antwerp (one of the oldest Zoo's!)
- shopping area Meir
- Moorkensplein
The tramway and busstop are a 2 min walk and helps you to explore the rest of the city. Our multi-cultural neighborhood gives you a glimps of the real Antwerp!

There is a discount for bookings from 1 week or 1 month.

2 min walk to public bikes ( "Antwerp velo"). You can rent a bicycle for 4 euro a day there, or 9 euro for a week.
Antwerp Theatre is 1.5 km from the apartment. You can take a tram to the "Grote Markt" from tram stop Antwerp "Lente", which is a 4-minute walk. This tram will take you to the historic centre in just 11 minutes.
host_about:
Hi there!

I am Luc! I love to do yoga, to swim, to bicycle, to read, to sail and to do volunteering for scouts and other organizations. I am also intrested in permaculture (biological, ecological agriculture).

I like to go to the theater and to see modern art.

For food I like thai and chinese food. Or Asian food in general. I am also intrested in macrobiotics.

We want to tell you also we are proponents of diversity and inclusiveness.

When you come to Antwerp I will attempt to do anything that is possible to give you a splendid holiday! :)

I hope you will enjoy your stay in my apartment! We renovated it ourself, so everything is brand new :). We worked hard in it!

Hope to see you soon!
Greetz,
Luc

name: *Our zen spot in the city center. Quiet&authentic*
description:
Our place has a very authentic atmosphere. It's located in a quiet neighbourhood in the center of Antwerp, close to many cultural hotspots. You can walk out the neighbourhood into the vivid old center of Antwerp. The view is amazing and the beds are comfy. We also iron our bed linnen so everything feels like home. You can have a look in my art and design books which I collected over my studies. Suitable for all: couples, solo adventurers, business travellers, and families.

The space
The spacious living room has a dining and lounge area with a large couch convertible into a comfy bed with extra mattress. A glass sliding door gives access to the terrace with an amazing wide view over adjacent parks and gardens. As you have the apartment completely to yourself, it is ideal for families & friends up to 5 people, but also for people traveling alone who like space and peace. There is enough luggage capacity and a big closet in the bedroom which has a soft and comfortab
neighborhood_overview: Our house is situated in a quiet and green neighbourhood of the city on walking distance from basicly everything. The old city center for getting a spice of old Antwerp, the international well known cultural centrum De Singel with an interesting program on dance, theatre, concerts and architecture exhibitions. Nearby you find " Pain Quotidien" for breakfast and lunches. I also want to point out to Cafe nation and Barnini they make a nice breakfasts hipsters and youngsters will like! Also brewery the Koninck with guided tours and great bar. "Afspanning de hand" is a real recomendation for dinner. We also have the kids-paradise restaurant sensunik On walking distance near a small park you find "Café Kamiel" for drinks and light lunches. And 3 wonderfull parks. As part of the cultural life in Antwerp ourselves we are situated on a walking route of a gallery parcour. Antwerp is famous for his fashion and arts museums where you also find bars, antique shops and every Fridaymorning the famou
host_about: Since 1986 we have a gallery of contemporary art in our house which is build in 1900. Culture and travelling  is part of our life.

name: Small cosy house at magical location.
description:
Little house in quiet blind alley. Buses and trams to the center of Antwerp in 15min. The Rivierenhof, a large and beautiful park starts at the back door. Shops, bars , restaurants and parking lot around the corner. City bike stops nearby. Double bed. There's a small attic (open, no door) with room for 1 extra person. In the living area is a sofa bed for 2 extra persons. If you would like to visit Antwerp and return to a relaxed and quiet place in the evening, this is the perfect house for you.

The space
Fully equipped kitchen with dishwasher. Dining place and living room. Upstairs there is a bathroom with bathtub and shower. Sleeping room with double bed. Attic with matras for 1 extra person. Sofa bed in the living room for 2 extra persons. On the other side of the alley there is a small barn where you can use the washing and drying machine. You can sit outside on both sides of the house, so there is always a spot in the sun.

Other things to note<
neighborhood_overview: The Rivierenhof, one of the most beautiful parks of Antwerp, is situated right next to the house. It's ideal for an evening walk, picknick or a morning run.

name: Parkside Room with Yoga/massage
description:
We are a tiny international co-housing community and have an empty room for guests who like to stay near the park district of Antwerp. Infront of our door is the entrance of Boekenberg Park. Especially for guests who want to destress, do some Kundalini Yoga or receive a balancing Lomi Lomi massage.
The room has a view over the garden. The garden has a variety of herbs which you can use for cooking.
host_about:
Hi, I'm Linda, 58 years old, I share my house with one co-houser Namuun, a jewelry designer from Mongolia who is 28. We share kitchen, bathroom and garden. I practise Kundalini Yoga and Lomi Lomi massage. I could teach you some meditation if you like. 
We are open minded and spiritual.

The apartment is located in the heart of Antwerp, 600m from the Central Station. At walking distance from shopping area (Meir), het Eilandje, MAS, Park Spoor Noord and so many more.

The space
It is a rooftop apartment located at the 3th floor of a city mansion, totally renovated in 2012-13. (no elevator)
Open kitchen, fully equipped: refrigerator and freezer, oven, microwave, dishwasher, kettle, including washing machine.
Living room with Smart-tv (Netflix)
Bedroom with closet. (Street side, might by noisy, earplugs are at your service if you're sensitive to this)
Terrace with garden furniture.
Litlle mezzanine under the rooftop. (where the ladder leads to; not possible to stand up straight)
Bike storage inside, at ground floor.

You have free access to a parking space at the underground parking Sint-Jansplein (2 min walking).

name: Quiet Oasis in the Bustling Nationalestraat
description:
Our studio is located in the bustling Nationalestraat, the axis between the trendy "Zuid" and the cosy Groenplaats. You will find plenty of trendy shops and restaurants in the neighbourhood. Since the studio is situated at the backside of the building, you can unwind in our little oasis after a busy day in the city. We trust that you will appreciate the comfortable bed and the brand new bathroom with walk-in shower! The studio can accommodate up to two guests.

The space
The completely renovated studio with a surface of 30 sq. meters has everything you need. In the bathroom you will find a walk-in shower and a toilet. The kitchen is equipped with a combi oven (combination of a traditional oven and a microwave) and two cookers. We offer our guests an outstanding sleeping comfort. The high quality murphy beds (one double bed and one single bed, brand: Clei) both have a fully-fledged 7 pocket spring mattress.

Guest access
The studio is located
neighborhood_overview: The Nationalestraat is a bustling street, that connects the trendy "Zuid" and the renowned Groenplaats. The studio itself is a quite oasis where you can unwind after a busy day in the city. The Groenplaats is only at a 10 minutes’ walk. At the opposite side of the street, you will find a supermarket that is also open on Sundays. There are plenty of restaurants in the proximity.
host_about: Ons gezin houdt van reizen. Nadat we diverse malen te gast waren bij airbnb verhuurders, wilden we graag zelf gastheer worden. Intussen is onze droom uitgekomen en kunnen we op twee locaties mensen van over de hele wereld ontvangen in ons geliefde Antwerpen.

name: Beautiful family home in historical city center
description:
Our cozy 3-storey house is close to the historical city center, the fashion museum, central park, trendy shops like Dries Van Noten, Acne,... Great restaurants and bars within walking distance! Though peaceful, our street feels alive at any time of day. The house has plenty of daylight and a cosy, charming feel. We are creative artists, our house has been beautifully renovated. Our place is good for couples and families (with kids) or whoever is looking for a central home base.

The space
We live in a three storey house on a beautiful, wide street in Antwerp's historical center.
We recently renovated this old townhouse, trying to create an open, spacious atmosphere without losing the characteristic lay-out of the house.
There 's plenty of light, a wonderful view and a sense of quiet wellbeing, once inside.

Guest access
You'll have acces to a complete house (the vegan lunch spot on the ground floor excluded):
-fully equiped k
neighborhood_overview:
In the immediate surroundings, you can go shopping for fashion (Dries Van Noten, Acne, Ann Demeulemeester, ...), design, local delicacies, ...
Lively bars and great restaurants are within walking distance.
There's even an excellent vegan lunch spot on our ground floor (you enter the house through the shop): very convenient!
The central city park, cool Theaterplein and ancient botanical garden are really nearby, ideal for an afternoon stroll.
We love being in the heart of the city, all the good stuff Antwerp has to offer within reach. Once inside, our home feels like a comfortabel cocoon, quiet, cosy and peaceful.
host_about: I am a Swiss make up artist, I have lived for over a decade in Paris and recently moved - together with my boyfriend and little daughter - to Antwerp, Belgium. I love making things, travelling, hanging out with friends and family.

Make yourself at home in our light and spacious house in the beating heart of Antwerp!

Stay in an antique carriage house dating back to the 1880's. Enjoy the abundant light filling the rooms by daytime and the quiet at night. Share our passion for furniture, art and music in this lovely house.

The space
Make yourself at home in our light and spacious house in the beating heart of Antwerp!

You can easily store your bicycles in our garage.

Hi, I'm Joris, an Antwerp native and fond of my city!

name: Nice big room in charming modern flat in Antwerp
description:
Nice spacious and cozy bedroom accomodation in Antwerpen with garden view in a comfortable, clean and charming apartment. Only 10 min by tram from the centre. At 250m from De Singel Music Conservatorium, Antwerp Expo Center, tram (metro) stop, bicycles to rent, supermarket, fitness and olympic pool. Free car parking at 300m distance. Wifi always available.
Perfect location for those who come to the Conservatorium, those who visit Antwerp Expo and those who come for the olympic pool.

The space
Sunny, comfortable, clean and cozy modern appartment. The bedroom is spacious and quiet with garden view. The double bed is comfortable for one or 2 persons and it is provided with clean sheets and towels. Big fridge and deep freezer available, water boiler and microwave.
Antwerpen tourist tax of 2 euro per day is included in the price.

Guest access
The tram stop (metro) is at 250m distance from the flat and in 10 minutes you are at the old
neighborhood_overview:
The area is quiet and at 10 minutes walking distance you can relax in a very nice artificial lake perfect for jogging, walking or just relaxing in front of the lake.
At 10 min walking you have a big supermarket, fitness and indoor olympic pool. Rental bikes are almost in front of the flat.
The apartment is perfectly located for those who come to the Music Conservatorium (There is also a nice cafeteria) and Antwerp Expo Center.
Close to the supermarket there are 2 cafetarias and an Italian restaurant.

name: Great city, great apartment, great location!
description:
Nice new modern studio flat located only minutes walk from the City. Private terrace for relax. Wifi and Smart Tv.

Vibrant, bustling neighbourhood, with all of the excitement of Antwerp on your doorstep. Near Antwerp Central Station, Meir famous shopping district & historical centre.

The flat has everything to make you feel comfortable enough to enjoy a night in if you wish, and grocery stores, restaurants are just around the corner.

The space
The flat is located on the third floor and is easily accessible by elevator.

Guest access
The kitchen has a microwave, fridge, coffee maker, water kettle and dish washer for your use. You’ll find a few snacks, coffee, tea, and cool drinks in the fridge, please enjoy these they are for you!

Other things to note
We ask that you treat our home with the same respect that you do your own.
This is a non-smoking home. If you do smoke we ask that you do so on
neighborhood_overview:
Ideally situated near all the major attractions and then some.
Shopping? Explore the Meir, Wilde Zee area and for the die hard fashionistas the Nationale & Kammenstraat where all the famous names have their flag ship stores (Dries Van Noten, A.F. Vandevorst, Veronique Branquinho,..)
Visit the historical centre round the Cathedral, City Hall, het Steen. After stumbling over the cobbly stones, treat yourself to the local beer, a Bolleke.
Off the beaten track: the Zurenborg area, ecclectic Jugendstil follies, with the hipsteresque Dageraad Plaats nearby.
Yes, Antwerp has it all & more
Travel back in time and explore the Rubens House, grand manor of the world famous painter slash diplomat par excellence Rubens. Marvel at the grand paintings and the short canopy bed, where the master took his power naps sitting up.

Antwerp is yours to discover...& so is my apartment.
host_about:
I am a creative generalist, fond of sewing clothes, tea bonnets and sofa covers. I love tropicalia music and samba dancing. My favourite travel destinations are the Lusophone countries: Brazil, Portugal & Mozambique. 
Guiding people around in Antwerp is a great pleasure for me. I love discovering new places & meeting new people. So I look forward meeting you.

name: Cute apartment in historical center incl parking
description:
Newly renovated apartment (with free underground parking) with lots of good energy - located in a quite street with pebble stones within a 5 min walking distance from the most beautiful squares 'Conscienceplein' and 'de Grote Markt' aka the historical centre of Antwerp. The shopping street 'Meir' is also 5 min away. The city bikes are in front of the door.

The space
My apartment is over 70 square meters with two bedrooms. It's spacious and cozy at the same time. Big windows leave light into the dining and living room from the south. Bathroom and toilet are separate.

Guest access
The whole apartment and garage.

Other things to note
I have no tv - the city is there to be explored!
neighborhood_overview: Everything is so near! Restaurants, shopping street, historical buildings, het MAS, the river, bars, central train station, ... All within a ten min walking range.
host_about: When I am on mission with Doctors without Borders my apartment is for you to use and explore Antwerp. Traveling opens your mind, so being part of your adventure is my pleasure.

name: Gingerbread house in Borgerhout, Antwerp city
description:
Charming house with stylish and very cosy interior design on an open and green square - one of the only ones in Antwerp city. Explore the city centre using our citybike (velo) cards.
Public transport around the corner and access to the highway in 5 minutes.
Contact us for a special offer.

The space
Downstairs you find the living & dining room and a fully equipped kitchen - dishwasher and a semi-prefossional coffee machine included! On the first floor you discover an amazing white bathroom with an antique iron cast bath tub. Nevertheless all the taps and walk-in shower are new. Next to the bathroom there is a colourful bedroom with a king size bed. The third floor is our art studio and office. The washing machine and dryer are located overthere.

Other things to note
We do not charge any cleaning fees. Therefore the house must be in the same clean state when you leave the house as when you arrive. (except the bed sheats offcourse).
neighborhood_overview: The house is located on a green oasis in the city. You can pick a citybike on the square and you find yourself within 10 minutes in the medieval city centre, next to the famous Antwerp cathedral, for example. There are quite some (hipster) bars and restaurants in the neighbourhood - you won't get bored.
host_about:
Ik ben 31 jaar oud. In het verleden heb ik vele seizoenen gedaan als skileraar. Na een geweldige tijd heb ik besloten om me terug in Antwerpen te vestigen. Het is een beslissing waarvan nog geen seconde twijfel heb gehad.  Gezien ik altijd graag mensen een leuk verblijf heb bezorgd in het toerisme wilde ik dit ook in Antwerpen verder zetten door het verhuren van een camper en een appartement.
Sinds ik met mijn vriendin Maartje samen ben en ons appartement af heb gerenoveerd  gaat het absoluut geweldig. Wanneer we samen terug gaan skiën met de nieuwe camper verhuren we soms ook ons eigen huis in Borgerhout.

Wanneer er tijd is geef ik graag zelf gegidste wandelingen door onze mooie stad.

Mijn hobby's zijn fietsen, klimmen, skiën en telemarken.

Contacteer me zeker voor een mogelijke korting. De situatie is verschillend voor elke huurder. Voor ons is een aangename relatie met de huurder erg belangrijk.

description:
Our house is located in the cosy neighbourhood Berchem, close to city centre. Public transport (bus, tram and train) is nearby. Perfect for couples, young parents, solo travelers and professionals. Babies and children are welcome. During your stay you can use our kitchen, bathroom, living room, etc.

The space
We want to warmly welcome you in our pretty house. The house was build in the early 1900s, but since been completely renovated, while keeping all its charme.

Guest access
The entire house is available. You can also enjoy your own private terrace.
neighborhood_overview:
Our house is located in the cosy neighboorhood of Berchem. The house is close to a multi cultural shoppingstreet where you can find a variety of shops, a backery, a grocerystore, nightshops, snackbars and several pubs and restaurants.
You can mingle with locals at the nearby 'Groen Kwartier' or 'Dageraadplaats'.

name: Studio Marie-Henriëtte
description:
Near the City Park and the weekly markets (Vogeltjesmarkt).
Perfect for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers and families (with 1 child).

Double bed and sofa bed
Kitchenette with fridge and hob
Separate bathroom with rain shower
Free WIFI
Flat screen TV

Arrival between 15h and 20h.
Excl. city ​​tax: € 2.25 / person / night
Cleaning is possible at € 12 / h

Non-smoking property, pets not allowed.

The space
Studio Marie-Henriëtte (38m2) is quiet and comfortable.
The double bed is spacious with the wardrobe next to it. Large mirror. The sofa is in a niche and is suitable as a single bed. The kitchen is equipped with the necessary cooking and eating utensils. Dining table for 4 people. The bathroom and the night hall are separated from the sleeping and sitting area with a door. Wide screen TV and free WiFi.

Guest access
Access to all areas of the studio.
neighborhood_overview: The building is located between the City Park and the former National Bank of Belgium, near the place where the weekly markets take place. The most beautiful shopping streets, delicious restaurants, the Bourla Theater, the Arenbergschouwburg and the Kruidentuin are just around the corner.
host_about:
Hallo, ik houd al meer dan 25 jaar mijn B&B open en doe het nog altijd even graag.
In mijn vrije tijd luister ik vaak naar klassieke muziek (ik zing zelf ook), kook ik lekkere gerechten of onderhoud ik mijn stadstuintje. Daarnaast reis ik graag met mijn man doorheen Europa, meestal op de fiets.
Ik ontvang mijn gasten in stijl in één van mijn studio's en geef hen met plezier uitleg over alle fijne adresjes in Antwerpen. 
En mijn motto? Carpe Diem. De tijd gaat al snel genoeg om hem te verliezen aan pietluttigheden :-)

name: Cosy, big and light house with garage and bicycles
description:
Our house is next to the popular Park Spoor Noord and the beautiful Rivierenhof (park). In close distance of cafes and various entertainment areas. 15 minutes walk from the Central Station and several subway stations towards the city center.
The house is suitable for business travelers, families (with children) and large groups.

The space
We have a garage where the car can be parked. We offer you two bicycles. Always convenient to go to the store or to take a step into the world.

For the baby or toddler has a crib and a changing table provided.
Bed Sheets and towels are waiting for you!

Our street is very quiet so you can take enough sleep in the night!

The kitchen's equipped with all the basics. Including oven, microwave, coffee maker, kettle etc ...
Unfortunately, no dishwasher ...

During the summer months you can have breakfast on our city courtyard in the sun.

name: Cosy 1 or 2 person apartment Top location 't Zuid
description:
Cosy 1 or 2 person apartment in a quiet street at one of the best locations in Antwerp, the hip and trendy South.

The apartment has an open living area, spacious bedroom, separate toilet and shower.
The kitchenette is fully equipped with a dishwasher, microwave oven, coffee machine, a water cooker, a hob and a fridge-freezer.

Ideal for couples and singles or for longer temporary stay.

Unlimited WiFi and television are free available.

All costs included.

The space
Note that the apartment is located on the first floor (without elevator) and also has as small staircase inside. The surface is 40 m².
neighborhood_overview:
Many nice restaurants, bars, shops, museums and other lovely places are located nearby.

Trams and buses are around the corner and the historic city center is just a 15-minute walk away.

All tourist attractions are also within walking distance and Antwerp is perfect to discover by bicycle (check for example 'velo antwerpen' for rental bikes).

There is also a free car park close by at a 5 minute walk (Vlaamse and Waalse kaai). You can also pay to park in the surrounding streets or use one of the Park+Rides around the city.

name: Terrace Luxury Suite 4
description:
Kaai11 is a luxurious and charming historical building on the Schelde quays in the funky area Antwerp South. Top location!

We house 4 city flats and 2 guest rooms. All flats and rooms can be reached by elevator and stairs.

The city flats offer an amazing river view making your sunset unforgettable. All flats are fully furnished, providing an equipped kitchen, desk, living room, separate bedroom and luxurious bathroom. Our city flats are also suitable for a longer stay.

Other things to note
We offer a luxurious breakfast for 12.5 euro per guest between 9u and 10.30u. You can reserve this by sending us a message here or by calling us directly.

The city flats offer an amazing river view making your sunset unforgettable. All flats are fully furnished, providing an equipped kitchen, desk, living room, separate bedroom and luxurious bathroom. Our city flats are also suitable for a longer stay.

Other things to note
We offer a luxurious breakfast for 12.5 euro per guest between 9u and 10.30u. You can reserve this by sending us a message here or by calling us directly.

name: Charming house - 1 bedroom  & sunny roof terrace
description:
My place is available for couples, singles or business people.

It has a fully equiped kitchen, a large living room, a bathroom with shower/bath, a room to work or relax, and one spacious bedroom with a king size bed, where you can also set up an extra bed. Wifi and a washing machine are aso available. I have a lovely sunny roof terrace where you can have breakfast in the morning or just relax.

Other things to note
Please respect my neighbours.

Smoking is not allowed inside but you can smoke on my terrace.

I have a lovely cat, Snuggels, who is very friendly and independent. He can come in as he like through the cat door. Food is available for him. You just need to feed him in the morning and in the evening. :-)

I did put a lot of love in my house so please respect it like it would be your own. But most of all enjoy it😊
neighborhood_overview:
I live in a upcomming trendy neighbourhood near Krüger square, a green parc just around the corner of my house. You find bars, restaurants and a biological store around the corner or on walking distance. Public transport to the central station and the city center is very near.

The lovely café "Bar Leon" on The Kruger square has a large and sunny terrace looking over the square and they serve very good wine:-) On sundays they also have an excellent lunch !

Romantic room for two in a cosy Antwerp mansion with wooden floors and high ceilings. Situated in a quiet neighbourhood within walking distance of the city centre.

Your room is private, off course. Bath room is shared, but privacy and discretion are guaranteed. Feel free to take a soak in the hot bath.

neighborhood_overview:

name: Industrial Loft @Eilandje - unique view on the MAS
description:
Turn your stay in Antwerp into an experience! Unique location straight opposite of the MAS and with full view on the Marina – central in the heart of the trendiest district of Antwerp.

Experience the unique combination of an 18e century house and the vintage and industrial style with surprising accents – straight to the eighties 80-NY Loft. Suitable for 7 guests.

The Loft is ideal as a base to explore the city while you enjoy the most hype neighborhood of Antwerp.

Parking present.

The space
The Loft is ideal for couples getaways, group of friends, families or professionals seeking unique working space. Also longer stays are perfectly possible due to the fully equipped kitchen.

Our guests can use the entire fully-equipped Loft. It features 2 separate large bedrooms with each their attached bathroom & rain shower. 3 large sleeping Sofa's can be turned into a sleeping place. Next to a living and dining room, we provi
neighborhood_overview:
When you look out of the window, you can see the MAS as your opposite neighbor ( see picture ) – which is the only stay in Antwerp offering this. If you look at the left and right you see the Antwerp Marine which completes this unique location. Lots of different restaurant, bars, sunny terraces, night shops all between 1 and 10 min. Nightlife in a range of 15 min – 15 min from sportpaleis / lotto arena by Taxi ( +-€20 )
Breakfast is available in the MAS itself ( bar STORM ) – highly recommended, low prices and only 1 min walk !
Supermarket ( Albert Hein & Delhaize ) and lots of smaller shops available within 10 min walk.
- 20 min walk from central station
- 10 min walk from city center
- 10 min walk from historical center
- 10 min walk from Christmas markets ( Dec. time frame )
host_about:
Vanuit een gezamenlijke passie voor interieur te kunnen werken met een industrieel pand op een prachtige locatie… 

Stef is een allround artiest en Chris een productontwikkelaar…dan is de uitkomst het creëren van eclectische interieurs met authentieke, ruwe materialen als basis. 

Een loft recht tegenover het MAS zagen we als een uniek geschenk en lang nadenken was niet nodig: een gastenverblijf waar we onze liefde voor industrieel erfgoed, gecombineerd met vintage elementen, kunnen delen met liefhebbers van het genre en bezoekers van onze geboortestad. 

We kijken ernaar uit om kennis te maken met wereldburgers van kortbij en ver weg.

name: Surprising characteristic apartment in Antwerp
description:
You're staying in the former servants' quarters of a house of the 30's. It comprises a double bedroom with a sitting area, a bathroom, a separate toilet, a compact kitchen, a living room with double sofa bed for 1 or 2 additional guests, a semi-covered terrace and a cosy and sunny garden. It is situated in a quiet street in a lively area of Antwerp near the center, attractions, shops, railway station and public transport.

The space
To enter the apartment you descend four steps. The bedroom with double bed is attached to the bathroom. There is a full bath in which you can also take a shower. The sofa in the living room can be used as a double sofa bed. You can make yourself a pleasant breakfast and enjoy it with a view on the garden. For guests with a large suitcase there is a lot of room in a closet and in the cloakroom. In the kitchen you can use a two-burner stove and microwave to prepare a simple meal.
In a shared room you can use the washing machine, dr
neighborhood_overview: You will be staying in a lively neighborhood in the divercity Antwerp. It is an area with many interesting, often less known things to discover. Around the corner there is cinema Klappei, some cosy café's (de Kroon and de Valk) and the Antwerp Zoo. For shopaholic's, the most famous shopping street of Antwerp, the Meir, is on walking distance about 1.3 kilometers away. At 130 meters you can find a supermarket of Albert Heijn in the Offerandestraat, where it is also fun to shop.
host_about: We like to discover ourselves through our guests. Discover Antwerp from our beautiful apartment! We love to give you local tips if you like that. Hope to see you soon.

name: Beautiful sunny apartment in the centre of Antwerp
description:
Welcome to our beautiful sunny apartment in Antwerp! The apartment is located on the 4th floor with an amazing view over Antwerp.
Our apartment is located in the centre of Antwerp with all the amenities at walking distance. In this neighbourhood (Schipperskwartier/University) you find lots of museums, bars and restaurants. The Great Square Market, the Cathedral and the historical city centre are only five minutes by foot. You can also easily visit the trendy Eilandje and MAS.

The space
Our apartment (110m²) has one bedroom with a stunning view over the city, a bureau/working space, a living room with television (+Netflix), kitchen with dishwasher, bathroom with bath/shower, washing machine and tumble dryer. You have free Wifi in the apartment. All the rooms are spacious and bright. The apartment was built in 1928 and was renovated between 2010 and 2014. Some aspects were kept, like the beautiful wooden floor, doors and the heatings in cast iron.
neighborhood_overview: In this neighbourhood (Schipperskwartier/University) you find lots of museums, bars and restaurants. The Great Square Market, the Cathedral and the historical city centre are only five minutes by foot. You can also easily visit the trendy Eilandje and MAS with lots of restaurants, bars and nice views. In the evening, when the sun goes down, we really recommand a visit to the riverbanks of 'Schelde'. It's really amazing to see the sun go down. It's a five minutes walk to get to the river banks and the 'Steen' for example, where you have a stunning view.
host_about: Kristof en ik wonen samen in ons appartement in Antwerpen. We hebben in 2015 besloten in Antwerpen te komen wonen en hebben nog geen seconde spijt gehad van deze beslissing! We genieten dan ook echt van het stadsleven: uiteten gaan, naar feestjes gaan, musea bezoeken, naar de cinema gaan, in de zomer de parken ontdekken, ... . Verder houden we enorm veel van reizen en nieuwe plaatsen ontdekken. Binnenkort zijn we dan ook terug te vinden overal ter wereld in onze VW bus, die we helemaal 'reisklaar' aan het maken zijn. Onze hobby is snowboarden en voor de rest proberen we zoveel mogelijk van het leven te genieten!

name: Room with amazing view over Antwerp
description:
My place is close to the MAS, public transport, the Center, "Eilandje". You will enjoy my place because of the view, the location, the surroundings.
My place is perfect for couples, solo-adventurers or business travellers.
Here, you can enjoy the rest, but you are very close to the center, museums, fancy restaurants en some clubs.

The space
The room is in an apartment on the 10th floor with an amazing view over the Scheldt and Antwerp.
The building is brand new (2016) and all comfort is available.
Everything is nicely finished in a minimalistic way and every night there is an amazing sunset to admire.

Guest access
Guests have access to the living room, the kitchen, the washing machine, the bathroom, the room itself and the terrace.
neighborhood_overview:
The "Eilandje" is a fancy upcoming neighborhood with lots of eat and party venues. If you want to get to know the better Antwerp, my apartment is the perfect starting point.
On a few minutes walk, there is the famous MAS museum you have to visit if you're in Antwerp.
host_about:
I am a Belgian. I love to travel with Airbnb.
I am non smoker and quite and clean.

name: Homy apartment near many parks #LovelyGreen
description:
Het appartement bevindt zich vlakbij het centrum van Antwerpen (5km), makkelijk te bereiken met openbaar vervoer. Met de fietsen van Velo Antwerpen (300m) geraak je overal snel.
Boekenbergpark (100m) heeft een natuurlijke zwemvijver, Boelaerpark (150m) heeft een grote speeltuin, Rivierenhof (3km) met zijn 132 ha, is het grootste park van Antwerpen.
Dageraadplaats (2.5km) met gezellige restaurantjes en café's gelegen in de leuke Zurenborgwijk.
Een heel rustig appartement in een groene buurt.

The space
Living en eetkamer bevinden zich in 1 grote ruimte met aansluitend een half open keuken, met mooi uitzicht op de bomen. Dit geeft een ruime en open indruk.
De houten vloer in heel het appartement, maakt het geheel warm en knus.
In de badkamer bevindt zich het toilet, bad met douche.
De slaapkamer heeft een dubbel bed en bevindt zich aan de achterkant van het gebouw, het geeft uit op stadstuintjes en is daarom heel rustig.

In
neighborhood_overview:
Een gezellige en rustige buurt en toch vlakbij Antwerpen centrum, wijk Zurenborg of het Zuid.
Vanuit station Antwerpen Berchem (2.5 km) geraak je overal met de trein.
Met de tram ben je snel op de Meir of de Nationalestraat, waar je naar hartenlust kan shoppen.

Tevens een zeer groene buurt met tal van parken op een steenworp van het appartement: Boekenbergpark (100m) heeft een zwemvijver en speeltuin, Boelaerpark (100m) heeft een speeltuin, Rivierenhof (2.5 km) is met zijn 3.2 ha het grootste park van Antwerpen.
Veel musea bereikbaar met tram of bus: M HKA, MAS, Rubenshuis, Red Star Line museum, Diamantmuseum, ...
host_about:
I love living in the beautiful city of Antwerp, come and take a look for yourself :)
I love family, friends, children, books, healthy food, coffee, music, shiatsu, movies and most of all: travelling. 
I like yoga and it's way of living, like to try new things in the kitchen, mostly vegetarian and world cuisine.

I like to share my apartment with you in an open way. You can use everything here, also the kitchen.

name: Hygienic nice apartment in the centre
description:
Hello there! I found the perfect apartment for you! My goal is to offer you the perfect stay in the fantastic location.

The space
The recently renovated apartment has two bedrooms: The master bedroom (double bed) and a smaller bedroom (2 single beds). There is also a modern bathroom with shower, a very cozy living room that offers you the opportunity to relax and a nice kitchen to show off your best cooking skills.

Other things to note
The building is build in the main building and it has a back house.
This means that the 2nd bedroom is located in the back house. You have to cross the hallway to get there. (3 meter) It has its advantages so that the 2nd bedroom is very quiet and private. The upstairs neighbors daughters sleeps there and she loves that room.
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is situated on the prime location known as the ‘Quartier National’. On a stone’s throw from the cathedral, in the bustling fashion district of the city and near the retro antique shops where it is pleasant to relax on Sundays. You’ll find the atmosphere in this small street very pleasant. Among boutiques, chocolate makers and restaurants, you will find also a popular and trendy breakfast bar where you can eat at heart’s delight. The apartment is conveniently located within walking distance (200m) from the quays where you can park your car for free on the public park spaces provided.

name: Charming apartment. Top location ! Romantic. Cozy.
description:

name: Fully renovated superb townhouse with garden
description:
Enjoy your stay in Antwerp in our recently renovated (2019), beautiful townhouse with garden in the heart of the nicest area of Antwerp, Zurenborg. Our house was recently fully renovated and we love the result :-)

The house is located in Antwerp's nicest area: Zurenborg. This area is well known for its splendid architecture, nice restaurants and cosy bars (on the famous Dageraadplaats). Public transport is a 2 min walk away if you'd like to discover other parts of the city.

The space
We have just finished renovating our home, making sure to respect beautiful 19th century elements such as the big wooden door, original wooden floor and ceiling details in the living room. We are combining these elements with more modern improvements on utilities such as heating/air conditioning but also focusing on light, white spaces. Moreover, we have a beautifully kept sunny garden which we consider our green oasis in the middle of the city. Perfect for sunbathing, cos
neighborhood_overview: Zurenborg is known as one of the most cosy, lively and safest areas of Antwerp. It is centrally located and near a train station, but still has a very distinct and pleasant vibe. The center of Zurenborg is called the dageraadplaats, which is a square with lots of restaurants and bars and a playground for children. Parks and playgrounds are nearby and can be reached on foot easily.
host_about:
Hi, my name is Jasmien. 

Together with my fiancee, Sam, I live in Belgium's nicest city: Antwerp. We recently completly renovated our house for ourselves, but will live abroad. We'd love to share our house, which we love so much, with guests. 

Do not hesitate to let us know if you have any questions!

name: Nice studio in the historic centre of Antwerp
description:
De studio is gelegen in het hart van Antwerpen
Je bent op wandelafstand van alle toeristische attracties
De Grote Markt met het mooie stadhuis is net om de hoek, alsook shops, restaurants, musea, etc

Er is een volledig uitgeruste keuken aanwezig met een kookvuur, ijskast met vriesvak, waterkoker, servies, etc

Verse handdoeken en lakens worden voorzien

In Antwerpen geldt een citytaks van €2,5/persoon/nacht.

neighborhood_overview: Het Historisch Centrum is de wijk met veel bekende gebouwen en toeristische trekpleisters als de Grote Markt met het stadhuis, de kathedraal en de Groenplaats. Deze buurt vormt een combinatie van barokke bezienswaardigheden, charmante straatjes en pittoreske pleintjes. Tussen de historische gebouwen, de gezellige restaurants, cafés, terrasjes, winkels en musea is het gezellig wandelen.

name: top floor 100y old townhouse Antwerp North
description:
I renovated a 100y old house and the style is original vs modern, with warm materials. It's a low energy house with only led lights, A+++ machines, good heatinsulation, eco-friendly heating and solar panels.

Guest access
The house is divided in 2 parts: the part where I live vs the second floor, a totaly independent apartment. We only share entrance and stairs.
neighborhood_overview:
The neighbourhood is an eclectic neighbourhood with shops, green area's, highways and public transport closeby (10min tram to Antwerp Central)

PUBLIC TRANSPORT: The easiest way to get here is to take the train to Antwerp Central station. From there on you can take a metro at koningin ASTRIDplein, it's the square in front of the central station. You can take numbers 2,3 or 6, in the direction of Merksem. It will take you 12minutes - 5 stops, the stop where you get of is 'GASTHUISHOEVE', it's very easy, it's the stop after sportpaleis, it's the first stop in open air. arriving at gasthuishoeve, you are standing in my street, it's just a 250m walk down the street. I always use google maps, button public transport to calculate my route. If you have any difficulty finding your way, please whatsapp me, and I will guide you here!

name: Beautiful appartment with a VIEW
description:
Beautiful newly built apartment on the 15th floor with a terrace, parking place and great view on the port of Antwerp. The city center as well as Antwerp's hotspot 't Eilandje (MAS museum area) are on walking distance. You also have the possibility to take a bus below the apartment.

The space
The apartment has 1 bedroom and a fully equipped kitchen, a bathtub with a shower. A sofa bed is installed in the living area of the apartment which has an amazing view over the skyline of Antwerp.
Breakfast bars are within walking distance as well as shopping streets, museums, the historical centre, great movie theatre, parks, other bars and restaurants.

Guest access
TV, Wifi, Nespresso machine, video door phone

Other things to note
Parking space included with automated garage gates
neighborhood_overview: There is a beautiful park called Park Spoor Noord right outside this 18 story skyscraper so you can enjoy some greenery in the morning or evening. In the park itself there is a biking path and also a small play area for kids (including fountains to play during the summer). A pop-up restaurant opens during every season in the park itself or you can simply walk or bike over a connecting bridge to the most trendy place in Antwerp called 't Eilandje where you will find the MAS museum and many great restaurants and bars.

name: House of Magic [Harry Potter themed]
description:
Welcome wizards, muggles and magical creatures! We welcome you in our lovely House of Magic in the heart of the city ideal for families and people enjoying Antwerp (NO party groups!) In our spacious and newly renovated house, we have 4 lovely and unique bedrooms available for your comfort and enjoyment. Every room is named after a specific Hogwarts House. We have a 'Hufflepuff' room, a 'Gryffindor room', 'Ravenclaw' room and finally a 'Slytherin' room. We wish a magical stay!

The space
The house has 4 lovely bedrooms:

Bedroom 1 - “Hufflepuff" - Yellow

Bedroom 2 - “Gryffindor" Red

Bedroom 3 - “Ravenclaw” Blue

Bedroom 4 - “Slytherin” Green

Furthermore the house has a fully equipped kitchen and a bathroom with two showers a toilet and urinoir. The house does not have a living room but the bigger bedrooms have a couch you can relax in together (and watch harry potter).

Guest access
neighborhood_overview:
We live in the heart of the city near the university of Antwerp.
All the main sightseeing cultural sights are easily to accessible by foot Groenplaats and the Cathedral is about 15 min walking distance.
Within 2 min of walking you can find different bars and restaurants and two supermarkets. There is also a fresh bakery and several coffeehouses in just around the corner.

We have made a booklet with all our favorite restaurants/bars/clubs you can use as inspiration.
host_about:
Well hellow there! My name is Zola. Im a 28 year old tax consultant living in Antwerp city. I've lived in Antwerp for the most part of my life and have and adore this beautiful city of Antwerp. I love showing my international friends the hidden gems of the city and taking them out to taste the amazing food here.

Zola

You will much appreciate the beautiful park across the street for your morning run or afternoon picknick. Welcome!

The space

host_about: We are a dynamic couple with 5 children living in Antwerp, Belgium. We love to travel and discover the world with our kids. We are happy to welcome you in our recently renovated house and to enable you to get to know the great city of Antwerp and other interesting places in Belgium : Brussels (50 km), Ghent (50 km), Bruges (100 km). Do not hesitate to contact us if you have any questions.

Vlak bij de Schelde en de 2 oudste dokken in Antwerpen is het de ideale uitvalsbasis om lekker te kunnen genieten van ons historisch verleden , cultuur, shopping ( 10 min te voet naar het Centrum van de stad en eveneens de mogelijkheid om de tram te nemen vlak in de buurt) restaurants , leuke caféetjes en trendy koffiebars.
Sinds

De buurt rond het Willemdok en het Bonapartedok is bezaaid met een divers pallet van leuke restaurants, unieke caféetjes en trendy coffeebars voor elke smaak en budget.

Het appartement bevat 3 ruime slaapkamers met dubbele bedden. Daarnaast zijn er 2 badkamers, een zee
neighborhood_overview: Het Eilandje heeft alle ingrediënten voor een relaxed en stijlvol bezoek aan Antwerpen.

name: Spacious characteristic apartment in Antwerp
description:
You're staying on the first floor of a former mansion of the 30's. It comprises a 14 meters long living room which is traditionally divided in 3 parts with double sofa bed for 1 or 2 additional guests, double bedroom, bathroom with full bath, separate toilet, kitchen, cosy sunny Mediterranean terrace AND a covered terrace. It is situated in a quiet street in a lively area of Antwerp near the center, attractions, shops, railway station and public transport.

The space
To enter the apartment, you go ten stairs up. The livingroom in the former mansion of the 30’s is divided in the typical division in front, middle and backroom and has a length of 14 meters and a width of 6 meters. The bedroom is equipped with double bed. In the bathroom you can use a full bath in which you can also take a shower. In there you can also find a washing machine which is ready to be used by you. If you wish you can ask a key from a shared room where you can use the dryer and iron. The so
neighborhood_overview: You will be staying in a lively neighborhood in the divercity Antwerp. It is an area with many interesting, often less known things to discover. Around the corner there is cinema Klappei, some cosy café's (de Kroon and de Valk) and the Antwerp Zoo. For shopaholic's, the most famous shopping street of Antwerp, the Meir, is on walking distance about 1.3 kilometers away. At 130 meters you can find a supermarket of Albert Heijn in the Offerandestraat, where it is also fun to shop.
host_about: We like to discover ourselves through our guests. Discover Antwerp from our beautiful apartment! We love to give you local tips if you like that. Hope to see you soon.

description:

Ik woon en werk in Antwerpen met mijn vriendin Margo. Wij zijn beide fans van reizen en van het concept Airbnb.

name: Complete house | 10 people | historic center
description:
ZaligInAntwerpen is a luxury holiday Home in the historic center of Antwerp.

The 16th century house has been completely renovated and can easily accomodate 10 people with 3 bedrooms and 3 bathrooms, a cosy living room and fully equipped kitchen and dining area. It is ideal for big families, groups of friends, colleagues, workshops, etc...

You stay in a quiet pittoresk street and yet only few steps of all hotspots in Antwerp: Groenplaats, Kloosterstraat, Fashion District, shoppingstreets,

The space
Because you have the whole house for yourself, you can spend quality time with your friends or family, share aperitifs, cooking and dining.
Both the cozy living with TV and gas fireplace on the 3rd floor as the kitchen and dining area in a cozy bistro atmosphere are exclusively for your group.

Guest access
You have the entire property exclusively at your disposal.
neighborhood_overview:
The holiday home for 10 people is located in the historic center of Antwerp

You stay in Leeuwenstraat, a quiet street in the Fashion District, a few steps from:

- VRIJDAGMARKT (FRIDAY MARKET)
A piece of Provence in Antwerp with nice cafés, terraces and with the UNESCO World Heritage Museum of Plantin-Moretus. On Friday morning, the square changes into an outdoor auction of old items and furniture.

- GROENPLAATS
One of the most famous squares of Antwerp with a cozy atmosphere, cafés and restaurants dominated by the beautiful Cathedral of our Lady

- GROTE MARKT
with the impressive building of the Town Hall and the statue of Brabo is overlooking the scenery.

- KLOOSTERSTRAAT
Well known street for antiques, brocante, vintage and interior design shops. De Kloosterstraat is also worth visiting on Sunday when all the shops are open.

- FASHION DISTRICT
With many renowned designers of the Antwerp 6, the
host_about:
Mother of 3 daughters living in Antwerp. 
Passionate about interior and giving guests a 5* experience. 
Owner and manager of ZaligAanZee and ZaligInAntwerpen, Self-catered holiday homes in Antwerp city and at the Belgian Coast, Knokke-Heist, Blankenberge, Damme
"It's a beatiful thing when a career and a passion come together"

name: Ground floor apartment with huge garden!
description:
Hello! We're a young couple, living in the north of downtown Antwerp. We bought this house, but as it is a bit big, we're renting out the apartment on the ground floor, including the magnificent garden! Feel welcome in the most vibrant part of town!

The space
This is the ground floor of our own house. We live upstairs and in the other part of the ground floor, we have our office and work area. In the back of the ground floor is an apartment for you to enjoy with kitchen, bathroom, bedroom, small living room (which is also bedroom if you're coming by 4), separate toilet and great view of (and access to!) the garden.

There is one double bed in the bedroom, shower and toilet in the bathroom, a fully equipped kitchen with refrigerator, sink, microwave oven, regular oven and gas cooker. Basic kitchen supply (oil, salt, herbs etc) is available. In the nearby living area, there is one large sofa, that can be turned into a bed and one extra bed. One extra toi
neighborhood_overview: Welcome in "2060" (the postal code of this area)! A great, lively neighbourhood close to the central station (10 min walk) and the city center (15 min walk). Also, if you plan on attending an event at Sportpaleis or Lotto Arena, this is just a 20 min walk or a 10 min tram ride away. In the neighbourhood itself, you'll find a lot of shops and restaurants, with tastes from all over the world. As Antwerp has about 164 nationalities living in the city (more than New York!!) this is where you can find them. Exotic restaurants side by side with traditional Belgian pubs and Eastern European supermarkets. Looking for something? Sure you can find it here!
host_about: Hi, I am lorenzo and together with my wife Zita we love travelling, hiking or biking through nature and... good food and wine. Yes! Looking forward to meet you!

name: Vinçotteplein
description:
Welcome!
Bright and homey apartment with one open bedroom and a sunny terrace in a small and quiet building.
Located in a green and quiet street, close to Krugerplein.
A nice sociable and flamboyant neighborhood (Borgerhout) close to central station with a few nice (coffee)bars, restaurants, art galleries, concerthalls, bakeries and grocery stores. Less than 5 minutes walking from tram- and busstops.

Other things to note
Pets are not allowed.
Smoking is allowed on the terrace, but please keep the noice down for the neighbors in the evening.
neighborhood_overview:
During the summer there are lots of small events and open air markets around Krugerplein.

You can walk to Rivierenhof or Park Spoor Noord on a summer evening (both with summerbar).
Tips and ideas in the close neighborhood:
Breakfast:
Ecocafé (Turnhoutsebaan)
Mokkakapot (Moorkensplein)
September (Vinçottestraat)
Bar Leon (Krugerplein)
Restaurant:
Brutal (Kerkstraat)
Miro (Moorkensplein)
June’s (Krugerplein)
Bars:
Bar Leon (Krugerplein)
Mombasa (Moorkensplein)
Bar Bakeliet (Laar)
Bar Noord (summerbar in Park Spoor Noord)
De Kroon (Kerkstraat)
…
a larger list with some nice places is available in the apartment.
host_about:
Hi and welcome on my page!
My name is Tony, 41, living in Antwerp.
As I like to travel a lot via Airbnb as well I thought it was nice idea to start renting my own place too, and here we are!
My personal experience as an Airbnb traveller teached me that the most important things for myself are cleanliness, a nice 'staying-between-locals' experience and mutual respect between the host and the guests. I truly hope I can pass this on whenever you stay at my place...
Don't hesitate to send me a message if you have any questions!

name: Romantic Gem in Antwerp’s Historic City Center
description:
This quiet, bijoux loft (65m2) is perfectly located; at 1’ from the 'Grote Markt', the City Hall, the Cathedral and the Scheldt river. You’ll be just a few steps away from great museums, art galleries, restaurants, bars, shops…

But be aware! There’s so much to explore —if only you manage to shut the door and leave your cosy nest behind. Can you?! ~;))

Museums:
2' DIVA - Diamonds
5' MoMu - Fashion
10' MAS - Antwerp history
15' MUHKA - Modern Art
20' FOMU - Photography
22’ Central Station

The space
‘Op Den Spieghel’ is a newly renovated, fully equipped rooftop aerie/loft with fantastic views out onto this beautiful city, often called the Manhattan of the 16th Century.

The building is secure and has a lift. Our small loft (65m2) includes a fully equipped kitchen, a dining/living area, a toilet, a bedroom with queen-sized boxspring bed (feather duvet) and en-suite bathroom with bath and shower.
neighborhood_overview:
—
‘Op Den Spieghel' is located in the very heart of historical Antwerp, next to the ‘Scheldt’, our river. Our loft is the ideal base camp for any kind of expedition, job, or adventure: Museums, art galleries, churches, cafés, coffee bars, restaurants, a great amount of authentic shops, and even an art-house cinema are all in the immediate neighbourhood.

—
Besides all these wealthy surroundings, our aerie is located in just a couple of steps away from a fantastic bakery store, some great butcher shops, an ultra-fresh fish seller, various vegan & vegetarian snack-bars and some ultra-polite mini-markets for last-moment-groceries. —Btw. Supermarkets, restaurants, take-aways and some of the best cafés in town are just one step further… all still within a 5 minutes walking distance.

—
Tip: Check ‘Susha’s Guidebook’ for an extended overview of our recommended restaurants, cafés, etc. (the results of 30 years very dedicated ‘research’…). They’re all within
host_about:
Traveling around the world as ’sales representative' for Antwerp fashion designers, or as ‘buyer’ for interior designers, made me be quite demanding regarding the places I was staying. Finding a comfortable, elegant and very tidy stay at a perfect location has always been my main goal.

When traveling for pleasure, I noticed I actually looked for the same kind of qualitative, stylish and —for sure!- authentic spots… Pleasure & business always seemed tightly connected :-)))

Starting from my own travel experiences and the encounter with so many people with various cultural backgrounds made me of course very skilled for the hosting of guests from all over the world. For business travelers, but for sure as well for my beloved friends. So, if you are looking for a kind of specific spot that provides you an ease of living in the heart of Antwerp, don’t hesitate and contact me!

CU soon?!
