name: Antwerp Centre - Shopping Meir (HV40)
description:
In centre nearby Meir, Groenplaats, Kammenstraat, Nationalestraat,
Bourla, Theaterplein and Stadsschouwburg at 100m.
Tram to Sportpaleis.

Luggage deposit before and after possible.
Self Check-In via code (in View Itinerary)

Parking
======
Free: at Sint Michielskaai at 900m
Pay: in street and public parking Oudaen at 50m

Equipped kitchen, bathroom/shower, separate toilet, a double bedroom, 2-person sofa-bed, TV, WiFi, dishwasher, wash/dry-machine.

2 elevators in building.

The space
Perfect apartment for singles, couples, friends, shopping-addicts, expats,...

Unique!
The shopping gallery belongs to the architectural heritage in post-war modernism of the architect Jean-Florian Collin. The building started on November 21st, 1952, and completed at the end of 1954.
For this special building the architect broke down the 16th-century city palace in renaissance style of the
neighborhood_overview:
50m away from the Meir - the shopping street.
250m away from Groenplaats, the Cathedral and the City Hall.
Bourla and Stadsschouwburg at 100 meter.
Public transport and public parking only 50 m away.

On Saturdays and Sundays you can walk, just 150m, to the ´Vogelenmarkt’ ('bird' market – as years ago you only found birds and rabbits) or the ‘Vreemdelingenmarkt´ (strangers’ markets). Bring your basket to buy Italian pasta, Greek pastries or Maroccon nuts!

Or just enjoy and drink a glass of cava - eat well and cheap - like the locals do. A must go in the weekend!
host_about:
I love life and the whole universe. Others describe myself as a 'positivo',  world traveler, cook. I embrace wining and dining. When exploring cultures, I look for similarities and I want to learn from differences.
Walking, jogging, reading and cooking are my hobbies... Writing is my passion. With open mind I strive for diversity and fairness.

name: Gezellig appartement in stadswoning
description:
Gezellig appartement, achter de Zoo en het Centraal Station, tussen Borgerhout en Zurenborg. Voel je helemaal thuis in Antwerpen, op je eigen verdieping met slaapkamer, leefruimte en badkamer.
Je hebt geen keuken, maar er is meer dan voldoende aanbod op wandelafstand om rustig te ontbijten, lunchen of dineren.

Let op! Op weekdagen is het niet altijd mogelijk om voor 18u in te checken. We verwelkomen jullie graag persoonlijk voor de check in en spreken hiervoor een tijdstip af samen met jullie.

The space
Het appartement maakt deel uit van onze stadswoning. Wij bewonen enkel het gelijkvloers en de eerste verdieping. De tweede verdieping is volledig voor jullie, de voordeur en trappenhal is gemeenschappelijk.

Het appartement bestaat uit een slaapkamer met dubbel bed en opbergruimte, een badkamer en aparte leefruimte met zithoek en eettafel.

Er is geen aparte keuken. We voorzien verse koffie/thee en de afwas mag je bij ons acht
neighborhood_overview: Rustige straat, heel centraal gelegen tussen stadscentrum, Borgerhout en Zurenborg. Levendige wijken met lokale horeca en winkels om te ontdekken.

X
Sumeyye, Kenan, Koray, Ada and Sem

name: Antwerp Historic City Centre (RS39)
description:
Groenplaats, Cathedral, Meir and Kammenstraat (shoppingstreets)
at 200m - Tram to Sportpaleis and bus to Boom at 150m

Self Check-in via code

Luggage deposit before / after

Parking
======
Free: Sint Michielskaai at 700m
Pay: in street and public parkings at 50m (Brabo, Groenplaats)

Flat with equipped kitchen, bathroom (shower/toilet), bedroom with 2 pers-bed, ergonomic antibacterial pillows, large wardrobe, flat-screen TV, WiFi, dishwasher, comfortable sofabed/couch

The space
The nice apartment is located in a quiet street 50 meters from the Groenplaats and 100m from the Cathedral. In the middle of the historic center! The famous restaurant 't Fornuis is so nearby. You look at a beautiful typical Antwerp street. Around the corner the 'Friday Market' - a place where the 'locals' like to take a break at the terraces. All cafes, restaurants, shops are in the nearby streets, waiting for you ;-)
neighborhood_overview:
50 meter from the Groenplaats and Cathedral in the historic centre. Round the corner you will walk into the Meir, the Nationalestraat and Kammenstraat - the shopping walhalla!

Supermarket at 120m - under the KBC Tower

You are in the middle of restaurants, authentic bars, and historic places of interest. Do not forget to stroll next to the river Schelde or visit 'het steen'.

You will receive more tips and a 'homemade' walking route, which will amaze you with streets and curiosities where no other tourist will go.

During weekend we recommend the Vogelmarkt and Vreemdelingenmarkt, where you can drink a glass (or more) Cava or do your groceries ...
host_about:
I love life and the whole universe. Others describe myself as a 'positivo',  world traveler, cook. I embrace wining and dining. When exploring cultures, I look for similarities and I want to learn from differences.
Walking, jogging, reading and cooking are my hobbies... Writing is my passion. With open mind I strive for diversity and fairness.

name: Private apartment in Antwerp for five people
description:
Newly renovated apartment with modern kitchen, two bedrooms, a living room and a clean bathroom. and a lot of light in a quiet and pleasant urban neighbourhood. Both bedrooms are light and modern and there's possibility for storing personal belongings.

It's easy to find close-by and free parking in the area and it's close to the highway with easy access to neighbouring cities. City center is a 20 minute busride away, buses go every 15 minutes and the busstop is a 2 minute walk away.

Guest access
The two top floors of the house have been renovated into an apartment and guests have access to their bedroom and all other common areas on those floors.

Other things to note
House rules:
- No parties or events
- Turn off the lights when you leave
- Always lock the doors when you leave or enter
- The apartment isn't fit for children younger than 12
- No pets allowed
- Absolutely no smoking allowed on the p
neighborhood_overview:
It's a calm and quite urban neighbourhood, located closely to three main Antwerp hospitals: St. Augustinus hospital, Middelheim hospital and Antwerp University hospital.

Other than that, the supermarket is a five minute walk from the front door. Around the corner there's a beautiful park with a lake, perfect for a stroll or picnic in spring or summer.

name: Appartement ensoleillé à Anvers (Wilrijk)
description:
Appartement très agréable, avec une superbe vue dans un quartier résidentiel et verdoyant.
Situé à 15 minutes du centre ville.
Hôpitaux à 5 minutes à pied.
Commerces, pharmacie et super-marché à côté.
Transports en commun à proximité: bus et tram. Vélos citadins en location en bas de l'immeuble.
Accueil chaleureux et multilingue.
Idéal pour 1 ou 2 voyageurs.

The space
Ce logement entièrement rénové est situé dans un havre de paix et de verdure, tout près du parc du Middelheim, célèbre pour ses sculptures les unes plus belles que les autres. Début août, s'y déroule le très couru festival de jazz.
L'appartement est baigné d'une lumière magnifique et les couchers de soleil valent le détour.
Possibilité d'un petit déjeuner continental moyennant un supplément.

Guest access
Chambre séparée, avec une terrasse orientée plein sud, salle de douche privée avec lavabo, essuies fournis, sèche-cheveux, etc.
WC

Quartier très calme, résidentiel, proximité transports publics, tram et bus.

Possibilité de louer des vélos de la ville à 100 m de la résidence.

name: Blue suite (with garage)
description:
It is a beautiful 110 m2 apartment in the city center of Antwerp, located in serene square close to a lively neighbourhood with to the most important shopping areas, musea, restaurants, nightlife and the city parc.
There is an availability for car parking ( max. height 1.70 )
City bike card for two persons.
Come over and enjoy the most amazing sunset from our little terras.

The space
It is a light and spacious appartment with a very romantic terrace in a very quite area. The house was build in 1820. The ceilings are over 4 meter high, big windows and a very pleasant atmosphere. Baby crib available.

Guest access
the whole appartement
neighborhood_overview: It is in the middle of the centre close to the most interesting musea, shops (fashiondistrict), great restaurants, market and parcs
host_about:
Hi I'm Hilde and I work constantly in the Belgian showbizz world, so often that it makes more sense to rent the apartment in between seaside visits. 

I am a fan of theater/film, literature, cooking and the Italian dolce vita. At home, I have a dog & 2 cats, and a ton of siblings (who also like to visit me at the coast...). 

My visits are filled with beach strolls with my dog, stocking up on good food, taking the time to cook elaborate healthy meals, drinking coffee and reading the newspapers... all while enjoying the salty sea air. The languorous pace allows me to relax completely before the rigors of the work week start again.

If you're new to the Belgian coast, I highly recommend "garnalkroketten" or "croquettes de crevettes"... aka shrimp croquettes. They are delicious and a local delicacy.

Perfect place to stay for either Holiday or Business activities.

The space

Feel free to take a look around and contact me if yo

City tax in Antwerp is €2,5/pppn. This can be taken care of at check in.

name: Big and bright room in nice residential area.
description:
Een kamer in een woning die gelegen is in de residentiële rand van Antwerpen. Je kan hier parkeren met een dagticket van 2,70 € en je bent op 17 min. / 1,60 € met het de tram in het centrum van de stad. Velo standplaats (stadsfietsen die je kan huren) is op 500 m van mijn woning.

The space
Mijn huis is gelegen in de residentiële rand van Antwerpen. Je hebt er je eigen kamer en de rest van het huis deel je met mij. Er verblijven geen andere gasten.

Een verblijf in mijn huis heeft volgende voordelen :
* het is een heel rustige buurt
* op 500 meter van het park Rivierenhof
* vele mogelijkheden om met het openbaar vervoer naar het centrum van de stad te gaan op 17 min. en voor 1,60 €
* op 500 m is er een Velo standplaats (verhuur stadsfietsen)
*cafés, restaurants, supermarkt, bakker, … alles op wandelafstand
* op slechts 1 km van het Wijnegem Shopping center (250 winkels)
* een volledig geïnstalleerde keuken beschikbaar
neighborhood_overview: Zie hierboven
host_about: It's always a pleasure to let people stay in my house and to let them experience the Belgium way of living ;-)

name: Charming bedroom with double bed in Antwerp
description:
Newly renovated apartment with modern kitchen, two bedrooms, a living room and a clean bathroom. and a lot of light in a quiet and pleasant urban neighbourhood. If you rent one of the bedrooms, you won't have access to the other one, unless you rent the whole apartment. It's easy to find close-by and free parking in the area. City center is a 20 minute busride away, buses go every 15 minutes and the busstop is a 2 minute walk away.

Guest access
You have access to your own private bedroom and will be able to lock the door to this bedroom with the key I will give to you upon arrival. There's a couch which can be transformed into a single bed in the common area, which can be used by a third person, provided you pay the fee of 20 additional euros for this extra person.
You also have access to the common areas: the kitchen, the livingroom and the bathroom. You don't have access to the second private bedroom.

Other things to note
House rule
neighborhood_overview: It's a calm and quite urban neighbourhood, located closely to three main Antwerp hospitals: St. Augustinus hospital, Middelheim hospital and Antwerp University hospital. Other than that, the supermarket is a five minute walk from the front door. Around the corner there's a beautiful park with a lake, perfect for a stroll or picnic in spring or summer.

Furnished for all comfort with TV, WIFI, fitted kitchen with dishwasher, Nespresso machine and a terrace, it is ideal for discovering Antwerp.

The space
An open, very light room with underfloor heating, a fully equipped kitchen with dishwasher, induction cooker, combi oven and Nespresso coffee machine.

Downstairs there is a lounge area with seat and TV and a dining room that borders the terrace. The small but extremely charming terrace makes it possible to sit outside to eat
.
With a staircase you reach the sleeping area. There is a double bed.
A spacious rain shower, sink and canned cabinet provide all the comfort. A washing-dryer machine is at the disposal of our guests.
There are towels provided in the kitchen as well as in the bathroom. Also the comfortable bed is fully m
neighborhood_overview: A cozy alley near a bustling neighborhood with the interactive brewery museum of the famous beer De Koninck (the Bolleke), delicious restaurants and famous cheese shop Van Tricht, DeLaet & VanHaver butcher, Kenny Van Hoorick bakery, .... Near a tram stop which take you to the center of Antwerp or the station. Nearby are also 2 parks. The lively South, the Groenplaats, the Meir are almost 10 minutes by public transport.

name: Beautiful recently renovated private DUPLEX
description:
Wonderful large renovated duplex in the heart of Antwerp (114 m²). Well located whereby everything is within walking distance. Nearby you will find a wide range of great places for lunch, dinner and/or drinks.

All amenities you will need, are provided. Enjoy the sunny terrace of 25m² (!).

I'm looking forward to welcome you in my duplex and give you all tips you need about Antwerp. If you have further questions, please feel free to contact me.

The space
Due to the fact that the living space is divided over two floors, this duplex is spacious by which a lot of privacy is created. It's located in the center of Antwerp, although you will notice that you can experience the silence inside and at the terrace. The terrace is partially enclosed whereby an enjoyable temperature is created. Because of this, you can perfectly sit outside from April until October.

Guest access
You may use all rooms.

description:
You're welcome to stay in my cozy vintage design house, conveniently located in the old part of the city. The room is elegantly furnished with vintage design items and has a new bed. All shopping streets, tourist sights and restaurants/bars are within walking distance from my place, public transport at 150m. Wi-Fi available.

The space
Ground floor has a fully equiped kitchen, large refrigerator, dining table, balcony and toilet.
Second floor has a shared bathroom with bath, shower, sink and toilet.
Your room is located on the third floor. It has a cozy reading corner where you can relax and plan all your activities. The room has a new double comfortable bed and an extra single bed to jump into the night.

Bed linen, towels and bathroom necessities are at your disposal.

Guest access
- Kitchen
- Refrigerator
- Shared toilet
- Shared bathroom

Optional:

neighborhood_overview: The house is situated in the centre of beautiful and lively Antwerp. "Groenplaats" and Great Market square with Cathedral and City Hall are less than 5 minutes away. Antwerps largest shopping areas "Meir" and "Wilde Zee" are at 150m.  You will be right in the middle of "'t Zuid" with it's many design shops, musea and art galeries, and "'t Eilandje", Antwerps new hot spot area in the north with the MAS museum as landmark building. Room on first floor with one double bed for a good quiet sleep. The house is very light. Our little garden has sun all day. the bathroom and kitchen are shared. The Tram and bus station are 2 min walk away. 20 min from central station. The south, with all the museums and restaurants, antique stores is 15 min by tram . Food supply 2 min walk away. You can walk to the middelheim museum park and the Brandt park in about 10 min. Brussels is only 35 min by car.

The space
House with old elements from 1927. Wooden floors, lot of light. Old bathtub. The house is east/ west orientated and we have morning light in the kitchen/ bathroom. The sleeping room has sunlight in morning.

Guest access
You will have access to the bathroom with bathtub. The kitchen is next to the garden, where you can have breakfast in the morning sun. You room is east / west orientated , so you will have a beautiful light during the day.

name: at HOME
description:
ANTWERP 🌴URBAN JUNGLE🌴
Welcomes Friendly People from around the World

Experience living in this authentic Townhouse of a Flemish Family!

Built in 1907 with plenty of Original Elements and recently renovated to offer all Modern Comfort.

FASHION & SHOPPING
Ann Demeulemeester 2km
Dries Van Noten 2,5km
de Meir 2,5km

ART
De Singel: 500m
Musea: 1,5km
Art Galleries: 2km

KIDS
Trampoline: 0m
Playgarden: 50m
Zoo: 3km

SPORT
Olympic Swimming Pool: 500m
Yoga: 500m

NATURE
Park: 50m
Sea: 90km

The space
A house built in 1907 and recently provided by all modern comfort....
We adore the spirit & good karma and would like to share it with you!

Guest access
You will have access to ALL spaces in the house but it might be that we stay on the topfloor or first floor.

Other things to note
neighborhood_overview:
The Markgrave district is a major neighborhood that was aimed at a wealthy bourgeoisie of magistrates, traders, artists, renters and unmarried ladies in the 19th century.
In terms of typology, the classic citizen's home dominates the basement or bell-floor. It is a stately quarter where streets like Markgravelei, Bosmanslei, Arthur Goemaerelei and Van Putlei are distinguished by the residential, monumental buildings of the late 19th and early 20th centuries. The chic facades of the neighborhood tell the glorious past of the neighborhood.
The Hof van Leysen and the Domain Hertoghe form open green areas that break the dense building. The St. Laurentius church adds a monumental accent to the scenography of the street.
host_about:

host_about: Hi, my name is Alexandra and I am a 29-year old with a passion for cooking and travelling (surprise!). I love to explore new countries and cultures. During my travels I’ve met a lot of interesting people, and what better way to feel a little like I’m abroad by becoming an Airbnb host!

name: PM87 - Modern, stylish home - 100% disinfected!
description:
* COVID -19: The flat is disinfected after each stay with 70% alcohol disinfectant. See details under 'Other things to note'.
Our lovely one-bedroom apartment is located centrally, just 5 minutes of a walk to the charming Eilandje and MAS museum. The kitchen is fully equipped. Netflix is available. Our bathroom has a rainshower and there is a washing machine. A rental city bike station is just in front. It is a great basis to explore the city, and you will find all you need here for a nice stay!

The space
Our apartment has been renovated with an eye for detail. The black kitchen is custom-designed and made by an architect and is at the centre of the apartment, as it deserves to be. The cups, glasses, and plates are carefully chosen from tasteful brands, just like the bedlinen, towels, and other objects. The bathroom is a delight to refresh yourself in the morning, with the beautiful marble top, rain shower, and the shower radio. It is suitable up to 4 person
neighborhood_overview: Our neighbourhood is a lively, hip area, with lots of restaurants, cafe's bars, and of course the MAS museum, and a little further, the Red Starline Museum. There is a large and a small supermarket within 2-3 minutes of a walk from to the apartment.
host_about: I live in Antwerp since 2001 and became a real local in the meantime. I love this city and enjoy living in the close proximity to all kinds of nice cafe's, restaurants, theathers, summer bars, stores, etc! In my free time, I like cooking, reading, watching films, spending time with friends, exploring new spots in and outside Antwerp. For sure you can count on me to get good advice on where to eat or go to, from fine dining to the most child-friendly places. I live almost next door to the apartment, together with my husband and two young children. After working for 15 years in a multinational company, mainly as Customer Service Manager, I have decided in 2017 to have some time off to spend with my family and follow my passions, and possibly make an own business out of it in the future. This also gave me the extra time to be able rent this apartment to guests, so that they can enjoy the space and this wonderful city. The apartment was originally meant for our family and friends visiting us from abroad, but we thought it will be a pity not to share it with others when it is not occupied. Hope you will like and cherish it as much as we do.  And hope to meet you soon!

name: Charmante kamer in guesthouse 'Mañana Mañana'
description:
Mañana Mañana is een recent geopende, kleinschalige, gezellige guesthouse gelegen in de trendy wijk Zuid in Antwerpen en biedt 4 charmant ingerichte kamers met eigen badkamer. De kamers stralen veel sfeer uit door de aangename lichtinval, de authentieke houten vloer, de wit stenen muren en de met veel zorg uitgezochte inrichting. De 4 kamers zijn bereikbaar via de trap.

Op het gelijkvloers hebben we recent een koffiebar/daytime café geopend. Daar kan je terecht voor ontbijt & lunch.

Guest access
Naast de toegang tot je eigen kamer, mag je ook gebruik maken van het terras op het 3e tussenverdiep. En van zodra de koffiebar/daytime café op het gelijkvloers open is, kan je ook daar gezellig vertoeven of drankjes bestellen voor op de kamer.

Other things to note
Elke verdieping heeft 1 kamer, en alle kamers zijn bereikbaar via de trap. Als je slecht te been bent, dan vraag je best onze kamer op de 1e verdieping.
neighborhood_overview:
- heel gezellige buurt met veel leuke cafeetjes, koffiebars en restaurants
- aangenaam vertoeven, niet te druk en niet te rustig
- slechts een 20tal minuten wandelen naar grote markt, kathedraal, Groenplaats, winkelcentrum
- vlakbij de Kloosterstraat, waar je vele vintage en antiek meubelwinkels vindt, het is een heel fijne straat om originele interieurspullen te gaan zoeken
host_about:
Sinds midden september (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) , zijn mijn partner en ik begonnen aan een nieuw avontuur: ‘Mañana Mañana’. Het is een kleinschalig hotel/guesthouse/logies met 4 charmante kamers met eigen badkamer en op het gelijkvloers een gemoedelijke koffiebar & daytime café. De publieke opening van de koffiebar is voorzien voor dit voorjaar!

‘Mañana Mañana’ is ontstaan vanuit het idee dat we allen meer moeten leren genieten van het leven van vandaag. In de huidige maatschappij gaat alles heel snel. Soms té snel. Af en toe is het dus niet slecht om te leven volgens de Spaanse mentaliteit, en enkele taken uit te stellen naar morgen. Zo kan je ruimte maken om te genieten van kleine dingen: een me-time momentje met een lekkere koffie, een ontspannend boek lezen, een jog-momentje om je hoofd leeg te maken, een weekendje weg met je partner in een gezellig hotelletje ...

We moeten echt meer tijd maken voor onszelf, wat vertragen, genieten van het kleine geluk, stilstaan bij hetgeen waarmee we bezig zijn, ons realiseren dat we vandaag leven, dromen proberen waar te maken en beseffen dat er nog andere dingen in het leven zijn dan rushen, stressen en deadlines halen. 

Zo heb je ons verhaal al in een notendop. We werken nog volop aan onze website en (Hidden by Airbnb) page. Maar wil je ‘Mañana Mañana’ in real life al leren kennen, boek dan alvast een kamer & take a moment to enjoy the moment…

name: Comfortable room near De Singel
description:
Spacious, cosy room in green area!

We are Lise & Eli and we live in a spacious apartment together with our cat Jabba. Lise likes designing houses & Eli likes taking care of the plants.

The house is situated South of the centre of Antwerp. Tram stop is 3-min walk from the house and brings you to the city center in 15 mins.

Ideal for a shopping/seighseeing trip or to pick a concert at the concert hall "Sportpaleis." Business travellers will appreciate the workdesk and fast (broadband) wifi.

The space

The bedroom of the apartment has a balcony and looks over the garden with trees. The bedroom has also digital tv.

The kitchen is fully equiped american kitchen.

- Sportpaleis (concert hall) 1.5 km (2 stops)
- Antwerp Central station 1.4 km (3 stops)
- Meir

The tram/metro station is at 240 metres from the apartment.

name: Spacious Suite in Antwerp
description:
Part of a masterfully restored late 19th century townhouse, this 2nd floor private suite is probably one of the cosiest places you'll ever stay. Centrally located, ideal for solo travellers or couples who want to discover Antwerp, or for business travelers looking for a convenient and private place. An en suite large bathroom with full bath incl. shower, double sink and all amenities. A two-person bed, sofa, flat screen TV with blu-ray player, Apple TV and surround sound system, free WiFi.

Guest access
Guests have the entire floor of the house to themselves. The private suite is fully separated and self-contained. The stairwell is shared with house residents. Please carry luggage on the hand rail side of the stairs at all times to avoid damaging the walls.

Other things to note
You should be able to walk up 2 flights of stairs; as stated, this is a 2nd floor suite. Please do approach us for more information or tips about the city!
neighborhood_overview: Our neighbourhood is generally somewhat calmer and more residential, but it's a stone's throw away from all the action in the tourist centre of Antwerp. In summertime more activities take place in the direct vicinity, ranging from urban gardening to an actual neighbourhood bar serving unique Antwerp beers, etc. - summer is when our neighbourhood really comes to life. We are proud of our tight-knit community and go the extra mile to maintain a close relationship with neighbours.
host_about:
Being too creative for a 9-to-5,  now on Airbnb because I love to travel to fresh and new destinations.

"Quality is not an act, it is a habit"

name: The knight's room
description:
Impressive historic room on a perfect downtown location in one of Antwerps oldest Monuments. The house is situated opposite the Arts Academy. Some other rooms are rented to artists.
The room is furnished with 4 brand new boxspring beds and is very quiet.
The bathroom is fully private and freshly renovated.
If you like historic houses and and artists around, we're sure you will enjoy our place!
Free bagagelockers available, you can drop off your bags before check in and go discover the city!

The space
One of Antwerps most characteristic town houses, originaly built by knight and former major of the city 'Arnold van Liere' back in 1503.
The knight's room is a majestic space with high ceilings and lots of historic elements. Cosy and with 4 brand new hotel quality boxspring beds.

Guest access
The room is easily accessible and located on the ground floor level in the back of the house.

Other things to note
neighborhood_overview:
The house is situated across Antwerps royal academy for fine arts, where famous painter Rubens used to study and teach at the time.
Ideally located to discover the city center on foot, yet peaceful and quiet.

name: Many Amenities ☆ Self check-in, walk from station
description:
Recently built (2018), well-equipped apartment with garden. Just a 5 min. walk from Antwerp-Berchem station, so you can drop off your bags and start seeing the sights.

Located in "het Groen Kwartier", nearby you will find: De Koninck brewery, PAKT, The Jane (two-Michelin star restaurant), city rental bikes, shops and plenty more.

Street parking is available for 5eur/day (free on sundays and after 19:00), availability can vary depending time of day.

Prices include VAT and tourist tax.

The space
- Open kitchen area with dishwasher, electric hob, oven/microwave combi and all required cooking utensils. A Nespresso coffee maker and capsules are available, along with a selection of teas, herbs and spices.

- I try and keep a selection of breakfast cereals available.

- Living room is equipped with a 55" smart tv. Relax, sit back and enjoy your Netflix shows after a day of exploring. There is also a chromecast avail
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is located in the “Groen Kwartier", a residential park centered around the repurposed buildings of Antwerp’s former Military Hospital, which date all the way back to 1899. With mostly private homes, generous green spaces and little to no motorised traffic, it is the perfect to place to unwind and escape the hustle and bustle of the city, all while keeping its conveniences right on your doorstep.

Several supermarkets, cafes and delis are just a stone’s throw away, and the neighboring boroughs of Zurenborg and Haringrode are teeming with restaurants to suit all tastes.

Nearby places of interest:
- The Jane, 2 Michelin star restaurant with a long waiting list. But in the evenings you can also try their 'drinks & bites' in the upper room bar.
- De Koninck brewery, take the tour and try the beers (discount available for guests)
- Blacksmoke, barbecue restaurant next to the brewery.
- PAKT - what was once a factory now home to various
host_about:
I'm a freelance webdeveloper living in Antwerp. When I'm not behind a computer I enjoy running and cycling. At least once a year you'll find me in the Alps enjoying the snow.

As a host I hope to provide all the positive things I've experienced travelling with airbnb.

X
Sumeyye, Kenan, Koray, Ada and Sem

name: Contemporary spacious loft with private garden.
description:
'Hidden Hoboken' is een verborgen unieke loft van 140 vierkante meter op 6 km van Antwerpen centrum en gemakkelijk bereikbaar met tram en bus. De sober ingerichte ruimtes met natuurlijke materialen stralen rust en toch luxe uit. Honden en katten welkom

The space
50 meter wandelen vanaf de straat. Privé ingang. Grote living met keuken. Badkamer met bad en douche. 1 grote slaapkamer met een afgeschermde ruimte met dressing en stapelbed. Grote privé patio. gratis parkeren .

Other things to note
Loft bevindt zich in hetzelfde gebouw van de verhuurder.
neighborhood_overview: Hoboken is the green lung of Antwerp. The renovated public swimming pool of Hoboken is about 300 meters walking from the loft. The 'Schoonselhof' and  the 'Broydenborghpark'  are worthwile to make a walk.

name: Cozy room w/ shower in historical setting
description:
Cozy bedroom with private bathroom and toilet in the historical setting of a renovated military complex.

Find some peace and quiet in this authentic private community with its own bakery, shop, restaurants and bars. Including the Michelin star restaurant The Jane and the open-air social spot PAKT with occasional DJs and events.

The space
Please note that the room is quite comfy and therefore has a double 140x200 bed.

Guest access
If I can't be present to hand over the key, I'll arrange a self check-in. Guests will be informed beforehand and receive concise instructions.

Other things to note
Airbnb asks a security deposit of €85, the minimum, which will not be charged but only temporarily blocked on your account. Duplicating our unique house key, in case of loss, is costly.
neighborhood_overview: Around the corner, you can find the trendy Zurenborg area and the heritage site Cogels-Osylei. We are also a stone's throw away from De Koninck brewery.
host_about: Come visit the metropolis of Antwerp so I can share the good vibes with you!

name: Spacious and sunny beautiful apartment
description:
An amazing big and bright apartment in the heart of Antwerp.The apartment has just been completely renovated, it is situated 2 minutes walking distance from the Central train station, the largest famous zoo, diamond area and the new Elisabeth zaal. 10 minutes walking distance from the Meir ( main shopping street).
All public transports are a minute away! Around the corner you have a big supermarket.

The space
The apartment has a big living room, fully equipped open kitchen, 2 bedrooms,a big comfy couch which can easily be transformed to an extra big one person bed, a bathroom and a separated toilet.
It is all fully furnished and has a big flat screen smart TV

Guest access
City maps, wifi code and keys are handled by us upon arrival.
We are always accessible on mobile phone!

description:
It is a very nice place that feels incredible good! You will have all you need & more.
There is a very sunny and spacious garden.
The building is located in the city center, but in a very safe and nice area.
I look for people to rent preferable for 4 months or longer. From December 2017 or January until may 2018 or longer if wanted.
The place is big enough for 4 people.
All-in: you will have a personal cleaning lady once a week, unlimited internet, TV, water, gas, electricity & a bike.

The space
It is a stylish & cosy loft apartment in an original mansion of 1912 in a safe residential area.
It includes a private entrance, a big living space with fireplace, a fully installed kitchen with dining area_kitchen island & bow.
You will have a guest toilet, bathroom with bath and shower.
The place has been renovated recently.
Nearby there a lots of shops and public transport, as well as 3 big parks.

Guest access

name: The Golden Gate {private studio - Central Station}
description:
We hebben de gastenkamer ingericht hoe we het zelf graag hebben: ruimtelijk, licht, kalmerend en met gouden accenten. Ze is gelegen in een apart gebouw op het gelijkvloers met afzonderlijke ingang en een terrasje, zodat je privé zit.

We decorated the studio how we would like a room: spacious, light, calming and with a touch of gold. The guestroom is located in a separate building on the ground floor with own entrance and a terrace, so you can enjoy in privacy.

The space
Onze studio is licht, ruimtelijk en stijlvol ingericht voor een aangenaam verblijf in het centrum van Antwerpen. De kamer ligt op het gelijkvloers in een apart gebouw, je zit dus volledig privé.

Guest access
De gastenkamer en badkamer zijn gelegen op het gelijkvloers in een apart gebouw en is dus volledig privé.

Other things to note
Please don’t smoke in the studio or in the doorway.
Our neighboors sleep with their window open and suffe
neighborhood_overview: De studio is gelegen op het gelijkvloers in een bruisende wijk, 600m van het Centraal Station, 1500m van het MAS op het Eilandje en 1800m van de Groenplaats en Kathedraal.
host_about:
Wij zijn Dietrich en Sofie, uitgeweken Kempenaars naar de Koekenstad. 
We wonen in een rustig achterhuis aan het De Coninckplein en genieten van het stadsleven.
We geven je graag tips over te bezoeken restaurants, verborgen historische parels en als barista geeft Dietrich je uitgebreid uitleg over leuke koffiebars en lunchplekjes. 
Wees welkom!

De ruimte

De accomodatie is een rustige, lichte kamer met privé-badkamer. De kamer ligt gescheiden van ons huis, zodat je in alle privacy kan genieten van je verblijf.
Gelegen in een bruisende buurt van de stad, heeft u vanaf hier de perfecte uitvalsbasis om de binnenstad te bereiken.

Openbaar vervoer op 150 meter.
Historisch centrum en Eilandje zijn vlot bereikbaar.

Antwerpen-Centraal (500 meter)
Beer Lovers Bar (100 meter)
Velo (150 meter)
Tram (150 meter)
Viggo’s Specialty Espresso Bar (150 meter)
Meir (1300 meter)
Park Spoor Noord (900 meter)
Cuperus Espresso & Lunchbar, best pie in town! (1000 meter)
MAS - Eilandje (1500 meter)
Historisch centrum (1800 meter)
Zuid (3000 meter)

description:
At the Britselei nearby Nationale Bank, Het Zuid, Mechelse Plein, Theaterplein, Bourla
and 1km away from the "Meir" (5 min by tram)
Tram to Sportpaleis at 150m

Quiet and peacefulness after a busy day with garden-view.

Parking
======
Free: Sint Michielskaai or Gedempte Zuiderdokken at 1 km
Pay : in street and public Parking Nationale Bank at 100 m

The flat has an oak fish-bone parquet, equipped kitchen, bathroom, toilet, double bedroom, TV 55", WiFi, dishwasher, wash+drying machine,
elevator

The space
The minute we stepped into this apartment, we fell in love!
You stay at the formerly conference room of the ‘Companie Maritime’.
The river ‘Schelde’ is the heart of Antwerp, so we are proud that the coordinating and overlooking business had their discussions at our place!

Guest access
You will have the full apartment to yourselves!

Other things to note<
neighborhood_overview:
This area is a treasure! Location is at "Britselei".

You are at walking distance (or 2 stops with the tram) from shopping area, cafes/restaurants, market in the weekend on the 'Vogelenmarkt' / 'Vreemdelingenmarkt' on the 'Theaterplein'.

You are close to the sparkling south with art galleries, fancy bars/clubs.
You can visit the 'Quartier National', the fashion heart of Antwerp!
(Fashion Museum, Kammenstraat, Dries van Noten,...)

Mechelseplein at 400 meter.
host_about:
I love life and the whole universe. Others describe myself as a 'positivo',  world traveler, cook. I embrace wining and dining. When exploring cultures, I look for similarities and I want to learn from differences.
Walking, jogging, reading and cooking are my hobbies... Writing is my passion. With open mind I strive for diversity and fairness.

name: Characteristic Attic/Suite Casa Zurenborg
description:
Cosy Attic/Suite, perfect for your stay in Antwerp. Situated on the third floor of our house "Casa Zurenborg", with private bathroom, sofa, table and corner with washbasin and microwave, in the heart of the picturesque quarter of Zurenborg. The area is unique and famous for its architecture, full of little bars and restaurants, and at only 10 minutes on foot from the train station Antwerpen-Berchem. The place is easily connected by public transport with the center and other tourist areas.

The space
Our Attic/Suite of around 35 square meter is an intimate and cosy place, with original wooden roof beams. It is situated on the third floor of our house, built in neo-flemish-renaissance style with a red brick façade, and is reachable through the common internal stairway. The automatically closing and fireproof door guarantees your privacy. The room is completely furnished and well illuminated, and has a double bed with luxury comfortable mattress. Furthermore, a woode
neighborhood_overview: Zurenborg is a picturesque and lively neighbourhood. It is a unique and protected area in Antwerp, which is famous for its Art Nouveau, Neo-Gothic and Neo-Renaissance architecture. It is full of little bars and restaurants, and is at only 10 minutes on foot from the train station Antwerpen-Berchem. The car-free square "Dageraadplaats" and the square "Draakplaats" are the animated centers of the neighbourhood, lined with bars and restaurants that are always full of local people who sip a drink while keeping an eye on their children playing in the square's playground.
host_about:
We are an Italian-Belgium family,  Paolo - Sarah and our little girls Lola and Giulia. 
Home is for us a place to enjoy warm moments together with friends, drinking a good beer or a good glass of wine.
We love to enjoy life, traveling and sharing our experiences.
"Life.. It is a trip to the unknown, to enjoy to the full extent."

Noi siamo una famiglia Italo-Belga, Paolo Sarah con le nostre piccole Lola e Giulia.
La casa per noi è un luogo caldo da condividere insieme e con amici, gustando una buona birra o un bicchiere di buon vino.
"La vita... Un Viaggio che ti porto verso l'inaspettato, da vivere pienamente."

host_about:
Hi!
I don't like to sell myself, but i'm always ready to answer a question. I like people, travelling, music(festivals), snowboarding, baseball and working on my own little projects.
Travelling for me is about seeing things that make me feel happy and meeting people that enrich the experience in any possible way.

description:
This is a 90m2 large apartment with a living room , two bedrooms , 1 bathroom , 1 toilet, a kitchen, and a dining room. The apartment is clean, comfortable and convenient. The apartment is 3 minute walk away from the train station, with a nice neighborhood as well as many fine restaurants. There is a supermarket right below the apartment.
 
Our large living room could be the perfect place for you to relax after a whole day of traveling and working. There is a big comfortable couch which will turn into a bed if you open it. The apartment consists of a fully equipped open kitchen with a wooden dining table, where you are able to prepare breakfast, lunch and dinner for yourself. Each room consists of a King-sized bed and other casual furniture with which you may feel yourself at home. The modern bathroom has a comfortable shower and a separate toilets. The apartment has high-speed Wi-Fi connection. The apartment is on the third floor. There isn't a lift, however a little

name: BoHo city House (easy parking)
description:
We offer you two very big private apartments in an old mansion.

There are two bathrooms, kitchens, living and two bedrooms and so perfect for bigger groups!

We have free parking in our street and the citybike just around the corner.
Everything what you need and a little bit more...

The apartments are very carefully designed by the owner and we offer you a free city map and nice books to discover Antwerp on pictures before you start your real trip!

We hope to see you soon!

neighborhood_overview:
Borgerhout, or BoHo is the place to be! Very multicultural and with a lot of good fish restaurants and nice bars!

We are living in a very quite neighborhood, in a multi culti street!
host_about:
Hi there,

I'm Sumeyye. Me and my family live in BoHo (Borgerhout) in a very old mansion build in 1925 and that we renovated in 2016.
We bought this house to have more space for the childeren and our hobbies, but currently it's to big with three small children and that's why we deside to rent the two upper floors, till we are in need for this extra space. But for now we love to share it with you!

Come and meet us!

X
Sumeyye, Kenan, Koray, Ada and Sem

It is situated on the second floor of our house, built in neo-flemish-renaissance style with a red brick façade, and is reachable through the common internal stairway. The automatically closing and fireproof door guarantees your privacy. The room is completely furnished and well illuminated, and has a double bed and a single bed with luxury comfortable mattress. There is a k
neighborhood_overview: Zurenborg is a picturesque and lively neighbourhood. It is a unique and protected area in Antwerp, which is famous for its Art Nouveau, Neo-Gothic and Neo-Renaissance architecture. It is full of little bars and restaurants, and is at only 10 minutes on foot from the train station Antwerpen-Berchem. The car-free square "Dageraadplaats" and the square "Draakplaats" are the animated centers of the neighbourhood, lined with bars and restaurants that are always full of local people who sip a drink while keeping an eye on their children playing in the square's playground.
host_about:
We are an Italian-Belgium family,  Paolo - Sarah and our little girls Lola and Giulia. 
Home is for us a place to enjoy warm moments together with friends, drinking a good beer or a good glass of wine.
We love to enjoy life, traveling and sharing our experiences.
"Life.. It is a trip to the unknown, to enjoy to the full extent."

Noi siamo una famiglia Italo-Belga, Paolo Sarah con le nostre piccole Lola e Giulia.
La casa per noi è un luogo caldo da condividere insieme e con amici, gustando una buona birra o un bicchiere di buon vino.
"La vita... Un Viaggio che ti porto verso l'inaspettato, da vivere pienamente."

neighborhood_overview: Antwerp is Belgium’s second largest city, has the biggest port and is the capital of coal. It has long been a powerful magnet for everyone from fashion moguls and club queens to art lovers and diamond dealers. In the mid-16th century it was one of Europe’s most important cities and home to baroque superstar painters like Pieter Paul Rubens. Despite many historical travails thereafter and severe WWII bombing, Antwerp retains an intriguing medieval heart with plenty of café-filled cobbled lanes, a riverside fortress and a truly impressive Cathedral. Today, however, Antwerp’s top drawcards are its vibrant fashion and entertainment scene, booming diamond businesses along with its startling architectural and cultural contrasts.

description:
My cosy lofty style apartment is located in the heart of the 2060 district, only 550m from the central station. Situated on the third floor, it offers a nice view on the De Coninckplein, an upcoming area within the district. The apartment is one of 6 in a smaller new city building and thus offers a nice and quite retreat within the city buzz.

The space

neighborhood_overview:
I love living is this lively colourful neighbourhood. Right in the heart of the 2060 district , close to the train station and
historical city centre, this area offers you a real taste of the Antwerp life. At walking distance you will find excellent Asian resto’s, a cool coffee bar, a cosy bar and the city library.

You can stroll towards Park Spoor Noord, where you can enjoy some greenery or hang out at the local bars/resto’s. From there you can make your way towards ‘het eilandje’, where culture in all it forms are to be found ( MAS - Red Star Line museum, ...)

Every third Sunday of the month (except during Nov - Dec - Jan - Feb) one can enjoy the comics and books market underneath my place at the De Coninckplein

You will find everything your travellers heart desires
host_about:
Hi fellow airbnb’ers, 

My name is Leen. I live in Antwerp, a beautiful city in the heart of Flanders. I frequently travel for work and pleasure, and therewith enjoy taking the off the beaten track. During my travels and while making use of Airbnb, hosts have experienced me as a very respectful and responsible guest. 
In my role as a host, I offer my guests a comfortable, clean and completely equipped  home from where they can enjoy the city. 
I’m a true fan off guests and hosts who respect and also value these standards, as I believe it can make our abroad experience more complete.

name: Spacious apartment at 'Den Dam' for two
description:
Spacious apartment in the city of Antwerp, appr. 3km away from the city centre (Groenplaats) . The perfect place for two people who'd like to discover Antwerp and stay in a hip and trendy neighbourhood.
It's only 3 minutes walking to Park Spoor Noord where in summer there's a pop-up bar and lots of chilling spots. Above all, the MAS is only 2km away from this amazing place.

The space
This apartment is on the third floor of the building, but there is an elevator to get you up easily. On the ground floor there's a very good sandwich bar for a quick snack or fruit juice.

We offer a FREE PARKING spot in the basement where you can park your car in all safety.

We don't allow animals for hygiene reasons nor smoking inside, but there is a terrace where you can.

For your comfort, there's a washing machine, dryer and ironing board with iron to your disposal. Moreover, there's a dish washer installed in the kitchen, free wifi all over
neighborhood_overview:
Precious new life was breathed into an abandoned 24-hectare railway marshalling yard in 2008/9 when the Park Spoor Noord opened. Now a large panoramic green park emphasising greenery, light, space, leisure, culture, sport and events.
It boasts play areas, a spectacular BMX and skate bowl, two cooling water fountains for children to splash in and a shelter with a temporary summer terrace, run by Bar Cargo, which sees the trendy set settling in - in the summer! Antwerpers sun their bodies, play and relax in this gem of a park - Park Spoor Noord, almost unimaginable in a city.

Leuke bel-etagewoning uit de jaren 50 recent gerenoveerd. Je hebt veel licht en ruimte en tevens een groot terras op het westen met zicht op de tuin. Voor het huis beschik je over een voortuintje met gratis prive parkeerplaats.

Guest access
De tuin en de garage zijn niet toegankelijk voor gasten.
Alsook de buffetkast op de 1ste verdieping en de ingemaakte kast op de 2de verdieping.
neighborhood_overview:
De woning is gelegen nabij het Eksterlaar. Een prima uitvalsbasis voor een citytrip in Antwerpen.

-PARKEN in de buurt : Boekenbergpark met z n gratis zwemvijver, Rivierenhof met z n loopparkour + openluchttheater en Boelaerpark

-MUSEA in de buurt : Stampe en Vertongen museum, Natuurhistorische museum Boekenberg en Renaat Braemhuis
-Download de Antwerp Museum App

-Gratis krant van je land lezen via een tablet in Bibliotheek Arena

-UIT : Lotto Arena, OLT Openluchttheater in park Rivierenhof
en (de) Roma

-SHOPPEN : Shopping Wijnegem

name: Cute Cozy Apartment Central Antwerp
description:
Cute, charming and modern apartment right in the city center, surrounded by fashion stores and hip coffee-shops. The kitchen is fully equipped and we supply fresh linen, towels and all essentials.

Located very close to the famous shopping street Meir and the main-squares "Groenplaats" and "Grote Markt". The best possible location for a visit to Antwerp!

The Central station is a 15-20min walk and there's a free parking area at the Waalse Kaai on a 10min walk.

Hopefully I'll see you soon! :-)

The space
Our apartments are decorated to make you feel at home. We want to give you a warm, enjoyable and relaxing place to rest while exploring our beautiful city. Our apartment is equipped with all essentials for a comfortable trip. Eg. a fully equipped kitchen, fresh bedlinnen and towels for each guest, shower gel, shampoo and conditioner, coffee, tea, hair dryer etc.

Guest access
The apartment is completely privat
neighborhood_overview: Antwerp is Belgium’s second largest city, has the biggest port and is the capital of coal. It has long been a powerful magnet for everyone from fashion moguls and club queens to art lovers and diamond dealers. In the mid-16th century it was one of Europe’s most important cities and home to baroque superstar painters like Pieter Paul Rubens. Despite many historical travails thereafter and severe WWII bombing, Antwerp retains an intriguing medieval heart with plenty of café-filled cobbled lanes, a riverside fortress and a truly impressive Cathedral. Today, however, Antwerp’s top drawcards are its vibrant fashion and entertainment scene, booming diamond businesses along with its startling architectural and cultural contrasts.
host_about: Hello, my name is Elisabeth! I've travelled around the world and lived abroad for a couple of years. Now my goal is to accomodate others in amazing apartments in the very heart of our beautiful city! :-)

description:
Ruime & mooie studio in centrum van Antwerpen tussen vele winkels gelegen (diamantenbuurt, enz...). 1 minuut te voet van Centraal Station, China Town, Zoo Antwerpen en Koningin Elisabethzaal, 3 minuten te voet van Meir en 5 minuten van Groenplaats, het historische centrum van Antwerpen. Ideaal om Antwerpen te bezoeken. Handig voor bezoekers van het Sportpaleis. Met tram 2, 3 en 6 (werking van 6u tot 00u) bent u in 7 minuten al bij het Sportpaleis. Studio is perfect voor koppels.

The space
Once northern Europe’s greatest city, today Antwerp is one of its best-kept secrets. Flanders’ unofficial capital is laden with historic riches and home to world-class arts and design, and this year it’s showing its cultural chops with a celebration of its Baroque heyday. Inspired by the city’s most famous resident, Rubens, Antwerp Baroque 2018 will feature Flemish Masters rubbing shoulders with modern talent in a calendar that spans parades, concerts, street art, multimedia sho
neighborhood_overview:

name: Charlie’s Loft (Bed and Breakfast)
description:
Volledige nieuwe luxe-loft op een toplocatie: gelegen in de centraal gelegen art-deco wijk van Antwerpen-zuid omringd door mooie boetiekjes, musea, leuke restaurants en café’s.
Openbaar vervoer voor de deur.
De loft kenmerkt zich door luxe, hygiëne en kwaliteitsvolle producten. Ontbijt beschikbaar in de loft of koffiebar. De bijhorende koffiebar werd uitgeroepen tot ‘Beste ontbijt-koffiebar van Vlaanderen 2014-2017’.

The space
De verhuurde ruimte is een volledige loft ter grootte van 92m2 waarvan 12m2 gezellig terras. De loft beschikt over een mooi afgewerkte keuken, een gezellig salon, aparte toilet, badkamer volledig in marmeren tegels en regendouche en open slaapkamer die wel afgezonderd wordt door een gangpad. De loft kenmerkt zich door enorm hoge grote ramen waardoor er zéér veel lichtinval is.
De hoge plafonds van meer dan 3.60m maken deze loft uniek voor dergelijke locatie.
De loft beschikt over wifi en televisie.

Guest
neighborhood_overview:
Het Antwerpse Zuid kenmerkt zich door zijn art-deco stijl. Hier zijn tal van restaurants en café's aanwezig. In deze wijk ga je de kleinere en unieke boetieks vinden i.p.v. de grote winkelketens.
Een supermarkt is vlakbij en ook het openbaar vervoer (tram/bus) stopt in de straat.
Enkele zéér populaire musea (Museum van Schone Kunsten, Fotomuseum, Modemuseum) liggen vlakbij.
De Volkstraat is dan weer gekend voor zijn unieke horeca zaken, winkels (check Steen en Been) en zijn breedte van de straat waardoor dit een prachtig zicht geeft op het nieuwe Vlinderpaleis (Justitiepaleis).
host_about:
Beste,
Ik ben Charlotte, uitbaatster van koffiebar Charlie's die ook gelegen is in dezelfde straat als de Bed and Breakfast.
Onze loft die te huur staat is gericht op kwaliteit, hygiëne, toplocatie, verwennerij en mogelijkheid tot een origineel en luxe ontbijt.
De prijsklasse ligt dan ook hoger dan een gewone kamer maar de unieke ervaring die je hierbij ervaart in deze prachtige loft proberen we dan ook te accentueren.
Ons team staat ook steeds ter uwe beschikking tijdens de openingsuren om jullie zo goed mogelijk te ontvangen. Bij late ontvangst kan u steeds binnen met een codeslot.

Lieve groetjes,
Charlotte

name: Spacious 110 m2 and Cosy in Belle Epoque District.
description:
GULDENVLIESSTRAAT 15, GROUND FLOOR
The apartment is located in Antwerp’s splendid Art-Deco / Art Nouveau Zurenborg district. Famous for it's achitecture and grandeur.
The apartment is spacious (110m²) with a fully equipped kitchen: Refrigerator and freezer, dishwasher, oven, microwave and all the necessary tools to make a nice meal for yourself. Salt and pepper to spice your food ….
3 separate bedrooms, with 4 single beds whitch you can move as pleasing.
A nice garden to sit outside in summer.

The space
If you plan a visit with small children or even a baby, you will find the apartment an excellent chose. The second bedroom is well equipped with various toys. (toys for children up to 12 years old) Family games, dvd player and music installation.
The apartment is CO² neutral. The solar panels on the roof provide electricity for the floor-heating and the ventilation systeem. All the furniture (finest quality) is selected in second hand sh
neighborhood_overview:
You will find loads of lovely cosmopolitan shops and supermarkets just around the corner. In a periphery of 10 minutes you will find organic breakfast cafés, veggie and vegan lunch facilities and amazing African and Asian restaurants.
I can provide you with addresses you must visit....for a taste of Belgum....
You can also use the various info of museums and places to visit.
host_about:
HELLO 
My name is An.
I am 37 years old and live in Antwerp, with my two kids and husband.
Living without being able to garden would not work for me. Growing my own vegetables, herbs and fruits is my healthy addiction. Cooking these fruit and veg another. When the Belgian weather doesn’t make a gardener happy and I have to stick indoors, you will find me reading endlessly. Mainly historical fiction novels, which I tend to spice with some scientific non-fiction.
I love to swim and run….and scan second-hand shops and flee markets. When I discover something lying in the streets or materials my neighbors or friend true out, I will confiscate them to turn them into something “NEW”. Maybe you can discover some of these lovely treasures when you visit my place.
I am looking forward meeting you.

Simone's Kitchen Home Restaurant and B&B is a place to feel at home, where you can sleep well and eat organic balanced delicious home cooked meals.

Right in the centre of Antwerp, located in a quiet street, you will find a 100 year old house with renewed interior that contains a homely restaurant B&B, with home-style meals prepared by Simone, all healthy, balanced flavour journeys, friendly for everyone; environment and animal.

The space
Get a full-experience of this by coming to our B&B, where breakfast is served upon request dinner Wednesday through Saturday, and Sunday brunch is served from 10am-2pm.

The homely feel continues into our rooms, which are newly outfitted and refinished, with two beds which can be made up as singles (90 x 200cm), or as a double bed (180 x 200 cm), made up with 100% Egyptian cotton, 400 thread count bed linen, and an ensuite bathroom. Acoustic isolated floors, new sanitary, home feeling lighting, cradle to crad

Private floor for 5 people in a recently renovated townhouse situated in the heart of the historic center and Antwerp Fashion District.

100m from the Groenplaats and the Cathedral of our Lady. All major sights can be discovered on foot.

Within walking distance of the Meir, The Nationalestraat and more you are surrounded by the hippest shopping areas of Antwerp.

In this neighborhood, you will find plentiful of museums, shops, restaurants, bars and clubs. In short, you will never be bored!

The space

Enjoy your stay with us 👨‍👩‍👧

The space
You will have a private room in our apartment.

There is a small table+chair in the room for reading. Also a mirror and small drawer in the corner of the room.

The bathroom is just in front of your room ‘easy access’, & the toilet is separated in the entrance of the apartment.

Other things to note
Please remember

name: TheDUPLEX(+terrace!): Nature&City life of Antwerp!
description:
Luxury and spacious Duplex apartment!
FREE PRIVATE PARKINGS, TERRACE, No LEZ!

Recommended for friends, families and business people.
You can enjoy the city & night life of Antwerp->can be reached by metro, car or bicycle (5 km) in 20 minutes.
All cultural activities (eg'TRIX',Sportpaleis, 'LOTO, 'ROMA',)are close by!
Located in the peaceful&green part of Antwerp; relax&sport in 1 of the 3 parks nearby.
Free outside swimming pool<1km of TheDuplex!

Looking forward to give you a warm WELCOME!
E&S

The space
THE DUPLEX apartment is all yours!

As TheDuplex is very spacious (120m2), the strength of our apartment is is to give everyone a comfortable place to sleep:
1 large room with king size bed (sleeping place for 2 persons)
1 small room with 2 single beds (sleeping place for 2 persons)
1 living room with 2 double beds (sleeping place for 4 persons), a closet, a TV & play-station and some e
neighborhood_overview:
Nearby 3 big parks (Boekenberg park, Ter Boelaerpark and Rivierenhof) where you can sport, chill and relax.
The FREE (!) outside swimming pool of Boekenberg park is located <1km to the duplex apartment!

THE DUPLEX apartment is very close to the metro station (300m), the train station (4km) and to the airport (3km). It is possible to rent a bike for only 4 euro/day (VELO ANTWERP - you can register for the bikes online)

ENJOY and COMBINE the city life of Antwerp with the green and peaceful environment around the apartment!
host_about:
Hello, my name is Stig and I’m 30 years old. Last year, I am married with my wife and this year, our baby girl is born.
We love to travel around the world, to meet new people and to see new places. 
We also lived and studied already in a lot of places in Belgium (Ghent, Ostend, Antwerp, Bruges) so we can give you a lot of information about all the cities in Belgium if you want to do a roadtrip :). 

Looking forward to meet you!
Greetings Stig

name: Feel Home
description:
The apartment is located at the left bank of the river.

It is very easy to get to the center. You can go by tram or on foot.
Using the pedestrian tunnel to the center is a unique experience !
It takes a 10 minutes walk to the tunnel from the apartment.

One can easily take tram 3 for those who attend a concert or performance in the "Sportpaleis".

You will stay in a very cosy bedroom.
You will feel at home !

The space
A trendy cosy bedroom with a very comfortable Boxspring a stylisch miror and a modern white little table.

Guest access
The guests have acces to the kitchen and the garden.
When the hostess is at home, the guests are welcome in the livingroom.
neighborhood_overview:
It is a very quiet neighbourhood.
The appartment is very close to a lake. During the summer there are many sailing boats on the lake.
From the left bank you have a fantastic view at the cathedral.
I have to repeat that it is as well very close to the center and very easy to get to the center.

name: Modern and spacious studio in the City Centre-70m2
description:
Most welcome to stay over in our studio, located between the old centre of the city and 'het eilandje'. The studio is divided by a mezzanine floor, furnished with a double-sized bed, a sleeping couch, usable as of from 3 persons. A private bathroom and Wi-Fi are available.
The main shopping streets and fashion houses, tourist spots + a wide range of bars/restaurants are within walking distance. A 20' walk from the Central Railway station and the Port House, 10' from the cathedral & the MAS.

The space
The studio its high ceilings are a remnant of the times when this building was used an old industry building, where back in the time marine engines were mended.

Other things to note
Hotel sheets on the beds.
The terrace is private.
We live in the same apartment, so we might cross each other in the hallway.
neighborhood_overview:
The neighbourhood is very diverse and lively, you can do everything by foot. You can find coffee, vinyl, local shops on a stone's throw.
You can start a wonderful stroll from the new Port House (designed by Zaha Hadid) via the Red Star Line museum, through the Marina in the direction of the MAS museum and the Port Pavilion. Enjoy the wide range of terraces and eateries in this neighbourhood before continuing your walk to the centre city. You can choose if you continue your walk next to the water and visit 'Het Steen' or through the little streets of Antwerp to enjoy the beautiful facade of the Town hall, the Brabo statue to go the cathedral and to get lost in the shopping streets in the Groenplaats neighbourhood.
host_about:
Being a fan of airbnb myself while travelling, it was a small step to rent a space in my own apartment. This is a nice opportunity to provide a personal touch when staying over in this beautiful city.  Always happy to give you additional information (regarding restaurants, culture,...)  to make your stay as enjoyable as possible. Looking forward to meet you. 
Kindest regards, Tinka

name: 4 Cosy rooms near Central Station ~ private Studio
description: Cosy studio near Central Station.
host_about:
Hi there! 

I am Son! I enjoy traveling as much as most of our guests. Cycling is my passion, for short as well as long distances.
The Antwerp Central Train Station is a short walk from my house. 
With the Metro station and rental bike stand around the corner, you can get to the old center of Antwerp in minutes, even when it's raining (which does happen in Belgium, from time to time...)

My job allows me to choose my working hours, so I can make time for my guests on arrival, or at breakfast. It's also possible to get in with keybox/code. Wifi is available, as are city guide maps. I hope to see you soon, feel free to contact me if you have any questions.

Warm greetings,
Son:)

Hey daar,  
Ik ben Son, 'doorzomerde' fietster, van een trip naar Parijs tot een rondje wereld, en heb dan ook graag reizigersvolk over de vloer, om verhalen en ervaringen te delen bij het ontbijt. Mijn huis is gelegen op korte wandelafstand van het Centraal Station Antwerpen. Mijn job laten ons meestal toe om mijn werkuren te kiezen, dus kan ik tijd vrij maken voor mijn gasten, bij ontvangst en bij het ontbijt. Het is ook mogelijk om binnen te komen met sleutelkastje/code.
Als je vragen of opmerkingen hebt, aarzel dan niet om mij te contacteren.
Graag tot gauw, en warme groeten,
Son:)

name: Instaworthy view 2 | A location | peaceful | shops
description:
Beautifully renovated apartment on one of the main squares of Antwerp. Great location! Near the shopping streets. This area is famous for its weekend market. The apartment offers a stunning view towards the theater building. The historical center, the Rubens House, the Grote Markt, the Cathedral, the Botanical Garden and many more are all within a 5 minute walk from the apartment. Wine and dine just a few steps away. And for those who love a morning jog: the park is literally around the corner.

The space
You will have a nice living room, fully equipped kitchen, two separate bedrooms and nice bathroom with walk in shower for your use.

Both Saturday and Sunday there is a big market in front of the door.
Bars and restaurants, the main shopping street, the Rubens house and the Cathedral are all within a 5 min walk. And there is even the city park behind the corner.

name: Beautiful, spacious house close to everything.
description:
Located in the vibrant city centre of Antwerp, only 5 min walk from central station and main shopping street "Meir". This authentic charming house offers a great and hassle free way to discover Antwerp. You are free to use the curbside parkingplace in front of the house to park your car for the duration of your stay. From there you can easily enjoy Antwerp by foot or if you prefer by public transport which is just around the corner.

The space
A comfortable and convenient getaway for families or couple's with two beautifully renovated bathrooms, a fully equipped kitchen with a cosy outdoor patio and a spacious living and dining room. Go for a nice Belgian beer, a great meal in one of the many restaurants close by, discover animals in the Antwerp Zoo, visit chinatown or stroll towards the historic city centre.

Guest access
The guest will have access to all rooms. Besides the bedrooms, the house comes with a room with a desk that could be used
neighborhood_overview: We moved in after completely renovating the house in 2011. Even after all these years we still enjoy the house very much since we built it completely to our liking. We love the ability to go out the door and explore the city by foot. We like to stroll through Antwerp during the weekend and search for new coffee places, bars and shops that pop up. It never grows old and there is so much going on in walking distance. The main shopping street the “Meir” as well as the Antwerp Zoo are just a block away. No need for public transport for people who like to walk.
host_about: Superhost through reviews with 100% response rate. Experienced traveller who understands the challenges it holds. Very flexible in making tailor made arrangements with focus on communication and guests having a good time.

The space

Surrounded by upper-class brands like Gucci, Chanel, Hermès and so many others, this residence will put you right in the heart of the city. You will be ideally located to enjoy the city's life and easily get to other part of the city. These Smartflats are totally furnished and equipped so you can fully enjoy a short or a longer stay.

Perfect gelegen privé duplex studio in een historisch gebouw in het hartje van het oude Antwerpen. Studio ligt op de 2de verdieping.

* De ruimte is volledig open.
* WYSIWYG

You can enjoy a spacious living room with open kitchen and lots of light on the 5th floor of a new building. The terrace is located next to the living room. You can sleep with four people in two bedrooms.
Spacious bathroom with bath and shower!
There is a separate toilet available. The apartment is equipped with a burglar-proof door even it's a safe neighbourhood!
It's an apartment to rent out. Nobody lives here personally.

description:
Great duplex loft ideally located in the center of Antwerp.
Three minutes walk from the fine and modern art museums.
Charming and quiet two floors apartment located on the first level of an old mansion house.
Fully equipped kitchen, large dining room, sitting area with fireplace.
Large sunny terrace with deck chairs.
Upstairs bedroom and bathroom with bath and rain shower.

Public transport and bike and step ( Bird ) rental very nearby. 8’ with taxi from central station/10’ station Berchem.

The space
Spacious apartment with multiple levels. A real ‘cosy nest’ to stay at when visiting Antwerp

The whole apartment is available (except for the second) bedroom.
No one else will be at the apartment when you are.

Real estate professional LOVE travelling LOVE yoga LOVE the ocean. LOVE June-LOVE Life.

name: Verblijf in uniek Antwerps Belle Epoque Herenhuis
description:
Bent U toe aan rust, schoonheid en authenticiteit? Reserveer dan zonder aarzelen uw verblijf bij Baron Osy en geniet in stijl. Niet alleen de uitzonderlijke architectuur van de buurt, maar ook de elegante ‘fin-de-siècle’ uitstraling van het pand, verlenen het huis een gevoel van rust. Vertoef in een omgeving die geschiedenis ademt.

Verkent u graag het bruisende stadsleven om dan ‘thuis’ te komen? Eenmaal voorbij de imposante hal, komt u tot rust in onze binnentuin.

name: Antwerpen Huis met een uitzicht
description:
Dit comfortabele, gezellige huis met ruime tuin is gelegen in de unieke Unitas tuinwijk, naast het Boekenbergpark waar je kan genieten van het ecologische zwembad. Vlakbij is er openbaar vervoer naar het centrum van Antwerpen, en ook een Velo-station waar je zeer goedkoop een fiets kan huren. Parkeren is geen probleem, bovendien gesitueerd in de goedkoopste parkeerzone van Antwerpen: zondag gratis, dagticket 2€70. Je logeert in een groene rustige omgeving aan de rand van de stad Antwerpen.

The space
Het huis maakt deel uit van de Unitaswijk, een beschermd stadszicht.

Guest access
gasten beschikken over het hele huis. Let op: slaapkamer 2 bevindt zich op de zolderverdieping en is toegankelijk via een trapladder.
neighborhood_overview: Het huis maakt deel uit van de Unitas-tuinwijk, ontworpen door architect Van Steenbergen naar model van de Engelse garden cities.  De wijk behoort behoort tot het historisch erfgoed en is een beschermd stadszicht.  Het is een groene, rustige wijk naast het Boekenbergpark, bekend om het grootste ecologische zwembad in België, inkom gratis.
host_about:
I love life, my partner, my kids, my job, dancing, traveling........... What  do u want to know more,,,,, 
find it out on (Hidden by Airbnb) or maybe during one of my travelexpeditions

name: Antwerpen quiet appartment in green surroundings
description: Appartment on the top floor of my house in a quiet area in the Hoboken district of Antwerp, in front of a beautiful park with pond, with other parks next to it. The main square of Hoboken is only 100 meters away. Double bed plus one single bed in the bedroom. The sofa in the living room can open into a double bed with decent mattress. Equipped kitchen and bathroom with shower and (little) bath. Free parking in the street. For solo and duo travellers and families with children.
neighborhood_overview: The house is in front of a beautiful park with a pond that continues into the larger green zone of the Sorghvlietpark and fort 8, ideal for walking, jogging or cycling. At the same time the Kioskplaats, the main square of Hoboken where the trams leave, with numerous shops, banks and bars is only 100 meters away. The river Scheldt with ferry boats and the nature park De Hobokense polder is about 1.5 kilometers away. You can take tram 4 to the historic centre or tram 2 to the Central Station, or use the system of city bikes. There's  also a train to centre or a ferry on the nearby river Scheldt to the other side of the river or to Antwerp centre

name: Maison Emile - Executive Room
description:
A hospitable home in a new city! Put one step in our carefully renovated city house and experience the gentle calm of our warm home. Our classical, with modern elements, decoration, combined with smooth music will put your at ease from the moment you walk in. And of course, we will be ready to shake your hand and welcome you in person.

Other things to note
When staying at Maison Emile, you will find yourself amidst the trendy, artful part of Antwerp-South. Our hotel is situated in the centre of trendy bars, colourful shops and delicious restaurants, all waiting for you to discover. And your journey will start at Maison Emile
neighborhood_overview:
Maison Emile is situated in a quiet, yet central place in the bustling city of Antwerp, the largest city of Flanders. A true metropolis, with one of the biggest harbors in the world, but everything is on a human scale. Architecture, fashion, culture, shopping, all go hand in hand. A visit to Antwerp is something you will never forget, especially when you combine it with a visit in Maison Emile.

There is a tramway, right in front of our door. In just a few minutes it will bring you to all of Antwerp’s landmarks: The central station (declared the most romantic city in the world), the Zoo or our famous shopping street the Meir.

name: Maison Emile - Superior Room
description:
A hospitable home in a new city! Put one step in our carefully renovated city house and experience the gentle calm of our warm home. Our classical, with modern elements, decoration, combined with smooth music will put your at ease from the moment you walk in. And of course, we will be ready to shake your hand and welcome you in person.

Other things to note
When staying at Maison Emile, you will find yourself amidst the trendy, artful part of Antwerp-South. Our hotel is situated in the centre of trendy bars, colourful shops and delicious restaurants, all waiting for you to discover. And your journey will start at Maison Emile
neighborhood_overview:
Maison Emile is situated in a quiet, yet central place in the bustling city of Antwerp, the largest city of Flanders. A true metropolis, with one of the biggest harbors in the world, but everything is on a human scale. Architecture, fashion, culture, shopping, all go hand in hand. A visit to Antwerp is something you will never forget, especially when you combine it with a visit in Maison Emile.

There is a tramway, right in front of our door. In just a few minutes it will bring you to all of Antwerp’s landmarks: The central station (declared the most romantic city in the world), the Zoo or our famous shopping street the Meir.

name: BEAUTIFUL DESIGN MANSION in city center
description:
If you are a city lover, but love to relax during the nights in a beautiful place, this home is the perfect place for you. This grand townhouse is the special design mix of old and new. After renovation, the house represents the perfect marriage of authentic features and contemporary progress.

The space
What we love about this grand townhouse is the special design mix of old and new. After renovation, the house represents the perfect marriage of authentic features and contemporary progress. This combination was central to both client and architect. A traditional facade in front and a modern glass volume in the rear. High ceilings with ornamental frames and large spaces with plenty of light and garden view. Authentic wooden doors, stairs and floors combined with a modern open kitchen. All four levels of the house benefit from natural light because of the 7m high window!
Let’s take a visual tour!

Guest access
access to the entire house
neighborhood_overview: If this isn’t convincing enough, the location of the house centainly is! Located in one of the most beautiful neighbourhoods in Antwerp: Zurenborg. With it’s bello époque grandeur it proudly shows surprised visitors art nouveau façades, elegant streets and lively squares. The highlight is the 19th century Cogels-Osylei: sublime architecture from around the turn of the previous century. The real beating heart of Zurenborg, the Dageraadplaats, lies next around the cornor of Antwerpsdesignhouse. With trees, a star sky and trendy restaurants, this somewhat alternative place is defenitely worthwile visiting!

spacious 20m2 room In my retro style apartment on 5 min walking distance of central station.

The space
If you are looking for a quiet home, I'd be happy to take you in. your spacious 20 m2 bedroom has a comfortable double bed, a reading nook, television with netflix and a mini fridge. The sofa in the living room also folds out to a double bed if necessary. I'm not always in the apartment, so if you are lucky, you have my flat all to yourself.

the apartment itself is spacious (110 m2) and has a nice mix of vintage and new furniture. It is conveniently located in the heart of the city; a 5-minute walk from the central station. I live on the top floor of a 6 floor building, that holds a nice view. In front of the apartment, tram 24 brings you in 10 minutes to the historical old town.

Coming by car is also easy, as it is also close to the highway. During your stay you can also use other facilities like a washer and dryer. No need for bed li

name: "Pagadder Flat"
description:
"Pagadder Flat"

This quiet, charming apartment (80 m2) is located in the historical city center just a few steps away from great restaurants and shops, the Cathedral and the “Grote Markt”.

The space
The apartment

The “Pagadder Flat”’ is a renovated, fully equipped and sunny apartment with fantastic view onto the “Pagadder Tower” and the backside of the beautiful historical 16th century guildhalls of the “Grote Markt”.

An elevator brings you to the 2nd floor (entrance, toilet, dinner/living room, kitchen). Inside the apartment are stairs to bedroom/bathroom and the attic room. The facility includes on the first floor a dining/living area with integrated and fully equipped kitchen, a toilet, a storage area. The bedroom on the second floor has an integrated bathroom with bath and shower, separate dressing. There is also an attic room. The apartment is located at the backside of the building so you're protected from urban noise.
neighborhood_overview:
When you leave the apartment you are immediately in the center of a bustling city.

Tourist Info on the corner of the street.

There is a laundry around the corner and a Velo (city bike) station in the street.
