name: Complete house | 14 people | Antwerp City Center
description:
ZaligInAntwerpen 77 is a luxury holiday Home in the historic center of Antwerp.

The house has been completely renovated and can easily accomodate 14 people with 4 bedrooms and 5 bathrooms, a cosy living room and fully equipped kitchen and dining area. It is ideal for big families, quiet groups of friends, colleagues, workshops, etc...

You stay in a quiet street and yet only few steps of all hotspots in Antwerp: Groenplaats, Kloosterstraat, Fashion District, shoppingstreets,

The space
Because you have the whole house for yourself, you can spend quality time with your friends or family, share aperitifs, cooking and dining.
Both the cozy living with TV and gas fireplace on the 3rd floor as the kitchen and dining area in a cozy bistro atmosphere are exclusively for your group.

Guest access
You have the entire property exclusively at your disposal.
neighborhood_overview:
The holiday home for 14 people is located in the historic center of Antwerp

You stay in Lange Riddersstraat, a quiet street in the Fashion District, a few steps from:

- VRIJDAGMARKT (FRIDAY MARKET)
A piece of Provence in Antwerp with nice cafés, terraces and with the UNESCO World Heritage Museum of Plantin-Moretus. On Friday morning, the square changes into an outdoor auction of old items and furniture.

- GROENPLAATS
One of the most famous squares of Antwerp with a cozy atmosphere, cafés and restaurants dominated by the beautiful Cathedral of our Lady

- GROTE MARKT
with the impressive building of the Town Hall and the statue of Brabo is overlooking the scenery.

- KLOOSTERSTRAAT
Well known street for antiques, brocante, vintage and interior design shops. De Kloosterstraat is also worth visiting on Sunday when all the shops are open.

- FASHION DISTRICT
With many renowned designers of the Antwerp
host_about:
Mother of 3 daughters living in Antwerp. 
Passionate about interior and giving guests a 5* experience. 
Owner and manager of ZaligAanZee and ZaligInAntwerpen, Self-catered holiday homes in Antwerp city and at the Belgian Coast, Knokke-Heist, Blankenberge, Damme
"It's a beatiful thing when a career and a passion come together"

The space

Flixbus, Bus, tramhalte OPERA, metro én het station (Antwerpen - Centraal) liggen op minder dan 3 minuten van de locatie. Er is een Delhaize, Lidl, bakkerij, winkelcentrum, biowinkel vlakbij.

Bagage droppen voor 13 uur is niet mogelijk. De kamer is privé en de rest van het
neighborhood_overview: De buurt is rustig en centraal gelegen. Vlakbij alle winkelstraten. host_about: Zelf een fervent reiziger en levensgenieter. Ik heb een eigen reiswebsite (Website hidden by Airbnb) en een Horeca opleiding genoten. name: Virginie LOVEling, quiet, with lovely garden
description:
Beleef het historische en diverse Antwerpen vanuit een stijlvolle fifties stadswoning. Het zonnige gelijkvloers kijkt uit op een ecologische siertuin. Rustig gelegen in hartje Antwerpen vlakbij het Centraal Station, de Zoo, Park Spoor Noord, het Sportpaleis, Lotto Arena en de Roma. Het historische centrum is op wandelafstand of bereikbaar per tram. Bijzonder geschikt voor zes personen mits bijhuren van kamer Rosalie Loveling (extra slaapkamer en badkamer). Ook geschikt voor langere verblijven.

The space

neighborhood_overview: De meest bruisende en dynamische wijk van de stad.  Goede restaurants op wandelafstand zo ook marktjes (op vrijdag en zaterdag) en culturele huizen.
host_about:
We are a family with three sons living in the center of Antwerp. We love our city life and its multicultural dynamics. We adore traveling and meeting people from all over the world. This love for diversity is the main reason why we started our bnb. We enjoy it when our guests have a good time, feel comfortable and at ease. We live in an original mansion from the fifties with a beautiful ecological garden. We completely renovated our ground floor into two separate bnb's, where the style and finishing level connect with the rest of the building. We hope to welcome you in our pleasant and soothing environment! 
Zouhra & Bernard

- Het stadshuis, grote markt, groenplaats zijn slechts een paar minuutjes wandelen.
- Restaurants, café, bars en nog zoveel andere gezellige zaakjes bevinden zich rondom.
- Hedendaagse en oudere antiek en brocanterie winkels zijn allemaal in de buurt.

Teveel gegeten, teveel gedronken, moe, je bed staat achter de hoek ;-)

neighborhood_overview:
Midden "historisch centrum" bedoeld midden erin. De grote markt, de groenplaats, Carolus Bortholemeus kerk, de kathedraal het zijn allemaal buren. Tussen deze gekende locaties bevinden zich tal van andere gezellige plaatsen om de body te ontspannen. Ook geschiedenis en cultuur is tof en daarom een grote verscheidenheid aan musea.

description:
Newly renovated premium 7th floor apartment, designed by Pieter Porters, with amazing view on three major parks.

Located in one of the nicest neighborhoods of Antwerp, easily accessible by car and public transportation.

Private indoor parking spot available on request, concierge present in building.

Do not hesitate to contact me.
Marnik Minelli

The space
Newly renovated premium 7th floor apartment, designed by Pieter Porters, with amazing view on three major parks.

Private indoor parking spot available on request, concierge present in building.

Lounge area with Bowers & Wilkins speakers and limited catalog of network accessible movies & TV-series aside from Netflix.

The first master bedroom features a kingsize bed (200cm X 220cm), a TV and plenty of storage room in the wardrobe.

The second master bedroom feat
neighborhood_overview:
The condo is in one of the most beautiful suburbs of Antwerp close to the major parks of the city.

It is very close by to 'Den Brandt Park', 'Nightingale Park' and 'Middelheim Park', the latter full of art monuments (free entrance). These parks are among the most beautiful of Flanders and definitely the most beautiful of Antwerp.
Across the street you'll find a Carrefour Express. Within 100m you can find a pharmacy, a grocer, a fishmonger, a fromagerie, a pizzeria, a winery, a chip shop and a Chinese.

Next door, on the corner of the street, one finds a nice Italian restaurant (La Tavola Italiana). In Den Brandt Park (in the former coach house of the castle) you have the amazing restaurant Danieli il Divino, in a gorgeous setting with great staff and a fantastic menu, it's simply never disappointing!

Wilrijk is also home to the largest Jain Temple (outside of India) constructed totally out of imported white marble.

name: Apartment in the greenest suburb of Antwerp
description:
This apartment offers you a great combo of city tripping and relaxing in a green, lush neighborhood (Wilrijk). It is ideal for a local experience of living in Antwerp.

Covid-19 info: extra care is taken!

The space
This apartment has been completely renovated and has all modern utilities that you need. Ideal for 1 and 2 person(s). Fully equipped kitchen (also with washing machine, dishwasher,..) wooden floors, a sleeping room with balcony and ensuite bathroom with a bath tup.

It is located in a multicultural building block from the 70'ies, quiet en restful.

Other things to note
I'm happy to share this wonderful place with you. I live here part-time. It would be my pleasure for you to feel at home!
neighborhood_overview:
I absolutely love living in this neighbourhood! It is a great choice for travelers who are interested in clean air, parks and outdoor activities.
From the apartment it is about 4 km to the city center of Antwerp which takes you 15 min by bike or by public transport. The beautiful parks and Middelheim open air art museum are a couple of streets away. Good combo of city buzz and green.
There are great restaurants close-by and a bakery & supermarket around the corner.

name: Unique Apartment with Terrace - 10 min to Station
description:
Recently renovated (end of 2017), well-equipped apartment with a lovely terrace. Just a 10 min. walk from Antwerp Central Station, so you can drop off your bags and start seeing the sights.

Located in the Diamond Quarter, one of the safest areas in Antwerp, nearby you will find The Jane (two-Michelin-star restaurant), city rental bikes, shops and plenty more.

Street parking is available for just 3.80 €/10hours (free on Sundays and after 22:00), availability can vary, depending on time and day.

The space
- Open kitchen area with dishwasher, induction hob, oven/microwave combi, and all required cooking utensils. A coffee maker and coffee are available, along with a selection of teas, herbs, and spices.

- The living room is equipped with a new 55 inch 4k TV. Relax, sit back and enjoy after a day of exploring. Netflix and Amazon are logged in and ready to use!

- The bedroom has a double bed to offer. There is also quite a b
neighborhood_overview:
Nearby places of interest:
- The Jane, two-Michelin-star restaurant with a long waiting list. But in the evenings you can also try their 'drinks & bites' in the upper room bar.
- Antwerp Central Park is less than 5 minutes away.
- The Zoo is also easy to reach by foot
- If you want to try "Frieterij", you will probably find the best fries you ever had, the place is just 10 minutes away.
- The city center is less than 20 minutes by foot.
host_about: I am an engineering expat working in Antwerp, Belgium and Graz, Austria. When I am not over boring calculations, every weekend and time off is a chance for me to explore a new city or country. I love traveling, hiking and I try to read lots of books.  With this experiences I had so far, I hope to provide many positive impressions.

name: Luxurious Old town Getaway
description:
Gelegen in het prachtige historische centrum van Antwerpen, op steenworp afstand van diverse musea, historische architectuur, met een uitgebreid aanbod aan horeca en een shopping walhalla met de mooiste designer merken.

Volgens onafhankelijke beoordelingen van gasten is dit hun favoriete buurt van Antwerpen.

Het appartement is gelegen in een monumentaal pand uit 1835, welke recent volledig gerenoveerd is en onder andere een luxe koffiebar tot buurman mag rekenen.

The space
Dit prachtige, ruime appartement bevind zich in een totaal gerenoveerde staat van een monumentaal pand, midden in het hartje van het historisch centrum. Het is gelegen op de begane grond met hoge plafonds, modern meubilair en een unieke en luxe afgewerkte badkamer gelegen in de kelder.

Guest access

name: Cosy apartment with sunny garden & comfy bed (TML)
description:
This modern apartment has everything you need for a comfortable and enjoyable stay in Antwerp. You will feel relaxed, cause of the bright colors, the open space and the sunny garden. The comfortable bed (boxspring) will give you a perfect sleep. A mini breakfast is offered; coffee/tea, milk&muesli. It is in Wilrijk, a very nice and quiet neighborhood, just a bus ride away from the city and also close to Tomorrowland. (the main road A12 is very nearby, to Antwerp or Brussels) Parking for free.

The space
You are totally private and of course you can use the whole apartment. The kitchen is open and connected to the living room, and therefore gives more a feeling of space. You can stay close to your friends while preparing something. ( incl. the oven, the fridge & freezer, the dishwasher). The living room gives out on the (open) sliding windows so you always have a lot of light. You have a separate bedroom that also spends on the garden. The bathroom has 2 lavabos/mi
neighborhood_overview: Wilrijk is a very nice & quiet neighborhood, just outside the city center of Antwerp. It 's a green suburb and has a unique location, because it is so close to the city and his famous parks (Park Den Brandt, Park Middelheim, Europe's biggest Open Air Museum) It is quiet, yet also close to the main roads, for easy access to the surroundings of Antwerp. (The main road A12 is very nearby & takes you easily to Antwerp or Brussels or to Boom, the city of Tomorrowland.)

name: Authentic family house
description:
We are renting out our home in the upcoming north side neighborhood of Antwerp while we are traveling. Our recently renovated 1910 house comes fully furnished, is bathing in light and has a authentic and relaxing atmosphere. The neighborhood is lively and a big park (Park Spoor Noord), concert hall Sportpaleis and Art Nouveau bathing house are right around the corner.

The space
We spent 2 years updating our pretty 1910 house to modern standards, without however neglecting the authenticity of the original elements and feel. We mainly aimed to stress the lightness of our high ceiling rooms and chose to bring back the original hardwood flooring, opened up some divided areas, created a bathroom and kitchen with all modern needs and facilities and turned the bewildered garden into a more spacious, urban but green 'outside room'.

Guest access
You will be given a key to the front door of our house. The first 3 floors will be all yours (living roo
neighborhood_overview:
The north side of Antwerp used to be a place to skip when visiting Antwerp. It is not anymore. On the contrary, the vicinity of Park Spoor Noord now offers the opportunity to relax while having a peaceful picnic, but also to enjoy nightlife by going to the summer bar (Bar Noord) or the multiple galleries that are nearby. More into a relaxing day at the spa or just a refreshing swim? The most beautiful (Art Nouveau) swimming pool annex bathing house is literally around the corner.
For those coming to Antwerp for a show or concert at Het Sportpaleis or Lotto Arena, our place is ideal to avoid the traffic jams, as it is only a 5 minute walk door to door.

Still close to the ancient city centre, our neighborhood is a very interesting one to live in and start your journey from.
host_about:
Hi, I'm Elisabeth. Although I studied psychology, I find myself taking pictures, filming and cooking most of the time. That is when I m not running after my one year old ever-active daughter, Nala. :-) 
I have a blog (Website hidden by Airbnb) where I share vegan recipes and write about sustainable stuff. 
I also really really like Tijs Delbeke, a musician who plays like every possible instrument, speaks 7 languages, looks better than Brat Pitt and makes me laugh on a daily basis. We share a baby, our house, 43 plants and a love for good coffee, sunny days and pretty views.

name: Cozy private apartment 7min from the city center
description:
🏡 Very comfy apartment located in an upcoming neighborhood of Antwerp.

🛌 Nicely furnished with 1 bedroom, bathroom, living room, open kitchen and view on a park.

📍Perfectly situated between city center (7 min 🚲), university (10 min 🚲) and main hospitals (10 min 🚲)

☕️ Apartment is located above a trendy coffee bar where you can enjoy breakfast. The neighborhood itself is crawling with nice restaurants and borders on other trendy neighborhoods such as “Groen kwartier” and ZurenBorg".

The space
The apartment is located on the first floor in a beautiful art-deco building of 20 apartments. On the first floor there are 2 more apartments.

The spacious hall brings you to the open kitchen and bright living room, overlooking the park 'Hof van Leysen'.

Through the hall you will also find the bathroom with shower and sink. You will also find the washing machine and dryer in the bathroom.

Finally, the hall al
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is located in the very emerging neighbourhood of Antwerp.
By bike it takes about 10 minutes to get to the center and/or the South of Antwerp.
If you cross the 'Singel' you are in 7 minutes at the parks (Nachtegalenpark) of Wilrijk. By foot you can head towards the up-and-coming neighbourhood of Oud-Berchem, Zurenborg and the 'Groen Kwartier' (Green Quarter) with its numerous eating and drinking establishments.
Within walking distance you will find the swimming pool the 'Wezenberg'.

For everyday purchases you can go to the Albert Hein or the Proxy Delhaize, both located 200 meters away.
Would you like a quick and tasty breakfast; under the apartment you will find the breakfast bar 'Kofika' as well as the 'Café Lucien' at 1 min walk.

The hospitals UZA, ZNA, GZA in Edegem/ Wirlijk can be reached at 10-15 min by bike and/or car. You can also easily reach the hospitals (AZ Monica, Sint-Vincentius) in Antwerp Centre.

F

name: Fancy Antwerp Getaway
description:
Gelegen midden in het historisch centrum van Antwerpen, op loopafstand van het winkelgebied de Meir, St Paulus Cathedraal en de Schelde, is het appartement gelegen in een volledig gerenoveerd monumentaal pand.

De Lange Koepoortstraat is een rustige omgeving welke direct gelegen is aan het centrum en de levendige binnenstad met alle horeca en bezienswaardigheden.

Het appartement zelf beschikt over alle gemakken en luxe, moderne inrichting, comfortabele bedden en volledig ingerichte keuken.

The space
Het monumentale pand stamt uit 1835 en is recent volledig gerenoveerd met alle hedendaagse gemakken, maar met behoud van alle authentieke elementen. Een mooie, rustige binnenplaats en een luxe koffiebar direct gekoppeld aan het complex maken het plaatje compleet voor een ontspannen verblijf in hartje stad.

Guest access
Het appartement beschikt over een eigen entree/toegang, ruime woonkamer voorzien van comfortabele slaapba
neighborhood_overview: De Lange Koepoortstraat is een rustige straat waar u in alle rust kunt genieten van uw verblijf in het appartement. Op een steenworp afstand ligt vervolgens het bruisende stadscentrum van Antwerpen met haar vele bezienswaardigheden, zoals musea, historische architectuur, horeca en vele (designer)winkels.

name: Instaworthy view 1 | A location | peaceful | shops
description:
Beautifully renovated apartment on one of the main squares of Antwerp. Great location! Near the shopping streets. This area is famous for its weekend market. The apartment offers a stunning view towards the theater building. The historical center, the Rubens House, the Grote Markt, the Cathedral, the Botanical Garden and many more are all within a 5 minute walk from the apartment. Wine and dine just a few steps away. And for those who love a morning jog: the park is literally around the corner.

The space
You will have a nice living room, fully equipped kitchen, a separate bedroom and nice bathroom with walk in shower for your use.

Both Saturday and Sunday there is a big market in front of the door.
Bars and restaurants, the main shopping street, the Rubens house and the Cathedral are all within a 5 min walk. And there is even the city park behind the corner.

host_about:
Hoi, ik  ben Pim. Ik ben 24 jaar en woon in een klein dorpje (waar de Monniken hun eigen bier nog brouwen en de helft vd bevolking uit koeien bestaat) dichtbij Antwerpen.

Ik heb vorig jaar mijn eigen bedrijf opgestart (id recruitment sector), een hele uitdaging waardoor ik ineens gekatapulteerd ben in het 'volwassen leven', maar ik doe het ontzettend graag. 

Ik ben verzot op reizen. Ik kan even hard genieten van een weekendje London als van dagen met de rugzak gaan rondtrekken.  

Ik heb geen specifieke hobby (momenteel is mijn werk mijn hobby en mijn hobby mijn werk), maar 's avonds lees ik graag een boek en in het weekend ga ik graag met vrienden op café of een stapje in de wereld zetten.

description:
Enjoy your stay in Antwerp in our lovely and bright corner apartment. You will start your stay with a free cappuccino in the coffee bar on the ground floor. The corner apartment is on the first floor in an beautiful historic building in the heart of Antwerp. It has authentic elements and a terrace with a view on the lovely neighborhood. It is within walking distance of shopping streets, touristic sights and cosy streets with bars and restaurants. We provide a free underground parking place.

The space
The apartment is on the first floor of a historic corner building. It is located above a hip coffee bar where you will be welcomed. There is a small balcony where you can see the world pass.

The apartment has a fully equipped open kitchen with fire, fridge, freezer, microwave, coffee maker, kettle, kitchen utensils (glasses, plates, cutlery, etc.)

The private bathroom is located right next to the apartment in the corridor. This has a bathtub. T

This stunning duplex apartment is situated in the vibrant heart of Antwerp. Right at the Groenplaats, next to the huge Cathedral and the big market square with lot's of fantastic restaurants, bars, café's and shops.

name: Historic Center Charmant Luxury apartment Longterm
description:
Het ruime 2 verdiepingen appartement is onderdeel van de charmante en zeer luxueuze stadswoning Witte Roose in hartje Antwerpen, gelegen op de zon met overal prachtig uitzicht op de oude binnenstad. Deze woning is ook in totaliteit te huur.

The space
Dit appartement (100m2) bevindt zich op de eerste 2 verdiepingen van deze prachtige stadswoning. Bij binnenkomst in de monumentale hal voelt u meteen de rijke historie van Antwerpen. De makkelijke eikenhouten trap brengt u naar de voordeur van dit appartement wat geheel is ingericht door interieur designer Charrell. De eetkamer biedt plaats aan 4 personen en is verbonden met een open keuken. Alles is aanwezig: naast borden en bestek, een vaatwasser, 4-pits gasstel, oven en voldoende opbergruimte. De naastgelegen sfeervolle woonkamer met hoge plafonds heeft vanuit alle zijden uitzicht op de levendige straat en de oude panden van Antwerpen.
Via een wenteltrap in de woonkamer komt u in het slaapgedeelte met een pra
neighborhood_overview: Witte Roose is gelegen tussen het bruisende Eilandje, de historische stadskern en de vele winkelstraten van Antwerpen. Nabij de woning bevinden zich zeer goede restaurants (Nathan, Marché Couverts en de Zoute Zoen), diverse tentjes om te ontbijten (Normo Coffee, O’ Cortado en Brood & Spelen) en op 2 passen van een supermarkt (Delhaize).

name: Pauline LOVEling, quiet+lovely garden+2 bathrooms!
description:
Beleef het historische en diverse Antwerpen vanuit een stijlvolle fifties stadswoning. Het zonnige gelijkvloers kijkt uit op een ecologische siertuin. Rustig gelegen in hartje Antwerpen vlakbij het Centraal Station, de Zoo, Park Spoor Noord, het Sportpaleis, Lotto Arena en de Roma. Het historische centrum is op wandelafstand of bereikbaar per tram. Ook geschikt voor langere verblijven.

The space
Het gelijkvloers appartement is gelegen op het gelijkvloers van de woning aan een ecologische siertuin, de ruimtes genieten volop van daglicht en zijn voorzien van sfeervolle verlichting. De tuin is gemeenschappelijk te gebruiken met de eigenaar die op de verdieping woont.

U vindt:
Een ruime volledig ingerichte keuken:
- inductie kookplaat en alle nodige potten en pannen
- elektrische oven
- Nespressomachines met cups, thee, melkschuimer, klassieke koffiezet, waterkoker
- broodrooster
- vaatwasser

Een aangename woonr
neighborhood_overview: De meest bruisende en dynamische wijk van de stad.  Goede restaurants op wandelafstand zo ook marktjes (op vrijdag en zaterdag) en culturele huizen.
host_about:
We are a family with three sons living in the center of Antwerp. We love our city life and its multicultural dynamics. We adore traveling and meeting people from all over the world. This love for diversity is the main reason why we started our bnb. We enjoy it when our guests have a good time, feel comfortable and at ease. We live in an original mansion from the fifties with a beautiful ecological garden. We completely renovated our ground floor into two separate bnb's, where the style and finishing level connect with the rest of the building. We hope to welcome you in our pleasant and soothing environment! 
Zouhra & Bernard

name: New stylish apartment @Antwerp city park area
description:
Charmant gerenoveerd herenhuis in het centrum van Antwerpen met alle nodige voorzieningen aanwezig. Het appartement bevindt zich in een zeer rustige éénrichtingstraat. Weinig verkeer en overlast, maar toch vlak bij het bruisende centrum Antwerpen.
Ideaal gelegen om alle bezienswaardigheden te verkennen in Antwerpen.

The space
Nieuw modern ingericht appartement in stijlvol pas volledig gerenoveerd gebouw. Het gelijkvloers appartement heeft alle moderne voorzieningen en beschikt over 2 ruime slaapkamers. Tevens is er ruime binnenkoer en moderne badkamer voorzien. Het appartement is zowel geschikt voor vrienden, gezinnen als voor zakelijke doeleinden.

Guest access
Het appartement is volledig ter jullie beschikking. Doe alsof je thuis bent zou ik zeggen.
neighborhood_overview:
Het historische pand bevindt zich in een rustige buurt genaamd "het zuid". In de buurt zijn vele gezellige restaurants en cafés. Alsook theaters, musea en verschillende hippe en trendy winkels. Het is centraal en rustig gelegen in de buurt van het stadspark op wandelafstand van het centraal station. Het is tevens makkelijk bereikbaar met de tram. In de aanpalende straat bevindt er zich een supermarkt, slager en bakker.
Ideaal gelegen om jouw citytrip te doen slagen.
host_about:
I am 26 years old and entrepreneur in Antwerp. 
I have these fantastic apartments up for rent, mostly during the weekends and vacations.

About myself, I love to travel the world and get to know different cultures and people. 
I am addicted to sports,  hang out with friends and of course being in Antwerp! 
I am a very relaxed, flexible and punctual person... 

So please feel welcome to come along and enjoy Antwerp!

Until we meet,

Sam

name: Cosy and trendy appartment in historic Antwerp
description:
Onze Guesthouse is gelegen in het hart van de wijk Zurenborg met zijn Dageraadplaats, the place to be, op 15' loopafstand van het centraal station. In de directe omgeving vind je voedingswinkels en vele hippe restaurants. Beste bakker om de hoek!
De Guesthouse is stijlvol, gezellig ingericht. Onze gasten kunnen genieten van volledige privacy, want ze hebben een compleet verdiep en tussenverdiep. Wij kennen de stad goed en doen dan ook graag leuke aanbevelingen! Wij verhuren min 2 nachten.

The space
Unieke romantische plek, met alle restaurateurs en het hart van Antwerpen vlakbij (10' te voet of tram op de hoek van de straat die brengt tot de grote markt van Antwerpen)
Sterrenrestaurant en vele trendy aanbevolen adresjes op 5' wandelafstand.

Guest access
Vanuit de centrale ruime inkomshall, die gemeenschappelijk is, bewoon jij het complete 2e verdiep.

Other things to note
Als je een gastronomische lekker
neighborhood_overview: Zurenborg staat bekend om zijn gezellige straten en statige herenhuizen. Het is een wijk die bruist en leeft. Wie hier logeert, leeft in één van de meest trendy wijken van de stad. De hoofdstraat is de Cogels-Osylei, dat als geheel bekend is om zijn architectuur. De Dageraadplaats, 3' van de guesthouse, is bijna volledig omringd door restaurants, en op zonnige dagen één groot terras. 's Avonds zorgt de verlichting voor een zuiderse sfeer. Dit alles op wandelafstand van het centraal station.
host_about:
Fabienne is een echte wereldburger, heeft veel continenten bereisd en vind het fijn als gastvrouw mensen te verwelkomen. Voor originele tips en heerlijke restaurants, ben
Je bij haar aan het goede adres. Ze is tijdens je verblijf bereikbaar voor je vragen. 
Daarnaast houdt ze van stijl en klasse, wat terug te vinden is in de inrichting van het prachtige herenhuis. Dus wie van een tikkeltje meer houdt .....  ;-)

name: Sunny 2 Terrace Panorama Penthouse + Free Parking
description:
Our penthouse is a calm and bright oasis in the city, you can enjoy the sun all day long on our 2 big terraces from which you can see Antwerp’s typical landmarks: the Cathedral, Central Station, Zaha Hadid's Havenhuis and the MAS.

It’s a 10 minute walk from the central station, a 15 minute walk to the central shoppingstreet The Meir. Close to all kinds of shops, restaurants, bars, and public transportation located in a vibrant multicultural area. Private parking space in the building.

The space
The apartment (110m2) itself consists of a bright open living room looking out on our 2 terraces (75m2), and an open fully equipped kitchen. We have 2 bedrooms, both looking out on our terraces. A bathroom with bath and a separate toilet. We are very excited about the renovation of our terraces in March.

Other things to note
During April, May, June and possibly July and August our terraces are being renovated. This means that our terrace
neighborhood_overview:
Amongst locals, our neighbourhood is called ‘Seefhoek’, which is known as a vibrant, multicultural place in town, right next to the old city center. In our colourful streets you can not only buy fresh fruit, vegetables and fish, you can also discover some real gems like an art deco bathhouse and an old theatre. During a 5 minute walk to the central station you come across ‘Winkelhaak’ design centre, ‘Permeke’, our beautiful antwerp library and Antwerp’s own China town, which is hardly more than 1 street :)
Discover our finest beers at ‘Beer lover’s bar’, get into some real old skool belgian folklore at restaurant 'Den Beer' where you can enjoy delicious lobster at very fair prices, or enjoy a freshly brewed coffee at 'Viggo's', all just around the corner!
host_about: Hi! We are Thomas & Jande, we are a couple living and working in antwerp. We love our city and especially our beautiful home, we are looking forward to sharing it with you!

The splendour, of one of the most beautiful train stations in the world, beams at your eye level - you situate comfortably above the vital Koningin Astridplein.

***** Attention 1 : Antwerp City Tax is 2.25€ p.p.p.n. on 12+. CASH ONLY. Thanks! *****

The space
The studio provides fully equipped kitchen - refrigerator - Nespresso - bathtub / shower - flatscreen + Apple TV - WiFi - work/dining table - king-size bed - mini travel wash machine - ironing kit - spacious cupboards - adequate backups for bed & bathroom.

Lift - surveillance cameras present in public areas inside the building - fortified entrance - electric devices only - certified fire extinguisher on site.

name: BRAND NEW DUPLEX APARTMENT  @Antwerp city
description:
Charmant gerenoveerd herenhuis in het centrum van Antwerpen met alle nodige voorzieningen aanwezig. Het appartement bevindt zich in een zeer rustige éénrichtingstraat. Weinig verkeer en overlast, maar toch vlak bij het bruisende centrum Antwerpen.
Ideaal gelegen om alle bezienswaardigheden te verkennen in Antwerpen.

The space
Splinternieuw duplex appartement dat beschikt over volgende faciliteiten:
Een ruime living met flatscreen en Netflix. Aansluitend aan de living bevindt zich een open keuken. Deze is volledig uitgerust met een vaatwas, oven, ijskast, Nespressomachine, koffie, thee, afwasmiddel, kruiden, vaatwastabletten,...
Daarnaast bevindt zich een apart toilet.
Vervolgens gaan we naar de bovenste verdieping waar een grote kleerkast + spiegel beschikbaar zijn.
Verder komen we aan 2 ruime slaapkamers met elk een tweepersoonsbed.
Tot slot hebben we een aparte badkamer met toilet, lavabo en ligbad/douche.
Het gehele verblijf
neighborhood_overview:
Het historische pand bevindt zich in een rustige buurt genaamd "het zuid". In de buurt zijn vele gezellige restaurants en cafés. Alsook theaters, musea en verschillende hippe en trendy winkels. In de aanpalende straat bevindt er zich een supermarkt, slager en bakker.
Ideaal gelegen om jouw citytrip te doen slagen.
host_about:
Hello, my name is Arne and I’m 24 years old. I love to travel, meet new people and see new places. I enjoy life and try to make the best of it with my girlfriend and dog.
If you planned a trip to Antwerp, let me know and I can arrange you a great stay in beautiful apartments. 

Greetings 
Arne

name: Bright flat in a 1920’s building
description:
My bright and comfy one bedroom apartment is located in the middle of Antwerp’s Jewish neighbourhood. You are 5min by metro/tram from Central station and 20/25min walk to the cathedral and the main square and all the shopping areas. The apartment is on the 5th floor of the building (with an elevator) so the view is really nice, it’s quiet and the sunsets are memorable!

The space
The space is very bright as it gets a lot of sun, with a high ceiling, big windows and a big living room opening directly on the hallway and the front door. The mix between old (20’s) and newly renovated makes the flat very charming. My plants will add this touch of jungle you need in your life!
The bathroom has everything you need, a bathtub, big mirror and even a washing machine. Kitchen is also fully equipped with a cooking gas system, fridge, oven and dishwasher. The bedroom is very simple, I like to keep it white and neutral for a good sleep quality. You will find a clothes han
neighborhood_overview:
The neighbourhood will give you a real feeling about the multicultural aspect of Antwerp. Close to the Diamond area and Harmonie, the Jewish neighbourhood will bring you the special plus about Antwerp’s history.
The flat is 2 metro stops from central station and very well connected with trams to the rest of the city.
The Ruben’s house is 10min by tram and less than 20min walk. The historical centre (cathedral, Grote Markt, etc) is also reachable by foot. There’s a vegetables place just down the building and a lot of groceries shops around.
The City park (Stadspark) is 5 minutes walk and the botanic garden and nice restaurants area are also just 10min walk away.
The flat is perfect to get the city vibe and in the same time enjoy the calmness (you don’t hear any street noises)
host_about: Hi, I’m Kasper a 35 years old actor, director and teacher. I live in Belgium and I like to travel both for work and pleasure.

name: Comfy & spacious apartment in the heart of Antwerp
description:
Very comfortable spacious apartment in the heart of antwerp. The cathedral, main square and port are steps away. Surrounded by a thousand little bars and restaurants everything you need is within reach. Feel at home at this comfy apartment in the middle of Antwerp.

We love to welcome people for longer stays. The apartment is fully equipped and has all the amenities you need for longer stays. If you are interested you can always send an inquiry (even for periods more than 6 months away).

Guest access
Fully equipped, modern apartment, will give you all the comfort you need and is also ideal for longer stays. Located on the top floor (3rd) and equipped with double glazed windows it gives you extra silence even though it's right in the centre of the city.
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is located in the old town right in the heart of the city.
Historical buildings, such as the cathedral, town hall and others are one block away. You are surrounded by cosy bars and restaurants.
If you are interested in shopping, all the main shopping streets are on a 5 min walk.
The 'Meir' (biggest, most famous street), 'Nationale straat' and 'wilde zee' (high end) , 'kloosterstraat' (antique).
host_about:
Hi there I'm Tobias. 
I'm born and raised in Antwerp and I hope to be able to welcome you here. 
What I really love about the city is that it has everything you need but its still cosy and small so you can do everything by foot or bike. 
I'm born to a dutch father and brazilian mom and like to learn new languages and learn new cultures. I'm fluent in English, Dutch and Portuguese  and can speak a bit of french, spanish and german. Its nice that I can practice these languages some more while hosting! 
One of my Biggest passions is music and I'm lucky to be able to work with it. 

See you soon!

name: Flowerroom in unique house
description:
Deze Engelse bloemenkamer bevindt zich in een Groot authentiek herenhuis met 7 slaapkamers, 2 badkamers, eetkamer en een grote leefruimte. Bedlinnen en handdoeken zijn inbegrepen. Het huis ligt ook op maar 15 min wandelen van het Sportpaleis. De living, badkamer en keuken zijn gedeeld met andere

Guest access

host_about:
Hoi, ik  ben Pim. Ik ben 24 jaar en woon in een klein dorpje (waar de Monniken hun eigen bier nog brouwen en de helft vd bevolking uit koeien bestaat) dichtbij Antwerpen.

Ik heb vorig jaar mijn eigen bedrijf opgestart (id recruitment sector), een hele uitdaging waardoor ik ineens gekatapulteerd ben in het 'volwassen leven', maar ik doe het ontzettend graag. 

Ik ben verzot op reizen. Ik kan even hard genieten van een weekendje London als van dagen met de rugzak gaan rondtrekken.  

Ik heb geen specifieke hobby (momenteel is mijn werk mijn hobby en mijn hobby mijn werk), maar 's avonds lees ik graag een boek en in het weekend ga ik graag met vrienden op café of een stapje in de wereld zetten.

name: Zanzibar bedroom in an authentic mansion
description: Deze Zanzibar bevindt zich in een groot authentiek herenhuis met 7 slaapkamers, 2 badkamers, eetkamer en een grote leefruimte. Bedlinnen en handdoeken zijn inbegrepen. Het huis heeft nog alle orginele elementen van eind 19de eeuw, maar is voorzien van alle moderne gemak. Verschillende tram, bus en metrolijnen vlakbij (de Meir is slechts 10min veraf!). Het huis ligt ook op maar 15 min wandelen van het Sportpaleis. De living, badkamer en keuken zijn gedeeld met andere
host_about:
Hoi, ik  ben Pim. Ik ben 24 jaar en woon in een klein dorpje (waar de Monniken hun eigen bier nog brouwen en de helft vd bevolking uit koeien bestaat) dichtbij Antwerpen.

Ik heb vorig jaar mijn eigen bedrijf opgestart (id recruitment sector), een hele uitdaging waardoor ik ineens gekatapulteerd ben in het 'volwassen leven', maar ik doe het ontzettend graag. 

Ik ben verzot op reizen. Ik kan even hard genieten van een weekendje London als van dagen met de rugzak gaan rondtrekken.  

Ik heb geen specifieke hobby (momenteel is mijn werk mijn hobby en mijn hobby mijn werk), maar 's avonds lees ik graag een boek en in het weekend ga ik graag met vrienden op café of een stapje in de wereld zetten.
amenities: ["Shampoo", "Heating", "Smoke alarm", "Essentials", "Wifi", "Kitchen", "Hair dryer", "Hangers", "Lockbox", "Fire extinguisher", "Hot water", "Paid parking off premises", "TV"]

name: nieuw appartement met uniek zicht op het park
description:
Na een drukke dag in Antwerpen is het goed thuiskomen in dit zonnige, nieuwe appartement met zijn prachtig uitzicht. Een beetje buiten het drukke centrum maar toch niet té ver van de stad. De leefruimte is ruim en licht. De slaapkamer is compact, maar het bed is comfortabel en extra groot.
Op het balkon zit je zo hoog boven de straat dat je er ongestoord kan eten of zonnen
Je logeert hier op wandelafstand van het Sportpaleis en Lotto arena.
You get up to 30 % off for long stays!

The space
Het appartement ligt op de derde verdieping van een klein nieuw gebouw op de hoek van een straat. Daardoor is de glaspartij aan de voorkant erg groot en biedt deze flat een panoramisch uitzicht over het park dat je op weinig andere plekken zal vinden. De flat beslaat de volledige verdieping er is een lift maar op het gelijkvloers zijn er een vijftal tredes die het voor een rolstoelgebruiker wat lastiger kunnen maken. Er is een mooie en ruime inloop douche en ee
neighborhood_overview: De woning ligt aan de rand van een kleurrijke en multiculturele buurt. Vlak aan het 'park spoor noord' met zijn fantastische zomerbar en zijn talloze sport en recreatievoorzieningen. Andere buurten zoals het hippe 'eilandje' of de gezellige 'dam' liggen vlakbij. Vele musea zoals het MAS liggen op wandelafstand. Je kan ook te voet naar het centrum en naar het station maar als je geen wandeltype bent kan je vlakbij een fiets huren of de tram nemen.
host_about:
I enjoy art, music and nature. But I also can't live without people and laughter.  
I play the tuba in a local brass band and i like to drink a good Belgian beer on one of the many terrasses in Antwerp.
If you want something extra in the appartment, just ask. I will try my very best!

name: stijlvol appartement in architectengebouw
description:
voor een vakantie in Antwerpen, of voor werk in Antwerpen of Brussel, modernistisch, appartement van 150 m2 in architectenwoning, levendige en tegelijk rustige buurt in de stad, vlakbij park, hoge mobiliteitsscore (bus, tram, deelfietsen deelscooters, autodelen, verbindingswegen naar Brussel, Nederland)winkels en horeca vlakbij, 10 minuten tram of fiets van het centraal station en het station van Berchem, historische en toeristisch centrum met fiets of openbaar vervoer op 15 minuten

The space
aantrekkelijk appartement met grote ruime kamers; het gebouw (1937) is ontworpen door Nachman Kaplansky; het behoort samen met andere gebouwen uit de straat en de straat zelf tot het cultureel erfgoed van de 19de Eeuwse uitbreiding van de stad Antwerpen; vanuit de woonkamer zicht op een basiliek, vanuit de keuken en de slaapkamers zicht op een gemeenschappelijke tuin.
Deel mee indien je met twee verblijft en 2 bedden/slaapkamers wil, zo niet voorzie ik een dubbelbed en
neighborhood_overview: geen uitgaansbuurt, wel levendige en tegelijk rustige buurt op de grens van de districten Antwerpen en Berchem, vlakbij park, winkels en horeca, kunstencentrum De Singel, Koninklijk Conservatorium, Antwerp Expo, historische en toeristisch centrum met fiets of openbaar vervoer op 15 minuten
host_about: Ik woon in Antwerpen en werk in Brussel, ik heb zelf een Airbnb in Antwerpen en heb op korte tijd zoveel positieve ervaringen, dat ik besloten heb om zowel voor het werk als privé vanaf nu ook via Airbnb te reizen.

name: AntwerpCity vintage+urban flat near CentrStation
description:
Charming appartment on the groundfloor. Special discount from 15-30 sept for guests who want to take care of the two cats.

This townhouse has it all; high ceilings, hardwood floor, a cute city garden: romantic and private, yet in the bustling heart of multicultural Antwerp. The perfect location for a city trip, and even more ideal for a longer stay (contact us now for special offers).

Cooking in an open kitchen, relaxing in the bath tub: this place is chill and central at the same time.

The space
We live on the top floor of our house that we have renovated ourselves, according to our own taste. Sixties meets contemporary urban, is what we like to tell ourselves :-)
Let us know what you think!
Your apartment is on the ground floor. You enter through our front door and shared hall. Your apartment is at the end of the hall. You enter through the dining area, with an eating table, a fully equipped kitchen including dishwasher and com
neighborhood_overview:
It's a 5 minute walk from Antwerp Central station to our place. We live in the multicultural Atheneum neighbourhood, so there are all these special and particular restaurants and shops. Did you know that Antwerp has the most nationalities in the world, besides Amsterdam?


Chinatown is just around the corner.

Our place is in walking distance from the touristic city center. 50 meters from our door there is access to public transport which takes you to any place in the city.
Subsequently a fresh bakery, several supermarkets, bars, breakfast places, are all right nearby.

My favorite place is Viggo's Coffee in the morning & Beerlover's Bar at night. These local, non-touristy spots are just a street away. Tim from Viggo's has the best coffee & Ben serves more than 130 different kinds of beer. You'll love it!
host_about:
Hoi, hello, bonjour, guten tag!
I´m a passionate host, and only happy when my guests are happy. I love to share my knowledge and appreciation and love for Antwerp with my guests. 
Me and my partner will do everything we can to make your stay as comfortable as possible.

name: Modern Loft with Rooftop Terrace @ 't Eilandje
description:
Cosy Loft with Modern Touch with a lot of Sunshine and Big Rooftop Terrace!

Situated in the Trendy Neighbourhood 't Eilandje, the new Beating Heart of Antwerp for Lovely Dinners & Great Night-outs. Right in the middle of the famous M.A.S and the historical city centre. Perfect for a weekend out!

Welcome for short cosy weekends or long (business) stays.
When looking for a meeting room or fotoshoot location, renting by the hour is also possible.

The space
When you enter the apartment you come into the livingroom with big windows and full of light.

Right around the corner is an open kitchen with marble design and a big dinner table.

The best part is the rooftop terrace with my own flowergarden.

On the other side you'll find the bedroom with the softest double bed you'll ever experience.
Next to it you'll find a modern bathroom with towels and a walk-in shower.

This apartment is my persona
neighborhood_overview: Nearby the waterfrond and musea (Modern Art, Kunsten, FotoMuseum, Muhka, Antwerp Fashion Museum ...), nice bars and restaurants just around the corner. You can ask me for my favorites!

name: Great Appartment with Garden in Cozy "Old Berchem"
description:
very cozy place, Neighbourhood "Nieuw Zurenborg/Oud Berchem".
Lots of places to drink/eat nearby (Zurenborg, city centre, ..). Also very close to the train station Berchem. options to go by foot or take a tram to go to the Centre of Antwerp.
The appartement is 65 m² with a garden of 30 m². the kitchen has all the machines possible, the shower next door is a big one, across the hall there's a separate toilet. further in the hall we have the bedroom with a closet and a two person bed, garden view.
neighborhood_overview: The neighbourhood "Old Berchem" is very authentic. It's a healthy mix of cultures and age. A lot of young couples bought houses here the last few years and with that you can notice the growing number of bars and cozy places to eat and drink.

name: Sympathieke stadswoning in  échte centrum Antwerp
description:
Sympathieke stadswoning op toplocatie in het échte centrum van Antwerpen. Deze volledig gerenoveerde woning heeft een mooie leefkeuken op begane grond. Op de 1ste verdieping bevindt zich de super gezellige living met zithoek. Op de 2de verdieping bevinden zich de kamers en bureau.
Ideale locatie voor shoppers en fashionista's of mensen die gewoon willen genieten van cultuur. De top winkelstraten op wandelafstand, de gezellige cafeetjes en restaurants van het QuartierLatin en de Graanmarkt ook.

The space
Volledig vernieuwde stadswoning.
Nieuwe keuken met alle toestellen.
Nieuwe kwalitatieve hotelbedden.
neighborhood_overview: Quartier Latin wordt ook wel de theaterbuurt genoemd – te danken aan de Bourla- en de Stadsschouwburg die zich hier nestelden. Ook de meest exclusieve boetieks vonden hier hun stek. Net als opmerkelijke antiek- en speciaalzaken.

name: The Blue Room: home away from home in Antwerp City
description: Large bedroom (18m2), in a spacious apartment. Bathroom is equipped with shower and large jacuzzi bath. Located in the city center, with bus and tram stops right outside. 5mins away (tram/bike) from both Train Station Central and Berchem. Important note: we have 2 adorable and curious kittens, but we will keep them out of your room if it is an issue.
host_about: Loving life in one of the most beautiful cities in Belgium. Science communicator, so sorry, you can tell me to stop talking.

name: Private room + bathroom for 2 in old townhouse
description:
Fijne cosy slaapkamer (met 2 enkele of 1 dubbel bed naar keuze) met ruime privé badkamer op afzonderlijke (1ste) verdieping van een herenhuis (1900), gelegen in een rustige éénrichtingsstraat in Centrum Antwerpen (5min van Centraal Station). Er is een gedeelde zithoek en keuken in overleg.

The space
Gezellige 2 persoons-kamer in rustgevende wit-blauwe tinten op de 1ste verdieping van 19e eeuws herenhuis. Gelegen in een rustige enkele richtingsstraat in het Centrum van Antwerpen is dit jouw perfecte uitvalsbasis voor een weekendje Antwerpen of als privé werkplek in een cosy omgeving.

Guest access
Gemeenschappelijke gang & terras en zithoek op dezelfde verdieping.
neighborhood_overview: Gelegen in de artistieke buurt van Antwerpen. Ver van het nachtlawaai, dichtbij winkels en tal van bezienswaardigheden.
host_about: Wij zijn professioneel uitbater van een belevings-B&B in het bruisende Antwerpen en ontvangen met veel plezier gasten van over de hele wereld in één van onze ruime gezellige flats. Tot binnenkort bij ons thuis ! Christian & Chantal

host_about:
I am 26 years old and entrepreneur in Antwerp. 
I have these fantastic apartments up for rent, mostly during the weekends and vacations.

About myself, I love to travel the world and get to know different cultures and people. 
I am addicted to sports,  hang out with friends and of course being in Antwerp! 
I am a very relaxed, flexible and punctual person... 

So please feel welcome to come along and enjoy Antwerp!

Until we meet,

Sam

name: Full 4 Floors House In The Center
description:
Fully renovated beautiful 4 floors house full of character was build at the end of the 1700 in the best location, just a min walk from the shopping street"Meir" , a few min walk to the old town where you will find cool bars and restaurants . Less then a min to the opera . 7-8 min from the Central station
the house can host 1 - 9 persons very comfortable , very modern kitchen , all smart tv's,
billiard table . Two toilets , bath and a shower , roof deck balcony and a privat elevator ..)

The space
a total of 250 m2 spread on 4 floors plus the roof balcony and the billiard room
neighborhood_overview:
Right in the center of Antwerp ,
near the biggest shopping street Meir,where you will find a lot of cosy restaraunts and cafes,shops . Supermarket just opposite of the income door . The opera house is right across ,
public transportation is nearby
host_about:
Hey I am Eli from Antwerp, I do interior design for some time .
I love  traveling in style , so i created  an Airbnb  project on my kind of comfort .

10 min walk from central station, 1 min walk from public transport,.
We share a house with 3 people and we always love to have guests in our house.
Our guest have more then enough space to be on their own in their room, but are more then welcome to join us in our communal spaces like the kitchen, livingroom, and garden.

Our guest can totally be on their own, but we love to connect with our guest as well.

The space
The room is basic but comfortable. And also has a little desk.

Guest access
Our guests have their room, and can use with us together the kitchen, livingroom, terras, and bathroom.

Other things to note
we prefer that you don't wear shoes in the house,

name: Luxury studio in Centre of Antwerp
description:
Luxury studio/room for 2-3 people, in Centre of Antwerp, with own kitchen, bathroom, terrace. 1 double bed and 1 single bed. Near the famous 'Meir' and 'Groenplaats', with view on the Saint-Bartholomeus church and Cathedral. Fully accomodated with everything you need.

At your arrival, the city tax of € 2.39 per person, per night should be paid cash.
host_about:
Hello everyone! I'm Sofia, living in Antwerp, one of the best cities in Belgium. I've got a very nice accommodation to offer for those who would like to visit Antwerp and stay in the centre. I've got 3 luxury studios which are totally renewed, with own kitchen, bathroom, balcony, nice view etc. The house could also be rent entirely (for max 7 people). Location of the building is near the centre of the city, near 'Meir' and 'Groenplaats', the places to be when you're coming for the first time. 

So take a look at the pictures and contact me if you'd like to be our guest. I'm at your disposal :-)

At the arrival, a tourist tax of €2.39/per person/per night should be paid cash. 

Thanks a lot
Kinds regards!

name: sunny one bedroom apartment at the riverside
description:
Sunny one bedroom partment in the south of Antwerp, on the first floor of a small apatment block. Located on the quay with a view of the Schelde and within walking distance of the historicalcenter. Close to lots of nice restaurants

The space
A few years ago I bought a house on the quay with a view of the Schelde.
The house is divided into 3 apartments. That was useful because at that time I had two daughters at home. The top apartment needs a lot of renovation and if everything goes well the works will start summer of 2019.
Meanwhile, the first floor apartment is already equipped with a new kitchen and a renovated bathroom.
My daughter went to live with her boyfriend a few weeks ago, so now I have available an apartment until the summer.
My experience with Airbnb is limited to using it until now. But I like receiving peolple and guiding them in Antwerp. Antwerp is a very nice city and there is always something to experince
neighborhood_overview: You can explore Antwerp by foot, starting from the apartment

name: Cute Townhouse in Antwerp South
description:
Cosy house on charming square in Antwerp Zuid close by the Troonplaats. The house has two large bedrooms with big beds. More then comfortably sleeps 4 people. The house has a cute living room, kitchen and an amazing sunny roof terras! Perfect for going out in Antwerp or staying in for some time together. Great for couples and friends. Conveniently close to the best coffee place in town! On the troonplaats you will find restaurants, bars and breakfast that is yummy!

The space
Two roomy bedrooms and one bathroom. Perfect for four people!
We have a lovely lil roof terrace that is great to spend some time star gazing :).

Guest access
You can enter the house with a key lock system. Easy and quick!

Other things to note
Parking is in the street or in the neighbourhood.
neighborhood_overview: T’ Zuid as it is called. Is an amazing neighborhood full of restau- rants, bars and museums. Also you can do some boutique and vintage shopping.
host_about: Always here to help. I am Yan from house with a story. If you have any questions or request I will solve them :). So you and your guests can have the best time in Antwerp.

name: *Spacious Modern appartement in City center *
description:
Modern appartement, 2 min away from Central station with a view on the huge Antwerp park . The appartement is located walking distance from the commercial area, shopping districts, restaurant and bars.
100m2 with open kitchen,2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms ( 1 shower, 1 bath), 2 toilets, , can accommodate max 4 people.
Access to metro very close but everything is by walking distance.
After 22h please avoid loud music or too much noise for neighbors.

The space
If you are looking for something modern, spacious and clean you are at the right place!

Other things to note
Residential building, parties are unauthorised.

name: Modern apartment in the heart of Antwerp
description:
Ground floor apartment with a spacious terrace, situated in the historical heart of Antwerp.

Details:
- +/- 75 m²
- Private entrance
- Guest toilet
- 2 separate bedrooms + sofa-bed
- Living room with a lot of natural light (table can be extended to fit 6 people, 6 chairs available)
- Fully equipped kitchen (dishwasher, oven, fridge, freezer and combi-microwave)
- Bathroom with walk-in shower
- Furnished terrace (15m²)

Guest access
Guests will have the entire apartment to themselves.

Other things to note
During high season (June-August, December) a minimum of 2 nights is required.

name: Romantic open city appartement with sunny terrace
description:
Romantisch appartement in gerenoveerde charmante stadswoning op het gezellige Antwerpen Zuid. Op wandelafstand van tram, bushaltes en treinstation Zuid. Leuke koffiebars en eetgelegenheden vlak aan de deur. Centrum Antwerpen is bereikbaar op 8 minuten met de tram, 20 minuten te voet. Je passeert allerlei leuke boetieks en horeca zaken. Een van de leuke routes is langs de Kloosterstraat, een super hippe straat met vele antiek winkels en aparte boetieks.

The space
De masterbedroom is open met de woonkamer en keuken. Deze kan afgesloten worden met de keuken doormiddel van een verduisterend gordijn. In de keuken is er ook plaats om te zitten en te eten. De badkamer is afgesloten van deze ruimtes. Hierin bevindt zich ook een mezzanine met nog twee extra slaapplaatsen. Ideaal voor kinderen. Er is ook een toilet en wastafel beschikbaar.

Guest access
Er is een gemeenschappelijke gang aanwezig voor het airbnb appartement en het appartement erboven.
neighborhood_overview: Antwerpen Zuid is een bruisende bekende buurt met veel evenementen, koffiehuisjes, lunchbars, restaurants en natuurlijk het bekende Museum voor Schone Kunsten die binnenkort na jaren renovatie terug open gaat.
host_about:
Hi there! My name is Charlotte and I'm An interior designer and graphic designer. I have a webshop in Belgian interior and graphic items: Studio Char. 

The interior of Maison Char is completely designed and chosen by me.

name: Relaxed verblijf op 't Zuid in Antwerpen
description:
We hebben 17 appartementen in Antwerpen Zuid, op de hoek van de Amerikalei en de doodlopende (en daardoor zeer rustige), Baron D'Hanislaan.

Het appartement dat je huurt, heeft een aparte ingang en alle faciliteiten die je nodig hebt tijdens je bezoek aan Antwerpen. Een volledig ingerichte keuken, aparte slaapkamer, badkamer en woonkamer. Er is ook een sofa bed in de woonkamer, dus je kunt eventueel nog een 3e persoon meenemen.

The space
Wifi is gratis, parkeren kan op straat (tegen betaling) of in de bewaakte parking op 300 meter van Bizzflats.

Guest access
Je hebt toegang tot de gemeenschappelijke ingang van het gebouw. Je hebt een eigen ingang voor je appartement en daarnaast is er een gezamenlijke fietsenstalling, alsook een ruimte met een wasmachine en droger/droogkast.

Other things to note

name: The Nomad's Lounge
description:
The Nomad's lounge breaths Eastern charm in a historical setting. It is located in one of Antwerps oldest protected town houses. The room combines historical elements like high ceilings and stained glass windows, with modern comfort, hotel beds and a stylish tadelakt bathroom. Perfect downtown location, ideal for discovering the city on foot or by bike.
Free bagagelockers available, you can drop off your bags before check in and go discover the city!

The space
We personally restored this historical space, which is part of a protected house that originally dates back to 1503. We tried to pay attention to the historical perspective, and give it a unique contemporary touch as well, using ecological building materials. Hope you like it!

Guest access
The room has a fully private bathroom and toilet. A kitchen is not available.

Other things to note
There´s a few great painters living on the upper floors of this house.
neighborhood_overview: The house is on a perfect downtown location. Ideal for discovering the city on foot or by bike, and just steps away from all big monuments and shopping streets.

name: Discover Antwerp, start in a beautiful apartment!
description:
We are hosting a beautiful, modern and comfortable apartment (92 sqm) in one of the greatest neighborhoods of Antwerp! Lots of light during the day, and very quiet at night. You can find everything you need in the apartment to feel at home! The place is very close to different highways (E19), and it is easy to park in front of the building or in the streets around it for just 3,80 euro per day!!! There is so much to do around the apartment and we would love to help you get around!

The space
There is a fully equipped kitchen so you can cook for your self, we offer different wine services on request ( if interested in wine and dine!).
There is a smart TV with a Netflix option you can use for free. There is a comfortable sofa bed and extra sheets and pillows available on request (for bookings more then 2 people). The bedroom is also very light and clean, and the bed is great to sleep in! The apartment is very quiet, as you have your own entrance. You can list
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is situated in one of the nicest neighborhoods, only 10 minutes walk to "de Singel" if you want to pick a jazz concert, dance or theater show. There are 3 beautiful parks around the apartment, and beer brewery " De Koninck" is only 5 minutes walk. There are a few nice coffee bars in the streets around if you want to have a good breakfast to start the day. Also there is a bike stations right next to the building (Red Velo's) where you can pick a bike to get around. City center, shopping area's, museums and lots of unique landmark are only 15 min by bike, 30 min walk or 20 min by tram. Lots of nice (wine) bars and restaurants are so close, you can walk every where if you love to discover this beautiful city.
host_about: I love traveling, books, wine, good coffee, and getting to know people!

the full house is voor the guests

name: Fully-equipped apartment in perfect location
description:
The perfect Antwerp getaway; this ground floor apartment has it all! From the large bed, natural light, fully equipped kitchen to the charming neighborhood square you're guaranteed to feel at home. A perfect location situated between the train station and city center.

The space
Charming and bright apartment fully equipped with a kitchen, microwave, refrigerator, coffee maker, blender, cookware, and spices. A large handicap accessible bathroom with standing shower and toilet, a 180cm wide (king-size) bed, large sofa with optional floor air mattress.
Digital TV and high speed wifi is included. Two-door secured entrance.

Other things to note
If arriving with a car: outside the apartment is a pedestrian area and park, you can pull your car within 15 meters from door for loading and unloading, however nearby overnight parking garage at Sint-Jacobsmarkt 81 for €20 or street parking for up to 3 hours via a mobile app.

The space is a friendly, safe and quiet environment, just a few minutes from the main shopping street or the student university.  Around the corner is a Carrefour Express grocery store open 7 days a week, as well as night shop,  bars and cafes.

host_about:
Hallo onze naam zijn Carl, Mady en Eva. 
Onze dochter Eva is in Augustus 2018 en gelateria gestart met overheerlijk ijs en wafels.
We hebben de 2 appartementen boven de zaak in ons beheer gekregen en verhuren deze fantastische locatie in het hart van Antwerpen.
Het zicht op De Grote Markt, de oude gildenhuizen, het stadhuis is vanuit het appartement (en) te bewonderen.
Ben je in Antwerpen op zoek naar een leuke locatie dan is deze
" the place to stay"!
 Leuke restauarants, shopping, musea, vervoer alles ligt op een boogscheut van elkaar.
Geniet van je verblijf in onze stad!

name: Cosy duplex at Antwerpen Zuid with free parking
description:
Since we travell a lot ourselves, we would like to share our apartment with other travellers when we are abroad.
We live in the trendy part of Antwerp, surrounded by restaurants, supermarkets and the only free parkingspace in town! Public transport at the corner, but everything you need is at walking distance. This neighbourhood is called HET ZUID, near the Schelde, where everyone wants to live.

The space
We have been offering our previous apartment to guests on air benb and had only positive feedback. We moved in the same neighbourhood because grandchildren are coming and this one is bigger.
host_about: Since I stopped working, I am on the road about six months a year, mostly on a bicycle. In five years my partner and I have travelled 25.000km cycling in Asia, mainly in wintertime. We bought a small apartment in Antwerp and are happy to host other travelers while we are not there.

name: Central duplex apartment perfect 4 tomorrowland
description:
Welcome in the Van Arteveldestraat, with the most beautiful central station of the world around the corner. Our recently renovated apartment is located in a very beautiful building from 1881 with a statue from Jacob Van Artevelde, the building is a true diamond in our street and perfect to discover Antwerp or other cities.

Our spacious duplex apartment is on the ground floor and the first floor. The establishment is practical and fresh with a mix of old and new materials.

The space
Our duplex appartment is 140 square metres with 2 big bedrooms and a badroom.
To relax, we have a big living room next to our open kitchen.
+ there is an extra private toilet on the ground floor.
neighborhood_overview:
We live in a nice neighborhood where there is always something to do.
Central station and the famous shopping area is only 5 minutes walking.

name: Best Location Ever! Beauty & Comfort & Netflix
description:
Location is so important! Right in the heart of Antwerp and yet in a beautiful street without traffic: in the shopping area, the historical centre and a 5 min. walk from Central Station and the famous Zoo. Wonderfully new, beautiful and comfortable apartment (1st floor). The luxury of a hotelroom + the comfort of your own sitting room & kitchen corner (+ minibar). Free Netflix, Wifi, Smart tv. Luxurious Swiss Sense boxspring bed. Artwork by Antwerp artist/photographer Alessandra Ruyten.

The space
The apartment is called 'Nest 1', because it is so cosy and comfortable. It is situated right in the heart of the city, yet in a very quiet street without traffic (first floor).

Guest access
You rent the whole apartment and have complete privacy.
neighborhood_overview: Just a short walk to the Meir (1 min - the shopping area of the town), Rubenshuis (the home of Pieter Paul Rubens 5 min), Central Station (4 min), the Opera (2 min) and the famous Zoo (4 min). You can hop on the tram (10 min) or walk (20 min) to the ''t Eilandje', the very hip neighbourhood near the harbour.

name: Spacious beautiful appartement in Antwerp
description:
This beautifull, 125m² appartment has 3 spacious bedrooms, a terras and fully equiped kitchen. The building is from 1930 and is recently renovated with eye for detail and scandinavian touch. The high ceilings give a bright, modern feeling.
It is near all the highways, with a public parking in front of the appartment (1€/12h). Park Den Brandt is only 700m away, tram stops right in front of the appartment and rentbycycles (15min by bike to downtown Antwerp) are also on the corner.

The space
Spacious, bright, modern apartment that has been completely renovated with a Scandinavian touch. Kitchen on original tile with gas stove and adjoining terrace. A large potted wardrobe in the hallway offers plenty of storage space. Sunny living space with a south orientation. Bathroom in mosaic tiles with walk-in shower and built-in cupboards. 3 spacious bedrooms with boxspring beds.

Guest access
Everything is accessible.
neighborhood_overview:
There is more information on what to do available in the appartment. But the Park Middelheim or a couple nice bsitro's and bakery are just around the corner.
As the appartment is located near to the E17, Bruges is only a 1h20min drive away, as well as Brussels which takes you 30min.

description:

Your charming loft is situated in the middle of a park garden. You are only 15 minutes (by public transport or bike) away from the historical city center. From June until half September, a heated natural swimming pool is at your disposal from 7 AM till 7 PM. Free parking spaces are available for your cars or bikes.

The space
The loft is part of a villa. You have your own entrance and possibility to park your car on site.

Guest access
A fast and reliable WIFI connection
The park garden with heated pool (12,5x 5m)
A sunny terrace
Coffee, tea and biscuits are complimentary

name: Home with terrace and city garden.
description:
This bright and spacious house is the perfect place to come home to after a busy day of discovering the city of Antwerp. Just like all the best houses in our beautiful city, this is a real 'Antwerps herenhuis' as we call it. Authenticity is a big plus here!

The space
This house is spacious and bright and will make anyone feel right at home. There is a well equiped kitchen, a toilet, a cosy sitting area and a city garden/patio on the groundfloor. The first floor accomodates a tv-room with sofabed and a bedroom that has two single beds and a terrace. The second floor has the master bedroom and on the topfloor we have a modern bathroom with big shower and extra toilet.

Guest access
Our guests have access to the entire place.
neighborhood_overview: The house is located right in between the city centre of Antwerp and the Zurenborg area. Zurenborg is a lesser known but very lively area with a lot of nice and cosy restaurants and bars.

description:
Sunny and spacious recently renovated apartment located near the famous restaurant 'The Jane'. It is situated in the MIPIM award nominated residential project called 'Het Groen Kwartier'. The project is the urban transformation of the former Military hospital of Antwerp. It is known for its combination of beautiful architecture, green environment, great restaurants, bars AND all this in a walking distance from the Antwerp city-center.

The space
The apartment offers the following amenities:
- 1 Large bedroom: 1 double bed
- Clean sheets, towels, etc.
- Fully equipped kitchen (including a Nespresso coffee machine)

name: Spacious house next to the zoo
description:
Our beautiful house is welcoming you for a visit to the great city of Antwerp. It's a very cosy place with lots of space and a fully equipped kitchen. In walking distance from the centre and in a very quiet neighborhood assuring you a good sleep. Our house is perfectly fit for families, offering 3 rooms with double beds and 1 children's room. Our neighborhood is also a very warm residential neighborhood, near by the zoo and nearby the station.

The space
Beautiful house built in 1920 style with lots of ornaments from that period. It has a garden with a terrace, 1 bathroom, a fully equiped kitchen, 4 bedrooms. The location is right behind the zoo of Antwerp very near to the ciry centre. Walking distance from the central station. It's a very quiet space in a very lively city, close to nice restaurants and bars, museums and shops to discover.

Een kamer met eigen badkamer en toegang tot grote terras. Veel licht en mooie zichten . Zeer goede verbinding met Antwerpen maximum 20 min. Bus stopt voor de deur en rijdt om het kwartier .Tram of boot zijn ook mogelijk. Mooie wandelingen en restaurants in de onmiddellijke omgeving. Paradijs voor fietsers . Zomeractiviteiten: plage , open luchtzwembad met lage inkomprijs, wandeldijk, zomer bars , jachthaven op 5 à 10 min wandelen. Gemakkelijke verbinding naar Lotto arena en sportpaleis.

The space
Lichte kamer met grote kast. Kamer ligt in een aparte nacht hal zodat geluid uit de woonkamer niet stoort. Heel veel stilte in de blok en buiten. Veel parkeer ruimte. Natuur in de directe omgeving. Antwerpen op een boogscheut.

Guest access
Bureau, living en keuken zijn toegankelijk voor de gasten

Other things to note
Ontbijt kan geserveerd worden indien het gewenst is. Dit aan €6 per persoon.
neighborhood_overview: Stille buurt . Aan de overkant begint de wandeling: richting het bos of richting de wandeldijk naast de Schelde. Je kan naast de Schelde wandelen tot aan de overzet boot, de busboot, de tram en de voetgangerstunnel. Zo kom je op 5 min in het oude centrum van de stad.

name: House with 4 bedrooms & garden @ hip Antwerp South
description:
While we discover the world we invite you to discover Antwerp from our home.
Our house is in the heart of Antwerp South, ideally located to visit the city or travel to other cities in Belgium or the Netherlands by car or public transport.
The railway station is at 15min. by tram or 20min. by bike. The historic city at walking distance. The hippest restaurants, lunch and coffee bars are just around the corner.
Enjoy real peace in the heart of the city.

The space
You have the whole house to yourself.
You'll feel at home immediately in the open living room with connecting terrace and garden. Enjoy a cosy meal you made yourself or had delivered at the dining table next to the fully equipped open kitchen.
You can work in peace in the separate office space.
There are 4 spacious bedrooms in the house and 2 bathrooms. All bedrooms can be darkened completely.
Kids can play in the biggest bedroom with 2 separate beds, TV and toys. There
neighborhood_overview:
Antwerp South district is famous for its art and fashion. The big five worked and lived here. You'll find a lot of hip and international restaurants, lunch, coffee, wine and cocktailbars but also authentic Flemish / Antwerp cafés at walking distance from the house.
In the Nationalestraat you'll find the hippest (popup) clothing stores, and the Kloosterstraat invites you to discover all latest vintage or other furniture and art on Sundays.
The Antwerp historic city centre is at walking distance and the Red Star Line museum in the north of the city is at 15min. by bike.
Get a breath of fresh air after a long day at the quay, with a view of the Scheldt.
host_about: Ik ben Daniel Vos, 40 jaar, en reis met mijn gezin over de hele wereld. Mijn vrouw en ik willen onze twee dochters laten zien hoe mooi de wereld is. Niets of niemand is vreemd. Alles en iedereen is anders.

name: Gezellige hideout nabij Spoor Noord en Eilandje
description:
Vlakbij Park Spoor Noord, op een boogscheut van het Eilandje, en een kwartiertje slenteren naar het centrum. Je bevindt je super centraal om meteen te kunnen genieten van wat Antwerpen te bieden heeft. De tramlijn en vélo-stationnetjes liggen op enkele stappen van de voordeur. Het appartement is ingericht met een voorliefde voor retrotoetsen en de 5 grote ramen zorgen voor een mooi lichtspel.

Other things to note
Het appartement bevindt zich boven een Portugees cafeetje.
neighborhood_overview:
We wonen in de zelf verklaarde Natie-buurt. Vlakbij Park Spoor Noord en het Eilandje. Op de plek waar nu Spoor Noord gevestigd is, lag het oude trein-rangeerstation. Via dit station en de dokken op het eilandje kwamen goederen vanuit de hele wereld. Die werden (onder andere) in deze buurt opgeslagen en verhandeld in de 'Naties'. Als je door de straten loopt zal je een mix van woningen en oude industriepanden vinden die deze geschiedenis nog een beetje prijsgeven.
Tegenwoordig bevindt zich hier een grote gemeenschap Portugesen. Je vindt hier allerlei typische Portugese eetcafétjes (Espiguero, Estrela Do Mar), maar ook leuke koffiebarretjes (Brandbar) en heerlijk lunchrooms (Le Red Fox, De Natie, Crumbles & Beans). Op wandelafstand van het mooiste Art Nouveau station van Europa (misschien wel de wereld) en de Meir. Het bruisende Eilandje bereik je op 5 minuten wandelen.
host_about: A social-worker, with an appetite for discovering new places.

name: The House on Kleine Goddaard, great 4 large groups
description:
A Large but super cosy charismatic house smack in the Historical center of Antwerp (up to 20 people).
Great for families, large groups of friends, wedding groups etc (read party policy). Completely renovated, and really comfortable and clean. We will do all in our power to make your stay the best possible. You'll be surrounded by restaurants, bars. Clubs like Club Anvers & Cargo (Red & Blue) are a 5 minute walk away. There's a grocery store on the corner + a Velo bike station across the street

The space
Every room in the house has it's own flair. Some are double rooms, other rooms can host up to 6 people. There's a cosy breakfast room with a fridge, an extra large micro/oven, egg boilers, a toaster and of course a coffee machine and water boiler.
The luxury rooms have a private bathroom, 1 room has a private toilet and the other rooms share a clean bathroom on the top floor.

This is the listing for the whole house. You can rent the whole
neighborhood_overview:
The location really is perfect and beautiful. The Mas Museum is less then a 10 minute walk from here, and you can actually see it from our rooftop terrace.

The Cathedral, city hall, The Schelde, and the main shopping area are even closer by.

There's a delicious Thai take away restaurant right opposite of our house. There's also a genuine Italian restaurant + few of Antwerps hot spot restaurants/lunch rooms are literally right next door.

The very famous fish store NADA is opposite our house and there's a Delhaize across the street that's open 7 days a week from 8am to 8pm. There's a Velostation + a really fun Drag performance bar with drag performances every Tuesday, Thursday, Friday and sunday. (Happy hour from 11pm to 12am)

There's also some amazing shops nearby.

The red light district is also just a 5 minute walk away.
host_about:
Hi there, I'm Erik. A makeup artist from the Netherlands who has been living in Antwerp for 20 years now. Antwerp is such a wonderful city to live and work, I’ll probably never leave.

Meanwhile, I opened a beautiful make up academy and shop right in the historic city center right underneath this beautiful completely renovated complex where I also live. 

So ladies, if you want to make Antwerp unsafe for a weekend, you can go downstairs for a beautiful make-up! ;) and guys! If you go with your girlfriend or wife... Surprise them with a nice make-over before you go out. You ‘d never score points so easily! Haha :)) 

We will always help you with tips for the best places to visit and eat in Antwerp and there is always a  little surprise waiting for you when you check in.

the rooms are warm and cozy .. some large, some smaller, but all very charming and completely renovated.

As a makeup artist, hygiene is incredibly important to me and the rooms will be dust free and anti allergic, bathrooms will always be clean and the bedding freshly washed.

I hope to meet you soon!
Erik

name: The Cosy, Cute cosy room Historical Center Antwerp
description:
A super cute and cosy room with private toilet and shared bathroom in the best part of Antwerp with a new box spring bed It is the perfect room for people that want to stay in Antwerp in a newly renovated and very clean house on a budget. The Cathedral, City Hall, the main shopping areas and the Schelde are all within a 5-minute walk. There's nice cafes, very good restaurants and really nice shops In the street itself .
+ Pretty much all Nightlife of Antwerp is just around every corner.

The space
This beautiful and warm room is small but super comfortable. There's a new bed + new linnen, a desk + your own private toilet.

There is a shared room where you can get free coffee, thee and hot chocolate and there is also a lovely roof terrace with a view of the Mas museum.

The house has 5 different rooms, 2 with private bathroom, 1 with a private toilet and 2 with a shared bathroom.

This room has been listed for over a year on A
neighborhood_overview:
Smack in the middle of the historic center of Antwerp. The Mas-museum is a 5-minute walk away, 'Onze Lieve Vrouw'-Cathedral is only 4 minutes away. The iconic town hall and the Schelde at 3 minutes and the main shopping streets are also less than a 5 minute walk away.

A very beautiful church can also be visited in the street opposite us. free of charge. In the street itself there's a few nice cafes and cool shops (the street is known for its second-hand shops) - lots of breakfast and lunch options and a nice croquette bar. There is a washing salon and a large Delhaize supermarket right on the corner that is open 7 to 7 open from 8 to 8 even on holidays.

And then there's these amazing restaurants and delicacies that are just located next to us.
And if you need a hairdresser a barber or a makeup artist you just need to walk outside.

Trendy and Classic coming together in this area, and there is certainly something to find for everyone.
