name: The Lux - Spacious Room, Historical Center Antwerp
description:
A Beautiful and light room with for up to 6 people + En-Suite bathroom in the best part of Antwerp with a new Mattress and new luxurious covers. This clean and very spacious room has a tv + Netflix. Perfect for love birds that just want to relax and do absolutely nothing! Tourist attractions and all shopping areas are within a 5-minute walk. There's nice cafes, very good restaurants and really nice shops In the street itself .
+ Pretty much all Nightlife of Antwerp is just around every corner.

The space
This beautiful, light, romantic and very clean room is spacious and very comfortable. It has an En-Suite bathroom, a dining table, a sitting area and a tv.

The mattress is completely new and so are the new luxurious bed covers + pillows.

There is a shared room where you can get free coffee, thee and hot chocolate and there is also a lovely roof terrace with a view of the Mas museum.

The house has 5 different rooms, 2 with
neighborhood_overview:
Smack in the middle of the historic center of Antwerp. The Mas-museum is a 5-minute walk away, 'Onze Lieve Vrouw'-Cathedral is only 4 minutes away. The iconic town hall and the Schelde at 3 minutes and the main shopping streets are also less than a 5 minute walk away.

A very beautiful church can also be visited in the street opposite us. free of charge. In the street itself there's a few nice cafes and cool shops (the street is known for its second-hand shops) - lots of breakfast and lunch options and a nice croquette bar. There is a washing salon and a large Delhaize supermarket right on the corner that is open 7 to 7 open from 8 to 8 even on holidays.

And then there's these amazing restaurants and delicacies that are just located next to us.
And if you need a hairdresser a barber or a makeup artist you just need to walk outside.

Trendy and Classic coming together in this area, and there is certainly something to find for everyone.
host_about:
Hi there, I'm Erik. A makeup artist from the Netherlands who has been living in Antwerp for 20 years now. Antwerp is such a wonderful city to live and work, I’ll probably never leave.

Meanwhile, I opened a beautiful make up academy and shop right in the historic city center right underneath this beautiful completely renovated complex where I also live. 

So ladies, if you want to make Antwerp unsafe for a weekend, you can go downstairs for a beautiful make-up! ;) and guys! If you go with your girlfriend or wife... Surprise them with a nice make-over before you go out. You ‘d never score points so easily! Haha :)) 

We will always help you with tips for the best places to visit and eat in Antwerp and there is always a  little surprise waiting for you when you check in.

the rooms are warm and cozy .. some large, some smaller, but all very charming and completely renovated.

As a makeup artist, hygiene is incredibly important to me and the rooms will be dust free and anti allergic, bathrooms will always be clean and the bedding freshly washed.

I hope to meet you soon!
Erik

name: 'Cleyn Antwerpen': 19th century apartment+terrace
description:
Nice to see you are interested to stay in our cosy apartment.

What do we offer?

- the entire groundfloor apartment
- a private entrance
- a private terrace
- an equiped kitchen
- a kingsize bed (180 - 200cm)
- only 2 stops away from the central station
- close to the city park and center
- parking in the street for €4/day
- public transport @ 200m
- a 'goody bag' with plenty of tips
- an enthusiastic superhost

It's also good to know that we are certified and in rule with local legislations!

The space
About the interior and facilities:
The entire ground floor is at your disposal to chill and relax.
The living room is very cosy and on sunny mornings the room is even more beautiful and bright due to the numerous windows and high ceilings. Just the place to enjoy your first coffee. There is a fully equiped kitchen with a stove, a Nespresso machine, a fridge and all necessary
host_about:
In our free time, we like to enjoy culture, festivals, dj-sets, vintage markets and dining out with our family and crazy friends. Our two adorable pugs, Spike and Lolita keep us fit. We enjoy the little things in life, things money can’t buy! We like to express this simplicity in our 19th century ground floor apartment.  
A warm welcome to ‘Cleyn Antwerpen’! 

Hallo!, Tof dat je ons appartement leuk vindt :)
We hopen jullie dan ook snel te verwelkomen! Zelf zijn we zot van A! Oorspronkelijk zijn we van een andere Vlaamse stad, namelijk Leuven, maar we verloren ettelijke jaren geleden ons hart aan deze mooie Scheldestad. We houden van de veelzijdigheid van de stad, het water, linker-en rechteroever...
Antwerpen heeft de kenmerken van een stad maar voor ons toch de gezelligheid van een groot dorp. De cultuurmogelijkheden, café's, wereldkeuken, clubscene, winkels en koffiebars typeren de veelzijdigheid van de stad. Er is maw voor ieder wat wils. Zelf zijn we fervente muziekliefhebbers en proberen we op geregelde basis wat dj's te gaan ontdekken en wat festivals mee te pikken. We wandelen graag en daar hebben we gezelschap voor! Onze twee mopshonden Spike & Lola houden ons fit :) 
En natuurlijk pikken we graag op geregelde basis een restaurantje mee! Genieten van de kleine dingen ... dat is iets wat we de laatste jaren meer en meer doen en wat ons ook oprecht gelukkig maakt. We hopen in Cleyn Antwerpen eenvoud, gezelligheid en feel good te combineren om jullie zo volop te laten genieten van onze mooie Scheldestad.

name: Spacious apartment - B&B InterMezzo near parc.
description:
BnB Intermezzo biedt een volledig gerenoveerd benedenappartement met eigen ingang en privé badkamer. Veggie of vegan gasten serveren we een aangepast ontbijt.
We zijn gelegen nabij Antwerpen op het gelijkvloers van een statig herenhuis van 1913 en vlakbij het park Rivierenhof .
Voor zowel korte periodes als voor zakenverblijven kan u bij ons terecht.
WIFI is gratis. Uitgebreid ontbijten kan voor 7,00 pppn.
Koffie- en theefaciliteiten worden gratis aangeboden evenals een welkomstdrink.

The space
We verhuren 1 ruim appartement met statige slaapkamer en suite met een kingsize bed (200x180) voor 1 of 2 personen en de mogelijkheid om van de sofa een comfortabel bed voor 1 of 2 personen te maken.
U kan privatief gebruik maken van de gehele benedenverdieping om rustig te ontbijten, te relaxen in de zithoek of in de stads(zuid)tuin.
Bij goed weer wordt het ontbijt buiten geserveerd.
Voor zakenmensen is er voldoende werkruimte,
neighborhood_overview:
Vlakbij vindt u concertzalen Trix, De Roma, Rataplan, OLT Rivierenhof en het Sportpaleis. Met de tram die zich op 5' wandelen bevindt bent u op 10' in het centrum van Antwerpen. Eveneens met de (huur) fiets bereikt u makkelijk het centrum.
U verblijft op wandelafstand (5') van een enorme groene oase zijnde het park Rivierenhof met de mogelijkheid om te wandelen, 's morgens te joggen of te genieten van het prachtig terras aan de vijver van het parkkasteel.
Het Wijnegem Shoppingcenter is makkelijk te bereiken.
Er zijn op wandelafstand gezellige restaurants, authentieke café's en supermarkten.

name: Charmante Privékamer in Antwerpen-Wilrijk
description:
Relax in stijl ! Sfeervolle kamer in karaktervol appartement.
U krijgt de slaapkamer volledig voor uzelf terwijl de keuken, badkamer en het toilet gemeenschappelijk zijn. Doch houden wij rekening met uw privacy en beperken onze aanwezigheid tot een minimum.
Op vraag kunnen wij u ook ontbijt- luxe ontbijt- lunch-snacks en verschillende specialiteiten aanbieden.
Indien u wenst kunnen wij u ook oppikken aan station of luchthaven .
Onze woning is ook makkeliik bereikbaar met het openbaar vervoer.

The space
Appartement in zeer groene omgeving. Op 500 m van prachtig park en openlucht Middelheim Museum.

Guest access
Naast gebruik van uw privekamer, toegang tot luxueuze badkamer, keuken en balkon met rookgelegenheid. Mits overleg kan de zeer gezellige keuken door u gebruikt worden als extra ruimte om in te vertoeven.
Op uw vraag serveren wij standaardontbijt of luxeontbijt en bieden wij extra services zoals transport, div
neighborhood_overview:
De ligging van onze woonst is uitstekend.
Gelegen in een rustige, groene buurt én toch vlakbij een heleboel trekpleisters die uiterst vlot bereikbaar zijn.
Vlakbij (5 min) verbinding met snelwegen naar alle grootste belgische (toeristische) steden : Brussel, Gent, Brugge, Oostende, enz. . Rijafstand Luchthaven Zaventem 20 minuten.
Vlak gelegen bij het Sint Augustinus ziekenhuis, het Universitair Ziekenhuis Antwerpen (UZA), de Universiteit Antwerpen, Universiteit Middelheim, Het Olympisch Ziekenhuis Wezenberg, , 500 meter van prachtig park en Openlucht Middelheim Museum, 20 min van Antwerpen Centrum met directe, vlotte verbinding vanaf 50 meter van de voordeur met openbaar vervoer of huurfiets. Eventueel privé auto op aanvraag.

name: Antwerp City Center Flat (build in 2019)
description:
This new modern and trendy city center flat is located close (9 minutes’ walk) to the Antwerp Central Station. We have been working over 20 years in hospitality industry and because of this we know what guests are looking for: a nice, modern and clean flat, in the centre of the city, nearby lots and good restaurants, shopping possibilities and points of interest.If you want to cook for yourself, there is a Supermarkt (Delhaize) at 3 minutes’ walk from our flat.

The space
In our flat you will find a comfy bed room with satin sheets and en suite bathroom with nice smelling soap and new towels. The kitchen is very well equipped with all modern appliances (oven, fridge, dish washer, mixer, toaster, Senseo Coffee ...) and of course nice cutlery, pots and pans. In the bright living room you will find a 43’ flat screen TV with a Netflix connection. You can chill in the comfortable couch (can be transformed on request into a bed for 2 kids or 1 adult) and watch t
neighborhood_overview: If you need any tips from locals, do not hesitate to contact us, but you will find an extensive information map with a lot of addresses and “must-do’s”.  We hope to welcome you and wish you already a lot of fun with your preparation of your trip to Antwerp, city of diamonds and “the good life”!
host_about:
We zijn reeds sinds jaren in hospitality sector werkzaam en daardoor weten we perfect wat gasten wensen.  Goede eerlijke informatie en een leuk verblijf, dat willen wij jullie graag bezorgen.

Zelf reizen we ook vaak en gebruiken maar al te graag dit platform.

name: Comfortable, relaxing and with a personal touch
description:
You are a guest in a creative and active family with three teenage children and three cats. The guest room is located on the ground floor of our home. You enjoy comfort and privacy in a homely atmosphere.
You will also find a cozy sitting area in the studio next to the guest room where, in the winter, the pellet stove burns attractively. In the morning you can use our breakfast service here. But you will also find all the practical necessities to prepare something yourself.

The space
The guest room is tastefully decorated with wooden furniture and here and there a funny detail such as a strip of retro wallpaper or a colorful shell garland.
Double bed, flat screen, internet, coffee and tea are available in the room. Our guests have their own separate private bathroom with shower, sink and toilet.

Guest access
As a guest you have access to the entire ground floor of the house.

Other things to note
2.5 euros to
neighborhood_overview:
Our B&B is located in a nice and quiet residential area near a park ( Hof van Leysen) where you can drink a coffee at Café Kamiel. Or maybe you would like to buy all sorts of goodies yourself at the Reddende Engel bakery in our street.
Villa Rafels has even more advantages in terms of location. For example, Expo Antwerp is within walking distance of our B&B. The same applies to the Wezenberg Olympic swimming center and the Singel international arts center.
We are also very close to a large number of training centers such as; East West Center, PIVA and KOCA.
host_about: I'm Dutch but I've been living  in Belgium for a pretty long time. Alex is my husband. Together we have three fantastic kids. I very much like being among friends, family and our 3 cats.  I love my city and that's why I want to take the best possible care of my guests during their stay in Antwerp. I wish for them to enjoy this town as much as I do!

host_about: Our hotel is situated within walking distance of all public transport. There are tram/metro/bus stops close to the hotel (50m), and Antwerp central station is just a 10-minute walk. name: Luxuary  studio in the centre of Antwerp
description:
My studio is very comfortable and very modern. The interior is new and up to date.
The kitchen is well equiped as well as the bathroom.
All linnen is available in the studio. You are in de historic centre of the city, at the square Kon. Astridplein and have the view on the historical central station as well as at the Antwerp Zoo.
De cauch transforms into a very comfortable bed for 2.

The space
Top location for any type of stay, both leisure and holiday stay.

Guest access
The complete studio is yours during your stay.

Other things to note
Please be carefull for the interior, it's all new. A small controle will be held at the end of your stay.
neighborhood_overview:
Top location in de old centre of the city. All historic buildings nearby. Beautiful restaurants, shops and museums.
Parking: there is an underground parking called Parking Astrid, just before the studio. U best use this parking for arrival. But for longer stay it is expensive. So better take your car to one of the Park & Rides ( P+R) , at the ring of Antwerp. Parking is for free there and you have direct access to the tram which takes you immediately to the center of town.

name: Ground floor apartament with terras
description:
Apartment on the ground floor with apart sleeping room, living room, kitchen, bathroom with shower and toilet, and a smal terras.
It located at 5 minutes by foot from the Central Stadion, in an area where food shops and small restaurants are open thill late in the night. Easy to reach, and 2 minutes walk for the tram station that brings you to the Central Station ,or on the new part of the city.
I leave in the building

The space
Appartement is situated in an area where food shops, as wel as smal restaurants are open thil late in the evening.
Apartament is recently renovated , . From the kitchen you can go outside on the terras . Terras has a roof protection in CAse that rains tha you do not have to go directly inside. Building is a small building and every Floor had only one appartment . I leave in the building.

Guest access
Appartment is totaly private for the guests . IT has a living room for 20 Mp , open kitchen for 16 Mp
neighborhood_overview: Appartment is 5 minutes by foot from the central station . 2 minutes by foot from the tram station that brings you on All Sites of Antwerp . 1 minutes by foot from the Pharmacies , docters, night shops . Supermarkt , Barber, etc Everything very close . just around the corner from Central Station and the Keyserlei with its numerous restaurants and cafes, the UGC cinema complex ... Since the reconstruction of the Keyserlei, a bicycle and pedestrian boulevard takes you from the Central Station to the old city center, with its Grand Place, Cathedral and Groenplaats, only 1.6 km (1 mile) from your bed. Metro Station 'Elisabeth' is just around the corner (100m), with bike rental stands next to it. Fun fact: Vincent Van Gogh lived in our street from 24 November 1885 until end of February 1886. Two of his paintings titled 'Lange Beeldekensstraat' are exhibited at the Vincent Van Gogh Museum in Amsterdam* I am a world cyclists myself and enjoy the stories and anecdotes of all travelers :) Break

name: Antwerp city centre - 16th century house
description:
Situated in the historic centre of Antwerp. The house dates back to the 16th century and is full of character. Located veruit near to restaurants, pubs, museums and pubs. Especially the museum of fashion and all the fashion industry is in the vicinity.
The street itself is very calm and quiet.

The space
The place is full of character. The guests van enjoy their room, the bathroom, can make use of the kitchen and the dining room.

Other things to note
The entire Antwerp city centre is a low emission zone. Those who intend to come by car should check if their car is allowed to enter the LEZ (please check on https://lez.antwerpen.be/?Taal=EN).
neighborhood_overview:
- the Antwerp Cathedral and other historic churches
- the Rubens house
- museum Mayer Van den Bergh (collection Pieter Brueghel)
- MAS museum
- museum Plantijn - Moretus
- many cosy pubs and restaurants
- AMUZ (concert hall in a former church)

name: Lighted and spacious apartment in Antwerp
description:
An amazing big and bright apartment in the heart of Antwerp.The apartment has just been completely renovated, it is situated 2 minutes walking distance from the Central train station, the largest famous zoo, diamond area ,Elisabethzaal and the new amazing chocolate museum. 10 minutes walking distance from the Meir ( main shopping street).
All public transports are a minute away! Around the corner you have a big supermarket.

The space
The apartment has a big living room, fully equipped open kitchen, 2 bedrooms,a big comfy couch which can easily be transformed to an extra big one person bed, a bathroom and a separated toilet.
It is all fully furnished and has a big flat screen smart TV

description:

Alle appartementen beschikken over een ingerichte keuken en een gezellige zithoek met een lightwall, alle appartement hebben ook een terras. Er is een tv en gratis wifi beschikbaar. The space
Het appartement is 54m²

Guest access

Na 18.00u inchecken is altijd mogelijk maar dan gaat dit via de App Argo die u kan Downloaden u krijgt dan een mail met een code van mij die u dan moet ingeven om de voordeur alsook de kamerdeur te d
neighborhood_overview: Het Eilandje heeft zijn naam niet gestolen: het oudste havengebied van Antwerpen is omgeven door water. Vandaag is de havenactiviteit meer in het noorden geconcentreerd, maar het havengevoel overheerst hier nog steeds. Proef de oude sfeer van de loskade met monumentale pakhuizen, lantaarns, hangars en kasseitjes. Dankzij drie publiekstrekkers, het MAS | Museum aan de Stroom, het Red Star Line Museum en het Havenhuis, wordt de band tussen de stad en het water nog eens onderstreept. Na een verblijf aan onze mooie stad ga je zeker met veel herinneringen en leuke foto’s naar huis! Als je meer informatie wil over wat er te beleven valt in Antwerpen bezoek je best een de volgende website: www.visitantwerpen.be

IK DOE AL 25 JAAR BUSINESS MET VOLLE OVERTUIGEN EN MET VEEL PASSIE IK BEN EEN ZEER VROLIJKE DAME DIE U HARTELIJK WELCOM HEET IN MIJN LOGIES EN U ZAL BIJSTAAN MET AL U VRAGEN OF NODEN! U ZAL MET EEN GOED GEVOEL HUISWAARTS KEREN!

name: Duplex place in south district for 2 to 4 people!
description:
It’s a cosy and quiet 2 floors apartment, at the 3th floor, and it is fully equipped.
You are near the Mhka, FoMu Photography museum, and the Museum voor Schone kunsten.
It’s a nice district with galleries, restaurants and bars.
The Antwerp historical center is at walking distance.

The space
The fully equipped kitchen has a dishwasher.
The living area has comfortable seating and tv with dvd player.
Cable tv and WiFi are available
The 2 bedrooms (one with a double bed of 140 cm and one with 2 single beds of 80cm) and 1 bathroom are upstairs.
The place is at the 3th floor.

Guest access
The place is all yours!
Feel home!

Other things to note
Kitchen is well equipped , coffee thee and cooking basics are available ...
neighborhood_overview:
Museums, bars, restaurants, are in direct access.
The cathedral and Antwerp historical center will be at walking distance (20 min).
The Schelde river is at 500m.
When available, there is free carparking at 300m
There’s a foodstore at 350m.
.

name: Double room-Deluxe-Private Bathroom
description:
Goodnight Antwerp is a small accommodation with a great atmosphere, a mixture of a hotel and a B&B, combining the best of both. The perfect base to visit our beautiful city,within walking distance from the Central Station and the Zoo, the commercial axis, the old town and the island district.
The 5 rooms have all been stylished individually and tastefully. Thanks to the colors, materials, high ceilings and lighting, the rooms are romantic, luxurious, elegant and relaxing.
If you wish, a hearty breakfast will be served.

The space
These spacious 27m² rooms have all been stylish individually and tastefully. Thanks to the colors, materials, high ceilings and lighting, the rooms are romantic, luxurious, elegant and relaxing.

name: Great apartment, top location in historical center
description:
Welcome to our petit apartment in the historic city center of beautiful Antwerp.
The location is in Antwerp's student area, perfect in the middle between the "Grote markt" and the "Meir" - highstreet shopping.
The apartment is on the third floor and rustic decorated. It's a one bedroom apartment, with an equipped kitchen, one bathroom with toilet and shower and a little balcony to enjoy the city!

The space
The building is a restored neoclassical townhouse and originates from around 1830. The entrance is original with the old tiles and big oak stairway.

The apartment is on the third floor and rustic decorated. It's a one bedroom apartment, with a fully equipped kitchen, one bathroom (with toilet, shower and washing machine) and a little balcony to enjoy the city!
The apartment is refreshed in June 2019 with small renovations, new paint, new bedding/towels and a beautifull new retro design sofa.
Fast internet (wifi) and digital tv
neighborhood_overview:
Welcome to our rustic petit apartment in the historic city center of beautiful Antwerp.

The location is in Antwerp's student area, perfect in the middle between the "Grote markt" and the "Meir" - highstreet shopping.

It's a very quite street, but surroundend with nice little restaurants and bars and great shops.
Just around the corner of the Hendrik Conscience square with its beautifull buildings from the 17th century, a must visit!

From the apartment you can easily walk to the shopping, nightlife or theater district or to the docks ("kaaien").

Just a perfect spot to enjoy the beautifull city of Antwerp!
host_about:
Hi, I'm Paul. 
Born in 1975, married to Maud and  with a young daughter. We are original Dutch, but we live in Belgium for 10-15 years now.  I'm working as a contracts manager for Stork (a Fluor company) and my wife works in the hospitality business in Antwerp. 
We live in the Belgium countryside close to the Dutch border, but used to live downtown and hence we kept our love for Antwerp. 
In 2019 we got the opportunity to buy a beautiful little property in one of the best area's in Antwerp, which we would like to share with you. In our apartment we brought the rustic atmosphere of our home to the beautiful city of Antwerp. 
Very pleased to meet you!

name: ZEN apartment
description:
Hi! You have Antwerp for tourists AND you have Antwerp for travelers. Our " zen" apartment is located in the most multicultural and upcoming neighbourhood , the place to be now !
The apartment is on the groundfloor of a authentic mansion in a one direction street.
Between Central Station and Park Spoor Noord and on walking distance of the Eilandje and the Old Town.

The space
The apartment has a bright bedroom ( double bed) , diningroom and a cozy livingroom to relax. There a kitchen with a gasstove, a microwave, a coffeemachine and a waterboiler. There is also a shower, a seperated toilet and a washingmachine. Last but not least a patio.

Guest access
Apartment and patio
neighborhood_overview: The Nord is the upcoming place of Antwerp! There are a lot of trendy and authentic, multicultural bars and restaurants situated at De Koninckplein, St.Jansplein and Park Spoor Noord.
host_about:
"Adventure is the best way to learn."

Hi everyone,
My name is Christel and this is my story:
I come from the countryside of Belgium. You know...like a small time-stood-still-village where everybody knows everybody :) ? Well, the only way to get out of there once in a while is by going to my favorite city in Belgium, Antwerp.

The City.
I like art, no I mean I LOVE art. Music, theatre, ballet, expositions, literature, performances,...are my sources of inspiration to be creative. I also love  Antwerp is both modern and authentic. It’s a city that moves. There are dozens of cultural activities every week. The food in the restaurants, even in the tiny bars are amazing. It’s ALL about exploring with all your senses. 

About the apartment.
My husband, my kids and I renovated this building a couple of years ago. I prefer to stay there once in a while, having some time for myself. That’s why we decided it to rent it on Airbnb. We’ve chosen for this neighborhood ‘cause it’s the most upcoming place in Antwerp. It’s on a foot walk from the centre and yet it’s different. It’s Antwerps most multicultural neigbourhood. Over 70 different nationalities! And they all have their own cultural traditions which are awesome to discover!

To my guests.
Enjoy your time in Antwerp, they say it's the city of diamonds. 
But for me it's the people who shine :)
Leave a note, a comment or better...a story before you leave. 
I love stories.

name: Duplex in a beautiful 1907 house.
description:
The house is located within the middle of the orthodox Jewish community at 'Zurenborg'. Zurenborg has a vital square with lots of cafés and restaurants. The streets around the square are peaceful, quiet and very beautiful cause af the art deco elements. The space (185m2) is ground floor and first floor wich is connected by a hall. The rooms you rent are private.

The space
The apartment I rent still has authentic elements: coloured staned glass, beautiful doors and other constructive elements.

Guest access
The apartment is on the ground floor and on the first floor. I live upstairs. There are no keys on the doors, but we respect each others privacy.

Other things to note
The rooms wich are included are: a garden op 35m2, a big kitchen, a middle room, a living room on the ground floor. On the first floor there are: a private toilet, a bathroom with a bath and two lavabo's, and two sleeping rooms with double beds. The t
neighborhood_overview:
Lots of things to see in my neighbourhood:
- Culture with its beautiful synagoges and extra ordinary houses.
- Horeca: bars, restaurants and coffeebars.
- The centre of Antwerp: our impressive gothic cathedral, the Rubens-house, not to forget the work from our great painters witch can be seen in churches and musea.
At the tourist office next to the main house, you can figure out what you want to visite.
host_about: Hello, I am a single mother with two sons from 18 and 19 years old. Every two weeks they live with me. My hobbys are ceramics and painting.

Tot snel

name: Quiet & cozy appartement in the HEART of the city!
description:
Beautiful appartement in the heart of Antwerp. Very quiet street. The appartement is on the first floor (no elevator) and has a lovely view. Located in the historical city center this is a perfect base to explore the city by foot, bike or public transport.

The space
Cozy appartement on the first floor consisting of a light and spacious living room with open kitchen, a bedroom and a bathroom with shower and toilet.

Guest access
The apartment consists of a big living are with kitchenette, a bedroom and a bathroom.

Other things to note
On the ground level of the building I have a small vintage showroom that is part of the vintage selling I do through instagram ---> @dressing_circles
If you like vintage clothes and accessoires please come in when I am there or ask me for an appointment and do some private shopping!
neighborhood_overview: The appartement is located in the middle of the historic city center. You are 50meters from the main square with the City Hall and 100meters from the Cathedral (wich is considered the CENTER of the city). A 200meters walk takes you to the river Schelde. All the must see places are in walking distance (museums, shopping, historic buildings, bars, restaurants, etc..).
host_about: Ik ben geboren en getogen in Antwerpen. Ik ben werkzaam in de Horeca (heb enkele jaren mijn eigen muziekcafé uitgebaat) en de cultuursector (Bourlaschouwburg). Ik heb een passie voor vintage en tweedehands meubelen en kleding. Samen met een vriendin begin ik binnenkort een eigen vintagewinkel in hartje Antwerpen. Verder maak artwork op aanvraag en eigen werk met analoge collages.

name: Penthouse of medieval home with rooftop terrace
description:
Beautifully renovated, light apartment on the 2nd floor of an authentic medieval house in the pedestrian city-center of Antwerp. The perfect place to unwind with a beer or glass of wine on the rooftop-terrace, to explore the lively city-center or to eat & drink in the many surrounding restaurants and cafes. The owners' recommendations make this hopefully an unforgettable stay.

The space
Open-plan apartment with kitchen, sitting area and comfortable queen-size bed. Bathroom with shower and separate toilet. Mezzanine with 2 single beds, leading towards rooftop terrace. Abundance of board-games to enjoy.
neighborhood_overview: In the middle of the medieval city-center of Antwerp, walking distance from all sites and restaurants/bars.
host_about: We live with our daughter Ida in the center of Antwerp. We are avid travelers for work and pleasure, love food, with a special weakness for sushi, walking through new cities and reading about them.

name: Bright and modern studio apartment.
description: On the second floor of an original 100 year old house, you'll find this contemporary studio appartment. It was tastefully renovated and has everything you need for a longer stay. Lots of natural light, a queensize bed with extra storage space, a private and fully equiped kitchen and last but not least a large and beautiful bath tub.
neighborhood_overview:
The appartment is located in between the Tentoonstellingswijk and Kiel. You'll be close to by far the most beautiful parks of Antwerp. In the Nachtegalenpark you can go for a run or a coffee and before you realise it, you'll be in the Middelheim park where there's a permanent outdoor art exhibition. Cross the street and you can continue your run or stroll in park Den Brandt where you can enjoy the famous Jazz Middelheim festival in August.
The neighbourhood is a truly divers example of Antwerp. Across the street you'll find a Marocan-Belgian bakery where you'll find both fresh msemen and typical Belgian buns on Sunday.
host_about:
I'm Anke and I love to travel. Together with my husband, we've been to Nepal, Lebanon, Peru and many more. Since 2019, a third travel companion joined our team. Now our daughter explores the world with us.
Love to meet you!

name: LOFT in Antwerp - bright 140m2 space
description:
Very bright 140m2 loft in the centre of Antwerp.
The space is used as an art space/architecture office and serves as a living space as well.
The bedroom, bathroom and dressing are designed as a compact glass volume in order to give the living room/kitchen a very open feeling.
The whole loft bathes in light, as there are 10 big windows and a huge sliding door towards the 15m2 terrace.
There is a private parking place under the common courtyard.
The loft is at 2 min. from the Central station.
neighborhood_overview:
The loft is situated in the very nice neighbourhood of Borgerhout and Zurenborg.
At the Borgerhout side there is a vibrant multi-cultural atmosphere.
At the Zurenborg side there is beautiful architecture and a lot of restaurants around Dageraadplaats.
The hip and cultural South ('Zuid') of Antwerp is at short biking distance , as well as the green area of 'Park Spoor Noord' and the maritime area 'Eilandje' in the North of Antwerp.
Lots to do here!

name: ☼ SUNSHINE Loft for Cozy & Happy time ☼
description:
REFURBISHED & Looking GOOD! Cosy times at sunny duplex Loft well located in the Center with rooftop view. Open & Spacious: a separate sleeping level, living area, equipped kitchen and a huge wellness shower. Enjoy a book in the morning sun in a cosy seating corner upstairs. Well located near Mechels Plein, Trendy Antwerp South and Huidevetterstraat with classy shops, cosy bars and nice restaurants. Bus and tram station as well as Antwerp old town around the corner.

The space
The flat has a 140 cm double bed, and 2 160cm double sofa sleepers.
Is fully furnished and equipped kitchen with fridge, freezer, oven, coffee machine, and everything you need to prepare a nice dinner, ...
Bright and sunny with plenty of roof windows, giving a view of Antwerp.
Located in the 3rd floor, but definitely worth the trip upstairs to enjoy cosy and good times.
A characteristic historical house which has been completely renovated, with a beautifull antique faca
neighborhood_overview:
Mechels Plein is around the corner, it has several bars and restaurants, so if you feel like a lazy stroll and enjoy, this is only a footstep away. Italian restaurants, Sushi restaurant, Belgian cuisine, Classy restaurants, ... Drinking Coctails, home brewed coffee on a terrace and authentic beer bars, we have it all at 5 minute walk. If you prefer to spebnd time in the old historical town, it takes not even 10 minutes to walk to the old town part of Antwerp, passing trendy shops underway. Fashion lovers will find Nationalestraat at only 2 blocks away and if you like oysters and cava, enjoy the atmosphere the weekly local and weekend market around the corner. If cocooning is more yoru thing... you will find plenty of supermarkets and even specialised bakerys, butchers, cheese, chocolate, ... shops all around the area.
If you come by public transport, the station will be at +- 15 minute walk, but you can also hop on a tram which brings you directly to Nationale bank a main tr
host_about: Hallo, dit huis was ooit een krot, na veel zwoegen is het nu een mooi huis met leuke accommodatie. Ik doe reeds verschillende jaren korte termijn verhuringen en probeer het nu ook eens op AirBNB. name: Unieke woning in het historisch stadscentrum
description:
Karaktervolle stadswoning in oud Antwerpen. Deze eeuwenoude woning is met moderne accenten uniek gerenoveerd. Ideaal voor het verblijf van een vrienden- of vriendinnengroep, een vrijgezellenweekend of een reünie. Vanuit de woning sta je op enkele minuten wandelen bij de Grote Markt, de kathedraal of het MAS. De woning is super rustig gelegen aan een idyllisch stadspleintje, en maakt van je verblijf in Antwerpen een bijzondere ervaring ! Gratis P op 900 m.

The space
Op het gelijkvloers vind je de woonkamer met open keuken en een eerste toilet. Op de open tussenverdieping is een “vintage” zitruimte ingericht met uitzicht op het stadspleintje. Op de eerste verdieping vind je een grote slaapkamer met een dubbel bed en een stapelbed, de badkamer met bad en douche en een tweede, afzonderlijk toilet. De mooie, oude zolderverdieping is één grote slaapkamer met 4 dubbele bedden.

Guest access
De volledige woning is ter beschikking van de gasten.
neighborhood_overview: In het historische hart van Antwerpen.

name: Enjoy Antwerp, stay in a charming apartment!
description:
We are hosting a beautiful, modern and comfortable apartment (55 sqm) in one of the greatest neighborhoods of Antwerp! Lots of light during the day, and very quiet at night. You can find everything you need in the apartment to feel at home! The place is very close to different highways (E19), and it is easy to park in front of the building or in the streets around it for just 3,80 euro per day!!! There is so much to do around the apartment and we would love to help you get around!

The space
There is a fully equipped kitchen so you can cook for your self, we offer different wine services on request ( if interested in wine and dine!).
There is a smart TV with a Netflix option you can use for free. There is a comfortable sofa bed and extra sheets and pillows available on request (for bookings more then 2 people). The bedroom is also very light and clean, and the bed is great to sleep in! The apartment is very quiet, as you have your own entrance. You can liste
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is situated in one of the nicest neighborhoods, only 10 minutes walk to "de Singel" if you want to pick a jazz concert, dance or theater show. There are 3 beautiful parks around the apartment, and beer brewery " De Koninck" is only 5 minutes walk. There are a few nice coffee bars in the streets around if you want to have a good breakfast to start the day. Also there is a bike stations right next to the building (Red Velo's) where you can pick a bike to get around. City center, shopping area's, museums and lots of unique landmark are only 15 min by bike, 30 min walk or 20 min by tram. Lots of nice (wine) bars and restaurants are so close, you can walk every where if you love to discover this beautiful city.
host_about: I love traveling, books, wine, good coffee, and getting to know people!

name: Hartje Antwerpen, stijlvol en gezellig
description:
Appartement vlakbij de kathedraal, de hotspot voor toeristen, waar werkelijk alles aan je voeten ligt. Open de ramen van de woonkamer en je voelt je in het midden van het levendige en bruisende Antwerpen. Je kan alles makkelijk te voet bezoeken.
Als je iemand bent die graag lekker eet en drinkt, de wereldkeuken in de directe omgeving; voor Belgisch eten, gewoon de trappen aflopen en je kunt dineren in de ‘Pottekijker’.

The space
Je moet je geen zorgen maken voor teveel lawaai van buiten; met de ramen dicht zit je in de stilte van de woonkamer en de slaapkamer bevindt zich achteraan. Het restaurant beneden sluit normaal om 10u ’s avonds.
Het is perfect voor een stel, een jong kind kan ook op de bank (1.6m) slapen.

neighborhood_overview: Antwerp is Belgium’s second largest city, has the biggest port and is the capital of coal. It has long been a powerful magnet for everyone from fashion moguls and club queens to art lovers and diamond dealers. In the mid-16th century it was one of Europe’s most important cities and home to baroque superstar painters like Pieter Paul Rubens. Despite many historical travails thereafter and severe WWII bombing, Antwerp retains an intriguing medieval heart with plenty of café-filled cobbled lanes, a riverside fortress and a truly impressive Cathedral. Today, however, Antwerp’s top drawcards are its vibrant fashion and entertainment scene, booming diamond businesses along with its startling architectural and cultural contrasts.

description:
A fantastic spacious house to spend some quality time with friends and family. With completely private entrance. Great entertainment kitchen and garden for breakfast and long dinners. Fun location for the best restaurants, bars and cool shops.
The house has three full bedrooms with double beds and one open bedroom with a single bed. It is great for groups.

The space
The house is fantastic for groups. Friends and family can stay together and explore the city. It has a big kitchen dining space. Which makes it the hart of the home. With a huge table for some memorable times.
host_about: Always here to help. I am Yan from house with a story. If you have any questions or request I will solve them :). So you and your guests can have the best time in Antwerp.

name: Charming and spacious apartment with sunny terrace
description:
Charming and spacious apartment with sunny terrace in a lively neighborhood, near the central station.

The space
The apartment is on the first floor, accessible by a long straight staircase. You then enter through a hallway that gives access to the kitchen and living areas. The kitchen and dining room both have a view of the terrace, and are therefore very light spaces. Through the kitchen you enter the terrace, which is not enclosed but very open and casts a glance at a landscape of typical Flemish back-building. The terrace also borders our back house, where we store our private belongings when we have visitors. The bqq around the corner is however available! There is a gas fire in the kitchen and we have a small but very capable oven! As well as a microwave. There is a fridge with freezer compartment, and there is a washing machine that you can use. The dining room has windows overlooking the terrace, and has a spacious table with at least 6 places, there are
neighborhood_overview: In the apartment you will find a folder with all kinds of tips about the neighborhood! The apartment is 10 minutes walk from the central station and the zoo. You then walk along the Offerandestraat, which is a car-free shopping street, where you will also find the supermarket Albert Heyn. You can also shop in the Chinese street for typical Asian specialties, or in the regular supermarket there, which is located in an old market hall! In the other direction you walk further to Borgerhout, with the Turnhoutsebaan as axis along which you will find all kinds of parks, squares and eating and drinking places. Or you can walk further towards the Seefhoek, where you will find, among other things, beautiful Park Spoor Noord. Borgerhout and the Seefhoek are both authentic and lively neighborhoods of Antwerp.

name: gelijkvloersappartement met tuin in rustige straat
description:
Gelijkvloersappartement met tuin. Heerlijk zitten op het terras. Gelegen in een heel rustige straat, vlak bij tram- en bushalte, 15 minuten van het oude stadscentrum. 20 minuten wandelen van het Middelheimmuseum, Brand en Vogelzang/Nachtegalenpark.

The space
Heerlijke tuin met terras. Woonkamer met tafel voor 8 personen, hangmat (kan ook buiten op het terras) en futonbed voor 2 personen. Badkamer met wc, lavabo, zitbad/douche. Ingerichte keuken met voldoende materiaal gasfornuis en grote koelkast, bergruimte met wasmachine.
neighborhood_overview: Vlak bij de mooiste parken van Antwerpen en natuurgebied de Hobokense polder

name: Spacious & modern apartment in Antwerp's centre
description:
Beautiful, brand new apartment on the first floor (with elevator) with a stunning view and a lot of natural light located in Antwerp's city centre. Just a 2 minute walk to the Meir (shopping street), a public park, cosy bars and restaurants,... I wrote my favourite places down for you to go and explore.

You can park your car in 'Parking Horta' (Hopland 24, Antwerp - 4 min walk) for 10,00€ a day.

Hope to welcome you soon!

The space
You have the whole apartment and the stunning view for yourself.

My home has two bedrooms with each their own bathroom (one shower - one bath).
One of the bedrooms has a sleeping sofa for two people. Plus there is a guest toilet!
There is also a laundry machine, dryer, ironing board and iron available for those who are staying for a long period of time.
neighborhood_overview:
You will be staying in the heart of Antwerp's theatre district and city centre.
Everything is in mere walking distance, so my home is the perfect place connecting Antwerp's finest places together!

A bright, large and newly renovated apartment right in the city center, surrounded by fashion stores and hip coffee-shops. The kitchen is fully equipped and we supply fresh linen, towels and all essentials.

Located very close to the famous shopping street Meir and the main-squares "Groenplaats" and "Grote Markt". The best possible location for a visit to Antwerp!

The Central station is a 15-20min walk and there's a free parking area at the Waalse Kaai on a 10min walk.

Best regards!

The space
Our apartments are decorated to make you feel at home. We want to give you a warm, enjoyable and relaxing place to rest while exploring our beautiful city. Our apartment is equipped with all essentials for a comfortable trip. Eg. a fully equipped kitchen, fresh bedlinnen and towels for each guest, shower gel, shampoo and conditioner, coffee, tea, hair dryer etc.

Guest access
The apartment is completely private for the
neighborhood_overview: Antwerp is Belgium’s second largest city, has the biggest port and is the capital of coal. It has long been a powerful magnet for everyone from fashion moguls and club queens to art lovers and diamond dealers. In the mid-16th century it was one of Europe’s most important cities and home to baroque superstar painters like Pieter Paul Rubens. Despite many historical travails thereafter and severe WWII bombing, Antwerp retains an intriguing medieval heart with plenty of café-filled cobbled lanes, a riverside fortress and a truly impressive Cathedral. Today, however, Antwerp’s top drawcards are its vibrant fashion and entertainment scene, booming diamond businesses along with its startling architectural and cultural contrasts.

name: The Red Monkey
description:
The Red Monkey studio is located at the ground floor of the building and has it's own entrance. You can check-in yourself with a codelock. The studio is decorated by Stekkie Amsterdam and has a unique colorful style on its own. The studio has everything you need; a boxspring queen size bed, a fully equipped kitchen, two TV's with channels from every country in the world, a bathroom with a rain shower and a little private patio next to the bedroom. Super location to explore Antwerp!

The space
You will enter the studio with a code and step right into the living space which consists out of a built-in sofa with pillows, a colorful chair and a flatscreen TV with more than 10.000 channels from all over the world. The kitchen and bathroom are opposite to each other and in between you can walk to the bedroom, which is located in the back of the studio. The bedroom consists out of a queen size boxspring bed, a wardrobe, an iron and ironing board, also a flatscreen TV with
neighborhood_overview: We can assure you that this is just the best neighborhood of Antwerp. Super central, a quiet street, close to public transfer and free parking Zuiderdokken, in the middle of the best shopping streets and within 10 minutes walking distance from the best restaurants, cafés and museums. The district is called Sint-Andries and it is located in the southern part of the city centre. The district is bordered by the "Historical Center" in the north, the "Theaterbuurt" in the east and "Het Zuid" in the south. Nowadays, it is the fashion centre of the city and a lot of famous Belgian designers are located here. Vintage, design, interior, fashion and boutiques are key words for what to find in this area.
host_about: SHWAY is a short and long-term rental company with three own buildings in the heart of the city Antwerp, Belgium. Interior designer Stekkie Amsterdam took care of all our apartments, to stay in one of them and feel the interior is already an experience! The founder and host Liselore is a specialist in giving you the best time in Antwerp, whether you are traveling for fashion or fun or you want to come for business, she has the best insider tips during your stay!

Modern, with visible concrete floor and ceiling. French bakery and a fine fish restaurant across the railway. Tram 9 to the citycenter at the entrance. Several parks on walking distance: stadspark, Brilschans/Brialmont and the ZOO with a magnificent garden. Concerthall Elisabeth (Antwerp Symphony) near CStation.

The building, 9 years old, is a concept by B-Architecten, a famous architectural studio.
The sun comes up in the living room and goes under at the back (bedroom): you can eat outside or relax in the afternoon/eveningsun.

The whole appartement is to you (in a building with 14 flats) with young people.

name: Spacious bright appartement with harbour view.
description:
A spacious bright appartement in the upcoming Cadix area. Located right next to het Eilandje, it is easy to borrow the typical city bikes down the road and explore Antwerp from there. The large fully equipped open kitchen and balcony give you a relaxing place to come home to after a day of exploring and a place to enjoy a nice sunny breakfast.
There is a supermarket at walking distance that is open every day ofcthr week from 8:00 untill 20:00.

The space
The master bedroom with adjacent bathroom is equipped with a large wardrobe. The bathtub will surely help you relax. If a quick shower is what you prefer, you can enjoy the rainshower in the second bathroom. Two toilets are available, one in the bathroom and one in the hallway. There is a laundry space where you will find a washing machine and dryer.
The kitchen is fully equipped.
neighborhood_overview: Best places to visit are het Eilandje with all its trendy retaurants. The Cadix area is upcoming and has some nice things to offer. Be sure to visit the microbrewery down the road, the pop up bars and restaurants along the rivers edge  such as Bar Paniek. If you would like to explore a more alternative side to Antwerp, be sure to catch a concert or art show at Het Bos.

Guest access
The apartment is completely private fo
neighborhood_overview: Antwerp is Belgium’s second largest city, has the biggest port and is the capital of coal. It has long been a powerful magnet for everyone from fashion moguls and club queens to art lovers and diamond dealers. In the mid-16th century it was one of Europe’s most important cities and home to baroque superstar painters like Pieter Paul Rubens. Despite many historical travails thereafter and severe WWII bombing, Antwerp retains an intriguing medieval heart with plenty of café-filled cobbled lanes, a riverside fortress and a truly impressive Cathedral. Today, however, Antwerp’s top drawcards are its vibrant fashion and entertainment scene, booming diamond businesses along with its startling architectural and cultural contrasts.
host_about: Hello, my name is Elisabeth! I've travelled around the world and lived abroad for a couple of years. Now my goal is to accomodate others in amazing apartments in the very heart of our beautiful city! :-)

Visit Antwerp while staying in this trendy decorated studio at 100 meters from central station and all major metro and public transport.
Wake up in this luxury bed (180x220) and get ready to stroll through town. You are close to all major shopping streets and the old city centre and 50 meters from the Antwerp meeting and convention centre and zoo

The space
you will stay in this newly renovated suite with a super size bed , thick duvet pillows and covers of the finest cotton, a bathroom with rainshower and thermostatic tab, and fully equipped kitchen.
neighborhood_overview: close to the zoo, opera, central station, diamond center, and mayor shopping streets, museums like MAS and Rubenshuis  and off course the old city centre

name: The Suit
description:
The Suit is a beautiful duplex apartment located at the third floor of the SHWAY60 Family House. You can check yourself in with a codelock. The apartment has an industrial style mixed with authentic Belgian materials such as natural stone and wooden floors. The apartment has everything you need; a queen size boxspring bed, a fully equipped kitchen, a flatscreen TV and a bathroom with a rain shower. Super location in the city centre, just perfect to explore Antwerp!

The space
When you enter the apartment after climbing the steep stairs to the 4th floor of the building, you step right into the hallway where you have the bedroom in front of you, the bathroom on your right, and the stairs to the living area on your left. The bedroom has a queen size boxspring bed, a dresser, a clothing rack and two night stands on each side. The bathroom consists out of a toilet, a rain shower and a sink. On half way of the stairs to the living area, there is a built-in closet for yo
neighborhood_overview: We can assure you that this is just the best neighborhood of Antwerp. Super central, a quiet street, close to public transfer and free parking Zuiderdokken, in the middle of the best shopping streets and within 10 minutes walking distance from the best restaurants, cafés and museums. The district is called Sint-Andries and it is located in the southern part of the city centre. The district is bordered by the "Historical Center" in the north, the "Theaterbuurt" in the east and "Het Zuid" in the south. Nowadays, it is the fashion centre of the city and a lot of famous Belgian designers are located here. Vintage, design, interior, fashion and boutiques are key words for what to find in this area.
host_about: SHWAY is a short and long-term rental company with three own buildings in the heart of the city Antwerp, Belgium. Interior designer Stekkie Amsterdam took care of all our apartments, to stay in one of them and feel the interior is already an experience! The founder and host Liselore is a specialist in giving you the best time in Antwerp, whether you are traveling for fashion or fun or you want to come for business, she has the best insider tips during your stay!

name: Studio: City Center, Botanical Garden, Parking
description:
This luminous apartment with terrace is situated in the middle of the city center of Antwerp, right in front of the famous Botanical garden.

We offer a spacious living room that can be transformed into an enjoyable bedroom. As a music fan I am equipped with stereo and television including wifi.
Your bathroom has a shower, washbasin and toilet. The kitchen is fully equipped: oven, dishwasher, microwave, toaster, coffee and ice-cube machine.

Guest will be offered clean bedding and towels.

The space
The apartment comes with a private parking place. This means you can park your car free of charge in the middle of the city center.
neighborhood_overview:
Vibrant city center in the middle of the Antwerp fashion district at walking distance of the Schelde. In case you are looking for peace you can enjoy the silent botanical garden just in front of the appartment.
Surrounded by multiple collinear restaurants and our famous city market on Saturday and Sundays.

name: Modern Industrial Designed appartment
description:
MODERN INDUSTRIAL DESIGNED apartment with in-build TERRACE


/!\ Awesome LOCATED for those who want to stay close to main central station & spend a great time in this Amazing dynamic city!


> 5-min walk from Antwerp Central TRAIN- ánd BUSstation,
> 3-min walk from Metro Station Astrid
> only 10-min from MAIN Shopping Street 'De Meir' & City CENTRE
> on the crossroad of a multicultural neighbourhood (around the corner of China-town) with lots of little shops & supermarkets

The space
- SPATIOUS (> 100m2 + terrace street side)
- Whole flat is stretched out over the whole width, with large windows and NATURAL LIGHT
- INDUSTRIAL design with CONCRETE ceiling & wooden floor

- ERGONOMIC & user-friendly half-open KITCHEN with GAS-Cooker (US Eng: Gas Stove)
- Also a micro-wave & gas-OVEN
- DISHWASHER

- The BACK-dormitory with sleeping bank (2) + AirMatress (2)
- Couch in livi
neighborhood_overview:
- at the crossroad of the City Centre, Central Station (TRAIN & BUS), Public Library on de 'CONINCK-plein' & the 'SEEFHOEK'

- INTERNATIONAL CHARMING AREA:
>Waking up and having breakfast or brunch at Coninck-Plein (Viggo's café or Permeke's Library coffee bar)
> China Town is literally around the corner for dim sum lunch
> Portuguese & Spanish Community 5 min further by foot
> African & Surinamian people all over
> Arabic community in the Borgerhout region with little shops and bakeries to enjoy some Marrocan bread with a cup of tea
> Supermarket in de ‘Schoonhovenstraat’
> 10 min walk from the Market in the weekend at 'Theaterplein'
host_about:
A dynamic, optimistic and friendly Belgian-born Chinese physician with roots lying in the magnificent city Hongkong! 

A perfect mix of the Oriental-Western culture, speaking 5 different languages: since Communication in the mother tongue of your guest/host is the Key to the world.

Open minded for every religion, culture, gender-identity or sexual preference.

Carpe diem et noctem - Mens sana in corpore sane are my mottos!

name: The 16th century Horse Alley
description:
The 16th century Horse Alley in the heart of Antwerp
The 300-year-old alley is located in the center of Antwerp, known as “Paardekensgang” (Horse Alley). The authentic houses are well-known as a tourist attraction. The alley and the houses have been kept in their original appearance. It is located in the most popular part of old Antwerp: the middle of center-south. Given the location, being in the heart of town, it is amazingly quiet at night.

The space
In spite of being in the center of the town, it is relatively quiet and safe at night. We are sure that you would not be disturbed much by the street noise. The location is very convenient to get around on foot. Almost everything is in walking distance.

*One little staircase goes to the upper floor is steep, but bedroom and toilet are there, so it is unavoidable*

Guest access
We provided a Nespresso machine and enough coffee capsules for you to get by. There are plenty of coo
neighborhood_overview:
You are staying in what is considered one of the best locations in Antwerp center. When you walk out and turn right, you come to Nationalestraat. Turn left and you will come to the area where the exclusive fashion designers of Antwerp are located. At the north end of that street is Groenplaats, that is the heart of Antwerp. Nearby the Meir starts, the most popular shopping street.

On the other side, if you walk out and turn left, there are two pubs on the corners. Both places are nice and cozy. Turn right at the pubs and down that street, you will find an antique shopping area where people go hunting for valuable vintage egg holders :-) This street will also lead you to Groenplaats and the cathedral of Antwerp.

A spacious designer Suite, hidden in one of Antwerps oldest and most beautiful town houses. The room is a combination of modern luxury with many original Art Deco features. Extra comfortable boxspring beds. Brand new private shower and toilet. Perfect downtown location.
Free bagagelockers available, you can drop off your bags before check in and go discover the city!

The space
A light and cosy room on the first level of a historic town house. The room has many original Art Deco features, but is freshly renovated with a luxurious shower and toilet.

Guest access
The room has it´s own private shower and toilet. A kitchen is not available.

name: Cosy room in cohousing house 3th floor
description:
10 min walk from central station, 1 min walk from public transport,.
We share a house with 3 people and we always love to have guests in our house.
Our guest have more then enough space to be on their own in their room, but are more then welcome to join us in our communal spaces like the kitchen, livingroom, and garden.

Our guest can totally be on their own, but we love to connect with our guest as well.

The space
this room is simple and cosy, and has a little desk.

Guest access
We love to interact, cook together, give you some advice on where to go in antwerp, have a coffee with our guests, tell you what to do around , etc etc.
As we share our house with some people, there is always a nice flow in the house.

Other things to note
we prefer that you don't wear shoes in the house,
host_about: i love travelling, but also love to be a host. I have a broad interest in people, and what they do. I love my city Antwerp, and always try to find the right balance between socialising with our guest, and leaving them in their space.

name: Luxury big apartment in city center of Antwerp!
description:
Completely renovated, and newly furnished luxury 2 bedroom apartment (2 - 3 people) on parquet floor with an unique view over the Cathedral of Antwerp. The apartment is located in Oudaan, the heart of Antwerp, near lots of nice and trendy shops, cozy restaurants and bars. At 4 minutes walking distance from the Groenplaats and 5 minutes away from the top shopping street De Meir.

The space
Through the spacious ENTRANCE with separate toilet you enter the cozy LIVING ROOM on parquet. This room is pleasantly light thanks to the floor-to-ceiling windows that offer you a blissful view over the center of Antwerp. The open stored KITCHEN is equipped with all necessary appliances: electric cooker with extractor, dishwasher, freezer, refrigerator, double sink, oven and microwave. The 2 BEDROOMS are located at the quiet backside of the apartment, the master bedroom offers access to the sunny TERRACE where you can chill on a lovely summer day. Both bedrooms have a BATHROOM w
neighborhood_overview:
Close by many good restaurants, cosy bars and stores. From the apartment you have a unique view on the cathedral of Antwerp. The apartment is located at Oudaan, heart of Antwerp, close by several trendy neighborhoods.

If you are looking for great restaurants, cocktail bars, stores ... you can always send us a message. We know the city very well and are always happy to help.

name: Box of Mirror, Het Eilandje (REDUCED PRICE)
description:
Located in the center of Antwerp's northern harbor district "Het Eilandje", this third floor studio features an open plan washed in early morning lights at the rear and afternoon sunlight at the living area. The appartment is organized as a continuous passage around the kitchen area and has an optimal use of space. The terrace in front has a direct view on the MAS museum, an iconic building in Antwerp.

The space
De ruimte heeft een uniek en sterk architectonisch uitgesproken ontwerp. We hebben deze ruimte ontworpen op basis van het "naakte architectuur" principe waarbij ruwbouw ineens afbouw is, we laten de constructie in het zicht maar gaan deze invullen met design elementen zoals een spiegelbox keukeneiland en een spiegelbox kastelement. Een grote open douche en dik fluwelen gordijn scheiden de ruimtes van elkaar, het gordijn kan op verschillende manieren geplaatst om zo de ruimte telkens anders op te delen en te ervaren. Met als laatste troef het principe van
neighborhood_overview:
Coffeebar "Black&Yellow" next door serves the best coffee in town.
Gelateria "Germaine" next door serves the best gelato in town.
Bakery "Toon De Clerck" has amazing pastries.
Butcher "Van Puyvelde" makes the best filet américain préparé.
Bagelshop "The Shack" down the street serves really good bagels.
Restaurant "Le Steak" down the street serves really good meat.
Restaurant "L'Officina" around the corner is the best Italian of our hood.
Bar "Brut" is a perfect spot to sip some wine with a bite and enjoy the sunset.
Lots of summer pop-up bars around the waterfronts make the most memorable summer night.
host_about:
Antwerp based Belgian architect. 

Appreciation of daily delights (morning cappuccino's...)
Life curious
Enthusiasm
Share your passion 
Amor Fati
Impulsive from time to time 
Not an introvert, can't help it. But sometimes, silence is golden.

name: The Card Room Green Studio
description:
The Card Room Green Studio is located at the third floor of the building and is decorated by Stekkie Amsterdam. The studio has everything you need; a queen size boxspring bed, a fully equipped kitchen, a separate bathroom with shower and a lot of storage space. Although the space is relatively small, it gives you a super cosy home-feeling!

The space
You will enter the building with a code and get the key of the apartment out of a locker in the hallway. When you enter the studio on the third floor, you will step right into the living and sleeping space which consists out of a queen size boxspring bed, a dining table with two chairs, a comfortable fauteuil and a large kitchen with built-in closet where you can find an iron and ironing board. The separate bathroom you can find on your right, next to the bed, and consists of a shower, a sink with mirror and a toilet. The kitchen has everything you need; a dishwasher, a big fridge, a Nespresso coffee machine, a water
neighborhood_overview: This is one of the most popular neighborhoods of Antwerp, not only because it's almost the heart of the centre, but also because on the big square you will find the famous "Vogelenmarkt" every Saturday and Sunday! This is a big market where you can find the best food, the weirdest antiques, different types of birds and other small animals and the most beautiful flowers and plants. This location is also a max ten minute walk from all the high lights of Antwerp, no public transfer needed.

description:
This apartment is perfectly located in the heart of the historical town. There are plenty of restaurants, bars, shops, markets and musea just around the corner. Please take a look at my profile and discover all my other apartments! I’m looking forward to host and meet you in Antwerp!

The space
This apartment is located on the fourth floor of a small and quiet building in the middle of the historical town.

It consists of a cosy living area with a big comfy couch, which also can be transformed into a double bed. Cable television is available as well as a dvd-player, and of course free WiFi.
Further on you will find the well-equipped kitchen with electrical cooking fire, fridge, microwave, water cooker and Nespresso coffee machine. Next to the kitchen you’ll find the bedroom. It has a queen sized boxspring bed and lots of storage room.
In the bathroom you’ll find a bath/shower combination, toilet and washing sink.

neighborhood_overview:

There are plenty of restaurants, bars and markets nearby, as well as shops and musea (Rubenshuis, Plantin-Moretus..). It's also the best location for fashionista's, because the fashiondistrict is in walking distance.

name: Frame of View, Het Eilandje
description:
Located in the center of Antwerp's northern harbor district "Het Eilandje", the first floor of our house features a light filled open living room with kitchen and dining/working. Separated through the main hallway, you find a quiet and private bedroom with annexing bathroom at the rear.
Breakfast bars and restaurants within walking distance. 15minute walk to the main square and cathedral. If you want to discover Antwerp for a few days, this is the perfect base for you!

The space
The main entrance from the street is a shared entrance, as well as the hallway and staircase. The first floor has an open kitchen, dining area and living area for you to use. Most of the time this area will be all yours but sometimes it might happen that this living area will be used by me as well.

Other things to note
Currently finishing our renovation works. The hallway still has to be done.
neighborhood_overview:
Coffeebar "Black&Yellow" next door serves the best coffee in town.
Gelateria "Germaine" next door serves the best gelato in town.
Bakery "Toon De Clerck" has amazing pastries.
Butcher "Van Puyvelde" makes the best filet américain préparé.
Bagelshop "The Shack" down the street serves really good bagels.
Restaurant "Le Steak" down the street serves really good meat.
Restaurant "L'Officina" around the corner is the best Italian of our hood.
Bar "Brut" is a perfect spot to sip some wine with a bite and enjoy the sunset.
Lots of summer pop-up bars around the waterfronts make the most memorable summer night.
host_about:
Antwerp based Belgian architect. 

Appreciation of daily delights (morning cappuccino's...)
Life curious
Enthusiasm
Share your passion 
Amor Fati
Impulsive from time to time 
Not an introvert, can't help it. But sometimes, silence is golden.

name: GREAT LOCATION-COMFORTABLE ROOM with own bathroom
description:
This room is suitable for couples, solo adventurers and business travellers.
The private room is on the ground floor of the building. As you enter - in front of you, the room opens up to a spacious living room/work station. On the far right end, the white door opens into a small courtyard that you will have access to. On the left, behind the teal coloured vintage cupboard is the bedroom and the bathroom.
And of course……High Speed Wi-Fi is included in the booking!

The space
The space
This booking is ideal for 2 persons, however, if you are travelling as a family or with friends, the couch in the living room doubles up as a comfy single-person bed.
You can literally see everything in the photos!!!

Extra: Please note that the price shown is only for 2 persons is considering that only the double bed in the bedroom will be used. In case you would will be travelling with family or friends and would like to use the sofa-cum-bed in the liv
neighborhood_overview:
My newly renovated property is a very comfortable and spacious room with own bathroom, very close to the Central Station (It’s walking distance!!). The studio is located in quiet residential area despite its proximity to the Central Station. Other than the obvious closeness to the Central Station, the property walkable distance from the Diamond District, the Zoo, Meier Street, Cathedral of our Lady Antwerp, Groenplaats (All within a maximum 20 minute walking distance). Moreover, restaurants, bars, and everything you need is also well within reach.
One thing is for sure-You will definitely be saving up on any taxi/transport expenses that can be pretty expensive for even short distances.

Mooie, ruime privékamer met kingsizebed en eigen regendouche en wc vlakbij het Middelheimpark in Antwerpen. Ontbijt in de gemeenschappelijke keuken of bij mooi weer op het terras of in de tuin. The space
Mooie en ruime privékamer- en badkamer in een groot en licht huis met grote, verzorgde tuin met twee terrassen. Je bent met de bus in 20 minuten in het centrum van Antwerpen.

neighborhood_overview: Antwerp is Belgium’s second largest city, has the biggest port and is the capital of coal. It has long been a powerful magnet for everyone from fashion moguls and club queens to art lovers and diamond dealers. In the mid-16th century it was one of Europe’s most important cities and home to baroque superstar painters like Pieter Paul Rubens. Despite many historical travails thereafter and severe WWII bombing, Antwerp retains an intriguing medieval heart with plenty of café-filled cobbled lanes, a riverside fortress and a truly impressive Cathedral. Today, however, Antwerp’s top drawcards are its vibrant fashion and entertainment scene, booming diamond businesses along with its startling architectural and cultural contrasts.

The India Yellow Studio is located at the third floor of the building and is decorated by Stekkie Amsterdam. The studio has everything you need; a living space with flatscreen TV, a separate sleeping area with a double size bed, a fully equipped kitchen, a separate bathroom with shower and sink, a separate toilet and a big roof terrace!

The space
You will enter the building with a code and get your key out of a locker in the hallway, and after a lot of stairs you will find The India Yellow Studio on the third floor. When you enter the studio, you will find on your left the living area which consists of a big sofa and flatscreen TV, a dining area and a big kitchen. The kitchen has everything you need; a dishwasher, a big fridge, a Nespresso coffee machine, a water boiler, a combi oven, enough cooking material and a lot of storage space. The separate sleeping area is located in the back of the studio, free from street noise and with a big roof terrace. The double
neighborhood_overview: This is one of the most popular neighborhoods of Antwerp, not only because it's almost the heart of the centre, but also because on the big square you will find the famous "Vogelenmarkt" every Saturday and Sunday! This is a big market where you can find the best food, the weirdest antiques, different types of birds and other small animals and the most beautiful flowers and plants. This location is also a max ten minute walk from all the high lights of Antwerp, no public transfer needed.
host_about: SHWAY is a short and long-term rental company with three own buildings in the heart of the city Antwerp, Belgium. Interior designer Stekkie Amsterdam took care of all our apartments, to stay in one of them and feel the interior is already an experience! The founder and host Liselore is a specialist in giving you the best time in Antwerp, whether you are traveling for fashion or fun or you want to come for business, she has the best insider tips during your stay!

name: Historic city centre 2 bedroom apartment
description:
Welcome to Jade’s Place - a bright and spacious apartment on a perfect location! In the middle of the city centre, although in a quiet one way street.

The apartment has two bedrooms, both of them have double beds. We provide you with towels and sheets. The kitchen is fully equipped (combi microwave and oven) and you can enjoy our free coffee and tea. There is a TV in the living room to watch your favorite show in our comfy couch ;-)

There is a washing machine, iron (board) and drying rack.

The space
The apartment is located at Steenhouwersvest, in the middle of the city centre but in a quiet one way street. It is nearby Vrijdagmarkt, Groenplaats, Grote Markt, fashion district and many shopping streets. Restaurants and bars are very closeby.

There is free parking at Sint-Michielskaai (15min walk) or you can park more nearby in public underground parkings at ‘Groenplaats’, ‘Brabo’ or ‘Cammerpoorte’ (where you need to pay).

name: At home in Antwerp !
description:
Welcome to Studio Minerva!

It is a home away from home for people who want to stay in Antwerp for a week or more for professional reasons or simply to explore the city. This loft is located in a historical building with connections to the belgian car maker Minerva, hence the name.
Excellent location to get in and out of the city. Quiet and green neighborhood.

The space
The serviced studio consists of 3 rooms: a bedroom with double bed, sitting area and writing table, a reading / living room under the roof with sofa-bed, and a kitchenette with bathroom.
This is a very independent set-up. Your hosts, their children and dog Cesar animate the other rooms in the house. We are all usually off to work/school or enjoying Antwerp so it can be rare to run into each other.
Children: welcome if you take into account the steep stairs that lead to the room under the roof.
A sofa bed is available in the attic room (hosts 1 adult or 2 children).<
neighborhood_overview:
Studio Minerva is located in one of Antwerp’s most beautiful neighborhoods.
Trams and trains, galleries and parks, cafes & restaurants are all on your doorstep or just a short stroll away.

neighborhood_overview: The Meir is considered to be the busiest shopping street in Antwerp. It’s lined with a mix of designer boutiques, trendy chain stores, and attractive architecture. Here you’ll find one of the most interesting shopping centers, the Stadsfeestzaal. Built as a banquet and exhibition hall at the turn of the 20th century and rebuilt following a disastrous fire at the turn of the 21st century, this elegant ‘city party hall’ reopened in 2007 as a shopping center. Though suffering from the effects of the recent financial crisis to hit Belgium, the Stadsfeestzaal is worth a short visit just to look around. There are two entrances to the Stadsfeestzaal, one at Meir 78 and one at Hopland 31, one street down from the Rubens House. Meir is also where you’ll see the 18th century Paleis op de Meir, former palace for the likes of Napoleon and the Belgian Royals. Head south of Meir to the Quartier Latin, or Latin Quarter, known for fashion and theater. Here’s where you’ll find a number of designer bout

neighborhood_overview: Antwerp is Belgium’s second largest city, has the biggest port and is the capital of coal. It has long been a powerful magnet for everyone from fashion moguls and club queens to art lovers and diamond dealers. In the mid-16th century it was one of Europe’s most important cities and home to baroque superstar painters like Pieter Paul Rubens. Despite many historical travails thereafter and severe WWII bombing, Antwerp retains an intriguing medieval heart with plenty of café-filled cobbled lanes, a riverside fortress and a truly impressive Cathedral. Today, however, Antwerp’s top drawcards are its vibrant fashion and entertainment scene, booming diamond businesses along with its startling architectural and cultural contrasts.

name: NOIR. RESIDENCE - City Center of Antwerp Lux. Loft
description:
The NOIR. residence is the place to really feel the city of Antwerp. With its location you are close to every hotspot of the city. Going out for drinks, a romantic weekend, a cultural trip or a shopping spree? In the NOIR. Residence you are always on a 1 to 5- minute walk away from everything.

- 24/7 support via text, email, or phone
- Coffee, fresh towels, and bathroom essentials provided
- Hotel-standard cleaning before you arrive

The space
The NOIR. Residence is an open loft with high ceilings and high windows.

- Free WiFi
- Washing machine & dryer
- Fully-equipped kitchen
- Extra bedlinnen & sheets


- Restaurants & bars in the street
- Supermarket next to building
- Metro stop in front of building
neighborhood_overview:
Must do’s:

MAS Museum: The MAS is more than an interesting building with countless impressive objects. Discover what makes the museum so unique and how it works.

MEIR: Meir is the main shopping street in Antwerp, Belgium. It is the most important shopping area in the country

The Cathedral: After 169 years of construction the cathedral of Antwerp finally dominated Antwerp's skyline in 1521 with a height of 123 metres. It's the highest Gothic building in the Low Countries.

We designed a unique city guide together with local @tonyamas. We gathered all our favorite places in the city so you can have the Antwerp experience like a real local.

name: Vintage appartment in lively though queit area
description:
This cosy, bright ground floor appartment is an ideal stay to enjoy the city of Antwerp. It has a lot of vintage details, a large bedroom, a bathroom with shower and bath, a separate toilet, a huge living room with a leather sofa, next to the dining room. The kitchen has all you need, including electrical device and micro combi oven. You even can enjoy a private terrace with lots of plants. The appartment is situated in a quiet but lively area, only 1 km away from (coffee)bars and restaurants.

The space
This ground floor appartment is situated in an old mansion and has a lot of authentic elements like wooden floors and doors, and marble fireplaces. The home has a tasteful interior with a vintage touch.
The bath- and bedroom overlook the green terrace, where you can enjoy your coffee.
neighborhood_overview:
The appartment is situated in a quiet but lively area. It's surrounded by 3 nice parks: Boelaerpark, Boekenbergpark and Rivierenhof. On the other side, it's only 1 km away from the famous Dageraadplaats and Draakplaats (Zurenborg) where you can enjoy nice food and typical Belgian beer in one of the uncountable cosy (coffee)bars and restaurants. Even closer (just around the corner), you'll definitely enjoy a drink at Bar Brul or a nice breakfast, coffee or lunch at Café Josee.
If you want to explore the center of Antwerp, it's just 4 km away and very easy to get there by tram, bus, bicycle or even by foot.

description:
Uniek herenhuis in hartje Antwerpen, op een steenworp van Berchem station. Gelegen in een jonge, bruisende buurt vlakbij de befaamde Dageraadplaats. Perfecte uitvalsbasis, vlakbij tram, trein en bus. Een ruime herenwoning met genoeg ruimte voor een groot gezin of vriendengroep. Gelijkvloers: grote inkomhal, leefruimte, keuken, stadstuin. De ruimte staat helemaal tot je beschikking en biedt comfortabel slaapplaats aan 6 personen.
