Dé plek om te ontdekken wanneer je in Antwerpen bent. Wil je toch naar het centrum van de stad? Neem dan de tram (15 minuten) of de fiets (Velo-deelstation voor de deur, 10 minuutjes) naar de Groenplaats of de Schelde.

name: Spacious, Luxurious Flat by Historical City
description:
Beautiful, two bedroom apartment as part of a majestic house just outside Antwerp's historical city centre. Over a 100 sq/m of living/sleeping space, lots of natural light and ten minutes away from Antwerp's best bars and restaurants. The house was built by Duke and Duchess Le Grelle over 100 years ago and currently occupied by a family. “occupied by a family, where they work and live.

The space
The house has become the inspiration for the Belgian coffee brand Vascobelo and is also where the artist Isabel Miquel Arques has her Fine Art Photography atelier. The home is a blend of history, art, beauty, style, perfect imperfection and functional poetry.

Guest access
The apartment is on the third floor, via stairs. Two bedrooms, a kitchen with Vascobelo Coffee provided andTea provided. Big private terrace where you can eat and relax when the weather permits. A bathroom with a shower and a dining area.

neighborhood_overview:
The neighborhood is very cosy and has lots of atmosphere. It’s close to the park, and a 10 minute walk from the city center with a large range of cafés and restaurants.
There’s public transportation in the street which will take you in every direction.
Berchem and Central Station are only 2km down. It will only take you 2 tram stops to get there.

name: Charming studio close to central station
description:
Welcome to our ground floor studio flat. We currently live in London but I am originally from Antwerp so we've created this home to come back to when we visit. It's conveniently located near central station (8 minute walk), the neighbourhood is lively and has a great community feel to it, while also being in a quiet street. New places are popping up and the centre is only a 10-minute bike or tram ride away.

The space
This is a studio flat and ideal for a couple. You enter the living space which has a sofa, small desk and a double bed. In the back there's a kitchen, a conservatory, and a sunny courtyard. The bathroom is big with a nice sized walk-in shower. The studio is located on the ground floor. It has been newly renovated so all appliances are new, while respecting the original features of this historic building.
neighborhood_overview:
This pocket of the city is less explored by tourists but a favourite with locals. It's close to some of the best bars and restaurants in adjacent neighbourhoods and has some great gems at walking distance too.

It is also close the central station, the Zoo and Elisabeth Hall.

name: Artist's house & rooftop terrace Central Antwerp
description:
Welcome to Antwerp! Our house is located on walking distance from Central Station and public transport. We live in a very vibrant neighbourhood with plenty of cafes, restaurants and shops. We have a lovely sunny rooftop terrace with a view over the city.

The space
On the ground floor there is the kitchen and the first living room. The kitchen is fully equipped and has a fridge, freezer, oven, dishwasher etc... We also have a washing machine and iron. The ground floor living room has TV.

The bathroom on the intermediate floor has two sinks, a 2-person bath and a shower.

On the first floor is the first bedroom with a double bed and another living room or work space: a big space full of light.

On the top floor there is a second bedroom with 2 single beds (bunkbed) which is ideal for children but equally comfortable for adults. Next to this room is a study and library with a kingsize double bed on the mezzanine.

The house i
host_about: Hi there, I'm a Belgian artist working in theater and film. I live with my 11 year old son and my artist girlfriend in Antwerp.

name: Stylish apartment with a panorama on Antwerp
description:
This apartment is placed in one of the most suggestive neighbourhoods of Antwerp. In a peaceful, but still central area, close to the waters of the Kattendijkdok. It is a luxurious 60 m2 apartment, complete with all services for a fantastic touristic or business experience. From the 14th floor of this skyscraper, you will have an unforgettable view of the city and its historical buildings.

The space
The apartment offers a bedroom with double size bed, a very practical kitchen with coffee mashine, refrigerator and freezer. The living room, attached to the kitchen, includes a comfortable sofa which can be arranged as a third single bed. The bathroom is separate from the little toilet room in the corridor.
neighborhood_overview: The Eilandje zone is famous firstly for the Museum Aan het Stroom (MAS): a futuristic construction surrounded by a very lively river dock full of pubs and restaurants.  You will also be close to the Red Star Line musem and a large number of art galleries in the neighbourhood.

name: Private double guest room in charming row house.
description:
We welcome you into our modest yet charming early 20th century workman's house, located 450m from Berchem Station.

Our study doubles as a private guest room with a comfortable 2 person daybed.

It is our aim to make sure you have a pleasant stay. Therefore, we are happy to assist you in any way and share all accomodations, and we will gladly show you around and give you some valuable pointers to start discovering Oud-Berchem, an authentic and colorful neighborhood that bursts with creativity.

The space
There is a spare single person sofa bed available. It can be made up in the private guest room, or in the dressing room.

You are free to use the shared bathroom, equipped kitchen, living room, washing facilities in the windowed back porch and the garden.
neighborhood_overview: You'll find plenty of cute coffee places, great restaurants, different cuisines, shops, parks. As you'll find out soon enough, local entrepreneurship is very much alive and encouraged in this borough. Just look for the label 'Made in Berchem' in shop windows.
host_about: We, Maarten and Kim, are living together with our 2-year old toddler Otto, in the pleasant district of Berchem. I play music, Kim loves to dance, and Otto is very fond of animals.

Bovendien verblijft u in het oude centrum en bent u op wandelafstand van alle populaire bezienswaardigheden, bars en restaurants.

Zeer ruime kamers die je een open gevoel geven. Grote badkamers met een regendouche en bubbelbad.

Ik ben een Belgische lijnpiloot die momenteel voor British Airways werkt.

name: A luxury apartment in the center of Antwerp
description:
In this perfectly arranged two-bedroom apartment of 125 m² in the historic center of Antwerp, comfort and luxury-minded guests will find everything they need for a carefree stay. With its high ceilings of 3 m 30 and parquet in all rooms, the apartment radiates a unique charm. This property has recently been completely renovated and painted and has a state-of-the-art new luxury kitchen with dishwasher, fridge, freezer, wine cooler, induction fire, oven and microwave. Two separate TV's in bedrooms

The space
Wooden floors throughout the whole apartment, the gas fire and the heigh ceilings create a cosy atmosphere. You will feel at home

Guest access
The guest can enjoy the whole apartment and will have plenty of space for their clothes and stuff in the large wardrobes. The high ceilings give a unique feeling of space.

Other things to note
Their is a large collection of DVD's available and a large office corner with an 2,5
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located in the heart of the bustling old town, with its many restaurants and nightlife options, and is just a three-minute walk from the Grote Markt and the Cathedral. Public transportation at the door. The Central Station and all sights are close by. Ideal for city trips or for expats who want to stay in Antwerp for a longer stay.

name: BoHo city Apartment (easy parking)
description: ovely bright apartment on the 2nd floor of an old mansion. Do you travel by car? Then you can park your car very easy in front of our garage. We live 2,5 km from the central station, so please be very sure about our location before you book! We have public transport just around the corner or you can use the city bike. host_about:
Hi there,

I'm Sumeyye. Me and my family live in BoHo (Borgerhout) in a very old mansion build in 1925 and that we renovated in 2016.
We bought this house to have more space for the childeren and our hobbies, but currently it's to big with three small children and that's why we deside to rent the two upper floors, till we are in need for this extra space. But for now we love to share it with you!

Come and meet us!

X
Sumeyye, Kenan, Koray, Ada and Sem

name: Theodore Lodge. Luxury Apartment Antwerp
description:
A big, bright and beautiful apartment, right in the historic center of Antwerp, across the street of the famous Fashion Museum. We're surrounded by fashion stores & hip coffee-shops. The kitchen is fully equipped and we supply fresh linen, towels & all essentials.

Located very close to the famous street Meir and the main-squares "Groenplaats" & "Grote Markt" and the Train Station. Literally the best possible location in Antwerp!

There's a free parking area at the Waalse Kaai on a 5min walk.

The space
Our apartments are decorated to make you feel at home. We want to give you a warm, enjoyable and relaxing place to rest while exploring our beautiful city. Our apartment is equipped with all essentials for a comfortable trip. Eg. a fully equipped kitchen, fresh bedlinnen and towels for each guest, shower gel, shampoo and conditioner, coffee, tea, hair dryer etc.

Guest access
The apartment is completely private for the p
neighborhood_overview: Antwerp is Belgium’s second largest city, has the biggest port and is the capital of coal. It has long been a powerful magnet for everyone from fashion moguls and club queens to art lovers and diamond dealers. In the mid-16th century it was one of Europe’s most important cities and home to baroque superstar painters like Pieter Paul Rubens. Despite many historical travails thereafter and severe WWII bombing, Antwerp retains an intriguing medieval heart with plenty of café-filled cobbled lanes, a riverside fortress and a truly impressive Cathedral. Today, however, Antwerp’s top drawcards are its vibrant fashion and entertainment scene, booming diamond businesses along with its startling architectural and cultural contrasts.
host_about: Hello, my name is Elisabeth! I've travelled around the world and lived abroad for a couple of years. Now my goal is to accomodate others in amazing apartments in the very heart of our beautiful city! :-)

name: Modern flat with a vintage touch.
description:
Apartment on the 1st floor of a spacious building.
You reach the private entry by a staircase.
The flat has 2 bedrooms, a bathroom with toilet, dining room with kitchen and a roof terrace.
The apartment has a vintage touch and paintings for sale at the walls.
You are more than welcome on the ground floor.
The owner runs a bar with gallery there.
This place is cosy to stay with a small family or friends. However, a group(up to 8 persons) can stay here and also rent the 2nd & 3rd floor.

The space
You have a parkview.
The apartment is only accessible by a staircase.
Wifi connection available, no television.
Bathroom with shower.
This location is very convenient when you want to combine the city with a concert at the Sportpaleis in Antwerp.
neighborhood_overview:
Park Spoor Noord is just across the apartment.
The neighborhood is quiet. There are a few places to lunch and pubs around.
2060 is an area with many nationalities. So there are a lot of different foodstores.
A walk across the bridge leads you to 'het Eilandje', a trendy district nearby the water, where you can find restaurants, pubs and the MAS museum.

name: ♥  Romantisch verblijf in hippe buurt
description:
Het appartement bevindt zich vlakbij het centraal station, de zoo en het stadspark.

De gezellige dageraadplaats of moorkensplein vind je op enkele minuten wandelen.

Je kan je gemakkelijk verplaatsen naar andere delen van de stad met de bus/tram/trein of de Antwerpse velokes.

The space
Het appartement is gelegen op de 4de verdieping. Er is geen lift aanwezig, dus je zal trappen moeten beklimmen :-)

Er is een keuken met afwasmachine, een eethoek, leefruimte met TV, slaapkamer met een was- en droogmachine, een apart toilet en een badkamer met zalige regendouche.

Aangezien wij hier wonen heeft het appartement een uitgebreide uitrusting van bv. kookgerief, thee, zepen. Deze mag je gebruiken. Er zijn 2 kledingrekken voorzien voor de keldij van gasten.
neighborhood_overview:
De buurt waarin het appartement gelegen is is een echte hippe,bruisende woonbuurt. Recent zijn er projecten geweest om onze buurt tevergroenen. Je vind hier allerlei fleurige bloemen in geveltuintjes en zelfs gevelslingers!

Op wandelafstand liggen de dageraadplaats, draakplaats, het moorkensplein en het mechelseplein. Op deze plekken kan je terecht voor een koffietje/pint&wijntje/Italiaans ijs of een gezellig restaurant. In het appartement ligt een opsomming van onze favorieten + tips voor activiteiten wat verder uit de buurt!

In de Roma (10min) kan je een concertje meepikken. In de Arenberg (25min) kan je genieten van een theater/comedy-avondje.

Er is een kringwinkel in de straat waar je naar schatten kan speuren.

Ook nog op wandelafstand vind je het stadspark. Met een prachtige vijver, en romantische brug.

name: Theaterstudio 2.0 Antwerp
description:
In this cosy studio you will find everything you need - a double bed, a sofa bed, a basic kitchen with utensils, a dining table, a big dresser with a flatscreen TV, a bathroom with a shower and toilet, and a lot of storage space. The studio is located on the third floor right in the city center. Perfect for exploring the city! The studio is also located in the back of the building, so you don't hear any noise from the streets.

The space
After climbing the stairs to the third floor you will enter the studio with your key and enter the tiny hallway with built-in closet and bathroom door. You can step right into the living area where you can find on your left hand the double bed, clothing rack and mirror. On your right hand you see the comfy sofa bed, big flatscreen TV, the dresser and the dining table with four chairs. Right around the corner next to the dining area is the kitchen with big fridge, microwave, cooking material, Nespresso coffeemachine and waterboiler
neighborhood_overview: The studio is perfectly located for exploring the city. You will be right in the city center and in walking distance of the historic center, museums and the large shopping street (the Meir). There are many good restaurants and bars in the area. Also, the very popular neighborhood ''Het Zuid'' is close to the studio. On the corner of the street (1min walk) is a small supermarket providing basic things for your stay. On saturday and sunday is the famous ''Vogelenmarkt'' on the square at the end of the street, this big market full of food, clothing, flowers, animals and weird antiques is a perfect place to buy the best fresh vegetables and fruits during your stay!

name: Stadswoning in hartje centrum van Antwerpen.
description:
Tot uw beschikking is de volledige stadswoning gelegen in een van de oudste straten van Antwerpen. Deze mooie patriciërswoning is pas gerenoveerd en heeft een mooie hal, keuken en 2 slaapkamers met eigen badkamer, ieder op zijn eigen verdieping. Het ligt op loopafstand van vele toeristische attracties en de belangrijkste winkelstraten. Het centraal station is op 15 minuten lopen.

The space
De woning bevat 4 verdiepingen, waaronder 3 verdiepingen ter beschikking van de gast. Begaande grond bevat de ruime keuken met bank, TV, wasmachine, droger, vaatwasser en magnetron. Op de 1ste verdieping is er een ruime slaapkamer, met veel lichtinval, 2 aparte eenpersoonsbedden, een bureau, veel kast ruimte en een eigen badkamer. Het volgende, 2de verdieping, is bijna identiek aan de 1ste, ook veel lichtinval en een eigen badkamer.
neighborhood_overview:
De buurt is een typische Antwerpse volksbuurt. Met in de omgeving supermarkten, bars met terrasjes en restaurants. Dicht bij het MAS en de Schelde en de universiteit van Antwerpen.
Afstanden:
- Supermarkt: 50 m en grotere 180 m (Albert Heijn)
- Centraal Station: 1,1 km (15-20 min, of via bus 7 minuten)
- Bushalte: 60 m (Lijn 17)
- Shopping, Meir: 10 minuten te voet
- Bioscoop/theater (UGC): 10 minuten
- Museam MAS: 5 minuten wandelen
- Meerdere theaters zijn op wandelafstand (Bourlaschouwburg, Arenbergschouwburg, theatergebouw) liggen op 1.2 km.
- Universiteit Antwerpen: 150 m

name: Design loft in the historic center with a terrace
description:
If the loft isn’t available, please check out other listing: https://www.airbnb.com/h/thecollectorshouse

Unique design loft in the historic city center of Antwerp with high ceilings and lots of daylight.

There is 1 master bedroom, 1 bathroom with rain shower, a spacious living room with smart TV and a full equipped kitchen. There is also a cosy little terrace with a city view.

The space
The loft has everything you need to enjoy a comfortable stay: big bed with hotel linen, coffee machine, kettle, bathroom necessities and towels, Wifi, hairdryer, ...
neighborhood_overview:
The Loft is situated in the historical heart of the city, on a walking distance of all city highlights: MAS, Red Star Line Museum, FOMU, Museum of Modern Art, the Cathedral tower, Fashion Museum, the gorgeous Carolus Borromeus church, Meir shopping area but also the local boutiques and trendy fashion stores are nearby.
And ofcourse there are plenty of restaurants, bars and breakfast places in the neighborhood.
Public transport is at 100m, a 10 minute walk from the central station and also parking facilities are to be found at walking distance.

In short, you'll never be bored!

The apartment features one large open space and a separate bathroom with a lockable door. The sofa bed is in the same area as the main bed. It is situated on the first floor reachable by stairs or elevator.

description:
You're welcome to stay in the guest bedroom of our home, a duplex apartment, which I share with my girlfriend, Sanne (co-host). Located in a nice and quiet street, and only a short walk from the trendy 'Het Zuid', and a short bike ride from the tourist area.

Our apartment is also very easy to reach: the train station (Antwerpen Zuid) is only 2 minutes on foot, the bus and tram stops are also located near the station and there's free parking a 3-minute walk away.

The space
We live in a house which is divided into two apartments, one on the ground floor and the second one on the first + second floor, which is ours.

The first floor contains our living and dining room, the kitchen and the bathroom, which are all shared with us. The second floor contains the guest room,
next to our own bedroom. Our sunny terrace is located between the first and second floor.

The guest room has a double bed for a couple, but is also big enough fo
neighborhood_overview:
The flat is located in a residential neighbourhood so its a pretty quiet part of town.

Located just a short 5-10 minute walk from the trendy Het Zuid and the river, and a 5-minute walk from Troonplaats, a square with a couple of cool bars and restaurants. We highly suggest heading to Bar d'Henri to try their cheese platter!

The Meir (Antwerp's most known shopping street) and the main touristic area is only a 10-minute bike ride away.

We will be there as well to give some more suggestions when you are here :)

neighborhood_overview:

The location is great because it is very easy to reach by car (free parking on the street) and public transport. It's very close to the Port of Antwerp and to an entertainment center with movie theater, restaurants, bars and close to a big parc.
The apartment is on the second floor of a house with private entrance. We have all the amenities that you need to make you feel at home.

The space
You enter via a private entrance in the hallway.
The apartment itself is very bright with a lot of windows.
Everything is newly painted, renovated and the bathroom is brand new!

You can also use the storage room that is located on the ground floor and a priva
neighborhood_overview:
My place is located in a dead-end street with a green square in the middle. Thre is free parking and it is very quiet, but still close to the city center.
It is very easy reachable by car and public transport. There are also shared bikes nearby.
You can easily jog/walk to a big parc 2km away.
There is also a big entertainment center closeby (2km) with a big movie theater, bars and restaurants.
The sportpaleis is a concert hall at about 3km where there are often big concerts.
It's also very close to the Port of Antwerp, but still close enough to the center to enjoy Antwerp as a local. Also, it's easy to reach The Netherlands from here.

name: The Greenplace Lodge - S1
description:
Right in the historic heart of Antwerp, we host a fully equipped, ultra renovated apartment inside an antique building.

A 1 minute walk to the main square "Groenplaats" on a quiet street. A 15 min walk to the Central Station and less than 5 min walk to the famous shopping street "Meir". We are surrounded by several lunch bars and fashion shops. The cities top restaurant area is also less then 5 min walking from the apartment.

The best possible place for an amazing stay in Antwerp! :-)

The space
Our apartments are decorated to make you feel at home. We want to give you a warm, enjoyable and relaxing place to rest while exploring our beautiful city. Our apartment is equipped with all essentials for a comfortable trip. Eg. a fully equipped kitchen, fresh bedlinnen and towels for each guest, shower gel, shampoo and conditioner, coffee, tea, hair dryer etc.

Guest access
The apartment is completely private for the people t
neighborhood_overview: Antwerp is Belgium’s second largest city, has the biggest port and is the capital of coal. It has long been a powerful magnet for everyone from fashion moguls and club queens to art lovers and diamond dealers. In the mid-16th century it was one of Europe’s most important cities and home to baroque superstar painters like Pieter Paul Rubens. Despite many historical travails thereafter and severe WWII bombing, Antwerp retains an intriguing medieval heart with plenty of café-filled cobbled lanes, a riverside fortress and a truly impressive Cathedral. Today, however, Antwerp’s top drawcards are its vibrant fashion and entertainment scene, booming diamond businesses along with its startling architectural and cultural contrasts.
host_about: Hello, my name is Elisabeth! I've travelled around the world and lived abroad for a couple of years. Now my goal is to accomodate others in amazing apartments in the very heart of our beautiful city! :-)

name: Luxurious historical mansion 🎯top location/parking
description:
Prachtig historisch herenhuis in het hartje van Antwerpen. 5 luxueuze/modern ingerichte verdiepingen. Perfect bereikbaar met de wagen en voorzien van een gratis ondergrondse parking voor gasten. Alle bezienswaardigheden op wandelafstand. Gelegen in het midden van de stad aan de Grote Markt maar toch ontzettend rustig. Een artisanale bakkerij in de straat, culinaire ontdekkingen in de onmiddellijke omgeving. De ideale mix van toerisme, shopping, gastronomie en werk in de bruisende stad Antwerpen.

The space
Een unieke historische herenwoning in het hart van Antwerpen. De woning bestaat uit 5 verdiepingen. Op de gelijkvloers een volledig uitgerust kantoor, met sofa bed en buitenruimte. Een was ruimte en toilet. Op de eerste verdieping een luxueuze en gezellige leefruimte met eetkamer en volledig uitgeruste keuken. Op verdieping 2 een master suite met inloopkast en badkamer. Op de derde en vierde verdieping een slaapruimte met badkamer, toilet, inloopkast en sofa bed
neighborhood_overview: Super centraal gelegen herenwoning aan de Grote Markt van Antwerpen. Alle bezienswaardigheden op wandelafstand.

name: City Centre Studio:  enjoy art, fashion & dining
description:
Welcome to Antwerp's historic city center!
Your clean and disinfected comfy home will be a light and spacious loft in a refurbished 19th century mansion.
Private entrance with cloakroom at the 4th level, wooden floors, lots of natural light with 3 big Velux roof windows. 2 Sofas, a Smart TV, DAB+ bluetooth Radio, private internet, a fully equipped kitchen, dishwasher, etc.
Queensize bed, a bathroom with bath and shower and a separate toilet. All with bed en bathroom linen.

The space
DISINFECTION of the loft and PERSONAL HYGIENE.
After each occupation the dwelling will stay vacant for 24 hours and professionally cleaned up and disinfected. A disinfecting handwash is installed at the entry, please use it.



Beautiful, comfy & private studio, located in the middle of everything! Whether you want to visit the historical-cultural centre, eat, shop, work or just relax and enjoy Antwerp: all you need is only minutes away. Feel
neighborhood_overview:
Located at the famous ‘Vogeltjesmarkt' you can enjoy this light, comfy and retro studio apartment with beautiful view from the 4th floor.
The recently renovated square hosts Antwerp's most cosy markets on weekends, and is the centre of the theatre district with the beautiful “Bourla theatre”, the “Arenberg”, the “Stadsschouwburg”, the Opera and of course the famous “Rubenshuis” all within a short walk, and -of course - lovely cafés, terraces and restaurants.
A few minutes away you can find yourself right at the historical centre with the Grote Markt, the Groenplaats and the cathedral, but also in the city's major shopping streets: the Meir, the Huidevettersstraat or de Keyserlei. The botanical garden and the city park are less than 5 minutes walking. The fashion and art & antique neighborhood “Het Zuid” (the South) is at walking distance through the historical city centre.
host_about:
Alain Daxhelet is professor vertaalkunde aan de KULeuven van 1997 tot 2017 en oprichter/bestuurder van dhaxley Translations nv van 1986 tot 2019 , thans onderdeel van Ubiqus Group sa. 
Vandaag is Alain Daxhelet senior consultant bij Studiecentrum C&T.

name: Perfect Location, location, location
description:
A charming studio located in the old harbor district of Antwerp known as the legendary “Schipperskwartier” Only a stroll away from the river side, shops, restaurants and all the delights of the old city centre. This Bright & cozy studio is on the first floor with an amazing view over a vivid square. Take your breakfast on a sunny morning on the balcony and feel the enery of this beautiful city.

The space
Heigh ceiling, french doors to the balcony at the front and the back, wooden stairs to the cosy mezzanine with a double bed and Apple TV for your entertainment programmed with Netflix. walk-in closet, fully stocked kitchen if you like to cook, large dining table with 8 chairs, seperate bathroom and a cozy lounge.
We love our flat and are renting out while we are away.

Guest access
This centrally located, fully furnished appartment is well maintained and has wooden floors and can be reached via a tidy central corridor with elevator a
neighborhood_overview:
Our apartement is just a step away from "Het Eilandje", or so called “The Little Island,”
A few years ago, the city of Antwerp started a successful re-development of the old harbor district known as the legendary Schipperskwartier”
Today this neighborhood is a cozy place with a rich history and a limited well-kept and traffic-free tolerance zone for the oldest profession.
The city of Antwerp won the prize for the broad yet precise way in which it approached the red light district in recent years, both socially and spatially.
In the past decade, the harbor area has gone from scruffy maritime wasteland to foodie haven and museum central. Ask any local what prompted the change, and they’ll most likely point you to the MAS, a remarkable sandstone-colored construction. Today, the district boasts waterfront cafés, lofts and another successful museum, The Red Star Line, dedicated to the eponymous Antwerp cruiser company and the millions of emigrants it carried oversea
host_about: I love travelling around and enjoy meeting people. Looking forward to welcome you in Antwerpen.

name: Friday Market
description:
The "Friday Market" is a newly refurbished self catering apartment overlooking the quiet, leafy square of the Vrijdagmarkt. Apart from Friday mornings when there is a bustling bric a brac market, the square is a calm oasis hidden in the middle of the historic centre of old Antwerpen.

A bright living room with a double sofa-bed and gas heating stove, a cozy bedroom with a large double bed, a fully equipped kitchen( nespresso machine, toaster, microwave) and a bathroom with a bath and a shower.

The space
Numerous vintage 'objet d'art', pictures and books adorn the apartment, I hope you like them!
The apartment is on the 2nd floor and there is no lift.

Other things to note

name: Unique apartment in historic Antwerp mansion
description:
Staying here will be an exclusive and unique experience, being a private apartment in a beautiful 18th century monumental mansion. The combination of old-world antique charm and stylish sophistication make this both romantic and cozy.
Upon entering the building, you will be awed by its beautiful historic entrance including a historic water pump & sculptures. The rooms feature a beautiful combination of antique wooden styled 18th century structure, complimented with modern 21st century comforts.

The space
This accommodation is wonderful for families, large groups of friends, wedding groups etc. and we will do all in our power to make your stay the best possible.

you have access to the entire 2nd floor private apartment, with the option of.
parking for multiple cars, inside the property’s 2 spacious garages.

Our guests continuously say, their visit to Antwerp was worthwhile just for the experience of staying in this very special ven
neighborhood_overview:
This stylish mansion is located in the heart of historic Belgium, an ideal base to explore the charming city of Antwerp. Located just a few steps away from the Shopping District, cosmopolitan restaurants, bars, top tourist attractions and museums.


Antwerp’s famous shopping street – Meir: 3 minute walk / 200 meters
Grote Markt: 7 minute walk / 500 meters
Rubens House Museum: 6 minute walk / 500 meters
St James church: 3 minute walk / 200 meters
AP hoge school: 3 minute walk / 200 meters
Cathedral of Our Lady Antwerp: 6 minute walk 400 meters
Antwerp opera house: 10 minutes

City-bicycles and scooters can be hired nearby.

THE CITY OF ANTWERP – VOTED TOP DESTINATION OF 2018 BY LONELY PLANET
From chocolates and beer to diamonds and world-class shopping, experience the best of Belgium. A charming city hosting Belgium's biggest port, fashionable hotspots, diamond districts and an amazing night life, this city is a memor
host_about:
Hosting guests and tourists is our passion.

Our mansion is situated in a prime location and extremely unique as being both a 17th century antique building that also includes all modern comforts

We felt its only morally correct that this building is offered to the general public and tourists, rather than for long term rentals.

We proudly offer accommodation for 3 different group sizes, 4 14 or 18 people, thus be it a couple on their honeymoon or romantic city break, or even a larger group getting together for a fun weekend or conference, we will be delighted to accommodate.

We also proudly offer a dining/conference hall in the building (multi option lighting, set according to your venue and needs).

People staying here marvel the beauty and experience of staying here.

We are looking forward to your bookings and the chance to give you a amazing experience.

name: Marble Luxury Lodge Heart of Antwerp 4E
description:
This beautiful luxury apartment is located right on the famous "Meir" street in the heart of Antwerp. The Meir is the biggest shopping street of the Benelux filled with high-end and well known brands.
The best possible location for a wonderful stay in our city.
Recently renovated with 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms & a completely equipped kitchen our apartment will exceed your expectations.
We are on a couple of minutes walking distance of the Central Station, Groenplaats square & The Cathedral! :-)

The space
Our apartments are decorated to make you feel at home. We want to give you a warm, enjoyable and relaxing place to rest while exploring our beautiful city. Our apartment is equipped with all essentials for a comfortable trip. Eg. a fully equipped kitchen, fresh bedlinnen and towels for each guest, shower gel, shampoo and conditioner, coffee, tea, hair dryer etc.

Guest access
The apartment is completely private for the peopl
neighborhood_overview: Antwerp is Belgium’s second largest city, has the biggest port and is the capital of coal. It has long been a powerful magnet for everyone from fashion moguls and club queens to art lovers and diamond dealers. In the mid-16th century it was one of Europe’s most important cities and home to baroque superstar painters like Pieter Paul Rubens. Despite many historical travails thereafter and severe WWII bombing, Antwerp retains an intriguing medieval heart with plenty of café-filled cobbled lanes, a riverside fortress and a truly impressive Cathedral. Today, however, Antwerp’s top drawcards are its vibrant fashion and entertainment scene, booming diamond businesses along with its startling architectural and cultural contrasts.
host_about: Hello, my name is Elisabeth! I've travelled around the world and lived abroad for a couple of years. Now my goal is to accomodate others in amazing apartments in the very heart of our beautiful city! :-)

name: Studio Heaven: in the heart of Antwerp!
description:
Studio Heaven is a spacious studio in the heart of Antwerp. You stay within walking distance of all the sights that Antwerp has to offer. The Meir, which is less than 100 meters away, the romantic Old Town, the Cathedral, Central Station, the Zoo and numerous museums ... The light and spacious studio is on the 3rd floor, that's why we call it Studio Heaven. Beware, there is no elevator present, so expect a "stairway to Heaven" ;-).

(Due to taxes, we don't rent the studio to companies.)

The space
The studio is light and spacious with a large double bed (160x200 cm), a closet to hang your clothes, a sitting area with a comfortable sofa bed (2p) and an eating area with a large dining table. There is a separated kitchen and bathroom. The kitchen has a breakfast area, a cooking plate, a combi-oven and fridge with small freezer. The bathroom has a bathtub (with shower option), a toilet and sink. We provide clean sheets, bathtowels and soap. As you can see o
neighborhood_overview: The studio is right in the city center and the shopping streets are just around the corner. It is a few meters from the OPERA tram stop and located in a quiet street. So you don't suffer from city noise. Bus, tram, metro and the station (Antwerp - Central) are less than 5 minutes away. There is a supermarket Delhaize, bakery, shopping center and organic shop nearby.
host_about:
Hello, I'm Hanne and I work at PRH - Persoonlijkheid en Relaties vzw.
PRH is an organization from the socio-cultural sector that gives courses on personal growth. Studio Heaven is on the 3rd floor of our building were you can enjoy a pleasant stay at a unique location.

name: Antwerp For Two Bed & Breakfast
description:
Our B&B has spacious rooms and is designed to guarantee a delicious night’s rest for two people. You have your own bathroom (with a reviving rain shower and powerful hairdryer) and a separate toilet. A safe big enough to hold your laptop computer, Wi-Fi, digital radio and smart TV with sound bar. After a visit to the city, you can take time to relax on our terrace. And if you feel like a snack or a drink, just serve yourself from your well-stocked Honesty Bar.

The space
When designing your room, we put a great deal of attention into ensuring your comfort while taking a proactive approach to the environment. In your bathroom, for instance, you will find an environmentally friendly soap dispenser with high-quality shampoo, conditioner and shower gel.
neighborhood_overview: Our B&B is located in the center of the city between the MAS-museum and the historical center. At 500 meters you will find the Cathedral and the Grote Markt. Below 1km you will find MAS, Momu and Red Star Line Museum. You can go out shopping at de Meir, Nationalestraat, Kloosterstraat and Schuttershofstraat all in walking distance. Restaurants and bars are plenty available in the neighbourhood.
host_about: Onze B&B Antwerp For Two boek je vanaf 1 nacht in de week en 2 nachten in het weekend. Je verblijft in een ruime kamer, die zo ingericht werd dat je met 2 personen van een zalige nachtrust kan genieten. Je beschikt over een eigen badkamer (met verkwikkende regendouche en krachtige haardroger) en een apart toilet. Een ruime kluis waar je portable in past, wifi, digitale radio en smart-tv met soundbar zijn aanwezig. Na een bezoek aan de stad vind je rust op je terras. Heb je zin in een hapje of drankje, dan neem je dat zelf uit je goedgevulde Honesty Bar.

name: Charming and cosy apartment in the old town
description:
If you are looking for a charming place with everything you need for a great stay in Antwerp, this is your place. Located in between the hip neighbourhood Het eilandje and the historic city centre. The cathedral, Grote Markt and Groenplaats are only a 5min walk. The fashion district and shopping streets will take you 10 min by foot or 3 min by tram (stops at 100m) to Meir. The MAS museum is right around the corner. There are 2 bakeries with breakfast within 20 meters of the appartement.

The space
This appartement (70m² ) is trendy, cool and newly renovated combining high ceilings with exposed beams, and a cosy wooden floor. It is located at the first floor of a small building, and equipped with a lift. The flat features all the modern facilities you need. Wifi, smart tv, fully equipped kitchen, bathroom with rain shower and separate toilet. In the bedroom you will find a queen size hotel bed. The living space has a couch that transforms into a double sofa
neighborhood_overview: Our airbnb is located in the city center  next to the historic neighbourhood and close to the Mas museum and Schelde river bank. The Eilandje, one of the nicest quarters in Antwerp, with his restaurants, harbour and museums is a 3 min walk, the iconic Havenhuis is 15 min further down the riverbank.  From the apartment you can walk straight to our lovely Cathedral,  in between the Groenplaats en Grote markt.  This is the heart of Antwerp. In this area you will find all the bars and restaurants, the diamond museum, the historic buildings surrounding the Grote markt.  If you walk further to the south the fashion district awaits you.    5 min to the north of the apartment, you can stroll along the river banks of the Schelde.  There are 2 supermarkets within 300m and a laundromat at 50m of the appartment.

name: Beautiful Loft Antwerp Old Town with unique view!
description:
This is a spacious loft( 100 m² )with a big terras. The view is spectacular: you can see a few iconic buildings of Antwerp e.g..St. Bartholomew's Church. It's bright, with high ceilings, wooden floors, and natural light. This loft features 1 master bedroom with a luxury bathroom, a big living area, and a fully equipped kitchen.
The loft is located in a monumental building in the heart of the historic center of Antwerp. You can explore the city on foot. It's a lively and safe neighborhood.

The space
It's bright and sunny, with high ceilings, wooden floors, and natural light. This loft features 1 master bedroom with a luxury bathroom, a big living area, and a built-in fully equipped kitchen.

Guest access
Guests have access to the entire loft: living room, kitchen, bedroom, bathroom, and toilet are private.
neighborhood_overview:
The loft is located in a monumental building in the heart of the historic center of Antwerp. From the roof terrace, you have a view of the Bourse of Antwerp, KBC tower, and the cathedral.

The shopping street the Meir and the Groenplaats are just around the corner at 150 meters.
You can walk to the town hall on the Grote Markt in 5 minutes. The MAS Museum can be reached on foot in less than 15 minutes.

Antwerpen Centrum is full of cozy restaurants, coffee bars, museums, shops . There is a small supermarket Delhaize 5min away. It's a safe and cozy neighborhood.

description:
Staying here will be an exclusive and unique experience, being a private apartment in a beautiful 17th century monumental mansion. The combination of old-world antique charm and stylish sophistication make this both romantic and cozy

Upon entering the building, you will be awed by its beautiful historic entrance including a historic water pump, sculptures and more. It features a beautiful combination of antique wooden styled 18th century structure, complimented with modern 21st century comforts

The space
You have access to the entire ground floor private apartment, with the option of
parking for multiple cars, inside the property’s 2 spacious garages.

Our guests continuously say, their visit to Antwerp was worthwhile just for the experience of staying in this very special venue.

Guest access
free parking

Other things to note
Due to COVID19, our apartment is disinfected before and after each
neighborhood_overview:
This stylish mansion is located in the heart of historic Belgium, an ideal base to explore the charming city of Antwerp. Located just a few steps away from the Shopping District, cosmopolitan restaurants, bars, top tourist attractions and museums.

This accommodation is accessible being only a 10 minute walk from Antwerp‘s Central station and a 3 minute walk from a selection of tram and bus stops.

Antwerp’s famous shopping street – Meir: 3 minute walk / 200 meters
Grote Markt: 7 minute walk / 500 meters
Rubens House Museum: 6 minute walk / 500 meters
St James church: 3 minute walk / 200 meters
AP hoge school: 3 minute walk / 200 meters
Cathedral of Our Lady Antwerp: 6 minute walk 400 meters
Antwerp opera house: 10 minutes

City-bicycles and scooters can be hired nearby.
host_about:
Hosting guests and tourists is our passion.

Our mansion is situated in a prime location and extremely unique as being both a 17th century antique building that also includes all modern comforts

We felt its only morally correct that this building is offered to the general public and tourists, rather than for long term rentals.

We proudly offer accommodation for 3 different group sizes, 4 14 or 18 people, thus be it a couple on their honeymoon or romantic city break, or even a larger group getting together for a fun weekend or conference, we will be delighted to accommodate.

We also proudly offer a dining/conference hall in the building (multi option lighting, set according to your venue and needs).

People staying here marvel the beauty and experience of staying here.

We are looking forward to your bookings and the chance to give you a amazing experience.

name: Spacious Apartments in the Center of Antwerp 1L
description:
Right in the center of Antwerp on the best possible location. Just next to the famous shopping street Meir, surrounded by revered coffee bars and fashion stores.
2 beautiful bedrooms with broad windows.
A brand new fully equipped kitchen, large bathroom, a luminous balcony and a wonderful rooftop terrace. Less than a 5 minute walk to the city hall, the main square 'Groenplaats' and less than 10 minutes walking to the Central Station. Perfect for an amazing holiday or a business trip in Antwerp!

The space
Our apartments are decorated to make you feel at home. We want to give you a warm, enjoyable and relaxing place to rest while exploring our beautiful city. The apartment is completely private for the people that
neighborhood_overview: Antwerp is Belgium’s second largest city, has the biggest port and is the capital of coal. It has long been a powerful magnet for everyone from fashion moguls and club queens to art lovers and diamond dealers. In the mid-16th century it was one of Europe’s most important cities and home to baroque superstar painters like Pieter Paul Rubens. Despite many historical travails thereafter and severe WWII bombing, Antwerp retains an intriguing medieval heart with plenty of café-filled cobbled lanes, a riverside fortress and a truly impressive Cathedral. Today, however, Antwerp’s top drawcards are its vibrant fashion and entertainment scene, booming diamond businesses along with its startling architectural and cultural contrasts.
host_about: Hello, my name is Elisabeth! I've travelled around the world and lived abroad for a couple of years. Now my goal is to accomodate others in amazing apartments in the very heart of our beautiful city! :-)

name: Rustig gelegen huis op toplocatie
description:
Het huis is zeer rustig gelegen in het historisch stadscentrum achter een winkel bereikbaar via een afgesloten gang.

De locatie is in een hippe winkelbuurt en vlakbij restaurants, cafés en openbaar vervoer.

Op 5 minuten wandelafstand zijn er ook meerdere ontbijtgelegenheden en supermarkten.

Voor het huis is er een private binnenkoer met terrasje waar ook enkele fietsen kunnen worden geplaatst.

The space
Rust en stilte in een stijlvol ingerichte gerenoveerde woning midden in de Antwerpse hippe modebuurt.

Guest access
De gehele woning is ter beschikking

Other things to note
Niet zo geschikt voor kleine kinderen of minder mobiele personen wegens draaitrap
neighborhood_overview:
Het huis is gelegen in de St-Andrieswijk. Dit is “de” modebuurt in Antwerpen met tal van ontdekkingen, designer shops, vintage winkels, etc...

De straat zelf is ver buiten Antwerpen gekend om z'n mode designer winkels.

Er zijn toffe pleintjes in de buurt en uiteraard het echte stadscentrum waar altijd wat te beleven en ontdekken valt.
host_about:
3 kinderen, 19, 17 en 13 jaar
Gehuwd met Greet

name: Cosy studio in trendy neighbourhood!
description:
I am renting my apartment located in the hipster area "Zurenborg" close to the city center. My place isn't big but very cozy as you can see on my pictures.

The space
My studio is 45m2 and has 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom with shower + bathtub. The kitchen has a dish washer which is also nice. I have very big bookcase so feel free to read anything! I also have a TV, DVD player and Netflix that you can use.

Other things to note
I have two little birds but they are super cute and if you are lucky they will sing to you :)
neighborhood_overview: This area has a very nice little square, just across the street from my studio. There you will find a lot of bars and restaurants. I also live only  500 meters  from the train station and 50 meters from my door you will find a tram/bus stop that takes you to the city center!

description:
Vlak naast de nieuwe "groene long" van Antwerpen , op het gezellige Damplein ligt dit mooi ingerichte loft-appartement op de 4de verdieping . De leefruimte met knusse slaapbank heeft aansluitend een volledig ingerichte keuken. De slaapruimte en badkamer zijn voorzien van alle comfort. Tal van sportieve mogelijkheden in de buurt. Zo ook gezellige bars en restaurantjes. En 2km van het Sportpaleis.

The space
Wij voorzien een Nespresso machine, waterkoker en broodrooster. Shampoo, douchegel, handdoeken en beddengoed liggen klaar bij aankomst.
Mocht de loft niet meer vrij zijn, vrij vrijblijvend naar onze andere accomodaties. Een babybedje kan op aanvraag.
neighborhood_overview:
De woning van Luc ligt in Antwerpen, Vlaanderen, België.

- Uniek en gezellig park 50m afstand
- Diverse originele eetgelegenheden in de directe omgeving
- Een Belgisch frietkot 300m .
- op 10 minuten van de shopping area en oude stadskern.
- Het MAS museum op wandelafstand
- 2km van het Sportpaleis

It has a full equipped kitchen, living room, nice ( 55" ) smart tv cable , two bedrooms one with a double bed and one with two single beds that u can set as a double bed , beautiful bathroom. All this is located at the entrees to the Diamond Bourse of Antwerp, just opposite Astoria hotel Antwerp

The space
75 m2 two bedrooms apartment on the first floor

name: Lovely & bright 2P apartment, Top location 't Zuid
description:
Comfortable and cosy 2 person apartment at one of the best locations in Antwerp, the hip and trendy South.

The apartment is recently renovated. It has a bright, open living area and a master bedroom with a double bed. The kitchen is fully equipped with a dishwasher, oven, microwave, coffee machine, a water cooker, a hob and a fridge. The bathroom has a walk-in shower. You can grab some fresh air on the little balcony.

WIFI is free available.

Other things to note
Note that the apartment is located on the first floor (without elevator) and also has as small staircase inside.

name: New Cosy Apartement in the heart of Antwerp
description:
Beautiful new apartement with nice sun terras in the heart of Antwerp historical center. In the middle of nice shopping streets, bars and restaurants.
It has a cosy, homy style . And immediately gives you that feeling of walking in to your own “get-a-way” in Antwerp.

The space
We designed it as if we would live there ourselfs .
For us it is important that you feel at home and welcome .
On the corner you’ll find an amazing breakfast bar, on the other side of the street the best coffee-/interior shop of Antwerp and just 20m a way a supermarket.
All the best shops of Antwerp are just a 1 min walk away .
The historical monuments of the city are literally around the corner .

We hope you will love this apartement as much as we do .

Other things to note
Very new and cosy
neighborhood_overview:
Its in the middle off the city center off Antwerp
Just two minutes walking from all shops en restaurants
But still in a very quiet neighbourhood

description:
1 Master Bedroom with a double bed of 1m60 wide with storage space available.
Shared bathroom with bath/shower and double sink. Clean sheets and towels included.
Separate toilet.
Separate space to store your luggage.
Shared fully equipped kitchen with dining space and lounge.

neighborhood_overview: Modern apartment on the first floor of a 3 story house, just outside Antwerp. Recently renovated, everything is new and shiny. Vivid neighborhood close to shops, restaurants and parks. Art-deco neighborhood 'Zurenborg' in walking distance.

name: Light House Lodge Apartment in Center of Antwerp |
description:
A bright, large and hyper renovated apartment right in the city center, surrounded by fashion stores and hip coffee-shops. The kitchen is fully equipped and we supply fresh linen, towels and all essentials.

Located very close to the famous shopping street Meir and the main-squares "Groenplaats" and "Grote Markt". The best possible location for a visit to Antwerp!

The Central station is a 15-20min walk and there's a free parking area at the Waalse Kaai on a 10min walk.

Best regards!

The space
Our apartments are decorated to make you feel at home. We want to give you a warm, enjoyable and relaxing place to rest while exploring our beautiful city. Our apartment is equipped with all essentials for a comfortable trip. Eg. a fully equipped kitchen, fresh bedlinnen and towels for each guest, shower gel, shampoo and conditioner, coffee, tea, hair dryer etc.

Guest access
The apartment is completely private for the
neighborhood_overview: Antwerp is Belgium’s second largest city, has the biggest port and is the capital of coal. It has long been a powerful magnet for everyone from fashion moguls and club queens to art lovers and diamond dealers. In the mid-16th century it was one of Europe’s most important cities and home to baroque superstar painters like Pieter Paul Rubens. Despite many historical travails thereafter and severe WWII bombing, Antwerp retains an intriguing medieval heart with plenty of café-filled cobbled lanes, a riverside fortress and a truly impressive Cathedral. Today, however, Antwerp’s top drawcards are its vibrant fashion and entertainment scene, booming diamond businesses along with its startling architectural and cultural contrasts.
host_about: Hello, my name is Elisabeth! I've travelled around the world and lived abroad for a couple of years. Now my goal is to accomodate others in amazing apartments in the very heart of our beautiful city! :-)

description:
My appartment is in a very good location. There is a tram in front of it going to the city center. 5 minutes to Berchem station, +- 10 min central station, city center 15min max. And 5 minutes to the airport of Antwerpen.
There is a park in front of the appartment and supermarkets around.

The space
Fica em uma boa localização temos 2 linha de tram. 04 e 09 que vai para o Centro que fica 5 minutos da garre de Berchem, 10 minutos para a Garre central e centro max 15 minutos. E 5 minutos do aeroporto de Antwerpen. Tem mercado perto o Aldi e Delheize sem contar com ótimos restaurantes ao lado e um lindo park.

neighborhood_overview: Antwerp is Belgium’s second largest city, has the biggest port and is the capital of coal. It has long been a powerful magnet for everyone from fashion moguls and club queens to art lovers and diamond dealers. In the mid-16th century it was one of Europe’s most important cities and home to baroque superstar painters like Pieter Paul Rubens. Despite many historical travails thereafter and severe WWII bombing, Antwerp retains an intriguing medieval heart with plenty of café-filled cobbled lanes, a riverside fortress and a truly impressive Cathedral. Today, however, Antwerp’s top drawcards are its vibrant fashion and entertainment scene, booming diamond businesses along with its startling architectural and cultural contrasts.

name: B&B in historisch stadscentrum.
description: Op een van de meest historische pleintjes in Antwerpen in de schaduw van het barokjuweel onder de Antwerpse kerken, de 16de eeuwse Sint Pauluskerk, vindt u Urban Dreams. Verzorgde nieuwe kamers met volledig uitgeruste trendy badkamers en een gezellige ontvangstruimte waar naar hartenlust koffie en thee gedronken kan worden. De Bed & Breakfast zich achter een 300 jaar oude stadsgevel op minder dan 5 minuten wandelafstand van zowel de Schelde als de grote Markt, het hart van het oude stadscentrum.
neighborhood_overview: In het historisch stads-centrum.

name: GREAT apartment, ideal location!
description:
The apartement (85m2) is located in a building that used to be the "Kamer van Koophandel". You enter the building in a very beautiful entrance hall. The apartment is on the second floor and can be accessed with an elevator.
The apartment is completely at your disposal. You will find a spacious room with kitchen and living room, two bedrooms and 1 bathroom. There is also a parking spot available in the building for a little additional cost.

The space
The kitchen is equipped with a fridge, an induction cooker, a microwave combi oven, a dishwasher, a water boiler and a Nespresso coffee machine.
neighborhood_overview: The appartement is located nearby the lively Mechels Plein and Marnixplaats. The Theaterbuurt, Meir, 't Zuid are all on walking distance(5-10min). Close to the apartement you will find a lot of bars/restaurants, cheap and more pricy. Supermarkets are next door. Aldi and Carrefour market (also open on Sunday).

name: Studio free parking & breakfast, kitchen, bathroom
description:
Welcome to our family house!

You will enjoy a room on ground level w/shared use of veranda and garden. It has a double bed and a couch/bed for 2p. No other people live on this floor.
It has a shower room. NEW (9/2020): renovated toilet room.
You have your own fully equipped kitchen (fridge, oven, cooking plates)

Parking is easy outside (free but use of blue card). At 100m free without blue card.
all bedsheets & towels incl., also simple self-served breakfast.

The space
a middle sized room with a 1m60 double bed and a couch that can be transformed into a bunk bed, with a lot of light. view over veranda and garden.
The room itself is not big, but use of veranda and garden offer space to relax. Also use of garage for storing bicycles or luggage).

Guest access
entrance through door or garage port. Ground level, so access for disabled is possible.

Other things to note
If you w
neighborhood_overview: Very close to Sportpaleis (800m) for concerts etc.
host_about:
Welcome to our family house! 

We like to welcome guests in our garden view room or in a room om the third floor. 

The garden room on the ground floor had kitchen and a double sized bed of 160cm. You can use the veranda and the garden, shared with us. 

The rooms on third floor you can only reach using the stairs (no easy acces for disabled people), shared toilet and shower. You can use a shared tv-room. No kitchen. 

We live in this house, using 1st and 2nd floor. 

Corona update: 
all rooms are desinfected before your arrival. 
social distancing rules apply. (no handshakes, 1,5m etc).

name: Room in big loft in the citycenter, meirbuilding
description:
Very nice apartment in the city center of Antwerp. GIRLS ONLY !! You share the flat with 2 Flemish girls and two cats, you have your own bathroom and bedroom, the other rooms are shared. You can use the dishwasher, fridge and washingmachine. The apartment is located on the 6th floor with elevator, there is room for your bike and there is a velo station nearby to rent a bike if you want. The metro station Meir is just downstairs. It is 1.5km from Central station. PM for questions! See you soon!

The space
Een grote loft met veel ruimte en een prachtig zicht op de meir en de boerentoren! Het beste aan dit apartement is de rust en de locatie!

Guest access
Je heb toegang tot alle ruimtes, natuurlijk zijn de slaapkamers privé.

Other things to note
GIRLS ONLY !

name: Cosy vintage design house+roof top terrace
description:
Renovated bel-étage house from 1928 in a residential area within bike/tram distance of the city of Antwerp. Cosy living room on first floor with authentical vintage design, 2 big sofa's, table, fireplace and fully equiped kitchen. Roof top terrace and garden with outdoor furniture are next to the living room. Lots of natural light in the house. Compact sleeping room with a comfy double bed. Modern bathroom with a big walk in shower, a bath tub and toilet. A study is located on the ground floor.

Other things to note
TV: there is no cable subscription, but a HDMI cable and Chrome Cast to cast the TV apps on your phone or laptop to the big screen (Netflix etc).
Breakfast: there is a wide variety of self service breakfast options, only no fresh bread as I will only be there for check-in.
Furniture: the design pieces and other furniture have been selected carefully to give the house its cosy vibe, please use these with care and respect.
neighborhood_overview: Quiet residential area, with some supermarkets, a bakery and a vegetable/fruit store nearby. At 5 minutes drive, there are cosy restaurants such as Pompidou, Murni, a brunch place called Pain Pidou, close to the Middelheim/Nachtegalen/Den Brandt parks where you can run/walk, visit the exposition park, take a coffee at the terrace, etc. You go easily to the centre of Antwerp by bike/tram/car.
host_about: Hi, I'm Tinne, I'm a passionate fashion retail professional and I enjoy life to the fullest! In my job and on airbnb, my greatest pleasure is to take care of people so they have a great experience and leave with a smile on their face!

description:
Wij bieden een hippe ruimte aan, gelegen op het trendy Zuid in hartje Antwerpen. De lichte kamer is de perfecte uitvalsbasis om de stad te verkennen. In onze buurt vind je heel wat leuke eethuisjes, koffiebars, musea en winkels.

Houd je meer van rust? Onze bnb biedt de mogelijkheid om je terug te trekken voor een zelfgemaakt ontbijt, een koffie in onze schommelstoeltjes of een goed boek op het terras.

We staan garant voor een ontspannen sfeer, en 'local' tips om alles uit je bezoek te halen.

The space
Onze airbnb bevindt zich op de tweede verdieping van een gezellige rijwoning in Antwerpen. Je bereikt de kamer via een gezamenlijke trap. Vlakbij de kamer kan je beschikken over een privé toilet met een eigen (kleine) lavabo.

De badkamer is gedeeld maar meer dan de moeite waard, check de foto's maar. Handdoeken, een haardroger en beddengoed wachten je uiteraard op.

Wie af en toe graag zelf zijn eten voorziet kan rekenen

neighborhood_overview: Antwerp is Belgium’s second largest city, has the biggest port and is the capital of coal. It has long been a powerful magnet for everyone from fashion moguls and club queens to art lovers and diamond dealers. In the mid-16th century it was one of Europe’s most important cities and home to baroque superstar painters like Pieter Paul Rubens. Despite many historical travails thereafter and severe WWII bombing, Antwerp retains an intriguing medieval heart with plenty of café-filled cobbled lanes, a riverside fortress and a truly impressive Cathedral. Today, however, Antwerp’s top drawcards are its vibrant fashion and entertainment scene, booming diamond businesses along with its startling architectural and cultural contrasts.

name: Cosy apARTment in the suburbs
description:
The flat is located on the first floor (USA: second floor) on a quiet street in the green residential area of Wilrijk. Both bedrooms face the street.
It's a 2 bedroom flat suitable for 3 people. It's bright and cozy. It was designed by an interior architect who combined timeless design with modern artwork.

The living areas are in a large open-space design so you can walk freely from the kitchen through the dining area and into the living room.

There is no elevator, no TV and no microwave.

The space
The master bedroom has a big walk-in dressing making it suitable for long stays.
The second bedroom has a full-length single bed (2m long). The bed has 3 drawers for storage. There is enough seating in the living and dining room for 4 people. The kitchen is fully equipped with a large fridge, an oven, an induction stovetop and a dishwasher.
The bathroom has a walk-in shower and no bathtub.

Other things to note<
neighborhood_overview: Wilrijk is the green suburb of Antwerp with three parks nearby, one of which is an open-air museum. City bikes are available a stone's throw away and bus stops are within a 2 mn walk. There is a big supermarket nearby
host_about: My daughter has been using airbnb for a while in Berlin and recommended I do the same. I am an interior designer and Antwerp native. I've lived in this city my entire life and know the best places to eat, drink and be merry. I love meeting new people and promoting this city to curious travels who come to Belgium's best kept secret!

name: Unique stay in an exclusive, historical building
description:
Fully equipped apartment on the 2nd and 3rd floor of an original town house built in 1884.
In the most fashionable and vibrant part of town (Het Zuid), close to the fashion district, the Kloosterstraat with its vintage and antiques shops, shopping street "Meir" and lots of museums, bars and restaurants nearby.
The apartment has its own kitchen, bathroom, 2 bedrooms (2nd bedroom to be installed) and the private use of a huge terrace.
There is a baby cot if needed and coffee and tea is offered.

The space
Welcome to Antwerp's most fashionable neighborhood!

Your home will be a light and spacious apartment in an authentic mansion.

White wooden floors, lots of natural light, a huge terrace, fully equipped kitchen with coffee, tea etc. and a separate bathroom with shower.

Everything you need for a nice getaway!
You get to live here like a local! ;-)

Other things to note
Because we care about
neighborhood_overview:
Het Zuid is a neighborhood known for it's stately mansions, wide streets and beautiful squares.
Art lovers can find many galleries and museums here, such as Sofie Van de Velde, Tim Van Laere, M HKA, FOMY and many more. FOMU.
This part of town is also known for it's many popular bars and restaurants such as Hopper, Pilar, The Glorious, Ferrier 30 etc.

name: Flat with mezzanine@OudeBeurs
description:
Комнаты Oude Beurs apartments находятся в самом сердце старого Антверпена, на улице Oude Beurs - самой первой и старейшей фондовой биржи. Менее чем в 1 минуте ходьбы от оживленной площади Grote Markt и собора Антверпенской Богоматери.

The space
Мы предоставляем полностью укомплектованные комнаты на короткий и длинный срок. Во всём здании есть бесплатный Wi-Fi.
Нашим гостям предлагается размещение в светлых и комфортных комнатах в стиле лофт. Все комнаты оснащены индивидуальной кухней сo встроенным холодильником, микроволновой печкой, чайником, тостерницей и кварцевой плитой. Так же имеются все небходимые кухонные принадлежности и посуда. В комнатах есть телевизор с плоским экраном и мобильный кондиционер. Индивидуальная ванная комната с душем, туалетом, феном и полотенцами.
Для гостей, желающих позавтракать или же пообедать недалеко, внизу есть маленький ресторанчик Fit Food с широким выбором горячих и холодных бутербродов и блюд. А так же с выбором ра
neighborhood_overview:
Дом AVER–Lodge расположен в удобном месте в историческом центре города, на расстоянии пешей прогулки от главных музеев и торговых улиц. Рядом находятся такие популярные достопримечательности, как Зелёная площадь (Groene Plaats), музей «Рубенс», музей Плантина-Моретуса и улицы магазинов Мейр (Meir). До музея Ан де Стром - MAS («Музей на реке») можно дойти за 10 минут, а до музея Red Star Line - за 15 минут. Расстояние до главного железнодорожного вокзала Антверпена (также одна из достопримечательностей города), 1,6 км., которое можно преодолеть пешком за 20 минут, а на машине за 11 мин. Расстояние до международного аэропорта Антверпена составляет 7,5 км. Мы говорим на 4х языках: нидерландский, французский, английский и русский.
Антверпен - центр города — является отличным выбором, если вам интересны атмосфера старого города, круглосуточные бары и рестораны.
Это любимая часть города Антверпен среди наших гостей согласно независимым отзывам.

name: Top located, cosy and very charming apartment
description:
This apartment, fully renovated in 2019, is the perfect central based place to explore the beautiful city of Antwerp. It is located on the 5th floor of one of the most prestigious projects from architect, Marc Segers, just after WOII. The building has a sober modernistic style, which fits perfectly in the architecture of the central 'Leien' next to the beautiful old National Bank.

The space
The apartment is on the 5th floor on the side of “the Leien”. The bedroom is on the back of the apartment which will guarantee you a good night's sleep. The open kitchen and living room improve the comfort and functionality of the place. There is a separate bedroom with a boxspring (double bed - 1.80m), a separate modern bathroom and a toilet. There is a small balcony (south-east oriented) in the front of the apartment which gives you a nice view of 'the Leien'.

What do you get?

-Fresh bed linnen
-Fresh towels
-Hair dryer
-Soap and shampoo<
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is located in the heart of Antwerp (Theatre neigbourhood). All Antwerps' mayor attractions are within walking distance.

TIP: On Saturday and Sunday there is a big market around the corner where locals collect their groceries for the week and enjoy a drink.

name: Stijlvolle privé-kamer + badkamer nabij Antwerpen
description:
Stijlvolle en goed uitgeruste privé-kamer met eigen badkamer vlakbij het prachtige Rivierenhof, gelegen in een rustige woonwijk, met gezellige restaurantjes en barretjes op wandelafstand, in onze straat en het heerlijk groene Rivierenhof.

The space
De scandinavisch ingerichte slaapkamer is voorzien van een comfortabel kingsize tweepersoonsbed. Televisie met dvd-speler en HDMI aansluiting. Waterkoker, haardroger, bluetooth muziekbox, informatie over Antwerpen,… is voorzien in de privé-kamer.
Praktisch ingerichte privé-badkamer naast slaapkamer voorzien van douche, toilet, lavabo, shampoo en zeep.
neighborhood_overview:
Traditioneel Italiaans restaurant op 50 meter.
Ontdek het prachtige Rivierenhof met openluchttheater, sportterreinen, restaurants en bars.
host_about:
My name is Martijn Bosmans, 31 years old and a traveller for life!
Together with my wife Elisa Gilin I'm living in Antwerp, Belgium. 
I like to travel, play music, watch movies, be sportive and creative all the time. 

If I'm visiting your home stay, I'm sure we can share some good travel advice and tips. Feel free to book a stay at our home in Deurne,  Antwerpen, next to the beautiful Rivierenhof and 15 minutes away from the amazing Antwerp city center. 

See you around!

Greets,
Martijn & Elisa

name: Antwerp Cosy Corner
description:
Little and cosy apartment in the city center of Antwerp. A building build in the '50 Architecture. Perfect place for a couple or solo traveler to rest and enjoy the new surrounding. Located in a quite neighbourhood, and in walking distance from the Central Station and City center.
It can be an ideal place to have a break after this Covid-19 Lockdown or for holiday purposes.

The space
The small and cosy apartment will give you a romantic vibe and for the solo traveler a place to hide from the big city hustle. Perfect to reload the batteries and organize the next travel destination. You'll be located in the exact city center and very close to all the shops and restaurants. No traffic in the street next to the house either.

Other things to note
on arrival you will take the elevator at the end of the hall. It is a small elevator with an ifrared security curtain. Keep your key at the ready because the elevator gives "direct" acces to t
neighborhood_overview: All around the apartment you have places to go eat on walking distance. (5min tops) It's a very comfortable location to be at.  In front of the apartment you have the old "Bourla Schouwburg"  and a very nice market place.   On Saturdays there are the markets there where you can buy food, textiles and other things.  very nice to wander around.
host_about:
Hi. I'm David Hendrickx,  I'm a Belgian carpenter/ timber framer from the flemmish region. 
I like sailing, nature, hiking in the mountains and reading good novels. 

talk soon. ;)

name: Cozy 2-Bedroom Apartment
description:
Very cozy apartment in perfectly located in the heart of Antwerp Berchem. The apartment has everything that is neccessary to feel at home: fully furnished and fully equipped kitchen, washing machine and little backyard.
The neighbourhood is a very friendly area, with many supermarkets and bakeries just around the corner and the train station is reachable in less than 10 minutes by foot.

The space
Our apartment has recently been renovated and is in a very good condition. There is central heating, WiFi, a very well equipped kitchen, a washing machine and dryer available.

The neighbourhood is very warm and friendly. Just around the corner is "Statiestraat" where you can find many shops, grocery stores and even a saturday market with fresh items from the producer themselves. There are many nice cafés where it is worth enjoying the atmosphere.
Berchem train station is just around the corner and reachable in less than 10 minutes by foot. There are also tram stations from with which you easily get to the city center within 15 minutes.

name: Design loft near Antwerp city centre and De Roma
description:
Ruime, trendy en karaktervolle loft met zithoek, volledig nieuw ingerichte keuken en badkamer met douche. Afgeschermde slaapruimte. Terras op het zuiden. Licht en rustig gelegen (op derde verdieping van een herenhuis). Er is airco en regelbare verwarming. Op 200m van De Roma in BOHO (Borgerhout), het kleurrijkste en levendigste district van de Antwerpse binnenstad. Cafés en restaurants, kunstgalerijen, winkels van alle slag in de buurt. Goede openbaarvervoerverbindingen en fietsverhuur (Velo).

The space
Ruime, trendy en karaktervolle loft die volledig nieuw is ingericht. Zithoek met design meubelen. Nieuwe keuken met elektrische kookplaat en oven. Een stijlvolle badkamer met douche. Afgeschermde slaapruimte. Mogelijkheid om een matras bij te leggen voor een kind. Ruim terras op het zuiden met extra zithoek. Een licht en rustgevend appartement (op derde verdieping gelegen in een herenhuis).

Guest access
De gasten komen aan via de privéwo
neighborhood_overview: BOHO (Borgerhout), is het kleurrijkste en levendigste district van de Antwerpse binnenstad. 'Op de Turnhoutsebaan vind je heel de wereld'. Maar ook in de wijkstraten zijn  er verschillende cafés met terrassen, koffiehuizen en restaurants , ook kunstgalerijen, winkels van alle slag (gaande van biowinkel, ambachtelijk ijs, frituur, supermarkt, nachtwinkels). Een buurtpark vind je op 100m van de studio.
host_about: I am a retired teacher in secondary education who has just obtained her diploma as a guide of Antwerp.  We opened our airbnb loft at the beginning of  March 2020 and we hope to receive many visitors.

name: Cozy BoHo Antwerp appartement op 10min van Station
description:
Appartement Cozy BoHo Antwerp ligt net buiten het centrum. De tram stopt voor de deur en brengt je op 10min naar het centraal station van Antwerpen. Te voet doe je er een half uurtje over. Ook deelfietsen zijn te huur voor de deur. Parkeren is gratis. Het appartement is zeer luxueus en gezellig ingericht om u een aangename tijd aan te bezorgen. Alle voorzieningen zijn aanwezig. De ideale locatie om Antwerpen te bezoeken. Het Sportpaleis, Trix, Bosuil, ligt allemaal op wandelafstand.

The space
Je beschikt hier over het volledige appartement op 1 ruimte na die op slot is. De slaapkamer biedt een zeer groot king size bed van hoge kwaliteit. Er is een ruime keuze aan kussens. Airco kan voorzien worden. De keuken is volledig ingericht met alle benodigdheden. De koelkast is gevuld. Er is led-verlichting geplaatst om je een gezellige avond te kunnen bezorgen.
neighborhood_overview: Het appartement ligt tegenover het mooiste park van Antwerpen. Het Rivierenhof. Hier kan men zeer mooie en rustige wandelingen maken. Dit op de grens van Borgerhout en Deurne. Op wandelafstand zijn verschillende eetgelegenheden, supermarkten. Het Sportpaleis, Lotto-arena, Trix en vele andere trekpleisters liggen op wandelafstand. Er kan gratis geparkeerd worden op de parking en op straat.
host_about: Ik ben Steven, 36 jaar en afkomstig uit Lommel. Sinds 2019 woon ik in Borgerhout. Ik werk voor de Vlaamse overheid in Antwerpen.  Andere mensen gelukkig maken, maakt mij gelukkig.

name: Cozy and compact city home
description:
This compact comfy apartment is the perfect basis for exploring the cultural, gastronomic and fashion city of Antwerp. Located ideally between the old town and the hip district of 't Eilandje, you will be able to walk almost everywhere during your stay. This 50 cm2 one bedroom apartment is at the ground floor of a typical Antwerp house from 1800s. It has a living, a separate bedroom with a queen-size bed, a bathroom, kitchen, and a small terrace. We wish you a nice and comfortable stay!

The space
The apartment is located at the back of the building, and does 'not' have any street views. It looks at the private small terrace through 2 windows in the kitchen. The living room and the bedroom has windows 'only' on the ceiling. The kitchen has a full-size fridge, an oven, microwave, a Nespresso coffee machine, and a kettle. In the bedroom, there is a queen-size bed, and a closet. Bathroom has a bathtub with a shower in it. There is Netflix available on tv, in case you
neighborhood_overview: There are many many nice restaurants, cafe's in the neighborhood, I will be happy to share with you my tips if you like it. The landmark Mas museum is within only a few minutes of a walk, all cultural highlights are easily reachable by foot.
host_about: I live in Antwerp since 2001 and became a real local in the meantime. I love this city and enjoy living in the close proximity to all kinds of nice cafe's, restaurants, theathers, summer bars, stores, etc! In my free time, I like cooking, reading, watching films, spending time with friends, exploring new spots in and outside Antwerp. For sure you can count on me to get good advice on where to eat or go to, from fine dining to the most child-friendly places. I live almost next door to the apartment, together with my husband and two young children. After working for 15 years in a multinational company, mainly as Customer Service Manager, I have decided in 2017 to have some time off to spend with my family and follow my passions, and possibly make an own business out of it in the future. This also gave me the extra time to be able rent this apartment to guests, so that they can enjoy the space and this wonderful city. The apartment was originally meant for our family and friends visiting us from abroad, but we thought it will be a pity not to share it with others when it is not occupied. Hope you will like and cherish it as much as we do.  And hope to meet you soon!

name: GoedenDag - GoedeNacht: Antwerpen net even anders
description:
Gastenverblijf GoedenDag - GoedeNacht ligt op de eerste verdieping in een herenhuis in een rustige woonstraat. Bij aankomst is er gratis koffie, thee en water. Slaapkamer, werkkamer/dressing en badkamer zijn royaal van opzet en sfeervol ingericht met verrassende elementen. GoedenDag - GoedeNacht is de ideale uitvalsbasis om BoHo (BorgerHout), het andere Antwerpen te verkennen. Verfrissend, nieuw en net even anders! En natuurlijk ook nog dicht bij het centrum.

The space
Gastenverblijf GoedenDag - GoedeNacht bestaat uit een royale slaap/zitkamer (24 m2) een ruime werkkamer/dressing (18 m2) en een sfeervolle badkamer (9 m2). De werkkamer is ideaal om je kleren en bagage op te slaan, en je laptop op te starten en gebruik te maken van gratis WiFi. In de slaapkamer staan twee eenpersoonsbedden voor je klaar: om heerlijk te slapen en zoet te dromen. Ruimte in overvloed en alles voor jou! Gelegen in hartje BorgerHout (BoHo), het andere Antwerpen.

In het verb
neighborhood_overview: De wijk BoHo (BorgerHout) bruist en leeft. Hier kun je het Andere Antwerpen, hip, jong en trendy, met onder andere zijn mediterrane sferen in alle opzichten beleven. BoHo heeft veel, zo niet alles: de cultuur van de Roma, Rataplan en beeldentuin/museum Middelheim, de evenementen in het Sportpaleis; de natuur rondom openluchttheater Rivierenhof, Park Spoor Noord of Spoor Oost. Eten, lunchen, ontbijten of drinken kun je er in overvloed: van typisch Vlaams tot en met de internationale keuken. En dat alles op loopafstand.

It’s a very luminous appartment on the 4th floor with a far view from both sides.
