name: History & Design in one appartement
description:
Fully restored city palace in the center of town, the spaces exude traditional values & luxury. Handmade furniture, design fixtures and an amazingly comfortable boxspring queensize bed. Included is a professional wellness steamroom. After a day seeing the sights in Antwerp you'll be able to relax and sooth tired muscles in the steamroom.

The space
Built-in esspresso machine, combimagnetron, induction plate and the spices, condiments are available for your use. I love to cook, and you'll notice that when going through my kitchen ;-)

Guest access
You'll enter the appartement through the spacious hallway, from there you'll enter a large living room with kitchen. In the back of the house is the master bedroom with anex dressing and bathroom. The shower room accomodates two and is equipped with a steam engine.
neighborhood_overview: Smack dab in the middle of things, go left and you're headed toward the MAS and 'het eilandje, go right and you're headed toward the center where you'll find the 'grote markt' and the Meir, and other shopping areas. Close by are dancings, bars, trendy coffee shops and Coyote, my hangout when there is always something going on!
host_about: I'm 100% Belgian, at least 50% American and 25% Dutch, and no worries that this adds up to 175% me ;-)  Life takes you on journeys close & far, and I've enjoyed them all! I'm an optimist, while I sometimes don't believe I'm that much of one, until friends remind me that I'm sometimes to naive to believe good things come from the decisions I make. I'm not to worried about it, and will keep on doing exactly as I'm doing for sure!

name: Granny's Ground Floor Room
description: Tranquility is guaranteed at Granny's in a quiet street with Antwerp's largest park around the corner. Just  outside the center it is easy to get around with bus, tram or city bike (Velo).
host_about:
We, Lieve (52 y.) Fronk (49 y.) and Aurora (18 y.) love talking, laughing and music.
Communication is always easy as we speak several languages
Fronk is crazy about Brazil, where he lived for 2 years
Lieve adores India and Aurora is mad about Greece.
We have a preference for natural, vegetarian food.
Lieve and Fronk  practice Yoga daily..
We and our neighbours live on pleasant terms with each other.
Tranquility is a must in our home and in the building.
Please ring our bell... N°116/14 (fifth floor)

FLANDERS TODAY a flemish online newspaper has published an article about us and about Airbnb:
“In the last year we’ve had 60 or so guests staying with us at home,” says Fronk, who, with his partner Lieve, is one of the best-rated Flemish hosts on Airbnb, a hotel-like service for the digital age. “We have had guests from Brazil, the US, Canada, Iran, Japan, Bulgaria and more. Though no one from Africa has yet requested to stay.” 
Airbnb is an online marketplace for temporary accommodation across 33,000 cities in 192 countries. Trip planners can find spare rooms, flats, sofa-beds and even igloos and private islands. Some hosts are simply renting out a spare room for a couple of weeks a month to travellers to supplement their incomes or to fill the house when they themselves are away. 
Airbnb is in the vanguard of the so-called “sharing economy”, in which web services help private individuals monetise their possessions and share anything from school runs to electric drills. Flanders has more than 900 listings on the site. 
Connections 
Fronk and Lieve say that their guests have loved Antwerp and always have a good time. Yet if a number of their guests are visiting for tourism, many are in town for less conventional reasons. One was interviewing for a job at the opera house. Another was doing a course with world-famous contemporary artist Jan Fabre, while a third was studying with a leading dancer. A medievalist stayed for several weeks to learn Dutch for her research, while a Canadian rock band crashed when gigging down the road. 
Connecting with new people with different world views is one of the attractions, as is discovering a unexpected shared interest. “The other day I was having a bowl of soup with one of our guests, who had just arrived from the United States,” recalls Fronk. “To our surprise, we soon discovered that we were both working on essays on the same subject.” Fronk, who is a literary translator of Russian and a performer, and Lieve, an organist and soprano, say that in their year of hosting they have yet to have a bad experience. Some guests stay several weeks, some come back for a second or third visit. “But we make it clear on the website that we are vegetarians, that we do yoga and that this is a family house,” Fronk explains. This attracts people who are into the same things (and probably discourages those who want to spend their time exploring Antwerp’s party scene). 
Peer reviews 
Fronk and Lieve live in Borgerhout, a neighbourhood with a large immigrant population just east of the city’s Central Station, which is visible from their balcony. Borgerhout itself does not house many attractions and enjoys a reputation for being a rough sort of place. But guests have never had any problems, says Fronk. Indeed, he wistfully recalls a middle-aged American visitor looking out of the window at the district where Fronk grew up and declaring it a beautiful place. 
Importantly for guests, the area provides easy access by foot or bike to Antwerp’s main sites, including the zoo; elephants can be heard vaguely trumpeting from the flat’s balcony.

name: The Capital Street Lodge
description:
Bright and Beautiful Triplex Apartment, very close to the Cathedral of Antwerp. This is known to be the best possible tourist location. You are surrounded by all the historic-high-lights of Antwerp and there are several iconic café's, bars and restaurants in the area. The central station is a 15min walk and there's a free parking area at the Waalse Kaai on 5-10min of the apartment. The kitchen is fully equipped and we supply fresh linen, towels and all essentials. Hopefully we'll host you soon!

The space
Our apartments are decorated to make you feel at home. We want to give you a warm, enjoyable and relaxing place to rest while exploring our beautiful city. Our apartment is equipped with all essentials for a comfortable trip. Eg. a fully equipped kitchen, fresh bedlinnen and towels for each guest, shower gel, shampoo and conditioner, coffee, tea, hair dryer etc.

Guest access
The apartment is completely private for the people that made the
neighborhood_overview: Antwerp is Belgium’s second largest city, has the biggest port and is the capital of coal. It has long been a powerful magnet for everyone from fashion moguls and club queens to art lovers and diamond dealers. In the mid-16th century it was one of Europe’s most important cities and home to baroque superstar painters like Pieter Paul Rubens. Despite many historical travails thereafter and severe WWII bombing, Antwerp retains an intriguing medieval heart with plenty of café-filled cobbled lanes, a riverside fortress and a truly impressive Cathedral. Today, however, Antwerp’s top drawcards are its vibrant fashion and entertainment scene, booming diamond businesses along with its startling architectural and cultural contrasts.
host_about: Hello, my name is Elisabeth! I've travelled around the world and lived abroad for a couple of years. Now my goal is to accomodate others in amazing apartments in the very heart of our beautiful city! :-)

host_about:
Father of three adult children, who don't live with me anymore, but with whom I have an excellent relation.
I cannot without my daily coffee and newspapers. 
I love to visit cities (London is my favourite) but I also adore nature!
Spain is my favourite country since I'm speaking the language, but also Italy.
I love to go out eating also.
I'm very eager to know new languages...
I love small things in life  :-)  Carpe diem!

name: The Hendrik Lodge in Heart of Antwerp
description:
Bright and Beautiful Triplex House, very close to the Cathedral of Antwerp. This is known to be the best possible tourist location. You are surrounded by all the historic-high-lights of Antwerp and there are several iconic café's, bars and restaurants in the area. The central station is a 15min walk and there's a free parking area at the Waalse Kaai on 5-10min of the apartment. The kitchen is fully equipped and we supply fresh linen, towels and all essentials. Hopefully we'll host you soon!

The space
Our apartments are decorated to make you feel at home. We want to give you a warm, enjoyable and relaxing place to rest while exploring our beautiful city. Our apartment is equipped with all essentials for a comfortable trip. Eg. a fully equipped kitchen, fresh bedlinnen and towels for each guest, shower gel, shampoo and conditioner, coffee, tea, hair dryer etc.

Guest access
The apartment is completely private for the people that made the rese
neighborhood_overview: Antwerp is Belgium’s second largest city, has the biggest port and is the capital of coal. It has long been a powerful magnet for everyone from fashion moguls and club queens to art lovers and diamond dealers. In the mid-16th century it was one of Europe’s most important cities and home to baroque superstar painters like Pieter Paul Rubens. Despite many historical travails thereafter and severe WWII bombing, Antwerp retains an intriguing medieval heart with plenty of café-filled cobbled lanes, a riverside fortress and a truly impressive Cathedral. Today, however, Antwerp’s top drawcards are its vibrant fashion and entertainment scene, booming diamond businesses along with its startling architectural and cultural contrasts.

name: Short/long term  one-room expat flat with terrace
description:
Charming end of the 19th century ground floor one-bedroom apartment with private entrance, fully equiped kitchen and living room and a cosy terrace.
This 'maison de maître' with high ceilings gives you the peace and quiet you need. The entire ground floor is private and has a private entrance.
As this is an old house, you can expect a good inside temperature during our hot summers.
Furthermore we will provide you with all the comfort you need to enjoy your stay.

The space
Furnished one-bedroom apartment with kingsize bed (180 x 200); fully equipped kitchen and a light and spacious bathroom wih shower. Included in the price: water, electricity, heating, high speed internet connection, sheets, towels and cleaning once every two weeks (max 2 hours).
The apartment is fully checked and complies with all local rules and regulations.
Furthermore there is a waching machine, oven and microwave, iron and a fridge. The television operates with Cr
neighborhood_overview:
We are at 1km from the central station and next to the beautiful city park and at a few 100 meters from the Diamond district.
There is a lot of public transport in the area since we are situated at the heart of Antwerp.
There are city bikes to rent at 200m from the house.
host_about:
In our free time, we like to enjoy culture, festivals, dj-sets, vintage markets and dining out with our family and crazy friends. Our two adorable pugs, Spike and Lolita keep us fit. We enjoy the little things in life, things money can’t buy! We like to express this simplicity in our 19th century ground floor apartment.  
A warm welcome to ‘Cleyn Antwerpen’! 

Hallo!, Tof dat je ons appartement leuk vindt :)
We hopen jullie dan ook snel te verwelkomen! Zelf zijn we zot van A! Oorspronkelijk zijn we van een andere Vlaamse stad, namelijk Leuven, maar we verloren ettelijke jaren geleden ons hart aan deze mooie Scheldestad. We houden van de veelzijdigheid van de stad, het water, linker-en rechteroever...
Antwerpen heeft de kenmerken van een stad maar voor ons toch de gezelligheid van een groot dorp. De cultuurmogelijkheden, café's, wereldkeuken, clubscene, winkels en koffiebars typeren de veelzijdigheid van de stad. Er is maw voor ieder wat wils. Zelf zijn we fervente muziekliefhebbers en proberen we op geregelde basis wat dj's te gaan ontdekken en wat festivals mee te pikken. We wandelen graag en daar hebben we gezelschap voor! Onze twee mopshonden Spike & Lola houden ons fit :) 
En natuurlijk pikken we graag op geregelde basis een restaurantje mee! Genieten van de kleine dingen ... dat is iets wat we de laatste jaren meer en meer doen en wat ons ook oprecht gelukkig maakt. We hopen in Cleyn Antwerpen eenvoud, gezelligheid en feel good te combineren om jullie zo volop te laten genieten van onze mooie Scheldestad.

name: COSY DOUBLE ROOM @ LOVELY HOMELIKE RumpusRoom B&B
description:
RumpusRoom is a tiny guesthouse with a cozy, relaxing atmosphere where you can feel at home. It's a charming, comfy place to enjoy peaceful and restful nights. As a traveler and creative person I like to guide you through Belgian cultural identity in its widest form as I believe curiosity, sharing and connecting are key values to life. Therefore the guesthouse is kept small; 3 rooms, a living room and a kitchen free to use...Who knows you might bump into another sweet guest?

The space
A nice private double room with all you need provided; a good comfy double bed (French size), your own little desk and a relax chair. For your clothing and other belongings sliders, shelves and a clothing rack is present. Since the guesthouse has 2 bathrooms to share, the room itself, as an extra, has its own washbasin and -yes- 2 bathrobes! The walls are nicely decorated with some fine (Belgian) art. You'll always be welcomed with some tasteful tea, coffee and water.
The rooms
neighborhood_overview: Located on the eastside of Central Station you can find the area of BORGERHOUT, a place where I now live for more than 10 years and which I really really love. Sharing the positive vibe of the district, its locals and all their wonderful initiatives is why I started my guesthouse right here, in the heart of 'BOHO' as we call it. The neighborhood is a mix of many different cultures, marked by a large Arabic population, so if you like North African/ Middle-East snackbars and shops, TURNHOUTSE BAAN is your place. Once you turn into one of the many smaller streets you will feel a creative and young atmosphere. As the neighborhood is up-and-coming you will discover lots of cozy squares with bars and restaurants, start-up and pop-up shops, DIY galleries and local entrepreneurs... A mix of local seniors, hipsters, young families, kids and some lucky tourist discovering this surprisingly other, personal and small-scaled side of Antwerp. Hope you feel as much at home as I do...Don't worry, I he
host_about:
Hello,

My name is Ina. I am very curious about people and culture and I like to connect to people of all different kinds and places. So yes of course I like to travel but even more it's all about sharing and meeting new ones en new things. I' m always in search of the hidden secrets in other cities but also in my own neighborhood ! I'm an adventurous explorer with a special interest in architecture, photography, film, graphic design, let's say art in general ...I love to enjoy the beauty and force of nature! Can't wait to meet you while traveling or host you in my own RumpusRoom GuestHouse and especially: share my favorite places with you!

Welcome to Maison Philippe, your own luxury fully equipped apartment with 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. Situated on the Meir in the middle of Antwerp Center. The perfect location for 4 guests to have an amazing stay in the center of Antwerp.

The space
Maison Philippe is a two bedroom and two bathroom apartment. Each bedroom as an ensuite bathroom. Fully equipped kitchen a dining table for four people and two comfortable sofa's. Maison Philippe is an "Smart" apartment with Sonos sound system. A tablet to control lights and Sonos is provided.

Guest access
Guests of Maison Philippe will have private access to the complete apartment. This is an entire apartment there are no shared areas with me or other guests.
neighborhood_overview: Smack in the middle of Antwerp center located at the Meir. The biggest shopping street in Antwerp. The apartment is two doors down from "het stads paleis" the former residence of Napoleon Bonaparte and the home of famous painter Peter Paul Rubens House is just around the colder in 5 minutes walking distance. The Stadsschouwburg of Antwerp and the Antwerp Opera house is within 10 minutes walking distance. Amazing Michellin star restaurants and affordable restaurants are all in walking distance. If you would like to explore the city by bike there are shared "Velo" bikes parked in front of the building.

name: CHARMING PRIVATE ROOM @ HOMEY COMFY RumpusRoom B&B
description:
RumpusRoom is a tiny guesthouse with a cozy, relaxing atmosphere where you can feel at home. It's a charming, comfy place to enjoy peaceful and restful nights. As a traveler and creative person I like to guide you through Belgian cultural identity in its widest form as I believe curiosity, sharing and connecting are key values to life. Therefore the guesthouse is kept small; 3 rooms, a living room and a kitchen free to use...Who knows you might bump into another sweet guest?

The space
A nice private double room with all you need provided; a good comfy double bed (queen size or twin), your own cosy table corner and shelves and clothing rack to organize your belongings and clothes. Since the guesthouse has 2 bathrooms to share, the room itself, as an extra, has its own washbasin and -yes- 2 bathrobes! The walls are nicely decorated with some fine (Belgian) art. You'll always be welcomed with some tasteful tea, coffee and water.

The rooms are on the firs
neighborhood_overview: Located on the eastside of Central Station you can find the area of BORGERHOUT, a place where I now live for more than 10 years and which I really really love. Sharing the positive vibe of the district, its locals and all their wonderful initiatives is why I started my guesthouse right here, in the heart of 'BOHO' as we call it. The neighborhood is a mix of many different cultures, marked by a large Arabic population, so if you like North African/ Middle-East snackbars and shops, TURNHOUTSE BAAN is your place. Once you turn into one of the many smaller streets you will feel a creative and young atmosphere. As the neighborhood is up-and-coming you will discover lots of cozy squares with bars and restaurants, start-up and pop-up shops, DIY galleries and local entrepreneurs... A mix of local seniors, hipsters, young families, kids and some lucky tourist discovering this surprisingly other, personal and small-scaled side of Antwerp. Hope you feel as much at home as I do...Don't worry, I he
host_about:
Hello,

My name is Ina. I am very curious about people and culture and I like to connect to people of all different kinds and places. So yes of course I like to travel but even more it's all about sharing and meeting new ones en new things. I' m always in search of the hidden secrets in other cities but also in my own neighborhood ! I'm an adventurous explorer with a special interest in architecture, photography, film, graphic design, let's say art in general ...I love to enjoy the beauty and force of nature! Can't wait to meet you while traveling or host you in my own RumpusRoom GuestHouse and especially: share my favorite places with you!

name: Cozy & perfectly situated apartment in Zurenborg
description:
Cozy apartment in the trendy Zurenborg neighborhood.
Ideally situated: close to public transport, close to Antwerp's city center.
Great bars and restaurants are nearby.

The space
Living room with L-shaped couch which can be transformed into a 2 person bed, TV and various cupboards.

One bedroom with a two person bed. Sheets and pillows are provided. Mirror closet for storage.

The kitchen includes everything you need for 8 persons. Dinner table, microwave, cooking plate, refrigerator, sink (2), coffee maker. Dish towels are provided.

The bathroom has a shower, sink, toilet and plenty of drawers for storage. Towels and a hairdryer are also provided.
neighborhood_overview:
Zurenborg might just be the prettiest little neighborhood of Antwerp. Its elegant streets and squares are filled with art-nouveau architecture.
It's a trendy neighborhood with a lot of young families. The belle-époque street Cogels-Osylei, the most expensive bit of real estate of Antwerp, is a must if you're into architecture.
The Dageraadplaats is a cozy square with lovely bars (such as the legendary Zeezicht) and restaurants. The surrounding streets and squares (such as Draakplaats) are also filled with great little places to visit.

name: St-Jacobs Luxury Lodge
description:
A bright, large and newly renovated apartment right in the city center, surrounded by fashion stores and hip coffee-shops. The kitchen is fully equipped and we supply fresh linen, towels & all essentials.

Located very close to the famous shopping street Meir and the main-squares "Groenplaats" and "Grote Markt". The best possible location for a visit to Antwerp!

The Central station is less than a 5min walk and there's a free parking area at the Waalse Kaai on a 20min walk.

See you soon! :-)

The space
Our apartments are decorated to make you feel at home. We want to give you a warm, enjoyable and relaxing place to rest while exploring our beautiful city. Our apartment is equipped with all essentials for a comfortable trip. Eg. a fully equipped kitchen, fresh bedlinnen and towels for each guest, shower gel, shampoo and conditioner, coffee, tea, hair dryer etc.

Guest access
The apartment is completely private
neighborhood_overview: Antwerp is Belgium’s second largest city, has the biggest port and is the capital of coal. It has long been a powerful magnet for everyone from fashion moguls and club queens to art lovers and diamond dealers. In the mid-16th century it was one of Europe’s most important cities and home to baroque superstar painters like Pieter Paul Rubens. Despite many historical travails thereafter and severe WWII bombing, Antwerp retains an intriguing medieval heart with plenty of café-filled cobbled lanes, a riverside fortress and a truly impressive Cathedral. Today, however, Antwerp’s top drawcards are its vibrant fashion and entertainment scene, booming diamond businesses along with its startling architectural and cultural contrasts.
host_about: Hello, my name is Elisabeth! I've travelled around the world and lived abroad for a couple of years. Now my goal is to accomodate others in amazing apartments in the very heart of our beautiful city! :-)

The space

Also, the biggest and most famous theatre of Antwerp is almost next door!

name: Riverside Loft 150m²
description:
Riverside loft of 150m² at 15th floor. Amazing view at both sides. 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms at 2,5km distance from historical city center. Free parking included. Building designed by L.Stynen and P.Demeyer as a tribute to Le Corbusier. Loft design by Studio Okami (feat. Dezeen). In addition to a beach along the river Scheldt, the area also boasts a heated 50m outdoor swimming pool ‘De Molen’, the Saint Anna Woods (100 ha running heaven) and Nature Reserve "Blokkersdijk" (100 ha birds heaven)

The space
You can enjoy the panoramic views of the river Scheldt, Antwerp’s skyline and the port.
Interior design by trending architect.

Guest access
Entire loft for yourself!
neighborhood_overview:
Cross the river
As Europe’s second biggest port, the river Scheldt is Antwerp’s lifeblood.
The Left Bank is an exceptional part of Antwerp. A major asset of Linkeroever is the open and green character. Summer pop-ups and epic city views.

De Molen is a big open air swimming pool on the left side of the river (Left Bank). It might not be the first place to come to mind when you want to go for a swim but it has a lot of charm and there is a lot to do: take a stroll on St. Anneke Beach, have a picnic and enjoy the most beautiful views you'll find in Antwerp.

Antwerp is full of surprises. Take its city beach, Saint Anneke, on the left bank, for example, where you can come for a walk, a nice meal or just to chillax.

Saint Anna Beach on the left bank refers to the former village of Saint Anna, when the beach was a popular attraction with many of the locals. They would typically come here by ferry to enjoy the famous mussels of Saint Anneke.
host_about: Antwerp is who I am. Almost all cliches about the city and its people are true about me as well... Passionate about design and sports!

name: Private apartment in green neighborhood in Antwerp
description:
• Open living room with (sleeping) couch, dining table and a modern fully equiped kitchen
• Bedroom with 1 double size bed
• Bathroom with walk in rainshower
• Separate toilet
• Terrace

The space
I live here myself when I’m not hosting guests so my place really has anything you need to feel at home: fresh bed linen, towels, hair dryer, toiletries, coffee and tea, fridge, freezer, cutlery, microwave oven, dishwasher, digital television, radio, books, games and ofcourse Wifi. I also have a washing machine, tumble dryer and iron if you need to do some laundry.
neighborhood_overview:
My apartment is located on the second floor of a small building in a nice green residential area, right between the Boekenbergpark (which has an ecological outdoor pool where you can swim for free in summer) and the Boelaerpark.

There’s a bakery and a pharmacist across the street, a supermarket and night shop around the corner and some nice places to eat and drink nearby.

I will send you a guidebook I drafted with all my favourite places in the neighborhoud.

name: Vintage City house Antwerp
description:
An entire vintage decorated house in the most beautiful aria of the city of Antwerp, close to everything, 2 minutes walking to restaurants and bars, 5 minutes to shop, train station 10min, public transport 5 min. In city centre in 15min with a lot of buses/ trams. There is very good wifi and a 47inch smart tv. You can rent the whole house for just the two of you or with a group of maximum 8 people.

The space
Our house has 4 separate bedrooms and is located in a very quiet street for a good night rest but close to everything.

Guest access
Everything is private for our guests to use only.
neighborhood_overview:
Dageraadplaats

De Dageraadplaats in de wijk Zurenborg is één van de gezelligste pleinen van Antwerpen. Aan het begin van de twintigste eeuw kwam de wijk tot stand als 'Beau Quartier' voor de middenklasse en de burgerij van de stad.

Onder meer de neogotische Norbertuskerk uit 1904 dateert uit deze tijd. In 2007 werd het plein in een nieuw trendy jasje gestoken en autovrij gemaakt. De oude bomen maakten plaats voor zilverlinden en het plein oogt met de nieuwe kasseien als een pleintje in de Provence.

De speeltoestellen zijn splinternieuw en wie even wil uitrusten, kan dat op trendy zitbankjes en -blokken met ingebouwde verlichting. Ook drinkfonteintjes zijn aanwezig op dit pittoreske plein. Al is water misschien niet de eerste keuze, vermits de hele Dageraadplaats omzoomd is met cafés en restaurants.

De innerlijke mens wordt uitvoerig verwend met een uitgebreide keuze van fastfood tot haute cuisine. Het bekendste en grootste café is wellicht
host_about: I love to travel and discovering new places and thats why I know what guests need and I love to make people feel at home in a city like Antwerp.

name: Anvers: apart comfort 2 chambres, avec parking
description:
Appartement en style scandinave de 2 chambres pour max 4 personnes (95 m²).
Proche du centre-ville d'Anvers par transport commun / vélo / voiture, à 3 km de l'aéroport d'Anvers et à 5 min de l'autoroute (E19).
Parking en face.

The space
L'appartement a tout le confort et les fonctionnalités nécessaires. Les deux chambres ont un lit double (+ nombreux oreillers), des armoires et de la protection solaire (rideaux et écran solaire).

Dans le salon, vous trouverez un canapé avec chaise longue, une table basse, un meuble de TV avec espace de rangement, un télé, une table à manger et un dressoir. Vous pouvez profiter d'un verre ou quelque chose à manger sur la terrasse adjacente avec vue sur le parc.

La cuisine moderne est entièrement équipée avec réfrigérateur américain, micro-onde, four, cafetière, bouilloire, vaisselle, casseroles / poêles, couverts, lave-vaisselle...

La salle de bain a une douche avec différents réglages, u
neighborhood_overview:
Le quartier est calme, cependant proche de tout.

A seulement quelques minutes du centre d'Anvers par tram. Accès facile par transport en commun, tram/train/bus. En vélo, il faut environ 20 minutes pour rejoindre le cœur de la ville. L'autoroute à proximité (5 min de l'E19) vous permet d'accéder facilement le reste du pays.

Le Rivierenhof, le plus grande parc d'Anvers, en face est merveilleux pour marcher ou courir (au moins 20 km de pistes de course).

Dans un rayon de max. 500 m, vous trouverez tous les grands supermarchés (Delhaize, Aldi, Colruyt, Lidl). Restaurants et snack-bars également accessibles à pied.
host_about:
Hello there!

I'm an outgoing & social globetrotter fond of culture in a very broad way (music, film, art, architecture...). My biggest passions are travelling and food: start a conversation about one or both and I can go on for hours ;)
I'm a professional travel and event agent, and in my spare time I'm an amateur chef. Couldn't guess, right!?

I've been Airbnb'ing for several years already, as a traveller but also as a host. Positive experiences are very important to me so I always try to make people feel at ease in my apartment. Since I shortly moved in with my boyfriend, I'm now renting the entire condo instead of only a room.

Motto: live your dreams, explore the world!

Looking forward to meeting you.

The space
Het appartement is een perfecte uitvalsbasis wanneer je voor een weekend, of een langere tijd, in Antwerpen wil verblijven. Het heeft 2 slaapkamers, waarvan er dus 1 wordt verhuurd, met een eigen terrasje, een gedeelde badkamer met inloopdouche, een toilet en een ruime living met open keuken. Ook wifi en TV zijn aanwezig.
neighborhood_overview: Het appartement bevindt zich in het bruisende Borgerhout. Op enkele meters bevindt zich het central Moorkensplein van Borgerhout met bars en restaurants. Ook is het op wandelafstand van het Centraal Station, de Keizerlei - veel restaurants - en de Meir - perfect op te shoppen. Ook andere pleinen zoals de Marnixplaats, de Grote Markt en het Mechels Plein zijn makkelijk bereikbaar met het openbaar vervoer of de fiets.

name: Blue Room in Family Home
description: The Blue Room in our spacious apartement  has a double   bed which we can  easily transform  into two single beds or just one. The room has a small  dining table, a desk and two wardrobes.
host_about:
We, Lieve (52 y.) Fronk (49 y.) and Aurora (18 y.) love talking, laughing and music.
Communication is always easy as we speak several languages
Fronk is crazy about Brazil, where he lived for 2 years
Lieve adores India and Aurora is mad about Greece.
We have a preference for natural, vegetarian food.
Lieve and Fronk  practice Yoga daily..
We and our neighbours live on pleasant terms with each other.
Tranquility is a must in our home and in the building.
Please ring our bell... N°116/14 (fifth floor)

FLANDERS TODAY a flemish online newspaper has published an article about us and about Airbnb:
“In the last year we’ve had 60 or so guests staying with us at home,” says Fronk, who, with his partner Lieve, is one of the best-rated Flemish hosts on Airbnb, a hotel-like service for the digital age. “We have had guests from Brazil, the US, Canada, Iran, Japan, Bulgaria and more. Though no one from Africa has yet requested to stay.” 
Airbnb is an online marketplace for temporary accommodation across 33,000 cities in 192 countries. Trip planners can find spare rooms, flats, sofa-beds and even igloos and private islands. Some hosts are simply renting out a spare room for a couple of weeks a month to travellers to supplement their incomes or to fill the house when they themselves are away. 
Airbnb is in the vanguard of the so-called “sharing economy”, in which web services help private individuals monetise their possessions and share anything from school runs to electric drills. Flanders has more than 900 listings on the site. 
Connections 
Fronk and Lieve say that their guests have loved Antwerp and always have a good time. Yet if a number of their guests are visiting for tourism, many are in town for less conventional reasons. One was interviewing for a job at the opera house. Another was doing a course with world-famous contemporary artist Jan Fabre, while a third was studying with a leading dancer. A medievalist stayed for several weeks to learn Dutch for her research, while a Canadian rock band crashed when gigging down the road. 
Connecting with new people with different world views is one of the attractions, as is discovering a unexpected shared interest. “The other day I was having a bowl of soup with one of our guests, who had just arrived from the United States,” recalls Fronk. “To our surprise, we soon discovered that we were both working on essays on the same subject.” Fronk, who is a literary translator of Russian and a performer, and Lieve, an organist and soprano, say that in their year of hosting they have yet to have a bad experience. Some guests stay several weeks, some come back for a second or third visit. “But we make it clear on the website that we are vegetarians, that we do yoga and that this is a family house,” Fronk explains. This attracts people who are into the same things (and probably discourages those who want to spend their time exploring Antwerp’s party scene). 
Peer reviews 
Fronk and Lieve live in Borgerhout, a neighbourhood with a large immigrant population just east of the city’s Central Station, which is visible from their balcony. Borgerhout itself does not house many attractions and enjoys a reputation for being a rough sort of place. But guests have never had any problems, says Fronk. Indeed, he wistfully recalls a middle-aged American visitor looking out of the window at the district where Fronk grew up and declaring it a beautiful place. 
Importantly for guests, the area provides easy access by foot or bike to Antwerp’s main sites, including the zoo; elephants can be heard vaguely trumpeting from the flat’s balcony.

name: BED in FUNKY COMFY 6-bed FEMALE DORM – bed 1
description:
RumpusRoom is a tiny guesthouse with a cozy, relaxing atmosphere where you can feel at home. It's a charming, comfy place to enjoy peaceful and restful nights. As a traveler and creative person I like to guide you through Belgian cultural identity in its widest form as I believe curiosity, sharing and connecting are key values to life. Therefore the guesthouse is kept small; 3 rooms, a living room and a dining room free to use...Who knows you might bump into another sweet guest?

The space
This 6-bedded comfort female dormitory has all you need. It is spacious, light, sunny and colorful and you will share it with maximum 6 women. Every bed has a very comfy mattress and is provided with sheets and a relaxing pillow, no need to bring your sleeping bag! Also there is an individual (electricity supplied) locker and a night light next to each bed. Oh and did I mention the wifi? In the hallway you have access to two shared bathrooms/toilets. A delicious breakfast buffet
neighborhood_overview: Located on the eastside of Central Station you can find the area of BORGERHOUT, a place where I now live for more than 10 years and which I really really love. Sharing the positive vibe of the district, its locals and all their wonderful initiatives is why I started my guesthouse right here, in the heart of 'BOHO' as we call it. The neighborhood is a mix of many different cultures, marked by a large Arabic population, so if you like North African/ Middle-East snackbars and shops, TURNHOUTSE BAAN is your place. Once you turn into one of the many smaller streets you will feel a creative and young atmosphere. As the neighborhood is up-and-coming you will discover lots of cozy squares with bars and restaurants, start-up and pop-up shops, DIY galleries and local entrepreneurs... A mix of local seniors, hipsters, young families, kids and some lucky tourist discovering this surprisingly other, personal and small-scaled side of Antwerp. Hope you feel as much at home as I do...Don't worry, I he
host_about:
Hello,

My name is Ina. I am very curious about people and culture and I like to connect to people of all different kinds and places. So yes of course I like to travel but even more it's all about sharing and meeting new ones en new things. I' m always in search of the hidden secrets in other cities but also in my own neighborhood ! I'm an adventurous explorer with a special interest in architecture, photography, film, graphic design, let's say art in general ...I love to enjoy the beauty and force of nature! Can't wait to meet you while traveling or host you in my own RumpusRoom GuestHouse and especially: share my favorite places with you!

name: Bright and trendy apartment with sunny terrace
description:
My recently renovated appartment is centrally located & offers all the comodities you need to make your stay pleasant. It’s the ideal starting point to start exploring Antwerp!
The central rail station and shopping district are only 5 minutes away by foot.

The building is a traditional old house which has been renovated & reconfigured into 3 appartments. My appartment is on the 2nd floor without an elevator.

The space
Bright living room with traditional brick wall & tv with Netflix subscritpfion

kitchen is integrated in the living room & fully equiped with oven, toaster, microwave, coffee machine, etc. complimentary Nespresso coffee available. Everything you need to cook & enjoy your favourite meal!

Quiet bedroom with queensize bed

Bathroom with shower & toilet

Sunny terrace with bbq & lounge area

Other things to note
No animals allowed & please respect my neighbours
neighborhood_overview:
Appartment is located in the middle of Antwerp in a multicultural neighbourhood, china town is just 2 blocks away.
Distance by foot to districts & touristic venues:
- central station: 5’
- shopping district: 5’
- old town with cathedral: 15’
- ‘eilandje’ with MAS: 20’
- het zuid: 25’
host_about: Adventurous, I love to travel around the world and discover new cultures. I’m working as a supply chain consultant, based in Belgium

name: Private Grand Residence | Atelier Wits
description:
This totally renovated house is the very first Airbnb combined antique shop in Antwerp. Enter a wonderful house with open living area accented by art and antiques. Everything in this house is for sale. Atelier Wits is situated in the south 20 min from dowtown Antwerp. This private house is suitable for big groups up to 10 people. Below you will find some details on this beautiful getaway.

The space
- Private house, self enter with codelock
- 4 bedrooms (4 single beds, 3 double beds)
- 2 livingrooms with table and chairs
- 2 fully equiped kitchens with table and chairs
- 2 bathrooms
- 3 toilets
- Wi-Fi throughout the house
- Free parking at ''Parking Beerschot'', 2 minute walk (150m) from the apartment.

name: Private room with Tv Room (3th) + free parking
description:
Private room with bed 140 cm. Very Clean. 3th floor only stairs.
Next to the room is a tv room you can use -
Shower, toilet etc might be shared.
No kitchen. No breakfast, just basic room on our top floor. No one lives on this floor.

Other things to note
stairs ! 3 floors
toilet and shower on different levels of the building. possibly shared
host_about:
Welcome to our family house! 

We like to welcome guests in our garden view room or in a room om the third floor. 

The garden room on the ground floor had kitchen and a double sized bed of 160cm. You can use the veranda and the garden, shared with us. 

The rooms on third floor you can only reach using the stairs (no easy acces for disabled people), shared toilet and shower. You can use a shared tv-room. No kitchen. 

We live in this house, using 1st and 2nd floor. 

Corona update: 
all rooms are desinfected before your arrival. 
social distancing rules apply. (no handshakes, 1,5m etc).

name: Riant achterhuis met zuiderse tuin en dakterras
description: Uniek achterhuis, een oase van rust in hartje Antwerpen. Prachtige binnentuin met mediterraanse sfeer, dakterras, originele Cubex-keuken met alle toestellen, twee grote leefruimtes, bureau, 4 (mogelijks 5) slaapkamers.
neighborhood_overview: De Satelliet ligt in ‘Den Dreihoek’, één van de oudste wijken van Borgerhout, net achter de Zoo en vlakbij Antwerpen-Centraal. Het is erg centraal gelegen: Zurenborg, de chique Meir, het historisch centrum en het Stadspark liggen op een boogscheut
host_about: Classical musician, lute player, specialised in early music (renaissance, baroque) and contemporary music (creation)

name: Stunning loft in the heart of Meir shopping area

A mere 5-minute walk from Antwerpen Centraal train station.

name: Mies Van de Rohe kamer net aan het park
description:
De kamer beschikt over een king size bed (180x210), een dubbele douche met toilet, tv en een zithoek. Verder kan je gebruik maken van gratis WIF, koffie of thee op de kamer.

The space
Mies Van der Rohe (Maart 27, 1886 – Augustus 17, 1969 was een Duits-Amerikaanse architect en meubelontwerper. Hij vestigt zijn naam als een van de bekenste modernistische architecten en ontwierp samen met Lilly Reich de bekende Barcelona Chair, de klassieker dewelke nog steeds door Knoll wordt geproduceerd. Deze stoel kan bewonderen en uittesten in deze kamer.
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast
amenities: ["Shampoo", "Heating", "Smoke alarm", "Essentials", "Wifi", "Hair dryer", "Lock on bedroom door", "TV"]

name: Arne Jacobsen familiekamer net bij het park
description:
De Arne Jacobsen kamer bestaat uit 2 slaapkamers met 1 kingsize bed (180x210) in de ene kamer en een slaapbank met latoflex in de andere kamer. Je kan in deze kamer met 4 slapen.
De kamer beschikt ook over een prive-badkamer met douche en toilet, koffie, thee en water op de kamer.
Gratis WIFI is ter uwer beschiking. Bijkomend kan je terplaatse ontbijt reserveren.

The space
Arne Jacobsen (februari 11,1902 – maart 24 1971) was een Deense architect en ontwerper. Hij werd geïnspireerd door onder andere Mies Van der Rohe. Naast gebouwen ontwierp hij ook kranen en meubels. De vorm werd door hem steeds door de functie bepaald, waardoor zijn stijl als functionalistisch kan worden omschreven. De bekende eggchair kan je terugvinden in deze kamer. Deze stoel werd wereldberoemd door zijn elegante eenvoudige stijl.

Other things to note
Er zijn verschillende restaurants aanwezig in de buurt, waar je voor ieders wat wil lekker kan eten of gew
neighborhood_overview: De kamer is gelegen in een prachtig herenhuis in een straat met gelijkaardige art deco huizen vlak aan het park den Brandt en het Middelheimmuseum.  Verder is ze perfect bereikbaar met het openbaar vervoer?

name: Charmant appartement in achterhuis bij Zurenborg
description:
Welkom in mijn gezellig appartement in één van de meest relaxte en bruisende buurten van Antwerpen. Het appartment met terras bevindt zich in een achterhuis, een rustige en unieke setting. Zowel het Centraal Station als het station van Berchem zijn op wandelafstand, en ook het centrum van Antwerpen is vlot bereikbaar met openbaar vervoer, met de fiets of te voet (15 min).

The space
Het appartement heeft 1 grote slaapkamer met ruim dubbel bed, een mooie badkamer en een volledig uitgeruste keuken. Het gezellige terras zorgt voor een instant vakantiegevoel!
neighborhood_overview:
De straat geeft uit op 'de Zurenborg', met zijn art nouveau architectuur één van de mooiste buurten van Antwerpen. Aan de andere kant van de straat bevindt zich het Groen Kwartier, met onder meer het sterrenrestaurant The Jane en de bruisende openlucht social spot PAKT.

In de buurt bevinden zich tal van restaurants en bars, de Dageraadplaats (één van de populairste pleinen onder de locals) is op wandelafstand.
host_about: Ik ben geboren en opgegroeid in Antwerpen, en kocht vorig jaar dit appartement vlakbij mijn favoriete wijk Zurenborg. Ik werk met vluchtelingen in Antwerpen, en houd van fietsen, windsurfen en cultuur. Ik ken een heleboel leuke restaurants en bars in de buurt, en kan jullie vertellen waar de leuke evenementen te vinden zijn. Mijn vriend Harmen woont vlakbij en ik breng veel tijd bij hem door, daarom verhuur ik af en toe mijn appartement. Hopelijk tot snel!

name: Modern Studio Near Central Station - 10 Min Walk
description:
Being located right in the center of one of the most vibrant and upcoming districts of Antwerp, the studio is ideally located for strolling around in the city, restaurants, shopping, nightlife, and discovering the real Antwerp local life.

About 20 minutes on foot from the historic center, walking along some of the city's top tourist attractions (Central Station, Diamond District, Meir, ...). In the other direction, some of the city's most beautiful parks are within the same walking distance.

The space
Spacious fully equipped studio apartment (65m2), with living room, kitchenette, mezzanine bedroom, separate bathroom and toilet. Terrace table and chairs available to sit/eat/relax/... in the sun in front of the house.

Wi-Fi is available in the entire studio.

The studio is on the ground floor.
A roller shutter is provided on the street-side window, making it easy to make the studio dark and quit at night/mornings.
neighborhood_overview:
The studio apartment is located on the recently reconstructed Moorkensplein, the central square of the Borgerhout district in the Antwerp city center, within 10 min walking from the Antwerp Central train station.

Emerging neighbourhood with many nice coffee bars and restaurants.
host_about: Hi there! I'm Sam, always keen to start some new adventures and meeting new people. I like travelling and particularly enjoy staying with locals and dicovering spots off the beaten path. Do not hesitate to contact me in case of questions. Cheers!

name: Luxe Penthouse, rooftop terrace, spectacular view!
description:
Luxurious penthouse apartment in the heart of Antwerp. Amazing view on the Central Station & the Zoo. Close to public transport & city-bikes. Within walking distance from theatres, restaurants, shopping area's & markets. Discover Antwerp at its best. Whether you are looking for a corporate or vacation stay, this 2-bedroom penthouse is the perfect choice! Fully renovated with equipped kitchen, comfy bedrooms and a relaxing living area incl ROOFTOP TERRACE. Free NETFLIX, WIFI & air conditioning!

The space

It has a hall, a spacious living room with dining area, ROOFTOP TERRACE, a fully equipped new modern kitchen, 2 bedrooms, a bathroom with rain shower and a separate toilet. name: Beautiful room Camille in authentic master house
description:
Graag verwelkomen we u in onze eigen woning, een meesterwoning uit 1858, gelegen tussen het oude stadscentrum en de trendy buurt Eilandje. Hier bieden we met ons gastenverblijf "Upstairs" 2 kamers met eigen badkamer aan.

In onze zuidgerichte kamer Camille zorgen de marmeren schouw en antieke dubbele deuren nog voor het authentieke karakter. Daarnaast vindt u er ook alle comfort voor een aangenaam verblijf in hartje Antwerpen.

The space
In deze kamer zorgt het boxspring bed (1,80m x 2m) voor uw nachtrust, na een dagje Antwerpen. U beschikt er ook over een privé badkamer met toilet, lavabo en inloopdouche. Badlinnen en een haardroger zijn hierbij voorzien.

In de gezellige zithoek kunt u in de Louis XV stoelen rustig een boekje lezen of genieten een lekker kopje koffie/thee.

Guest access
Via de oude koetspoort komt u binnen in onze indrukwekkende inkomhal. Daarna begeeft u zich links met de marmeren trap naar het trappen
neighborhood_overview:
Onze woning is de ideale uitvalsbasis als u Antwerpen wil beleven in alle facetten die de stad rijk is:

WATER: Op 300m van onze deur kunt u gaan uitwaaien of joggen op de kaaien langs de rivier Schelde. De jachthaven en boottochten zijn eveneens op wandelafstand

CULTUUR: Bij ons slaapt u bijna "onder de toren" van de Sint-Pauluskerk. Neem zeker hier een kijkje waar u nog schilderijen van Rubens, Jordaens,... kan bewonderen. Verder kan u op nog geen 600m de rijke geschiedenis van Antwerpen opsnuiven in het MAS en de oude stadskern.

ETEN & DRINKEN: In de directe omgeving vindt u talrijke terrasjes om te genieten van een Antwerps biertje of lekker eten. Om de hoek vindt u tal van restaurants, bistro en het sterrenrestaurant Nathan. Graag adviseren we u bij uw keuze.

Wij bieden zelf geen ontbijt aan, maar graag bevelen we u enkele ontbijtrestaurants aan op nog geen 5 minuten wandelen.

SHOPPING: Antwerpen is de stad bij uitstek om
host_about:
Als kind was het altijd mijn droom een eigen hotel uit te baten. Ik verzamelde jarenlang hotelfolders en speelde ook vaak reisbureautje. 

De microbe voor reizen en toerisme was aangewakkerd. 

In de middelbare school en op de Hogeschool ging ik in Brugge toerisme studeren. Uiteindelijk werk ik al enkele jaren in een bank en verhuisde ik voor de liefde naar Antwerpen. Toch is de passie voor reizen en toerisme altijd gebleven.  

Met de aankoop begin 2020  van onze karaktervolle meesterwoning in Antwerpen, zag ik de kans om de draad van toerisme terug op te nemen. Enkele maanden later bieden we met “Upstairs” onze gerenoveerde gastenkamers Camille en Liselle aan om u te ontvangen. 

De authentieke elementen hebben we zoveel mogelijk proberen te bewaren, gecombineerd met een eigentijdse toets. Tegelijk bieden we u graag alle modern comfort van nieuwe privé badkamers met een inloopdouche, lavabo en toilet; Nespresso-apparaat; föhn,...

Voor de gordijnen, stoffering, bed- & badlinnen kozen we voor lokale bedrijven en Belgische kwaliteit. Het is heerlijk om na een dagje Antwerpen in slaap te vallen onder die witte percal katoenen lakens...

name: Antwerp: spacious light home with park view
description:
Our home is a spacious and light place and we enjoy living here very much. The living area is a nice space with adjoining terrace. We also have a beautiful spacious natural garden. It is located close to the city center opposite the most beautiful park of Antwerp, which gives you an unique green view. The area is one of the most trendy neighbourhoods in Antwerp. Shops, restaurants and bars are all within walking distance.

The space
Our home has a spacious and light living area with adjoining terrace and garden. There is a fully equiped kitchen, including an oven, microwave, dishwasher, fridge and nespresso coffee machine. There are two large bedrooms and a bathroom. There is a parking place in front of the house.
neighborhood_overview: Our home is located not far from the city center of Antwerp on a beautiful location opposite of a large city park. The area is very trendy with some very nice bars, restaurants and coffee places. There are multiple supermarkets at walking distance. Our home is located not far from the cozy square Dagraadplaats. In our street you will find one of Antwerp's most famous bars and in summer there is also a summer bar in the park.
host_about: Hi there, I'm a Belgian city planner and happy to host you in Antwerp where I live with my wife and our son.

name: B&B Borgerhouse Antwerp Central Station Borgerhout
description:
Moorkens Room:

Spacious and bright room located at the front, with beautiful views of the wooded square and the monumental old town house of Borgerhout.

Room named after Lodewijk Moorkens, mayor of Borgerhout from 1884 to 1904, who had the town hall built and after whom this square was named. Decoration with historical pictures of this monument of Flemish Neo-Renaissance.

B&B open from 1 July 2020.

Breakfast possible: €12,50 pp.

The space
Sleep in a lovely queen-size boxspring bed.

Healthy breakfast in the room, with oven-fresh rolls, yoghurt, muesli, fruit, spreads... Nespresso coffee machine, tea and water permanently available in the room. Lactose-free, vegetarian or halal breakfast available on request.

Private bathroom with shower and washbasin. Separate private toilet. Soap and shower products, hairdryer and towels (no washcloths) available. Honesty bar with soft drinks, beer, wine, cava and
neighborhood_overview:
B&B Borgerhouse is located in the heart of Borgerhout (Antwerp), on the traffic-free Moorkensplein.

The ideal base to explore Antwerp and its surroundings from a different angle. The Moorkensplein was beautifully redeveloped a few years ago and is an attraction in the super-diverse Borgerhouse. Restaurants and shops nearby.

Antwerp Central Station, Antwerp Zoo, De Roma arts centre or Zeno X art gallery are all within walking distance. Just like the trendy Zurenborg with its listed Belle Epoque houses on the Cogels-Osylei and its cosy terraces on the Dageraadplaats. The Sportpaleis, the MAS and Park Spoor Noord are within cycling distance.
host_about:
Ik woon al mijn hele leven in Antwerpen, waarvan de laatste 20 jaar in het superdiverse Borgerhout. De voorbije jaren is hier veel ten goede veranderd. Vandaag is Borgerhout het hippe Boho en de ideale uitvalsbasis om eens iets anders in Antwerpen te ontdekken. We bouwden 2 luxueuze B&B-kamers in ons veel te grote huis op het verkeersvrije Moorkensplein, hartje Borgerhout. Verlaat eens de platgetreden toeristische paden en laat je Borgerhouts verrassen. O ja, momenteel schrijf ik een reisgids over Borgerhout, voor alle toevallige en blijvende passanten... :-)

Your host Marc
I have lived in Antwerp all my life, the last 20 years of which in the super-diverse Borgerhout. A lot has changed for the better here in recent years. Today Borgerhout is the trendy Boho and the ideal base to discover something different in Antwerp. 
We built 2 luxurious B&B rooms in our far too big house on the traffic free Moorkensplein, in the heart of Borgerhout. Leave the beaten tourist paths and let your Borgerhouts surprise you. Oh yes, at the moment I'm writing a travel guide about Borgerhout, for all coincidental and permanent passers-by... :-)

===

Votre hôte Marc

name: B&B Borgerhouse near De Roma Antwerp Borgerhout
description:
"Giant Room":
Spacious and quiet room, located at the rear, with cozy cocoon feeling.
Room named and decorated after the Borgerhout giants.
B & B open from 1 July 2020.

Breakfast possible: €12,50 pp.

The space
Sleep in a lovely queen-size boxspring bed.

Healthy breakfast in the room, with oven-fresh rolls, yoghurt, muesli, fruit, spreads... Nespresso coffee machine, tea and water permanently available in the room. Lactose-free, vegetarian or halal breakfast available on request.

Private bathroom with shower and washbasin. Separate private toilet. Soap and shower products, hairdryer and towels (no washcloths) available. Honesty bar with soft drinks, beer, wine, cava and snacks.

Guest access
A shared hospitality room with honesty bar and fridge is located on the mezzanine floor.

Other things to note
You will stay in a house that is occupied above and below you by a family

description:
U Eat & Sleep is een ch

The space
U Eat & Sleep is een charmant boetiekhotel met 15 luxekamers gelegen op 't Eilandje in Antwerpen. Met zicht op de jachthaven en het MAS. U kan er genieten van een zalige cocktail in onze bar, een ontbijt, lunch of diner in het restaurant en genieten van de zon aan het water op ons geweldige terras.
neighborhood_overview: 't Eilandje in Antwerpen is de hipste buurt van de stad. Geleden aan het water en op wandelafstand van alle trekpleisters van Antwerpen. Het historisch centrum, de hippe winkelstraten, de vele musea zoals het Rubenshuis, Red Star Line en het MAS.

description:
Guest access
My house is located on the left bank of the river in a quiet street. On walking distance you have the Marina, an open air swimming pool, the walking promenade next to the river the Scheldt with different restaurants. Nearby you have a supermarkt. It is very easy to go to the center. You can do this by bus, tram, bicycle, boat or on foot. Using the pedestrian tunnel to the center is a unique experience.

host_about:
#JAMES uw BnB Butler

Ik ben op de achtergrond beschikbaar voor vragen tijdens uw verblijf, ik doe er alles aan om u zo goed mogelijk te ontvangen & waar nodig, te assisteren met allerhande zaken, zodat u het maximale uit uw verblijf kunt halen.

Indien gewenst kan ik zorgen voor extra's, denk hierbij aan;

- huren van fietsen?
- golfkar huren?
- ontbijtservice?
- restaurant reserveren? 
- boodschappen doen zodat u "thuis"komt met een gevulde  ijskast?
- wijn, bier, fles champagne koud zetten? 
- Verse bloemen?

Happy to help, laat mij uw wensen weten, en ik regel het voor u! Heeft u vragen, twijfel niet om mij deze te stellen

at your service #JAMES uw BnB Butler

name: SHWAY60 Family House
description:
The SHWAY60 Family House is a beautiful renovated house in downtown Antwerp for up to 10 people. It consists out of 3 apartments: The Red With Pearls, The Black Pants and The Suit. These apartments are connected to each other by a steep spiral staircase. There are three bedrooms, three living spaces, three kitchens and three bathrooms in total, spread over 5 floors. It is perfect for a big family, a group of friends, colleagues, workshops, meetings and so on and so on!

The space
In the ground floor apartment you can find the big three meter table where you can have dinner and gather the whole group. Two people can sleep here in a queen size boxspring bed and they will have their own bathroom too.
The first floor duplex-apartment sleeps 4: two in a queen size boxspring bed in a separate bedroom, the other two on separate sofa beds in the living room. This apartment has one bathroom and one kitchen and a cute balcony where you can hang out with good weather.
neighborhood_overview: We can assure you that this is just the best neighborhood of Antwerp. Super central, a quiet street, close to public transfer and free parking Zuiderdokken, in the middle of the best shopping streets and within 10 minutes walking distance from the best restaurants, cafés and museums. The district is called Sint-Andries and it is located in the southern part of the city centre. The district is bordered by the "Historical Center" in the north, the "Theaterbuurt" in the east and "Het Zuid" in the south. Nowadays, it is the fashion centre of the city and a lot of famous Belgian designers are located here. Vintage, design, interior, fashion and boutiques are key words for what to find in this area.
host_about: SHWAY is a short and long-term rental company with three own buildings in the heart of the city Antwerp, Belgium. Interior designer Stekkie Amsterdam took care of all our apartments, to stay in one of them and feel the interior is already an experience! The founder and host Liselore is a specialist in giving you the best time in Antwerp, whether you are traveling for fashion or fun or you want to come for business, she has the best insider tips during your stay!

Ellen

description:
spacious 105 m2 2 bedroom apartment in the heart of Antwerp, walking distance from Central station and city center.

The space

the biggest bedroom holds a television and comes with free use of my netflix account. There is also a mini fridge.

name: Vintage-design apartment in the best area in town
description:
Lovely 1-bedroom apartment situated in the best neighborhood of fabulous Antwerp: “Zurenborg". Famous for it’s cosy squares, nice restaurants & bars and beautiful architecture! Close to just about everything: the city-centre, train-& busstations, highway, … but just far enough from the centre to find a bit of peace and quiet. Welcome to the village in the city! The apartment is located on the 2nd floor of a beautiful 50’s inspired townhouse in the best street of Antwerp. No kidding. :)

The space
The interior has plenty of vintage-design & furniture gems making your stay full of character and definitely Insta-worthy.
The apartment holds one big living-room featuring a dining-table for 4 and a very nice leather couch with pouf to dream away while watching your favorite Netflix-show.
It also has a private kitchen with induction-cooker, a Smeg-fridge and a all needed kitchen amenities.
It connects to the bedroom which also features a flat-screen telev
neighborhood_overview: As said in the introduction this really ís everyone's favorite place to stay. Zurenborg is solid gold.  It's within walking distance of the busy city-centre (20 minutes) but most visitors prefer to stay within reach: we've got everything you could possibly need: the best restaurants, the hottest bars, cocktails, snacks, supermarkets, architecture. You name it, we've got it.
host_about: Hi, I'm Ray! A 42-year-old lover of mid-century architecture and vintage-design. I rent out a few 'rough-design' lofts in the 'Groen Kwartier'-area, and a mid-century meets art-deco house in the Zurenborg-area. The newest addition is being built in the promised land: Portugal! ;) Always looking for new ventures and opportunities. Welcome!

name: spacious and light apartment in Antwerp
description:
Dit ruime en lichte appartement is centraal gelegen en is de perfecte uitvalsbasis om Antwerpen te ontdekken. Het is gelegen tussen het groen kwartier (PAKT (10 min te voet), brouwerij De Koninck (10min te voet) en de theaterbuurt/historisch centrum (13 min wandelen).

The space
Het appartement bestaat uit een ruim leefgedeelte met semi-open keuken, een eettafel, een sofa met koffietafeltjes en een beamer om films te kijken (chromecast geïnstalleerd). De keuken is voorzien van alle basisvoorzieningen: een hetelucht oven, microgolfoven, ruime koelkast, diepvriezer, warm waterketel, gasvuren, bestek, glazen .... Er zijn 2 WC's beschikbaar, waarvan 1 in de badkamer. De 'masterbedroom' beschikt over een ruim tweepersoonsbed. Er is ook een TV aanwezig in de slaapkamer (chromecast). In de bibliotheek staat een uitvouwbare slaapbank voor max. 2 personen. Als gast mag u gebruik maken van alle spelletjes en boeken die u kan vinden in de bibliotheek. Er is een ligbad met
neighborhood_overview: Leuke activiteiten in deze Harmonie wijk: 2 parkjes op 8 minuten wandelen. In de zomer komen locals daar verkoeling zoeken. Brouwerij De Koninck is niet alleen een brouwerij: er is een restaurant, een rooftop cocktail bar, bakkerij, een slager ... alles van topkwaliteit. Je kan natuurlijk ook een gegidste rondleiding in de brouwerij zelf boeken. Wat verder is er de site van PAKT waar lokale hipsters koffie komen drinken in Caffenation, waar je vele belgische bieren kan gaan proeven (inclusief proefplankje) in 'cafe Speciale Belge'. Er zijn ook enkele restaurants. Wil je eerder de richting van het historische centrum uit, dan ben je ook weer snel bij enkele hotspots. Na een klein kwartier wandelen ben je al aan het mechelseplein waar enkele leuke cafeetjes zijn. Nog wat verder ben je in het midden van het historisch centrum: de huidevetterstraat, de kathedraal, de grote markt,  Meir etc.
host_about: Wij zijn Filip en Lenah. Een jong koppel wonende in Antwerpen. Wij verhuren met veel plezier ons appartement aan al wie Antwerpen wil komen verkennen of een rustig en ruim appartement nodig heeft.

name: Sunlit Gem in historic city center (1)
description:
You will stay in a corner apartment on the third floor in the historic city center of Antwerp. The ideal home base for exploring the city. You'll stay there with the host (Jens) who likes to share the apartment with you as if it were your own home. You'll share the whole apartment, but you'll have your own private room.

The space
You have a private room with a single bed and desk. Th living room is the jewel of the apartment because it is flooded in light during the whole day (and yes we have a view on the Cathedral!) The bathroom has a shower, sink and washer/dryer. The kitchen is equipped with all the necessary comfort. You are free to use everything.

name: Home away from home
description:
Spacious, light, quiet 100m2 flat. The apartment contains an entrance hall with desk, equipped kitchen, balcony, bathroom with bath / shower, separate toilet, sitting room with corner sofa (can be converted into a sofa bed for 2 people) and internet TV, spacious dining room, bedroom for 2 people, dressing room. Bed, kitchen and bath linen are provided.

Other things to note
The apartment is located on the 2nd and top floor. This means that you will not be bothered by upstairs neighbors, but you do have downstairs neighbors to take into account.
The central hallway walls need replastering here and there which is under negotiation with the other two owners in the building.
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located in the Expowijk or Tentoonstellingswijk, just outside the historic city center near the Antwerp Expo. Numerous architectural masterpieces from the interwar period and the 1950s and 1960s are hidden here. Since 2015, the city of Antwerp has had this district fully mapped out by heritage specialists. The result can now be viewed online. A walk through the neighborhood is definitely worth it!  The district also has a small supermarket, a real Belgian chip shop De Vest, a small Italian trattoria Da Giacomo and a cozy French-Belgian Bistro Camille. You will find other tips & tricks for a top weekend in Antwerp in the apartment.
host_about: Low maintenance travel, food, pet and life lover!

name: A little piece of paradise @ Casa Sol Antwerp
description:
Casa Sol is a lovely, cosy apartment located right next to the famous cathedral of Antwerp. Recently refurbished to a very high standard, it is ideal for families with children, business travellers, and groups up to 4 people that are looking for a comfortable and peaceful stay in one of the most characteristic local neighbourhoods of the city. Stay here if you want to experience the city vibe of Antwerp, surrounded by many highlights.

The space
Casa Sol offers that bit of extra space to comfortably stay in. It comes with a spacious living area, large dining table and fully-equipped kitchen. The space is suitable for a long stay; washing machine & dryer, coffee machine, vacuum cleaner, iron, as well as a TV are all included.

Other things to note
This apartment is refurbished with a lot of love, and we highly value respect for materials and for the neighbours! 😀 Please keep it quiet between 11pm and 8am, and strictly no parties!

P
neighborhood_overview:
Casa Sol is situated on the vibrant square called 'Lijnwaadmarkt', right next to the beautiful cathedral of Antwerp. This is one of the most famous sights in Antwerp. Within a radius of 50 meters you will find a night shop, the café 'Red Pelican' , and the chocolatebar Quetzal.
The most popular highlights of Antwerp like the Great Market Square, the Schelde, the Cathedral, Brabo staue, Meir shopping street and Groenplaats are all located within 1 km.

name: Unique bohemian inspired room in the city center
description:
We offer a bright and spacious room with bohemian accents and high ceilings.

Our house is located in the calm Zurenborg neighbourhood. Here you can find many nice restaurants and bars The train station is only a few minutes walk and public transport and bikes are around the corner.

If we are around, feel free to dip in the heated pool and relax outside in our tropical city garden. Instagram: @urbantropicalgarden

We are happy to serve breakfast or even lunch/dinner on your request.

The space
This historical mansion was designed in 1891 and was part of a project under supervision of Ernest Dieltiëns for the family Nottebohm.
Its neoclassical style is very charming and the balcony stands out from all other houses in the street.

name: Newly renovated FineWineJunkies Apartment
description:
The newly renovated and hip apartment (65m2) is located in a modern renovated authentic “Hoekhuis" where you can also find wine in our pop-up wine shop. You have your own entrance and will find a light and spacious room with a fully equipped kitchen, living and dining area, high-speed internet and a separate bedroom with original mosaic floor. Parking space (payable) is easy to find in this cool and trendy area close to the Koninck brewery, Groen kwartier, Convention center, bars and shops.

The space
You enter the spacious and light living and dining area from the street. The sofa and TV invite you to chill, and the wooden dining table can seat 4 or be your home office space. There is a fully equipped open kitchen with all amenities including dish-washer, oven, gas stove and Nespresso machine. From the living room you can enter the sleeping room with a 160x200m bed, wardrobe and an authentic mosaic floor. The bathroom has a marble washing table, walk-in shower,
neighborhood_overview: There is a great bar around the corner called "Cantaloop" Other nearby places are the Koninck brewery and PAKT for dining and drinks. Nachtegalen Park and Park Den Brandt are very close, if you like it "green" and want to go for a run or bike ride. There is a large supermarket over the street and lots of small shops in walking distance.

Make yourself comfortable in our spacious living area.
Have a seat in the velvet couch, while immersing yourself in a fine selection of books and magazines.
Gather at our dining table to enjoy breakfast, lunch and dinner.

The kitchen is fully equipped and ready to facilitate your Masterchef & Bake-off worthy challenges
neighborhood_overview:

Explore - by foot or city bike - Antwerp’s coolest shopping & fashion districts (1 minute walking distance), the historic city center (5 minutes walking distance) and trendy ’t Zuid (5 minutes walking distance).

description:
Bright, new flat of 65 sq meters that comfortably fits 2 people. Flat has a real cozy feel, with lush furnishings & is fully equipped w/ new kitchen & bathroom. Located in Antwerp South's trendy Marnix Place - walking distance to restaurants & shops!

The space
This charming, modern one bedroom apartment is located in the true center of Antwerpse Zuid. Just around the corner you will find Marnixplaats and Leopold de Waelplaats, two of the city's most charming squares, filled with hip bars, great restaurants with outdoor terraces and nice cozy cafés.

It is the ideal location to explore Antwerp by foot. Just a ten minute walk to the Nationalestraat away from the Groenplaats and the historical centre of Antwerp. A five minute walk up to the "Kaaien", from which you can admire the river Schelt. And another five minute walk to the "Huidevettersstraat", one of the main shopping areas!

name: Exclusief Art & Design  Boetiekhotel Lit d'Art -
description:
ARCHITECTURAAL PARELTJE
Lit d'art is ondergebracht in een art-nouveau herenhuis dat behoort tot ‘De vijf werelddelen’, het beroemde woningensemble van architect F. Smet-Verhas. En het ligt in de bruisende Antwerpse wijk Het Zuid, op wandelafstand van het Museum voor Schone Kunsten. Kortom, een architecturaal pareltje op een droomlocatie.
Lit d'Art beschikt over vier luxueuze suites en een wellnessruimte .
Hier kunnen haar gasten zich na een druk dagje Antwerpen volledig ontspannen.

The space
KUNST EN DESIGN
Lit d’Art rijmt art nouveau met hedendaags design. Aida stelde het interieur met veel zorg en oog voor detail samen. Val je voor een van de kunst- en designobjecten? Pols dan gerust naar de prijs: de meeste werken en meubelen zijn te koop.

FILOSOFIE
Alles in Lit d’Art – van het logo tot het interieur – ademt dezelfde filosofie: de gasten rust en inspiratie bieden.
neighborhood_overview:
Lit d’Art ligt op wandelafstand van verschillende hotspots in Antwerpen, zoals het Koninklijk Museum voor Schone Kunsten, het Rubenshuis en de Grote Markt. Het modedistrict is dichtbij. Hou je van design en antiek? Trek dan zeker eens naar de Leopoldstraat of de Kloosterstraat.
Lit d'Art is gevestigd op het Zuid met zijn vele culinaire adresjes op het vlak van restaurants en bars.
Ben je op zoek naar meer tips? Dan helpt Aida je graag verder.

Beleef Antwerpen als een local

Zoek je een unieke plek om te overnachten tijdens je citytrip of ben je als expat op zoek naar iets met persoonlijkheid? Dan voel je je vast en zeker thuis in ons appartement in Antwerpen, waar design, comfort en huiselijkheid samenkomen.

The space
Op de eerste verdieping kom je binnen in de gezellige keuken met bakstenen muur. De zitkamer is heerlijk om languit een boek te lezen, muziek te beluisteren of een film te kijken. Verder beschik je over een compacte badkamer met douche en aparte slaapkamer met tweepersoonsbed. name: Happert House at Vlaanderen
description:
“A hidden jewel in the heart of Antwerp": For the first time in centuries, Happert House once again welcomes guests to this exclusive location in the heart of the city. Once the favoured residence of mayors, dignitaries and professors, this noble home is rich in history and character.
Immerse yourself in the unique atmosphere that is Happert House: a place where life is always fantastic!

Whether it be in the spacious courtyard or one of the many beautifully appointed rooms by an open fireplace, there are several places where people can relax and sit quietly together.

This luxurious, welcoming and stylish setting is ideally suited to virtually any form of meeting, event or workshop. Happert House can easily accommodate up to 12 guests.

The space
“A hidden jewel in the heart of Antwerp": For the first time in centuries, Happert House once again welcomes guests to this exclusive location in the heart of the city. Once the favour
neighborhood_overview:
Happert House is located in the middle of the historical part of Antwerp. There are unlimited bars and restaurants to discover such as Sir Anthony Van Dijck, which is one of the most famous restaurants with Michelin stars.

If you fancy art and culture, all the important museums and theatrehalls are within walking distance.  Want to go shopping? No problem! One street away from the House Happaert starts the fashion street for youngsters but also the chic boutiques like Dries Van Noten. There are activities for the entire family!

Transport will not be any problem while visiting Happert House because trams, trains, taxis and bicycles are to be found just around the corner.
host_about:
Our love affair with villa holidays first began in 2003 when Co-Founders Oliver and Ravi spent a week at a crumbling chateau in the Dordogne with a group of their closest friends. As fate would have it, that holiday was the start of something special. It was the beginning of Oliver’s Travels.

Today, we have over 6,000 hand-picked villas, chateaux and holiday homes across the top holiday destinations – with new regions launching every year. 

Before deciding on the where, it’s important to consider what you want from your villa holiday. Is it to relax around the pool, dining al-fresco with a spot of sightseeing? Or you are looking for an action-packed trip? Whatever you decide, it’s a good idea to put your requirements at the forefront when discussing with our travel experts who are the best in the business and we have countless awards to match. Trust us, we'll find you the perfect villa holiday to surpass your expectations. 

And the best part? Once you book a villa holiday, the service doesn't stop there. Our Free Concierge Service means you'll be in good hands to arrange catering & fridge stocking, housekeeping, childcare, tours & activities and so much more, to make your stay truly extraordinary.

name: Antwerpen-Zuid, prachtig huis met tuin en garage
description:
Prachtig gerenoveerd huis op het bruisende Antwerpen Zuid met inpandige garage en zonnige zuid-tuin in de buurt van Mukha, Momu en Fomu. Alle bezienswaardigheden op loopafstand en horeca-gelegenheiden op loopafstand

Other things to note
-> De douche beschikt over een fijne Hammam voor 2 personen met mozaiektegeltjes.
-> Twee fietsen (1 stadsfiets, 1 citybike) staan ter beschikking voor gebruik.
neighborhood_overview: Het Zuid is voor vele Antwerpenaren en bezoekers een grote aantrekkingspool. Je vindt er statige herenhuizen, wijde boulevards en mooie pleinen. Kunstliefhebbers halen hun hartje op dankzij de vele kunstgalerieën en musea als het FOMU en het M HKA. Dankzij de vele populaire cafés en restaurants is Het Zuid ook erg populair als uitgaansplek.
host_about: Onze B&B Antwerp For Two boek je vanaf 1 nacht in de week en 2 nachten in het weekend. Je verblijft in een ruime kamer, die zo ingericht werd dat je met 2 personen van een zalige nachtrust kan genieten. Je beschikt over een eigen badkamer (met verkwikkende regendouche en krachtige haardroger) en een apart toilet. Een ruime kluis waar je portable in past, wifi, digitale radio en smart-tv met soundbar zijn aanwezig. Na een bezoek aan de stad vind je rust op je terras. Heb je zin in een hapje of drankje, dan neem je dat zelf uit je goedgevulde Honesty Bar.

name: Small modern apartment in the city center
description:
This apartment is located in the center of Antwerp. It is located in a quiet neighborhood, yet close to everything. You have the local butchers and bakers nearby, as well as the nice restaurants and cafes. Also, the old center is only a 10 minute walk and public transport is nearby. The apartment was completely renovated in 2018 and is on the ground floor. It is in a 4 story block for students. This does not bother you, especially during the holidays, because they are not on site.

The space
The apartment consists of an entrance hall, separate kitchen, bedroom, living room and bathroom. You may also use the washing maching and if asked in advance, you can also use the iron.
neighborhood_overview: There are many nice places in the area, so you have 'Marnixplaats' within walking distance, the south and 'Mechelseplein'. Here you can relax in one of the nice restaurants and bars. If you like wine you have Tannin nearby or Avini. For nice cocktails I recommend Dogma Cocktails in the old center.

name: Soul Studio op toplocatie!
description:
We bieden een gezellige Studio in modern-vintage stijl recht aan de populaire en bruisende Marnixplaats in Antwerpen Zuid,
De Studio is voorzien van een comfortabele zithoek, een kitchenette, een groot tweepersoons bed en een private badkamer met inloop regendouche.
Er is gratis wifi en de kamer is voorzien van airconditioning,
De locatie biedt het perfecte startpunt om de leukste plekken van Antwerpen te ontdekken.
We houden het graag amicaal en informeel, good vibes!!

The space
De Studio kijkt recht uit op de Marnixplaats en het grote standbeeld 'Schelde Vrij', Het is een zeer levendige buurt, dus boek hier niet, als je voor rust & stilte komt :)
Er is een kitchenette met genoeg servies en kookgerei, mocht je zelf wat willen klaarmaken en er is een Illy espresso machine met espresso capsules voor een goede start van de dag.
In de douche vind je 2 verschillende douchegels van Rituals.
neighborhood_overview: 't Zuid staat bekend om zijn vele restaurants en uitgaansgelegenheden, de historische binnenstad is een kleine 15 minuten wandelen en tussen de Marnixplaats en de historische binnenstad vind je de leukere winkelstraten van Antwerpen. Het museum van Schone kunsten, MUHKA en fotografie museum vind je om de hoek.
